at the first god make the heaven and the earth . and the earth be waste and without form and it be dark on the face of the deep and the spirit of god be move on the face of the water . and god say let there be light and there be light . and god look on the light saw that it be good and god make a division between the light and the dark name the light day and the dark night . and there be even and there be morning the first day . and god say let there be a solid arch stretch over the water part the water from the water . and god make the arch for a division between the water which be under the arch and those which be over it and it be so . and god give the arch the name of heaven . and there be even and there be morning the second day . and god say let the water under the heaven come together in one place and let the dry land be see and it be so . and god give the dry land the name of earth and the water together in their place be name sea and god saw that it be good . and god say let grass come up on the earth and plant produce seed and fruit tree give fruit in which be their seed after their sort and it be so . and grass come up on the earth and every plant produce seed of it sort and every tree produce fruit in which be it seed of it sort and god saw that it be good . and there be even and there be morning the third day . and god say let there be light in the arch of heaven for a division between the day and the night and let them be for sign and for mark the change of the year and for day and for year and let them be for light in the arch of heaven to give light on the earth and it be so . and god make the two great light the great light to be the ruler of the day and the small light to be the ruler of the night and he make the star . and god put them in the arch of heaven to give light on the earth to have rule over the day and the night and for a division between the light and the dark and god saw that it be good . and there be even and there be morning the fourth day . and god say let the water be full of live thing and let bird be in flight over the earth under the arch of heaven . and god make great sea beast and every sort of living and move thing with which the water be full and every sort of winged bird and god saw that it be good . and god give them his bless say be fertile and have increase make all the water of the sea full and let the bird be increase in the earth . and there be even and there be morning the fifth day . and god say let the earth give birth to all sort of live thing cattle and all thing move on the earth and beast of the earth after their sort and it be so . and god make the beast of the earth after it sort and the cattle after their sort and everything move on the face of the earth after it sort and god saw that it be good . and god say let u make man in our image like u and let him have rule over the fish of the sea and over the bird of the air and over the cattle and over all the earth and over every living thing which go flat on the earth . and god make man in his image in the image of god he make him male and female he make them . and god give them his blessing and say to them be fertile and have increase and make the earth full and be master of it be ruler over the fish of the sea and over the bird of the air and over every living thing move on the earth . and god say see i have give you every plant produce seed on the face of all the earth and every tree which have fruit produce seed they will be for your food and to every beast of the earth and to every bird of the air and every living thing move on the face of the earth i have give every green plant for food and it be so . and god saw everything which he have make and it be very good . and there be even and there be morning the sixth day .and the heaven and the earth and all thing in them be complete . and on the seventh day god come to the end of all his work and on the seventh day he take his rest from all the work which he have do . and god give his blessing to the seventh day and make it holy because on that day he take his rest from all the work which he have make and do . these be the generation of the heaven and the earth when they be make . in the day when the lord god make earth and heaven there be no plant of the field on the earth and no grass have come up for the lord god have not send rain on the earth and there be no man to do work on the land . but a mist go up from the earth water all the face of the land . and the lord god make man from the dust of the earth breathe into him the breath of life and man become a living soul . and the lord god make a garden in the east in eden and there he put the man whom he have make . and out of the earth the lord make every tree to come delight the eye and good for food and in the middle of the garden the tree of life and the tree of the knowledge of good and evil . and a river go out of eden give water to the garden and from there it be part and become four stream . the name of the first be pishon which go round about all the land of havilah where there be gold . and the gold of that land be good there be bdellium and the onyx stone . and the name of the second river be gihon this river go round all the land of cush . and the name of the third river be tigris which go to the east of assyria . and the fourth river be euphrates . and the lord god take the man and put him in the garden of eden to do work in it and take care of it . and the lord god give the man order say you may freely take of the fruit of every tree of the garden but of the fruit of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil you may not take for on the day when you take of it death will certainly come to you . and the lord god say it be not good for the man to be by himself i will make one like himself a a help to him and from the earth the lord god make every beast of the field and every bird of the air and take them to the man to see what name he would give them and whatever name he give to any living thing that be it name . and the man give name to all cattle and to the bird of the air and to every beast of the field but adam have no one like himself a a help . and the lord god send a deep sleep on the man and take one of the bone from his side while he be sleep join up the flesh again in it place and the bone which the lord god have take from the man he make into a woman and take her to the man . and the man say this be now bone of my bone and flesh of my flesh let her name be woman because she be take out of man . for this cause will a man go away from his father and his mother and be join to his wife and they will be one flesh . and the man and his wife be without clothing and they have no sense of shame .now the snake be wise than any beast of the field which the lord god have make . and he say to the woman have god truly say that you may not take of the fruit of any tree in the garden ? and the woman say we may take of the fruit of the tree in the garden but of the fruit of the tree in the middle of the garden god have say if you take of it or put your hand on it death will come to you . and the snake say death will not certainly come to you for god see that on the day when you take of it fruit your eye will be open and you will be a god have knowledge of good and evil . and when the woman saw that the tree be good for food and a delight to the eye and to be desire to make one wise she take of it fruit and give it to her husband . and their eye be open and they be conscious that they have no clothing and they make themselves coat of leaf stitch together . and there come to them the sound of the lord god walking in the garden in the evening wind and the man and his wife go to a secret place among the tree of the garden away from the eye of the lord god . and the voice of the lord god come to the man say where be you ? and he say hear your voice in the garden i be full of fear because i be without clothing and i keep myself from your eye . and he say who give you the knowledge that you be without clothing ? have you take of the fruit of the tree which i say you be not to take ? and the man say the woman whom you give to be with me she give me the fruit of the tree and i take it . and the lord god say to the woman what have you do ? and the woman say i be trick by the deceit of the snake and i take it . and the lord god say to the snake because you have do this you be curse more than all cattle and every beast of the field you will go flat on the earth and dust will be your food all the day of your life and there will be war between you and the woman and between your seed and her seed by him will your head be crush and by you his foot will be wound . to the woman he say great will be your pain in childbirth in sorrow will your child come to birth still your desire will be for your husband but he will be your master . and to adam he say because you give ear to the voice of your wife and take of the fruit of the tree which i say you be not to take the earth be curse on your account in pain you will get your food from it all your life . thorn and waste plant will come up and the plant of the field will be your food with the hard work of your hand you will get your bread till you go back to the earth from which you be take for dust you be and to the dust you will go back . and the man give his wife the name of eve because she be the mother of all who have life . and the lord god make for adam and for his wife coat of skin for their clothing . and the lord god say now the man have become like one of u have knowledge of good and evil and now if he put out his hand and take of the fruit of the tree of life he will go on living for ever . so the lord god send him out of the garden of eden to be a worker on the earth from which he be take . so he send the man out and at the east of the garden of eden he put wing one and a flaming sword turn every way to keep the way to the tree of life .and the man have connection with eve his wife and she become with child and give birth to cain and say i have get a man from the lord . then again she become with child and give birth to abel his brother . and abel be a keeper of sheep but cain be a farmer . and after a time cain give to the lord an offering of the fruit of the earth . and abel give an offering of the young lamb of his flock and of their fat . and the lord be pleased with abel 's offering but in cain and his offering he have no pleasure . and cain be angry and his face become sad . and the lord say to cain why be you angry ? and why be your face sad ? if you do well will you not have honour ? and if you do wrong sin be wait at the door desire to have you but do not let it be your master . and cain say to his brother let u go into the field and when they be in the field cain make an attack on his brother abel and put him to death . and the lord say to cain where be your brother abel ? and he say i have no idea be i my brother 's keeper ? and he say what have you do ? the voice of your brother 's blood be cry to me from the earth . and now you be curse from the earth whose mouth be open to take your brother 's blood from your hand no longer will the earth give you her fruit a the reward of your work you will be a wanderer in flight over the earth . and cain say my punishment be great than my strength . you have send me out this day from the face of the earth and from before your face i will be a wanderer in flight over the earth and whoever see me will put me to death . and the lord say truly if cain be put to death seven life will be take for his . and the lord put a mark on cain so that no one might put him to death . and cain go away from before the face of the lord and make his living place in the land of nod on the east of eden . and cain have connection with his wife and she become with child and give birth to enoch and he make a town and give the town the name of enoch after his son . and enoch have a son irad and irad become the father of mehujael and mehujael become the father of methushael and methushael become the father of lamech . and lamech have two wife the name of the one be adah and the name of the other zillah . and adah give birth to jabal he be the father of such a be live in tent and keep cattle . and his brother 's name be jubal he be the father of all player on instrument of music . and zillah give birth to tubal cain who be the father of every maker of cut instrument of brass and iron and the sister of tubal cain be naamah . and lamech say to his wife adah and zillah give ear to my voice you wife of lamech give attention to my word for i would put a man to death for a wound and a young man for a blow if seven life be to be take a punishment for cain 's death seventy seven will be take for lamech 's . and adam have connection with his wife again and she give birth to a son to whom she give the name of seth for she say god have give me another seed in place of abel whom cain put to death . and seth have a son and he give him the name of enosh at this time men first make use of the name of the lord in worship .this . and god look on the earth saw that it be evil for the way of all flesh have become evil on the earth . and god say to noah the end of all flesh have come the earth be full of their violent doings and now i will put an end to them with the earth . make for yourself an ark of gopher wood with room in it and make it safe from the water inside and out . and this be the way you be to make it it be to be three hundred cubit long fifty cubit wide and thirty cubit high . you be to put a window in the ark a cubit from the roof and a door in the side of it and you be to make it with a low and second and third floor . for truly i will send a great flow of water over the earth for the destruction from under the heaven of all flesh in which be the breath of life everything on the earth will come to an end . but with you i will make an agreement and you will come into the ark you and your son and your wife and your son ' wife with you . and you will take with you into the ark two of every sort of live thing and keep them safe with you they will be male and female . two of every sort of bird and cattle and of every sort of living thing which go on the earth will you take with you to keep them seventy five year old when he go away from haran . and abram take sarai his wife and lot his brother 's son and all their good and the servant which they have get in haran and they go out to go to the land of canaan . and abram go through the land till he come to shechem to the holy tree of moreh . at that time the canaanite be still live in the land . and the lord come to abram and say i will give all this land to your seed then abram make an altar there to the lord who have let himself be see by him . and move on from there to the mountain on the east of beth el he put up his tent have beth el on the west and ai on the east and there he make an altar and give worship to the name of the lord . and he go on journeying still to the south . and because there be little food to be have in that land he go down into egypt . now when he come near to egypt he say to sarai his wife truly you be a fair woman and beautiful to the eye and i be certain that when the men of egypt see you they will say this be his wife and they will put me to death and keep you . say then that you be my sister and so it will be well with me because of you and my life will be keep safe on your account . and so it be that when abram come into egypt the men of egypt look on the woman saw that she be fair . and pharaoh 's great men have see her say word in praise of her to pharaoh and she be take into pharaoh 's house . and because of her he be good to abram and he have sheep and ox and ass and men servant and woman servant and camel . and the lord send great trouble on pharaoh 's house because of sarai abram 's wife . then pharaoh sent for abram and say what have you do to me ? why do you not say that she be your wife ? why do you say that she be your sister ? so that i take her for my wife now take your wife and go on your way . and pharaoh give order to his men and they send him on his way with his wife and all he have .and abram go up out of egypt with his wife and all he have and lot with him and they come in to the south . now abram have great wealth of cattle and silver and gold . and travel on from the south he come to beth el to the place where his tent have be before between beth el and ai to the place where he have make his first altar and there abram give worship to the name of the lord . and lot who go with him have flock and herd and tent so that the land be not wide enough for the two of them their property be so great that there be not room for them together . and there be an argument between the keeper of abram 's cattle and the keeper of lot 's cattle at that time the canaanite and perizzites be still live in the land . then abram say to lot let there be no argument between me and you and between my herdmen and your herdmen for we be brother . be not all the land before you ? then let u go our separate way if you go to the left i will go to the right or if you take the right i will go to the left . and lot lift up his eye and look an the valley of jordan saw that it be well water everywhere before the lord have send destruction on sodom and gomorrah it be like the garden of the lord like the land of egypt on the way to zoar . so lot take for himself all the valley of jordan and go to the east and they be part from one another . abram go on living in the land of canaan and lot go to the lowland town move his tent as far a sodom . now the men of sodom be evil and great sinner before the lord . and the lord have say to abram after lot be part from him from this place where you be take a look to the north and to the south to the east and to the west for all the land which you see i will give to you and to your seed for ever . and i will make your child like the dust of the earth so that if the dust of the earth may be number then will your child be number . come go through all the land from one end to the other for i will give it to you . and abram move his tent come and make his living place by the holy tree of mamre which be in hebron and make an altar there to the lord .now in the day of amraphel king of shinar arioch king of ellasar chedorlaomer king of elam and tidal king of goiim they make war with bera king of sodom and with birsha king of gomorrah shinab king of admah and shemeber king of zeboiim and the king of bela which be zoar . all these come together in the valley of siddim which be the salt sea . for twelve year they be under the rule of chedorlaomer but in the thirteenth year they put off his control . and in the fourteenth year chedorlaomer and the king who be on his side overcame the rephaim in ashteroth karnaim and the zuzim in ham and the emim in shaveh kiriathaim and the horites in their mountain seir drive them as far a el paran which be near the waste land . then they come back to en mishpat which be kadesh make waste all the country of the amalekites and of the amorites live in hazazon tamar . and the king of sodom with the king of gomorrah and the king of admah and the king of zeboiim and the king of bela that be zoar go out and put their force in position in the valley of siddim against chedorlaomer king of elam and tidal king of goiim and amraphel king of shinar and arioch king of ellasar four king against the five . now the valley of siddim be full of hole of sticky earth and the king of sodom and gomorrah be put to flight and come to their end there but the rest get away to the mountain . and the four king take all the good and food from sodom and gomorrah and go on their way . and in addition they take lot abram 's brother 's son who be live in sodom and all his good . and one who have get away from the fight come and give word of it to abram the hebrew who be live by the holy tree of mamre the amorite the brother of eshcol and aner who be friend of abram . and abram hearing that his brother 's son have be make a prisoner take a band of his trained men three hundred and eighteen of them son of his house and go after them as far a dan . and separate his force by night he overcome them put them to flight and go after them as far a hobah which be on the north side of damascus . and he get back all the good and lot his brother 's son with his good and the woman and the people . and when he be come back after put to flight chedorlaomer and the other king he have a meeting with the king of sodom in the valley of shaveh that be the king 's valley . and melchizedek king of salem the priest of the most high god take bread and wine and bless him say may the blessing of the most high god maker of heaven and earth be on abram and let the most high god be praise who have give into your hand those who be against you . then abram give him a tenth of all the good he have take . and the king of sodom say to abram give me the prisoner and take the good for yourself . but abram say to the king of sodom i have take an oath to the lord the most high god maker of heaven and earth that i will not take so much a a thread or the cord of a shoe of yours so that you may not say i have give wealth to abram give me nothing but the food which the fight men who go with me have have but let aner and eshcol and mamre have their part of the good .after these thing the word of the lord come to abram in a vision say have no fear abram i will keep you safe and great will be your reward . and abram say what will you give me ? for i have no child and this eliezer of damascus will have all my wealth after me . and abram say you have give me no child and a servant in my house will get the heritage . then say the lord this man will not get the heritage but a son of your body will have your property after you . and he take him out into the open air and say to him let your eye be lift to heaven and see if the star may be number even so will your seed be . and he have faith in the lord and it be put to his account a righteousness . and he say to him i be the lord who take you from ur of the chaldee to give you this land for your heritage . and he say o lord god how may i be certain that it will be mine ? and he say take a young cow of three year old and a she goat of three year old and a sheep of three year old and a dove and a young pigeon . all these he take cut them in two and put one half opposite the other but not cut the bird in two . and evil bird come down on the body but abram send them away . now when the sun be go down a deep sleep come on abram and a dark cloud of fear . and he say to abram truly your seed will be live in a land which be not theirs a servant to a people who will be cruel to them for four hundred year but i will be the judge of that nation whose servant they be and they will come out from among them with great wealth . a for you you will go to your father in peace at the end of a long life you will be put in your last resting place . and in the fourth generation they will come back here for at present the sin of the amorite be not full . then when the sun go down and it be dark he saw a smoking fire and a flaming light which go between the part of the body . in that day the lord make an agreement with abram and say to your seed have i give this land from the river of egypt to the great river the river euphrates the kenite the kenizzite and the kadmonite and the hittite and the perizzite and the rephaim and the amorite and the canaanite and the girgashite and the jebusite .now sarai abram 's wife have give him no child and she have a servant a woman of egypt whose name be hagar . and sarai say to abram see the lord have not let me have child go in to my servant for i may get a family through her . and abram do a sarai say . so after abram have be live for ten year in the land of canaan sarai take hagar her egyptian servant and give her to abram for his wife . and he go in to hagar and she become with child and when she saw that she be with child she no longer have any respect for her master 's wife . and sarai say to abram may my wrong be on you i give you my servant for your wife and when she saw that she be with child she no longer have any respect for me may the lord be judge between you and me . and abram say the woman be in your power do with her whatever seem good to you . and sarai be cruel to her so that she go run away from her . and an angel of the lord come to her by a fountain of water in the waste land by the fountain on the way to shur . and he say hagar sarai 's servant where have you come from and where be you go ? and she say i be run away from sarai my master 's wife . and the angel say to her go back and put yourself under her authority . and the angel of the lord say your seed will be greatly increase so that it may not be number . and the angel of the lord say see you be with child and will give birth to a son to whom you will give the name ishmael because the ear of the lord be open to your sorrow . and he will be like a mountain as among men his hand will be against every man and every man 's hand against him and he will keep his place against all his brother . and to the lord who be talk with her she give this name you be a god who be see for she say have i not even here in the waste land have a vision of god and be still live ? so that fountain be name fountain of life and vision it be between kadesh and bered . and hagar give birth to a child the son of abram to whom abram give the name of ishmael . abram be eighty six year old when hagar give birth to ishmael .when abram be ninety nine year old the lord come to him and say i be god ruler of all go in my way and be upright in all thing and i will make an agreement between you and me and your offspring will be greatly increase . and abram go down on his face on the earth and the lord god go on talk with him and say a for me my agreement be make with you and you will be the father of nation without end . no long will your name be abram but abraham for i have make you the father of a number of nation . i will make you very fertile so that nation will come from you and king will be your offspring . and i will make between me and you and your seed after you through all generation an eternal agreement to be a god to you and to your seed after you . and to you and to your seed after you i will give the land in which you be live all the land of canaan for an eternal heritage and i will be their god . and god say to abraham on your side you be to keep the agreement you and your seed after you through all generation . and this be the agreement which you be to keep with me you and your seed after you every male among you be to undergo circumcision . in the flesh of your private part you be to undergo it a a mark of the agreement between me and you . every male among you from one generation to another be to undergo circumcision when he be eight day old with every servant whose birth take place in your house or for whom you give money to someone of another country and not of your seed . he who come to birth in your house and he who be make yours for a price all be to undergo circumcision so that my agreement may be mark in your flesh an agreement for all time . and any male who do not undergo circumcision will be cut off from his people my agreement have be break by him . and god say a for sarai your wife from now her name will be not sarai but sarah . and i will give her a blessing so that you will have a son by her truly my blessing will be on her and she will be the mother of nation king of people will be her offspring . then abraham go down on his face and laughing say in his heart may a man a hundred year old have a child ? will sarah at ninety year old give birth ? and abraham say to god if only ishmael 's life might be your care ! and god say not so but sarah your wife will have a son and you will give him the name isaac and i will make my agreement with him for ever and with his seed after him . a for ishmael i have give ear to your prayer truly i have give him my blessing and i will make him fertile and give him great increase he will be the father of twelve chief and i will make him a great nation . but my agreement will be with isaac to whom sarah will give birth a year from this time . and have say these word god go up from abraham . and abraham take ishmael his son and all whose birth have take place in his house and all his servant whom he have make his for a price every male of his house and year old when he underwent circumcision . abraham and ishmael his son underwent circumcision on that very day . and all the men of his house those whose birth have take place in the house and those whom he have get for money from men of other land underwent circumcision with him .now the lord come to him by the holy tree of mamre when he be seat in the doorway of his tent in the middle of the not go away from your servant let me get water for wash your foot and take your rest under the tree and let me get a bit of bread to keep up your strength and after that you may go on your way for under the tree while they take food . and they say to him where be sarah your wife ? and he say she be in the tent . and he say i will certainly come back to you in the spring and sarah your wife will have a son . and his word come to the ear of sarah who be at the back of the tent door . now abraham and sarah be very old and sarah be past the time for give birth . and sarah laughing to herself say now that i be use up be i still to have pleasure my husband himself be old ? and the lord say why be sarah laughing and say be it possible for me be old to give birth to a child ? be there any wonder which the lord be not able to do ? at the time i say in the spring i will come back to you and sarah will have a child . then sarah say i be not laugh for she be full of fear . and he say no but you be laugh . and the men go on from there in the direction of sodom and abraham go with them on their way . and the lord say be i to keep back from abraham the knowledge of what i do see that abraham will certainly become a great and strong nation and his name will be use by all the nation of the earth a a blessing ? for i have make him mine so that he may give order to his child and those of his line after him to keep the way of the lord to do what be good and right so that the lord may do to abraham a he have say . and the lord say because the outcry against sodom and gomorrah be very great and their sin be very evil i will go down now and see if their act be as bad a they seem from the outcry which have come to me and if they be not i will see . and the men turn from that place go on to sodom but abraham be still wait before the lord . and abraham come near and say will you let destruction come on the upright with the sinner ? if by chance there be fifty upright men in the town will you give the place to destruction and not have mercy on it because of the fifty upright men ? let such a thing be far from you to put the upright to death with the sinner will not the judge of all the earth do right ? and the lord say if there be fifty upright men in the town i will have mercy on it because of them . and abraham answering say truly i who be only dust have undertake to put my thought before the lord if by chance there be five less than fifty upright men will you give up all the town to destruction because of these five ? and he say i will not give it to destruction if there be forty five . and again he say to him by chance there may be forty there . and he say i will not do it if there be forty . and he say let not the lord be angry with me if i say what if there be thirty there ? and he say i will not do it if there be thirty . and he say see now i have undertake to put my thought before the lord what if there be twenty there ? and he say i will have mercy because of the twenty . and he say o let not the lord be angry and i will say only one word more by chance there may be ten there . and he say i will have mercy because of the ten . and the lord go on his way when his talk with abraham be end and abraham go back to his place .and at nightfall the two angel come to sodom and lot be seat at the way into the town and when he saw them he get up and come before them fall down on his face to the earth . and he say my master come now into your servant 's house and take your rest there for the night and let your foot be wash and early in the morning you may go on your way . and they say not so but we will take our night 's rest in the street . but he make his request more strongly so they go with him into his house and he get food ready for them and make unleavened bread of which they take . but before they have go to bed the men of the town all the men of sodom come round the house young and old from every part of the town and cry out to lot they say where be the men who come to your house this night ? send them out to u so that we may take our pleasure with them . and lot go out to them in the doorway shut the door after him . and he say my brother do not this evil . see now i have two unmarried daughter i will send them out to you so that you may do to them whatever seem good to you only do nothing to these men for this be why they have come under the shade of my roof . and they say give way there . this one man they say come here from a strange country and will he now be our judge ? now we will do bad to you than to them and push violently against lot they come near to get the door break in . but the men put out their hand and take lot into the house to them shut the door again . but the men who be outside the door they make blind all of them small and great so that they be tire out with look for the door . then the men say to lot be there any others of your family here ? son in law or son or daughter take them all out of this place for we be about to send destruction on this place because a great outcry against them have come to the ear of the lord and the lord have send u to put an end to the town . and lot go when morning come the angel do all in their power to make lot go say get up quickly and take your wife and your two daughter who be here and go for fear that you come to destruction in the punishment of the town . but while he be wait the men take him and his wife and his daughter by the hand for the lord have mercy on them and put them outside the town . and when they have put them out he say go for your life without look back or wait in the lowland go quickly to the mountain or you will come to destruction . and lot say to them not so o my lord see now your servant have have grace in your there be it not a little one ? so that my life may be safe . and he say see i have give you your request in this one thing more i will not send destruction on this town . go there quickly for i be not able to do anything till you have come there . for this reason the town be name zoar . the sun be up when lot come to zoar . then the lord send fire and flame smoke rain down from heaven on sodom and gomorrah . and he send destruction on those town with all the lowland and all the people of those town and every green thing in the land . but lot 's wife look back become a pillar of salt . and abraham get up early in the morning and go to the place where he have be talk with the lord and look in the direction of sodom and gomorrah and the lowland he saw the smoke of the land go up like the smoke of an oven . so it come about that when god send destruction on the town of the lowland he keep his word to abraham and send lot safely away when he put an end to the town where he be live . then lot go up out of zoar to the mountain and be live there with his two daughter for fear keep him from living in zoar and he and his daughter make their living place in a hole in the rock . and the offspring by our father and that night they make their father take much wine and the old daughter go into his bed and he have no knowledge of when she go in or when she go away . and on the day after the old daughter say to the young last night i be with my father let u make him take much wine this night again and do you go to him so that we may have offspring by our father . and that night again they make their father take much wine and the young daughter go into his bed and he have no knowledge of when she go in or when she go away . and so the two daughter of lot be with child by their father . and the old daughter have a son and she give him the name moab he be the father of the moabites to this day . and the young have a son and give him the name ben ammi from him come the child of ammon to this day .and abraham go on his way from there to the land of the south and be live between kadesh and shur in gerar . and abraham say of sarah his wife she be my sister and abimelech king hand have i do this . and god say to him in the dream i see that you have do this with an upright heart and i have keep you from sin against me for this reason i do not let you come near her . so now give the man back his wife for he be a prophet and let him say a prayer for you so your life may be safe but if you do not give her back be certain that death will come to you and all your house . so wrong have i do you that you have put on me and on my kingdom so great a sin ? you have do to me thing which be not to be do . and abimelech say to abraham why do you do this thing ? and abraham say because it seem to me that there be no fear of god in this place and that they might put me to death because of my wife . and in fact she be my sister the daughter of my father but not the daughter of my mother and she become my wife and when god send me wander from my father 's house i say to her let this be the sign of your love for me wherever we go say of me he be my brother . then abimelech a nation of the son of your servant woman because he be your seed . and early in the morning abraham get up and give hagar some bread and a water skin and put the boy on her back and send her away and the philistine . and abraham after plant a holy tree in beer sheba give worship to the name of the lord the eternal god . and abraham go on living in the land of the philistine a in a strange country .now after these thing god put abraham to the test and say to him abraham and he say here be i. and he say to him take your son your dearly love only son isaac and go to the land of moriah and give then he say to his young men keep here with the as and i and the boy will go on and give worship and come back again to you . and abraham put the wood for the burned offering on his son 's back and he himself take the fire and the knife in his hand and the two of them go on together . then isaac say to abraham my father and he say here be i my son . and he say we have wood and fire here but where and there abraham make the altar and put the wood in place on it and have make tight the band round isaac his son he put him on the wood on the altar . and stretch out his hand abraham take the knife to put his son to death . but the voice of the angel of the lord come from heaven say abraham abraham and he say here be i. and he say let not your hand be stretch out against the boy to do anything
