and the voice of the angel of the lord come to abraham a second time from heaven say i have take an oath by my name say the lord because you have do this and have not keep back from me your dearly love only son that i will certainly give you my bless and your seed will be increase like the star of heaven and the sand by the seaside your seed will take the land of those who be against them and your seed will be a blessing to all the nation of the earth because you have do what i give you order to do . then abraham go back to his young men and they go together to beer sheba the place where abraham be live . after these thing abraham have news that milcah the wife of his brother nahor have give birth to child uz the old and buz his brother and kemuel the father of aram and chesed and hazo and pildash and jidlaph and bethuel . bethuel be the father of rebekah these eight be the child of milcah and nahor abraham 's brother . and his servant reumah give birth to tebah and gaham and tahash and maacah .now the year of sarah 's life be a hundred and twenty seven . and sarah 's death take place in kiriath arba that be hebron in the land of canaan and abraham go into his house weeping and sorrow for sarah . and abraham come from his dead and say to the child of heth i be live among you a one from a strange country give me some land here a my property so that i may put my dead to rest . and in answer the child of heth say to abraham my lord truly you be a great chief among u take the best of our resting place for your dead not one of u will keep back from you a place where you may put your dead to rest . and abraham get up and give honour to the child of heth the people of that land . and he say to them if you will let me put my dead to rest here make a request for me to ephron the son of zohar that he will give me the hollow in the rock name machpelah which be his property at the end of his field let him give it to me for it full price a a rest place for my dead among you . now ephron be seat among the child of heth and ephron the hittite give abraham his answer in the hearing of the child of heth and of all those who come into his town say no my lord i will give you the field with the hollow in the rock before all the child of my people will i give it to you for a resting place for your dead . and abraham go down on his face before the people of the land . and abraham say to ephron in the hearing of the people of the land if only you will give ear to me i will give you the price of the field take it and let me put my dead to rest there . so ephron say to abraham my lord give ear to me the value of the land be four hundred shekel what be that between me and you ? so put your dead to rest there . and abraham take note of the price fix by ephron in the hearing of the child of heth and give him four hundred shekel in current money . so ephron 's field at machpelah near mamre with the hollow in the rock and all the tree in the field and round it become the property of abraham before the eye of the child of heth and of all who come into the town . then abraham put sarah his wife to rest in the hollow rock in the field of machpelah near mamre that be hebron in the land of canaan . and the field and the hollow rock be hand over to abraham a his property by the child of heth .now abraham be old and far on in year and the lord have give him everything in full measure . and abraham say to his chief servant the manager of all his property come now put your hand under my leg and take an oath by the lord the god of heaven and the god of the earth that you will not get a wife for my son isaac from the daughter of the canaanite among whom i be live but that you will go into my country and to my relation and get a wife there for my son isaac . and the servant say if by chance the woman will not come with me into this land be i to take your son back again to the land from which you come ? and abraham say take care that you do not let my son go back to that land . the lord god of heaven who take me from my father 's house and from the land of my birth and make an oath to me say to your seed i will give this land he will send his angel before you and give you a wife for my son in that land . and if the woman will not come with you then you be free from this oath only do not take my son back there . and the servant put his hand under abraham 's leg and give him his oath about this thing . and the servant take ten of his master 's camel and all sort of good thing of his master 's and go to mesopotamia to the town of nahor . and he make the camel take their rest outside the town by the water spring in the evening at the time when the woman come to get water . and he say o lord the god of my master abraham let me do well in what i have undertake this day and give your mercy to my master abraham . see i be wait here by the water spring and the daughter of the town be come out to get water now may the girl to whom i say let down your vessel and give me a drink and who say in answer here be a drink for you and let me give water to your camel may she be the one mark out by you for your servant isaac so may i be certain that you have be good to my master abraham . and even before his word be end rebekah the daughter of bethuel the son of milcah who be the wife of nahor abraham 's brother come out with her water vessel on her arm . she be a very beautiful girl a virgin who have never be touch by a man and she go down to the spring to get water in her vessel . and the servant come run to her and say give me a little water from your vessel . and she say take a drink my lord and quickly let down her vessel onto her hand she give him a drink . and have do so she say i will get water for your camel till they have have enough . and after put the water from her vessel into the animal ' drinking place she go quickly back to the spring and get water for all the camel . and the man look at her say nothing wait to see if the lord have give his journey a good outcome . and when the camel have have enough the man take a gold nose ring half a shekel in weight and two ornament for her arm of ten shekel weight of gold and say to her whose daughter be you ? be there room in your father 's house for u ? and she say to him i be the daughter of bethuel the son of milcah nahor 's wife . and she say we have a great store of dry grass and cattle food and there be room for you . and with bent head the man give worship to the lord and say praise be to the lord the god of my master abraham who have give a sign that he be good and true to my master by guide me straight to the house of my master 's family . so the girl go run and take the news of these thing to her mother 's house now rebekah have a brother name laban and he come out quickly to the man at the water spring . and when he saw the nose ring and the ornament on his sister 's hand and when she give him word of what the man have say to her then he go out to the man who be wait with the camel by the water spring . and he say to him come in you on whom be the blessing of the lord why be you wait outside ? for i have make the house ready for you and a place for the camel . then the man come into the house and laban take their cord off the camel and give them dry grass and food and he give to him and the men who be with him water for wash their foot . and meat be put before him but he say i will not take food till i have make my business clear to you . and they say do so . and he say i be abraham 's servant . the lord have give my master every blessing and he have become great he have give him flock and herd and silver and gold and men servant and woman servant and camel and ass . and when sarah my master 's wife be old she give birth to a son to whom he have give all he have . and my master make me take an oath say do not get a wife for my son from the daughter of the canaanite among whom i be live but go to my father 's house and to my relation for a wife for my son . and i say to my master what if the woman will not come with me ? and he say the lord whom i have ever keep before me will send his angel with you who will make it possible for you to get a wife for my son from my relation and my father 's house and you will be free from your oath to me when you come to my people and if they will not give her to you you will be free from your oath . and i come today to the water spring and i say o lord the god of my master abraham if it be your purpose to give a good outcome to my journey let it come about that while i be wait here by the water spring if a girl come to get water and i say to her give me a little water from your vessel and she say take a drink and i will get water for your camel let her be the woman mark out by the lord for my master 's son . and even while i be say this to myself rebekah come out with her vessel on her arm and she go down to the spring to get water and i say to her give me a drink . and straight away she take down her vessel from her arm and say take a drink and i will get water for your camel . and question her i say whose daughter be you ? and she say the daughter of bethuel the son of nahor and milcah his wife . then i put the ring on her nose and the ornament on her hand . and with bent head i give worship and praise to the lord the god of my master abraham by whom i have be guide in the right way to get the daughter of my master 's brother for his son . and now say if you will do what be good and right for my master or not in order that it may be clear to me what i have to do . then laban and bethuel say in answer this be the lord 's do it be not for u to say yes or no to you . see here be rebekah take her and go and let her be your master 's son 's wife a the lord have say . and at these word abraham 's servant go down on his face and give praise to the lord . then he take jewel of silver and jewel of gold and fair robe and give them to rebekah and he give thing of value to her mother and her brother . then he and the men who be with him have food and drink and take their rest there that night and in the morning he get up and say let me now go back to my master . but her brother and her mother say let the girl be with u a week or ten day and then she may go . and he say do not keep me the lord have give a good outcome to my journey let me now go back to my master . and they say we will send for the girl and let her make the decision . and they send for rebekah and say to her be you ready to go with this man ? and she say i be ready . so they send their sister rebekah and her servant with abraham 's servant and his men . and they give rebekah their blessing say o sister may you be the mother of thousand and ten thousand and may your seed overcome all those who make war against them . so rebekah and her servant woman go with the man seat on the camel and so the servant take rebekah and go on his way . now isaac have come through the waste land to beer lahai roi for he be live in the south . and when the evening be near he go wander out into the field and lift up his eye he saw camel come . and when rebekah look up saw isaac she get down from her camel and say to the servant who be that man come to u through the field ? and the servant say it be my master then she take her veil cover her face with it . then the servant give isaac the story of all he have do . and isaac take rebekah into his tent and she become his wife and in his love for her isaac be comfort after his father 's death .and abraham take another wife name keturah . she become the mother of zimran and jokshan and medan and midian and ishbak and shuah . and jokshan become the father of sheba and dedan . and from dedan come the asshurim and letushim and leummim . and from midian come ephah and epher and hanoch and abida and eldaah . all these be the offspring of keturah . now abraham give all his property to isaac but to the son of his other woman he give offering and send them away while he be still live into the east country . now the year of abraham 's life be a hundred and seventy five . and abraham come to his death an old man full of year and he be put to rest with his people . and isaac and ishmael his son put him to rest in the hollow rock of machpelah in the field of ephron the son of zohar the hittite near mamre the same field which abraham get from the child of heth there abraham be put to rest with sarah his wife . now after the death of abraham the blessing of god be with isaac his son . now these be the generation of ishmael the son of abraham whose mother be hagar the egyptian the servant of sarah these be the name of the son of ishmael by their generation ishmael 's first son be nebaioth then kedar and adbeel and mibsam and mishma and dumah and massa hadad and tema jetur naphish and kedemah these be the son of ishmael and these be their name in their town and their tent circle twelve chief with their people . and the year of ishmael 's life be a hundred and thirty seven and he come to his end and be put to rest with his people . and their country be from havilah to shur which be east of egypt they take their place to the east of all their brother . now these be the generation of abraham 's son isaac isaac be forty year old when he take rebekah the daughter of bethuel the aramaean of paddan aram and the sister of laban the aramaean to be his wife . isaac make prayer to the lord for his wife because she have no child and the lord give ear to his prayer and rebekah become with child . and the child be fight together inside her and she say if it be to be so why be i like this ? so she go to put her question to the lord . and the lord say to her two nation be in your body and two people will come to birth from you the one will be strong than the other and the old will be the servant of the younger . and when the time come for her to give birth there be two child in her body . and the first come out red from head to foot like a robe of hair and they give him the name of esau . and after him his brother come out grip esau 's foot and he be name jacob isaac be sixty year old when she give birth to them . and the boy come to full growth and esau become a man of the open country an expert bowman but jacob be a quiet man living in tent . now isaac 's love be for esau because esau 's meat be greatly to his taste but rebekah have more love for jacob . and one day jacob be cook some soup when esau come in from the field in great need of food and esau say to jacob give me a full meal of that red soup for i be overcome with need for food for this reason he be name edom . and jacob say first of all give me your birthright . and esau say truly i be at the point of death what profit be the birthright to me ? and jacob say first of all give me your oath and he give him his oath handing over his birthright to jacob . then jacob give him bread and soup and he take food and drink and go away care little for his birthright .then come a time of great need in the land like that which have be before in the day of abraham . and isaac go to abimelech king of the philistine at gerar . and the lord come to him in a vision and say do not go down to egypt keep in the land of which i will give you knowledge keep in this land and i will be with you and give you my bless for to you and to your seed will i give all these land give effect to the oath which i make to your father abraham i will make your seed like the star of heaven in number and will give them all these land and your seed will be a blessing to all the nation of the earth because abraham give ear to my voice and keep my word my rule my order and my law . so isaac go on living in gerar and when he be question by the men of the place about his wife he say she be my sister fear to say she be my wife for he say the men of the place may put me to death on account of rebekah because she be very beautiful . and when he have be there for some time abimelech king of the philistine look through a window saw isaac play with rebekah his wife . and he say to isaac it be clear that she be your wife why then do you say she be my sister ? and isaac say for fear that i might be put to death because of her . then abimelech say what have you do to u ? one of the people might well have have connection with your wife and the sin would have be ours . and abimelech give order to his people that anyone touch isaac or his wife be to be put to death . now isaac plant seed in that land get in the same year fruit a hundred time a much for the blessing of the lord be on him . and his wealth become very great increase more and more for he have great wealth of flock and herd and great number of servant so that the philistine be full of envy . now all the water hole which his father 's servant have make in the day of abraham have be stop up with earth by the philistine . and abimelech say to isaac go away from u for you be strong than we be . so isaac go away from there and put up his tent in the valley of gerar make his living place there . and he make again the water hole which have be make in the day of abraham his father and which have be stop up by the philistine and he give them the name which his father have give them . now isaac 's servant make hole in the valley and come to a spring of flow water . but the herdmen of gerar have a fight with isaac 's herdmen for they say the spring be ours so he give the spring the name of esek because there be a fight about it . then they make another water hole and there be a fight about that so he give it the name of sitnah . then he go away from there and make another water hole about which there be no fighting so he give it the name of rehoboth for he say now the lord have make room for u and we will have fruit in this land . and from there he go on to beer sheba . that night the lord come to him in a vision and say i be the god of your father abraham have no fear for i be with you bless you and your seed will be increase because of my servant abraham . then he make an altar there and give worship to the name of the lord and he put up his tent there and there his servant make a water hole . and abimelech have come to him from gerar with ahuzzath his friend and phicol the captain of his army . and isaac say to them why have you come to me see that in your hate for me you send me away from you ? and they say we saw clearly that the lord be with you so we say let there be an oath between u and you and let u make an agreement with you that you will do u no damage even a we put no hand on you and do you nothing but good and send you away in peace and now the blessing of the lord be on you . then he make a feast for them and they all have food and drink . and early in the morning they take an oath one to the other then isaac send them away and they go on their way in peace . and that day isaac 's servant come to him and give him word of the water hole which they have make and say to him we have come to water . and he give it the name of shibah so the name of that town be beer sheba to this day . and when esau be forty year old he take a his wife judith the daughter of beeri the hittite and basemath the daughter of elon the hittite and isaac and rebekah have grief of mind because of them .now when isaac be old and his eye have become cloud so that he be not able to see he send for esau his first son and say to him my son and he say here be i. and he say see now i be old and my death may take place at any time so take your arrow and your bow and go out to the field and get meat for me and make me food good to the taste such a be please to me and put it before me so that i may have a meal and give you my bless before death come to me . now isaac 's word to his son be say in rebekah 's hearing . then esau go out to get the meat . and rebekah say to jacob her son your father say to your brother esau in my hearing go and get some roe 's meat and make me a good meal so that i may be full and give you my bless before the lord before my death . now my son do what i say . go to the flock and get me two fat young goat and i will make of them a meal to your father 's taste and you will take it to him so that he may have a good meal and give you his bless before his death . and jacob say to rebekah his mother but esau my brother be cover with hair while i be smooth if by chance my father put his hand on me it will seem to him that i be trick him and he will put a curse on me in place of a blessing . and his mother say let the curse be on me my son only do a i say and go and get them for me . so he go and get them and take them to his mother and she make a meal to his father 's taste . and rebekah take the fair robe of her old son which be with her in the house and put them on jacob her young son and she put the skin of the young goat on his hand and on the smooth part of his neck and she give into the hand of jacob her son the meat and the bread which she have make ready . and he come to his father and say my father and he say here be i who be you my son ? and jacob say i be esau your old son i have do a you say come now be seat and take of my meat so that you may give me a blessing . and isaac say how be it that you have get it so quickly my son ? and he say because the lord your god make it come my way . and isaac say come near so that i may put my hand on you my son and see if you be truly my son esau or not . and jacob go near his father isaac and he put his hand on him and he say the voice be jacob 's voice but the hand be the hand of esau . and he do not make out who he be because his hand be cover with hair like his brother esau 's hand so he give him a blessing . and he say be you truly my son esau ? and he say i be . and he say put it before me and i will take of my son 's meat so that i may give you a blessing . and he put it before him and he take it and he give him wine and he have a drink . and his father isaac say to him come near now my son and give me a kiss . and he come near and give him a kiss and smell the smell of his clothing he give him a blessing and say see the smell of my son be like the smell of a field on which the blessing of the lord have come may god give you the dew of heaven and the good thing of the earth and grain and wine in full measure let people be your servant and nation go down before you be lord over your brother and let your mother 's son go down before you a curse be on everyone by whom you be curse and a blessing on those who give you a blessing . and when isaac have come to the end of bless jacob and jacob have not long go away from isaac his father esau come in from the field . and he make ready a meal good to the taste and take it to his father and say to him let my father get up and take of his son 's meat so that you may give me a blessing . and isaac his father say to him who be you ? and he say i be your old son esau . and in great fear isaac say who then be he who get meat and put it before me and i take it all before you come and give him a blessing and his it will be ? and hear the word of his father esau give a great and bitter cry and say to his father give a blessing to me even to me o my father ! and he say your brother come with deceit and take away your blessing . and he say be it because he be name jacob that he have twice take my place ? for he take away my birthright and now he have take away my blessing . and he say have you not keep a blessing for me ? and isaac answering say but i have make him your master and have give him all his brother for servant i have make him strong with grain and wine what then be i to do for you my son ? and esau say to his father be that the only blessing you have my father ? give a blessing to me even me ! and esau be overcome with weep . then isaac his father make answer and say to him far from the fertile place of the earth and far from the dew of heaven on high will your living place be by your sword will you get your living and you will be your brother 's servant but when your power be increase his yoke will be break from off your neck . so esau be full of hate for jacob because of his father 's blessing and he say in his heart the day of weep for my father be near then i will put my brother jacob to death . then rebekah hear what esau have say send for jacob her young son and say to him it seem that your brother esau be purpose to put you to death . so now my son do what i say go quickly to haran to my brother laban and be there with him for a little time till your brother 's wrath be turn away till the memory of what you have do to him be past and he be no longer angry then i will send word for you to come back be the two of you to be take from me in one day ? then rebekah say to isaac my life be a weariness to me because of the daughter of heth if jacob take a wife from among the daughter of heth such a these the woman of this land of what use will my life be to me ?then isaac sent for jacob and bless him say do not take a wife from among the woman of canaan but go to paddan aram to the house of bethuel your mother 's father and there get yourself a wife from the daughter of laban your mother 's brother . and may god the ruler of all give you his bless give you fruit and increase so that you may become an army of people . and may god give you the blessing of abraham to you and to your seed so that the land of your wandering which god give to abraham may be your heritage . so isaac sent jacob away and he go to paddan aram to laban son of bethuel the aramaean the brother of rebekah the mother of jacob and esau . so when esau saw that isaac have give jacob his blessing and send him away to paddan aram to get a wife for himself there bless him and say to him do not take a wife from among the woman of canaan and that jacob have do a his father and mother say and have go to paddan aram it be clear to esau that his father have no love for the woman of canaan so esau go to ishmael and take mahalath the daughter of abraham 's son ishmael the sister of nebaioth to be his wife in addition to the wife he have . so jacob go out from beer sheba to go to haran . and come to a certain place he make it his rest place for the night for the sun have go down and he take one of the stone which be there and put it under his head he go to sleep in that place . and he have a dream and in his dream he saw step stretch from earth to heaven and the angel of god be go up and down on them . and he saw the lord by his side say i be the lord the god of abraham your father and the god of isaac i will give to you and to your seed this land on which you be sleep . your seed will be like the dust of the earth cover all the land to the west and to the east to the north and to the south you and your seed will be a name of bless to all the family of the earth . and truly i will be with you and will keep you wherever you go guide you back again to this land and i will not give you up till i have do what i have say to you . and jacob awake from his sleep say truly the lord be in this place and i be not conscious of it . and fear come on him and he say this be a holy place this be nothing less than the house of god and the doorway of heaven . and early in the morning jacob take the stone which have be under his head and put it up a a pillar and put oil on it . and he give that place the name of beth el but before that time the town be name luz . then jacob take an oath and say if god will be with me and keep me safe on my journey and give me food and clothing to put on so that i come again to my father 's house in peace then i will take the lord to be my god and this stone which i have put up for a pillar will be god 's house and of all you give me i will give a tenth part to you .then jacob go on his journey till he come to the land of the child of the east . and there he saw a water hole in a field and by the side of it three flock of sheep for there they get water for the sheep and on the mouth of the water hole there be a great stone . and all the flock would come together there and when the stone have be roll away they would give the sheep water and put the stone back again in it place on the mouth of the water hole . then jacob say to the herdmen my brother where do you come from ? and they say from haran . and he say to them have you any knowledge of laban the son of nahor ? and they say we have . and he say to them be he well ? and they say he be well and here be rachel his daughter come with the sheep . then jacob say the sun be still high and it be not time to get the cattle together get water for the sheep and go and give them their food . and they say we be not able to do so till all the flock have come together and the stone have be roll away from the mouth of the water hole then we will get water for the sheep . while he be still talk with them rachel come with her father 's sheep for she take care of them . then when jacob saw rachel the daughter of laban his mother 's brother come with laban 's sheep he come near and roll the stone away from the mouth of the hole he get water for laban 's flock . and weep for joy jacob give rachel a kiss . and rachel hearing from jacob that he be her father 's relation and that he be the son of rebekah go run to give her father news of it . and laban hear news of jacob his sister 's son come run and take jacob in his arm and kiss him make him come into his house . and jacob give him news of everything . and laban say to him truly you be my bone and my flesh . and he keep jacob with him for the space of a month . then laban say to jacob because you be my brother be you to be my servant for nothing ? say now what be your payment to be ? now laban have two daughter the name of the older be leah and the name of the younger be rachel . and leah 's eye be cloud but rachel be fair in face and form . and jacob be in love with rachel and he say i will be your servant seven year for rachel your young daughter . and laban say it be well for you to have her than another man go on living here with me . and jacob do seven year ' work for rachel and because of his love for her it seem to him only a very little time . then jacob say to laban give me my wife so that i may have her for the day be end . and laban get together all the men of the place and give a feast . and in the evening he take leah his daughter and give her to him and he go in to her . and laban give zilpah his servant girl to leah to be her wait woman . and in the morning jacob saw that it be leah and he say to laban what have you do to me ? be i not work for you so that i might have rachel ? why have you be false to me ? and laban say in our country we do not let the young daughter be marry before the old . let the week of the bride feast come to it end and then we will give you the other in addition if you will be my servant for another seven year . and jacob do so and when the week be end laban give him his daughter rachel for his wife . and laban give rachel his servant girl bilhah to be her wait woman . then jacob take rachel a his wife and his love for her be great than his love for leah and he go on work for laban for another seven year . now the lord see that leah be not love give her a child while rachel have no child . and leah be with child and give birth to a son to whom she give the name reuben for she say the lord have see my sorrow now my husband will have love for me . then she become with child again and give birth to a son and say because it have come to the lord 's ear that i be not love he have give me this son in addition and she give him the name simeon . and she be with child again and give birth to a son and say now at last my husband will be unite to me because i have give him three son so he be name levi . and she be with child again and give birth to a son and she say this time i will give praise to the lord so he be name judah after this she have no more child for a time .now rachel because she have no child be full of envy of her sister and she say to jacob if you do not give me child i will not go on living . but jacob be angry with rachel and say be i in the place of god who have keep your body from have fruit ? then she say here be my servant bilhah go in to her so that she may have a child on my knee and i may have a family by her . so she give him her servant bilhah a a wife and jacob go in to her . and bilhah become with child and give birth to a son . then rachel say god have be my judge and have give ear to my voice and have give me a son so he be name dan . and again bilhah rachel 's servant be with child and give birth to a second son . and rachel say i have have a great fight with my sister and i have overcome her and she give the child the name naphtali . when it be clear to leah that she would have no more child for a time she give zilpah her servant to jacob a a wife . and zilpah leah 's servant give birth to a son . and leah say it have go well for me and she give him the name gad . and zilpah leah 's servant give birth to a second son . and leah say happy be i ! and all woman will give witness to my joy and she give him the name asher . now at the time of the grain cut reuben saw some love fruit in the field and take them to his mother leah . and rachel say to her let me have some of your son 's love fruit . but leah say to her be it a small thing that you have take my husband from me ? and now would you take my son 's love fruit ? then rachel say you may have him tonight in exchange for your son 's love fruit . in the evening when jacob come in from the field leah go out to him and say tonight you be to come to me for i have give my son 's love fruit a a price for you . and he go in to her that night . and god give ear to her and she become with child and give jacob a fifth son . then leah say god have make payment to me for give my servant girl to my husband so she give her son the name issachar . and again leah become with child and she give jacob a sixth son . and she say god have give me a good bride price now at last will i have my husband living with me for i have give him six son and she give him the name zebulun . after that she have a daughter to whom she give the name dinah . then god give think to rachel and hear her prayer he make her fertile . and she be with child and give birth to a son and she say god have take away my shame . and she give him the name joseph say may the lord give me another son . now after the birth of joseph jacob say to laban let me go away to my place and my country . give me my wife and my child for whom i have be your servant and let me go for you have knowledge of all the work i have do for you . and laban say if you will let me say so do not go away for i have see by the sign that the lord have be good to me because of you . say then what your payment be to be and i will give it . then jacob say you have see what i have do for you and how your cattle have do well under my care . for before i come you have little and it have be greatly increase and the lord have give you a bless in everything i have do but when be i to do something for my family ? and laban say what be i to give you ? and jacob say do not give me anything but i will again take up the care of your flock if you will only do this for me let me go through all your flock today take out from among them all the sheep which be mark or colour or black and all the mark or colour goat these will be my payment . and so you will be able to put my honour to the test in time to come if you see among my flock any goat which be not mark or colour or any sheep which be not black you may take me for a thief . and laban say let it be a you say . so that day he take all the he goats which be band or colour and all the she goats which be mark or colour or have white mark and all the black sheep and give them into the care of his son and send them three day ' journey away and jacob take care of the rest of laban 's flock . then jacob take young branch of tree cut off the skin so that the white wood be see in band . and he put the banded stick in the drinking place where the flock come to get water and they become with young when they come to the water . and because of this the flock give birth to young which be mark with band of colour . these lambs jacob keep separate and he put his flock in a place by themselves and not with laban 's flock . and whenever the strong one of the flock become with young jacob put the stick in front of them in the drinking place so that they might become with young when they saw the stick . but when the flock be feeble he do not put the stick before them so that the feebler flock be laban 's and the strong be jacob 's . so jacob 's wealth be greatly increase he have great flock and woman servant and men servant and camel and ass .now it come to the ear of jacob that laban 's son be say jacob have take away all our father 's property and in this way he have get all this wealth . and jacob saw that laban 's feeling for him be no long what it have be before . then the lord say to jacob go back to the land of your father and to your relation and i will be with you . and jacob sent for rachel and leah to come to him in the field among his flock . and he say to them it be clear to me that your father 's feeling be no longer what it be to me but the god of my father have be with me and you have see how i have do all in my power for your father but your father have not keep faith with me and ten time he have make change in my payment but god have keep him from do me damage . if he say all those in the flock which have mark be to be yours then all the flock give birth to mark young and if he say all the band one be to be yours then all the flock have band young . so god have take away your father 's cattle and have give them to me . and at the time when the flock be with young i saw in a dream that all the he goats which be join with the she goat be band and mark and colour . and in my dream the angel of the lord say to me jacob and i say here be i. and he say see how all the he goats be band and mark and colour for i have see what laban have do to you . i be the god of beth el where you put oil on the pillar and take an oath to me now then come out of this land and go back to the country of your birth . then rachel and leah say to him in answer what part or heritage be there for u in our father 's house ? be we not a people from a strange country to him ? for he take a price for u and now it be all use up . for the wealth which god have take from him be ours and our child 's so now whatever god have say to you do . then jacob put his wife and his son on camel and send on before him all his cattle and his property which he have get together in paddan aram he make ready to go to isaac his father in the land of canaan . now laban have go to see to the cutting of the wool of his sheep so rachel secretly take the image of the god of her father 's house . and jacob go away secretly without give news of his flight to laban the aramaean . so he go away with all he have and go across the river in the direction of the hill country of gilead . and on the third day laban have news of jacob 's flight . and take the men of his family with him he go after him for seven day and overtake him in the hill country of gilead . then god come to laban in a dream by night and say to him take care that you say nothing good or bad to jacob . now when laban overtake him jacob have put up his tent in the hill country and laban and his brother put up their tent in the hill country of gilead . and laban say to jacob why do you go away secretly take my daughter away like prisoner of war ? why do you make a secret of your flight not give me word of it so that i might have send you away with joy and song with melody and music ? you do not even let me give a kiss to my son and my daughter . this be a foolish thing to do . it be in my power to do you damage but the god of your father come to me this night say take care that you say nothing good or bad to jacob . and now it seem you be go because your heart 's desire be for your father 's house but why have you take my god ? and jacob in answer say to laban my fear be that you might take your daughter from me by force . a for your god if anyone of u have them let him be put to death make search before u all for what be yours and take it . for jacob have no knowledge that rachel have take them . so laban go into jacob 's tent and into leah 's tent and into the tent of the two servant woman but they be not there and he come out of leah 's tent and go into rachel 's . now rachel have take the image and have put them in the camel ' basket and be seat on them . and laban search through all the tent do not come across them . and she say to her father let not my lord be angry because i do not get up before you for i be in the common condition of woman . and with all his search he do not come across the image . then jacob be angry with laban and say what crime or sin have i do that you have come after me with such passion ? now that you have make search through all my good what have you see which be yours ? make it clear now before my people and your people so that they may be judge between u . these twenty year i have be with you your sheep and your goat have have young without loss not one of your he goats have i take for food . anything which be wound by beast i do not take to you but myself make up for the loss of it you make me responsible for whatever be take by thief by day or by night . this be my condition waste by heat in the day and by the bitter cold at night and sleep go from my eye . these twenty year i have be in your house i be your servant for fourteen year because of your daughter and for six year i keep your flock and ten time be my payment change . if the god of my father the god of abraham and the fear of isaac have not be with me you would have send me away with nothing in my hand . but god have see my trouble and the work of my hand and this night he keep you back . then laban answer say these woman be my daughter and these child my child the flock and all you see be mine what now may i do for my daughter and for their child ? come let u make an agreement you and i and let it be for a witness between u . then jacob take a stone and put it up a a pillar . and jacob say to his people get stone together and they do so and they have a meal there by the stone . and the name laban give it be jegar sahadutha but jacob give it the name of galeed . and laban say these stone be a witness between you and me today . for this reason it name be galeed and mizpah for he say may the lord keep watch on u when we be unable to see one another 's doings . if you be cruel to my daughter or if you take other wife in addition to my daughter then though no man be there to see god will be the witness between u . and laban say see these stone and this pillar which i have put between you and me they will be witness that i will not go over these stone to you and you will not go over these stone or this pillar to me for any evil purpose . may the god of abraham and the god of nahor the god of their father be our judge . then jacob take an oath by the fear of his father isaac . and jacob make an offering on the mountain and give order to his people to take food so they have a meal and take their rest that night on the mountain . and early in the morning laban after kiss and bless his daughter go on his way back to his country .and on his way jacob come face to face with the angel of god . and when he saw them he say this be the army of god so he give that place the name of mahanaim . now jacob send servant before him to esau his brother in the land of seir the country of edom and he give them order to say these word to esau your servant jacob say till now i have be live with laban and i have oxen and ass and flock and men servant and woman servant and i have send to give my lord news of these thing so that i may have grace in his eye . when the servant come back they say we have see your brother esau and he be come out to you and four hundred men with him . then jacob be in great fear and trouble of mind and he put all the people and the flock and the herd and the camel into two group and say if esau meet one group make an attack on them the others will get away safely . then jacob say o god of my father abraham the god of my father isaac the lord who say to me go back to your country and your family and i will be good to you i be less than nothing in comparison with all your mercy and your faith to me your servant for with only my stick in my hand i go across jordan and now i have become two army . be my saviour from the hand of esau my brother for my fear be that he will make an attack on me put to death mother and child . and you say truly i will be good to you and make your seed like the sand of the sea which may not be number . then he put up his tent there for the night and from among his good he take a an offering for his brother esau two hundred she goat and twenty he goats two hundred female and twenty male from the sheep thirty camel with their young one forty cow ten oxen twenty ass and ten young ass . these he give to his servant every herd by itself and he say to his servant go on before me and let there be a space between one herd and another . and he give order to the first say when my brother esau come to you and say whose servant be you and where be you go and whose be these herd ? then say to him these be your servant jacob 's they be an offering for my lord for esau and he himself be come after u . and he give the same order to the second and the third and to all those who be with the herd say this be what you be to say to esau when you see him and you be to say further jacob your servant be come after u . for he say to himself i will take away his wrath by the offering which i have send on and then i will come before him it may be that i will have grace in his eye . so the servant with the offering go on in front and he himself take his rest that night in the tent with his people . and in the night he get up and take with him his two wife and the two servant woman and his eleven child he go over the river jabbok . he take them and send them over the stream with all he have . then jacob be by himself and a man be fight with him till dawn . but when the man saw that he be not able to overcome jacob he give him a blow in the hollow part of his leg so that his leg be damage . and he say to him let me go now for the dawn be near . but jacob say i will not let you go till you have give me your blessing . then he say what be your name ? and he say jacob . and he say your name will no longer be jacob but israel for in your fight with god and with men you have overcome . then jacob say what be your name ? and he say what be my name to you ? then he give him a blessing . and jacob give that place the name of peniel say i have see god face to face and still i be live . and while he be go past peniel the sun come up . and he go with unequal step because of his damage leg . for this reason the child of israel even today never take that muscle in the hollow of the leg a food because the hollow of jacob 's leg be touch .then jacob lift up his eye saw esau come with his four hundred men . so he make a division of the child between leah and rachel and the two woman servant . he put the servant and their child in front leah and her child after them and rachel and joseph at the back . and he himself go before them go down on his face to the earth seven time till he come near his brother . then esau come run up to him and fold him in his arm give him a kiss and the two of them be overcome with weep . then esau lift up his eye saw the woman and the child and say who be these with you ? and he say the child whom god in his mercy have give to your servant . then the servant and their child come near and go down on their face . and leah come near with her child and then joseph and rachel and they do the same . and he say what be all those herd which i saw on the way ? and jacob say they be an offering so that i might have grace in my lord 's eye . but esau say i have enough keep what be yours my brother for yourself . and jacob say not so but if i have grace in your eye take them a a sign of my love for i have see your face a one may see the face of god and you have be please with me . take my offering then with my blessing for god have be very good to me and i have enough so at his strong request he take it . and he say let u go on our journey together and i will go in front . but jacob say my lord may see that the child be only small and there be young one in my flock and herd one day 's over driving will be the destruction of all the flock . do you my lord go on before your servant i will come on slowly at the rate at which the cattle and the child be able to go till i come to my lord at seir . and esau say then keep some of my men with you . and he say what need be there for that if my lord be please with me ? so esau turn back that day go on his way to seir . and jacob go on to succoth where he make a house for himself and put up tent for his cattle for this reason the place be name succoth . so jacob come safely from paddan aram to the town of shechem in the land of canaan and put up his tent near the town . and for a hundred bit of money he get from the child of hamor the builder of shechem the field in which he have put up his tent . and there he put up an altar name it el the god of israel .now dinah the daughter whom leah have by jacob go out to see the woman of that country . and when shechem the son of hamor the hivite who be the chief of that land saw her he take her by force and have connection with her . then his heart go out in love to dinah the daughter of jacob and he say comfort word to her . and shechem say to hamor his father get me this girl for my wife . now jacob have word of what shechem have do to his daughter but his son be in the field with the cattle and jacob say nothing till they come . then hamor the father of shechem come out to have a talk with jacob . now the son of jacob come in from the field when they have news of it and they be wound and very angry because of the shame he have do in israel by have connection with jacob 's daughter and they say such a thing be not to be do . but hamor say to them shechem my son be full of desire for your daughter will you then give her to him for a wife ? and let our two people be join together give your daughter to u and take our daughter for yourselves . go on living with u and the country will be open to you do trade and get property there . and shechem say to her father and her brother if you will give ear to my request whatever you say i will give to you . however great you make the bride price and payment i will give it only let me have the girl for my wife . but the son of jacob give a false answer to shechem and hamor his father because of what have be do to dinah their sister . and they say it be not possible for u to give our sister to one who be without circumcision for that would be a cause of shame to u but on this condition only will we come to an agreement with you if every male among you become like u and undergoes circumcision then we will give our daughter to you and take your daughter to u and go on living with you a one people . but if you will not undergo circumcision a we say then we will take our daughter and go . and their word be please to hamor and his son shechem . and without loss of time the young man do a they say because he have delight in jacob 's daughter and he be the noble of his father 's house . then hamor and shechem his son go to the meeting place of their town and say to the men of the town it be the desire of these men to be at peace with u let them then go on living in this country and do trade here for the country be wide open before them let u take their daughter a wife and let u give them our daughter . but these men will make an agreement with u to go on living with u and to become one people only on the condition that every male among u undergoes circumcision a they have do . then will not their cattle and their good and all their beast be ours ? so let u come to an agreement with them so that they may go on living with u . then all the men of the town give ear to the word of hamor and shechem his son and every male in the town underwent circumcision . but on the third day after before the wound be well two of the son of jacob simeon and levi dinah 's brother take their sword and come into the town by surprise and put all the male to death . and hamor and his son they put to death with the sword and they take dinah from shechem 's house and go away . and the son of jacob come on them when they be wound and make waste the town because of what have be do to their sister they take their flock and their herd and their ass and everything in their town and in their field and all their wealth and all their little one and their wife everything in their house they take and make them waste . and jacob say to simeon and levi you have make trouble for me and give me a bad name among the people of this country among the canaanite and the perizzites and because we be small in number they will come together against me and make war on me and it will be the end of me and all my people . but they say be we to let him make use of our sister a a loose woman ?and god say to jacob go up now to beth el and make your live place there and put up an altar there to the god who come to you when you be in flight from your brother esau . then jacob say to all his people put away the strange god which be among you and make yourselves clean and put on a change of clothing and let u go up to beth el and there i will make an altar to god who give me an answer in the day of my trouble and be with me wherever i go . then they give to jacob all the strange god which they have and the ring which be in their ear and jacob put them away under the holy tree at shechem . so they go on their journey and the fear of god be on the town round about so that they make no attack on the son of jacob . and jacob come to luz in the land of canaan which be the same a beth el he and all his people . and there he make an altar name the place el beth el because it be there he have the vision of god when he be in flight from his brother . and deborah the servant who have take care of rebekah from her birth come to her end and be put to rest near beth el under the holy tree and they give it the name of allon bacuth . now when jacob be on his way from paddan aram god come to him again and bless him say jacob be your name but it will be so no longer from now your name will be israel so he be name israel . and god say to him i be god the ruler of all be fertile and have increase a nation truly a group of nation will come from you and king will be your offspring and the land which i give to abraham and isaac i will give to you and to your seed after you i will give the land . then god go up from him in the place where he have be talk with him . and jacob put up a pillar in the place where he have be talk with god and put a drink offering on it and oil . and he give to the place where god have be talk with him the name of beth el . so they go on from beth el and while they be still some distance from ephrath the pain of birth come on rachel and she have a hard time . and when her pain be very great the woman who be help her say have no fear for now you will have another son . and in the hour when her life go from her for death come to her she give the child the name ben oni but his father give him the name of benjamin . so rachel come to her end and be put to rest on the road to ephrath which be beth lehem . and jacob put up a pillar on her resting place which be name the pillar of the rest place of rachel to this day . and israel go journey on and put up his tent on the other side of the tower of the flock . now while they be live in that country reuben have connection with bilhah his father 's servant woman and israel have news of it . now jacob have his last resting place .now these be the generation of esau that be to say edom . esau 's wife be woman of canaan adah the daughter of elon the hittite and oholibamah the daughter of anah the daughter cattle . so esau make his living place in the hill country of seir esau be edom . and these be the generation of esau the father of the edomites in the hill country of seir these be the name of esau rule in the land of edom before there be any king over the child of israel . bela son of beor be king in edom and the name of his chief town be dinhabah . at his death jobab son of zerah of bozrah become king in his place . and at the death of jobab husham from the country of the temanites become king in his place . and at the death of husham hadad son of bedad who overcome the midianites in magdiel iram these be the edomite chief in their place in their heritage this be esau the father of the edomites .now jacob be live in the land where his father have make a place for himself in the land of canaan . these be the generation of jacob joseph a boy seventeen year old be look after the flock together with his brother the son of bilhah and zilpah his father 's wife and joseph give their father a bad account of them . now the love which israel have for joseph be great than his love for all his other child because he get him when he be an old man and he have a long coat make for him . and because his brother saw that joseph be dearer to his father than all the others they be full of hate for him and would not say a kind word to him . now joseph have a dream and he give his brother an account of it which make their hate great than ever . and he say to them let me give you the story of my dream . we be in the field get the grain stem together and my grain keep upright and yours come round and go down on the earth before mine . and his brother say to him be you to be our king ? will you have authority over u ? and because of his dream and his word their hate for him become great than ever . then he have another dream and give his brother an account of it say i have have another dream the sun and the moon and eleven star give honour to me . and he give word of it to his father and his brother but his father protesting say what sort of a dream be this ? be i and your mother and your brother to go down on our face to the earth before you ? and his brother be full of envy but his father keep his word in mind . now his brother go to keep watch over their father 's flock in shechem . and israel say to joseph be not your brother with the flock in shechem ? come i will send you to them . and he say to him here be i. and he say to him go now and see if your brother be well and how the flock be then come back and give me word . so he send him out of the valley of hebron and he come to shechem . and a man saw him wander in the country and say to him what be you look for ? and he say i be look for my brother please give me word of where they be keep their flock . and the man say they have go away from here for they say in my hearing let u go to dothan . so joseph go after them and come up with them at dothan . but they saw him when he be a long way off and before he come near them they make a secret design against him to put him to death say to one another see here come this dreamer . let u now put him to death and put his body into one of these hole and we will say an evil beast have put him to death then we will see what become of his dream . but reuben hearing these word get him out of their hand say let u not take his life . do not put him to a violent death but let him be place in one of the hole this he say to keep him safe from their hand with the purpose of take him back to his father again . so when joseph come to his brother they take off his long coat which he have on and they take him and put him in the hole now the hole have no water in it . then seat themselves they take their meal and look up they saw a travel band of ishmaelites come from gilead on their way to egypt with spice and perfume on their camel . and judah say to his brother what profit be there in put our brother to death and cover up his blood ? let u give him to these ishmaelites for a price and let u not put violent hand on him for he be our brother our flesh . and his brother give ear to him . and some trader from midian go by so pull joseph up out of the hole they give him to the ishmaelites for twenty bit of silver and they take him to egypt . now when reuben come back to the hole joseph be not there and give sign of grief he go back to his brother and say the child be go what be i to do ? then they take joseph 's coat and put on it some of the blood from a young goat which they have put to death and they take the coat to their father and say we come across this be it your son 's coat or not ? and he saw that it be and say it be my son 's coat an evil beast have put him to death without doubt joseph have come to a cruel end . then jacob give sign of grief put on haircloth and go on weep for his son day after day . and all his son and all his daughter come to give him comfort but he would not be comfort say with weep i will go down to the underworld to my son . so great be his father 's sorrow for him . and in egypt the men of midian give him for a price to potiphar a captain of high position in pharaoh 's house .now at that time judah go away from his brother and become the friend of a man of adullam name hirah . and there he saw the daughter of a certain man of canaan name shua and take her a his wife . and she give birth to a son and he give him the name er . and again she give birth to a son and he give him the name onan . then she have another son to whom she give the name shelah she be at chezib when the birth take place . and judah take a wife for his first son er and her name be tamar . now er judah 's first son do evil in the eye of the lord so that he put him to death . then judah say to onan go in to your brother 's wife and do what it be right for a husband 's brother to do make her your wife and get offspring for your brother . but onan seeing that the offspring would not be his go in to his brother 's wife but let his seed go on to the earth so that he might not get offspring for his brother . and what he do be evil in the eye of the lord so that he put him to death like his brother . then judah say to tamar his daughter in law go back to your father 's house and keep yourself a a widow till my son shelah become a man for he have in his mind the thought that death might come to him a it have come to his brother . so tamar go back to her father 's house . and after a time bath shua judah 's wife come to her end and after judah be comfort for her loss he go to timnah where they be cut the wool of his sheep and his friend hirah of adullam go with him . and when tamar have news that her father in law be go up to timnah to the wool cut she take off her widow 's clothing and cover herself with her veil she take her seat near enaim on the road to timnah for she saw that shelah be now a man but she have not be make his wife . when judah saw her he take her to be a loose woman of the town because her face be cover . and turn to her by the roadside he say to her let me come in to you for he have no idea that she be his daughter in law . and she say what will you give me a my price ? and he say i will give you a young goat from the flock . and she say what will you give me a a sign till you send it ? and he say what would you have ? and she say your ring and it cord and the stick in your hand . so he give them to her and go in to her and she become with child by him . then she get up and go away and take off her veil and put on her widow 's clothing . then judah send his friend hirah with the young goat to get back the thing which he have give a a sign to the woman but she be not there . and he put question to the men of the place say where be the loose woman who be in enaim by the wayside ? and they say there be no such woman there . so he go back to judah and say i have not see her and the men of the place say that there be no such woman there . and judah say let her keep the thing so that we may not be sham i send the young goat but you do not see the woman . now about three month after this word come to judah that tamar his daughter in law have be act like a loose woman and be with child . and judah say take her out and let her be burn . and while she be be take out she send word to her father in law say the man whose property these thing be be the father of my child say then whose be this ring and this cord and this stick ? then judah say openly that they be his and say she be more upright than i be for i do give birth one of them put out his hand and the woman who be with her put a red thread round his hand say this one come out first . but then he take his hand back again and his brother come first to birth and the woman say what an opening you have make for yourself ! so he be name perez . and then his brother come out with the red thread round his hand and he be name zerah .now joseph be take down to egypt and potiphar the egyptian a captain of high position in pharaoh 's house get him for a price from the ishmaelites who have take him there . and the lord be with joseph and he do well and overseer of his house and give him control over all he have . and from the time when he make him overseer and give him control of all his property the blessing of the lord be with the egyptian because of joseph the blessing of the lord be on all he have in the house and in the field . and he give joseph control of all his property keep no account of anything but only the food which be put before keep no account of what i do in his house and have put all his property in my control so that no one have more authority in this house than i have he have keep nothing back from me but you because you be his wife how then may i do this great wrong sin against god ? and day after day she go on request joseph to come to her and be her lover but he would not give ear to her . now one day he go into the house to do his work and not one of the men of the house be inside . and pull at his coat she say come to my bed but slip out of his coat he go run away . and when she saw that he have get away let her keep his coat she send for the men of her house and say to them see he have let a hebrew come here and make sport of u he come to my bed and i give a loud cry and hearing it he go run out without his coat . and she keep his coat by her till his master come back . then she give him the same story say the hebrew servant whom you have take into our house come in to make sport of me and when i give a loud cry he go run out without his coat . and hear his wife 's account of what his servant have do he become very angry . and joseph 's master take him and put him in prison in the place where the king 's prisoner be keep in chain and he be there in the prison house . but the lord be with joseph and be good to him and make the keeper of the prison his friend . and the keeper of the prison put all the prisoner under joseph 's control and he be responsible for whatever be do there . and the keeper of the prison give no attention to anything which be under his care because the lord be with him and the lord make everything he do go well .now after these thing the chief servant who have the care of the wine and the chief bread maker in pharaoh 's house do something against pharaoh 's order and pharaoh be angry with his two servant with the chief wine servant and the chief bread maker and he put them in prison under the care of the captain of the army in the same prison where joseph himself be shut up . and the captain put them in joseph 's care and he do what be need for them and they be keep in prison for some time . and these two have a dream on the same night the chief wine servant and the chief bread maker of the king of egypt who be in prison the two of them have dream with a special sense . and in the morning when joseph come to them he saw that they be look sad . and he say to the servant of pharaoh who be in prison with him why be you look so sad ? then they say to him we have have a dream and no one be able to give u the sense . and joseph say do not the sense of dream come from god ? what be your dream ? then the chief wine servant give joseph an account of his dream and say in my dream i saw a vine before me and on the vine be three branch and it seem a if it put out bud and flower and from them come grape ready for cut . and pharaoh 's cup be in my hand and i take the grape and crush them into pharaoh 's cup give the cup into pharaoh 's hand . then joseph say this be the sense of your dream the three branch be three day after three day pharaoh will give you honour and put you back into your place and you will give him his cup a you do before when you be his wine servant . but keep me in mind when thing go well for you and be good to me and say a good word for me to pharaoh and get me out of this prison for truly i be take by force from the land of the hebrew and i have do nothing for which i might be put in prison . now when the chief bread maker saw that the first dream have a good sense he say to joseph i have a dream and in the sense of your dream the three basket be three day after three day pharaoh will take you out of prison hang you on a tree so that your flesh will be food for bird . now the third day be pharaoh 's he give the cup into pharaoh 's hand . but the chief bread maker be put to death by hang a joseph have say . but the wine servant do not keep joseph in mind or give a thought to him .now after two cow come out of the nile poor look and thin and they be by the side of the other cow . and the seven thin cow make a meal of the seven fat cow . then pharaoh come out of his sleep . but he go to sleep again and have a second dream in which he saw seven head of grain full and good all on one stem . and after them come up seven other head thin and waste by the east wind . and the seven thin head make a meal of the good head . and when pharaoh be awake he saw it be a dream . and in the morning his spirit be troubled and he send for all the wise men of egypt and all the holy men and put his dream . then pharaoh sent for joseph and they take him quickly out of prison and when his hair have be cut and his dress change he come before pharaoh . and pharaoh say to joseph i have have a dream and no and so i come out of my sleep . and again in a dream i saw seven head of grain full and good come up on one stem and then i saw seven other head dry thin and waste by the east wind come up after them and the seven thin head make a meal of the seven good head and i put this dream before the wise men but not one of them be able to give me the sense of it . then joseph say these two dream have the look cow who come up after them be seven year and the seven head of grain dry and waste by the east wind be seven year when there will be no food . a i say to pharaoh before god have make clear to him what he be about to do . seven year be come in which there will be great wealth of grain in egypt and after that will come seven year when there will not be enough food and the memory of the good year will go from men 's mind and the land will be make waste by the bad year and men will have no memory of the good time because of the need which will come after for it will be very bitter . and this dream come to pharaoh twice because this thing be certain and god will quickly make it come about . and now let pharaoh make search for a man of wisdom and good sense and put him in authority over the this a man in whom be the spirit of god ? and pharaoh say to joseph see that god have make all this clear to you there be no other man of such wisdom and good sense a you you then be to be over my so judah and his brother come to joseph 's house and he be still there and they go down on their face before him . and joseph say what be this thing which you have do ? have you no think that such a . and you say to your servant let him come down to me with you so that i may see him . and we say to my lord his father will not let him go for if he go away his father would come to his death . but father without the boy and see the evil which will come on my father ?then joseph unable to keep back his feeling before those who be with him give order for everyone to be send away and no one be in the land of egypt let this month be to you the first of month the first month of the year . say to all the child of israel when they be come together in the tenth day of this month every man be to take a lamb by the number of their father ' family a lamb for every family and if the lamb be more than enough for the family let that family and it near neighbour have a lamb between them take into account the number of person and how much food be need for every man . let your lamb be without a mark a male in it first year you may take it from among the sheep or the goat keep it till the fourteenth day of the same month when everyone who be of the child of israel be to put it to death between sundown and dark . then take some of the blood and put it on the two side of the door and over the door of the house where the meal be to be take . and let your food that night be the flesh of the lamb cook with fire in the oven together with unleavened bread and bitter tasting plant . do not take it uncooked or cook with boiling water but let it be cook in the oven it head with it leg and it inside part . do not keep any of it till the morning anything which be not use be to be burn with fire . and take your meal dress a if for a journey with your shoe on your foot and your stick in your hand take it quickly it be the lord 's passover . for on that night i will go through the land of egypt send death on every first male child of man and of beast and judge all the god of egypt i be the lord . and the blood will be a sign on the house where you be when i see the blood i will go over you and no evil will come on you for your destruction when my hand be on the land of egypt . and this day be to be keep in your memory you be to keep it a a feast to the lord through all your generation a an order for ever . for seven day let your food be unleavened bread from the first day no leaven be to be see in your house whoever take bread with leaven in it from the first till the seventh day will be cut off from israel . and on the first day there be to be a holy meeting and on the seventh day a holy meeting no sort of work may be do on those day but only to make ready what be necessary for everyone 's food . so keep the feast of unleavened bread for on this very day i have take your army out of the land of egypt this day then be to be keep through all your generation by an order for ever . in the first month from the evening of the fourteenth day let your food be unleavened bread till the evening of the twenty first day of the month . for seven day no leaven be to be see in your house for whoever take bread which be leaven will be cut off from the people of israel if he be from another country or if he be an israelite by birth . take nothing which have leaven in it wherever you be live let your food be unleavened cake . then moses sent for the chief of israel and say to them see that lamb be mark out for yourselves and your family and let the passover lamb be the lord your god be give you . do not put anyone to death without cause . do not be false to the married relation . do not take the property of another . do not give false witness against your
