master and my wife and child be dear to me i have no desire to be free then his master be to take him to the god of the house and at the door or at it framework he be to make a hole in his ear with a sharp pointed instrument and he will be his servant for ever . and if a man give his daughter for a price to be a servant she be not to go away free a the men servant do . if she be not please to her master who have take her for himself let a payment be make for her so that she may go free her master have no power to get a price for her and send her to a strange land because he have be false to her . and if he give her to his son he be to do everything for her a if she be his daughter . and if he take another woman her food and clothing and her married right be not to be less . and if he do not do these three thing for her she have the right to go free without payment . he who give a man a death blow be himself to be put to death . but if he have no evil purpose against him and god give him into his hand i will give you a place to which he may go in flight . but if a man make an attack on his neighbour on purpose to put him to death by deceit you be to take him from my altar and put him to death . any man who give a blow to his father or his mother be certainly to be put to death . any man who get another into his power in order to get a price for him be to be put to death if you take him in the act . any man curse his father or his mother be to be put to death . if in a fight one man give another a blow with a stone or with the shut hand not cause his death but make him keep in bed if he be able to get up again and go about with a stick the other will be let off only he will have to give him payment for the loss of his time and see that he be care for till he be well . if a man give his man servant or his woman servant blow with a rod cause death he be certainly to undergo punishment . but at the same time if the servant go on living for a day or two the master be not to get punishment for the servant be his property . if men while fight do damage to a woman with child cause the loss of the child but no other evil come to her the man will have to make payment up to the amount fix by her husband in agreement with the decision of the judge . but if damage come to her let life be give in payment for life eye for eye tooth for tooth hand for hand foot for foot burning for burn wound for wound blow for blow . if a man give his man servant or his woman servant a blow in the eye cause it destruction he be to let him go free on account of the damage to his eye . or if the loss of a tooth be cause by his blow he will let him go free on account of his tooth . if an ox come to be the cause of death to a man or a woman the ox be to be stone and it flesh may not be use for food but the owner will not be judge responsible . but if the ox have frequently do such damage in the past and the owner have have word of it and have not keep it under control so that it have be the cause of the death of a man or woman not only be the ox to be stone but it owner be to be put to death . if a price be put on his life let him make payment of whatever price be fix . if the death of a son or of a daughter have be cause the punishment be to be in agreement with this rule . if the death of a man servant or of a woman servant be cause by the ox the owner be to give their master thirty shekel of silver and the ox be to be stone . if a man make a hole in the earth without cover it up and an ox or an as drop into it come to it death the owner of the hole be responsible he will have to make payment to their owner but the dead beast will be his . and if one man 's ox do damage to another man 's ox cause it death then the living ox be to be exchange for money and division make of the price of it and of the price of the dead one . but if it be common knowledge that the ox have frequently do such damage in the past and it owner have not keep it under control he will have to give ox for ox and the dead beast will be his .if a man take without right another man 's ox or his sheep and put it to death or get a price for it he be to give five ox for an ox or four sheep for a sheep in payment the thief will have to make payment for what he have take if he have no money he himself will have to be exchange for money so that payment may be make . if a thief be take in the act of force his way into a house and his death be cause by a blow the owner of the house be not responsible for his blood . but if it be after dawn he will be responsible . if he still have what he have take whatever it be ox or as or sheep he be to give twice it value . if a man make a fire in a field or a vine garden and let the fire do damage to another man 's field he be to give of the best produce of his field or his vine garden to make up for it . if there be a fire and the flame get to the thorn at the edge of the field cause destruction of the cut grain or of the living grain or of the field he who make the fire will have to make up for the damage . if a man put money or good in the care of his neighbour to keep for him and it be take from the man 's house if they get the thief he will have to make payment of twice the value . if they do not get the thief let the master of the house come before the judge and take an oath that he have not put his hand on his neighbour 's good . in any question about an ox or an as or a sheep or clothing or about the loss of any property which anyone say be his let the two side put their cause before god and he who be judge to be in the wrong be to make payment to his neighbour of twice the value . if a man put an as or an ox or a sheep or any beast into the keep of his neighbour and it come to death or be damage or be take away without any person see it if he take his oath before the lord that he have not put his hand to his neighbour 's good the owner be to take his word for it and he will not have to make payment for it . but if it be take from him by a thief he be to make up for the loss of it to it owner . but if it have be damage by a beast and he be able to make this clear he will not have to make payment for what be damage . if a man get from his neighbour the use of one of his beast and it be damage or put to death when the owner be not with it he will certainly have to make payment for the loss . if the owner be with it he will not have to make payment if he give money for the use of it the loss be cover by the payment . if a man take a virgin who have not give her word to another man and have connection with her he will have to give a bride price for her to be his wife . if her father will not give her to him on any account he will have to give the regular payment for virgin . any woman use unnatural power or secret art be to be put to death . any man who have sex connection with a beast be to be put to death . complete destruction will come on any man who make offering to any other god but the lord . do no wrong to a man from a strange country and do not be hard on him for you yourselves be live in a strange country in the land of egypt . do no wrong to a widow or to a child whose father be dead . if you be cruel to them in any way and their cry come up to me i will certainly give ear and in the heat of my wrath i will put you to death with the sword so that your wife will be widow and your child without father . if you let any of the poor among my people have the use of your money do not be a hard creditor to him and do not take interest . if ever you take your neighbour 's clothing in exchange for the use of your money let him have it back before the sun go down for it be the only thing he have for cover his skin what be he to go to sleep in ? and when his cry come up to me i will give ear for my mercy be great . you may not say evil of the judge or put a curse on the ruler of your people . do not keep back your offering from the wealth of your grain and your vine . the first of your son you be to give to me . in the same way with your ox and your sheep for seven day let the young one be with it mother on the eighth day give it to me . you be to be holy men to me the flesh of no animal whose death have be cause by the beast of the field may be use for your food it be to be give to the dog .do not let a false statement go far do not make an agreement with evil doer to be a false witness . do not be move to do wrong by the general opinion or give the support of your word to a wrong decision but on the other hand do not be turn from what be right in order to give support to a poor man 's cause . if you come across the ox or the as of one who be no friend to you wander from it way you be to take it back to him . if you see the as of one who have no love for you bend down to the earth under the weight which be put on it you be to come to it help even against your desire . let no wrong decision be give in the poor man 's cause . keep yourselves far from any false business never let the upright or him who have do no wrong be put to death for i will make the evil doer responsible for his sin . take no reward in a cause for reward make blind those who have eye to see and make the decision of the upright false . do not be hard on the man from a strange country who be live among you for you have have experience of the feeling of one who be far from the land of his birth because you yourselves be live in egypt in a strange land . for six year put seed into your field and get in the increase but in the seventh year let the land have a rest and be unplanted so that the poor may have food from it and let the beast of the field take the rest . do the same with your vine garden and your olive tree . for six day do your work and on the seventh day keep the sabbath so that your ox and your as may have rest together with the son of your servant and the man from a strange land living among you . take note of all these thing which i have say to you and let not the name of other god come into your mind or from your lip . three time in the year you be to keep a feast to me . you be to keep the feast of unleavened bread for seven day let your bread be without leaven a i give you order at the regular time in the month abib for in it you come out of egypt and let no one come before me without an offering and the feast of the grain cut the first fruit of your plant field and the feast at the start of the year when you have get in all the fruit from your field . three time in the year let all your male come before the lord god . do not give the blood of my offering with leavened bread and do not let the fat of my feast be keep all night till the morning . the best of the first fruit of your land be to be take into the house of the lord your god . the young goat be not to be cook in it mother 's milk . see i be send an angel before you to keep you on your way and to be your guide into the place which i have make ready for you . give attention to him and give ear to his voice do not go against him for your wrongdoing will not be overlook by him because my name be in him . but if you truly give ear to his voice and do whatever i say then i will be against those who be against you fight those who be fight you . and my angel will go before you guide you into the land of the amorite and the hittite and the perizzite and the canaanite and the hivite and the jebusite and they will be cut off by my hand . do not go down on your face and give worship to their god or do a they do but overcome them completely and let their pillar be break down . and give worship to the lord your god who will send his bless on your bread and on your water and i will take all disease away from among you . all your animal will give birth without loss not one will be without young in all your land i will give you a full measure of life . i will send my fear before you put to flight all the people to whom you come all those who be against you will go in flight turn their back before you . i will send hornet before you drive out the hivite and the canaanite and the hittite before your face . i will not send them all out in one year for fear that their land may become waste and the beast of the field be increase overmuch against you . little by little i will send them away before you till your number be increase and you take up your heritage in the land . i will let the limit of your land be from the red sea to the sea of the philistine and from the waste land to the river euphrates for i will give the people of those land into your power and you will send them out before you . make no agreement with them or with their god . let them not go on living in your land or they will make you do evil against me for if you give worship to their god it will certainly be a cause of sin to you .and he say to moses come up to the lord you and aaron and nadab and abihu and seventy of the chief of israel and give me worship from a distance . and moses only may come near to the lord but the others be not to come near and the people may not come up with them . then moses come and put before the people all the word of the lord and his law and all the people answer with one voice say whatever the lord have say we will do . then moses put down in write all the word of the lord and he get up early in the morning and make an altar at the foot of the mountain with twelve pillar for the twelve tribe of israel . and he send some of the young men of the child of israel to make burned offering and peace offering of ox to the lord . and moses take half the blood and put it in basin drain out half of the blood over the altar . and he take the book of the agreement read it in the hearing of the people and they say everything which the lord have say we will do and we will keep his law . then moses take the blood and let it come on the people and say this blood be the sign of the agreement which the lord have make with you in these word . then moses and aaron nadab and abihu and seventy of the chief of israel go up and they saw the god of israel and under his foot there be a it seem a jewelled floor clear a the heaven . and he put not his hand on the chief of the child of israel they saw god and take food and drink . and the lord say to moses come up to me on the mountain and take your place there and i will give you the stone on which i have put in write the law and the order so that you may give the people knowledge of them . then moses and joshua his servant get up and moses go up into the mountain of god . and he say to the chief keep your place here till we come back to you aaron and hur be with you if anyone have any cause let him go to them . the cloud . and the glory of the lord be like a flame on the top of the mountain before the eye of the child of israel . and moses go up the mountain into the cloud and be there for forty day and forty night .and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel that they be to make me an offering from every man who have the impulse in his heart take an offering for me . and this be the offering you be to take from them gold and silver and brass and blue and purple and red and the best linen and goat ' hair and sheepskin colour red and leather and hard wood oil for the light spice and see that you make them from the design which you saw on the mountain .and you be to make a house for me with ten curtain of the best linen blue and purple and red work with design of wing one by a regularly . one lamb be to be offer in the morning and the other in the evening and with the one lamb a tenth part of an ephah of the best meal mixed with a fourth part of a hin of clear oil and the the lord . this be to be a regular burn offering make from generation to generation at the door of the tent of meeting before the lord where i will come face to face with you and have talk with you . cubit long on three pillar with their three base . all the hanging be of the best linen . and the base of the pillar be of brass their hook and the band round the top of them be of silver all the pillar be ring with silver . and the curtain for the doorway of the open space be of the best linen with design of blue and purple and red in needlework it be twenty cubit long and five cubit high to go with the hanging round the side . there be four pillar with their base all of brass the hook be of silver and their top and their band be cover with silver . all the nail use for the house and the open space round it be of brass . this be the price of the making of the house even the house of witness a it be value by the word of moses for the work of the levite under the direction of ithamar the son of aaron the priest . bezalel the son of uri the son of hur of the tribe of judah make everything a the lord have give order to moses . and with him be oholiab the son of ahisamach of the tribe of dan a designer and a trained workman expert in needlework of blue and purple and red and the best linen . the gold use for all the different work do for the holy place the gold which be give be twenty nine talent and seven hundred and thirty shekel in weight by the scale of the holy place . and the silver give by those who be number of the people be a hundred talent and a thousand seven hundred and seventy five shekel in weight by the scale of the holy place . a beka that be half a shekel by the holy scale for everyone who be number there be six hundred and three thousand five hundred and fifty men of twenty year old and over . of this silver a hundred talent be use for make the base of the pillar of the holy place and of the veil a talent for every base . and a thousand seven hundred and seventy five shekel of silver be use to make the hook for the pillar and for plat the top of the pillar and for make their band . the brass which be give be seventy talent two thousand four hundred shekel from it he make the base of the doorway of the tent of meeting and the brass altar and the network for it and all the vessel for the altar and the base for the open space all round and for it doorway and all the nail for the house and for the open space .and from the needlework of blue and purple and red they make the robe use for the work of the holy place and the holy robe for aaron a the lord have give order to moses . the ephod he make of gold and blue and purple and red and the best linen hammer the gold into thin plate and cut it into wire to be work into the blue and the purple and the red and the linen by the designer . and they make two band for join it edge together at the top of the arm . and the beautifully work band which go on it be of the same design and the same material work in gold and blue and purple and red and twisted linen work a the lord give order to moses . then they make the beryl stone fix in twisted frame of gold and cut like the cutting of a stamp with the name of the child of israel . these he put on the ephod over the arm hole to be stone of memory for the child of israel a the lord have say to moses . the priest 's bag be design like the ephod of the best linen work with gold and blue and purple and red . it be square and fold in two a long and as wide a the stretch of a man 's hand and on it they put four line of stone in the first line be a carnelian a chrysolite and an emerald in the second a ruby a sapphire and an onyx in the third a jacinth an agate and an amethyst in the fourth a topaz a beryl and a jasper they be fix in twisted frame of gold . there be twelve stone for the twelve tribe of israel on every one the name of one of the tribe of israel be cut like the cutting of a stamp . and on the bag they put gold chain twist like cord . and they make two gold frame and two gold ring the ring be fix to the end of the priest 's bag and they put the two twist chain on the two ring at the end of the priest 's bag and the other two end of the chain be join to the two frame and fix to the front of the ephod over the arm hole . and they make two ring of gold and put them on the two low end of the bag on the inner side near to the ephod . and two other gold ring be put on the front of the ephod over the arm hole at the join and over the worked band . and the ring on the bag be fix to the ring of the ephod by a blue cord keep it in place over the band so that the bag might not get loose a the lord give order to moses . the robe which go with the ephod be make all of blue with a hole at the top in the middle like the hole in the coat of a fight man edge with a band to make it strong . the skirt of the robe be work all round with fruit in blue and purple and red made of twisted linen . and between the fruit all round the skirt they put gold bell a the lord give order to moses . all round the skirt of the robe be bell and fruit in turn . the coat for aaron and his son they make of the best linen and the twisted head dress for aaron and beautiful head dress of linen and linen trouser and a linen band work with a design of blue and purple and red a the lord have say to moses . and it base and make them holy . then let aaron and his son come to the door of the tent of meeting and after wash them with water you be to put on aaron the holy robe and you be to put oil on him and priest for ever from generation to generation . and moses do this a the lord give him order so he do . so on the first day of the first month in the second year the house be put up . moses put up the house place it base in position and lift up it upright put in the rod and plant the pillar in their place stretch the outer tent over it and cover it a the lord have give him order . and he take the give him order . and he put up the curtain at the doorway of the house . and at the door of the house of the tent of meeting he put the altar of burned offering offer on it the burned offering and the wash whenever they go into the tent of meeting and when they come near the altar a the lord have give order to moses . and he put up the hanging form the open space round the house and the altar and put the curtain over the doorway . so moses make the work complete . then the cloud come down cover the tent of meeting and the house be full of the glory of the lord so that moses be not able to go into the tent of meeting because the cloud be rest on it and the house be full of the glory of the lord . and whenever the cloud be take up from the house the child of israel go forward on their journey but while the cloud be there they make no move till it be take up . for the cloud of the lord be rest on the house by day and at night there be fire in the cloud before the eye of all the people of israel and so it be through all their journey .and the voice of the lord come to moses out of the tent of meet say give these order to the child of israel when anyone of you make an offering to the lord you be to take it from the cattle from the herd or from the flock . if the offering be a burned offering of the herd let him give a male without a mark he be to give it at the door of the tent of meeting so that he may be please to the lord . and he be to put his hand on the head of the burned offering and it will be take for him to take away his sin . and the ox be to be put to death about the loss of something which he have come across by chance if a man have do any of these evil thing cause sin to come on him then he will have to give back the thing he take by force or get by offering then let him give with the offering unleavened cake mixed with oil and thin unleavened cake cover with oil and cake of the best meal well mixed with oil . with his peace offer let him give cake of leavened bread a a praise offering . and let him give one out of every offering to be lift up before the lord that it may be for the priest who put the blood of the peace offering on the altar . and the flesh of the praise offering be to be take a food on the day when it be offer no part of it may be keep till the morning . but if his offering be make because of an oath or give freely it may be take a food on the day when it be offer and the rest may be use up on the day after but if any of the flesh of the offering be still unused on the third day it be to be burn with fire . and if any of the flesh of the peace offering be take a food on the third day it will not be please to god and will not be put to the account of him who give it it will be unclean and a cause of sin to him who take it a food . and flesh touch by any unclean thing may not be take for food it be to be burn with fire and a for the flesh of the peace offering everyone who be clean may take it a food but he who be unclean when he take a food the flesh of the peace offering which be the lord 's will be cut off from his people . and anyone who after touch any unclean thing of man or an unclean beast or any unclean and disgusting thing take a food the flesh of the peace offering which be the lord 's will be cut off from his people . and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel you be not to take any fat of ox or sheep or goat for food . and the fat of that which come to a natural death and the fat of that which be attack by beast may be use for other purpose but not in any way for food . for anyone who take a food the fat of any beast of which men make an offering by fire to the lord will be cut off from his people . and you be not to take for food any blood of bird or of beast in any of your house . whoever take any blood for food will be cut off from his people . and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel he who make a peace offering to the lord be to give an offering to the lord out of his peace offering he himself be to take to the lord the offering make by fire even the fat with the breast so that the breast may be wave for a wave offering before the lord . and the fat be to be burn by the priest on the altar but the breast be for aaron and his son . and the right leg you be to give to the priest for an offering to be lift up out of what be give for your peace offering . that man among the son of aaron by whom the blood of the peace offering and the fat be offer be to have the right leg for his part . for the breast which be wave and the right leg which be . if i have take the sin offering a food today would it have be please to the lord ? and after hear this moses be no long angry .and the lord say to moses and aaron say to the child of israel these be the living thing which you may have for food among all the beast on the earth . you may have a food any beast which have a division in the horn of it foot and whose food come back into it mouth to be crush again . but at the same time of those beast you may not take for food the camel because it food come back but the horn of it foot be not part in two it be unclean to you . and the rock badger for the same reason be unclean to you . and the hare because the horn of it foot be not part in two be unclean to you . and the pig be unclean to you because though the horn of it foot be part it food do not come back . their flesh may not be use for food and their dead body may not even be touch they be unclean to you . these you may have for food of all thing live in the water anything living in the water in the sea or river which have special part for swimming and skin form of thin plate may be use for food . all other thing live and move in the water in the sea or in the river be a disgust thing to you they may not be use for food and their dead body be disgust to you . anything in the water which have no special part for swimming and no thin plate on it skin be disgust to you . and among bird these be to be disgust to you and not to be use for food the eagle and the gier eagle and the ospray and the kite and the falcon and bird of that sort every raven and bird of that sort and the ostrich and the night hawk and the sea hawk and bird of that sort and the little owl and the cormorant and the great owl and the water hen and the pelican and the vulture the stork and the heron and bird of that sort and the hoopoe and the bat . every wing four footed thing which go on the earth be disgust to you but of the winged four footed thing those which have long leg for jump on the earth you may have for food such a all the different sort of locust . but all other wing four foot thing which go on the earth be disgust to you . by these you will be make unclean anyone touch their dead body will be unclean till even whoever take away the dead body of one of them be to have his clothing wash and will be unclean till even . every beast in the horn of whose foot there be not a complete division and whose food do not come back be unclean to you anyone touch one of these will be unclean . any four foot beast which go on the ball of it foot be unclean to you anyone touch the dead body of one of these will be unclean till even . anyone who take away the dead body of one of these be to have his clothing wash and be unclean till even . and these be unclean to you among thing which go low down on the earth the weasel and the mouse and the great lizard and animal of that sort and the ferret and the land crocodile and the lizard and the sand lizard and the chameleon . all these be unclean to you anyone touch them when they be dead will be unclean till even . the dead body of any of these fall on anything will make that thing unclean if it be any vessel of wood or clothing or skin or bag whatever it be if it be use for any purpose it will have to be put into water and will be unclean till even after that it will be clean . and if one of them get into any vessel of earth whatever be in the vessel will be unclean and the vessel will have to be break . any food in it and anything on which water from it come will be unclean any drink take from such a vessel will be unclean . any part of the dead body of one of these fall on anything will make it unclean if it be an oven or a cooking pot it will have to be break they be unclean and will be unclean to you . but at the same time a fountain or a place where water be store for use will be clean but anyone touch their dead body will be unclean . if any part of the dead body of one of these get on to any seed for plant it be clean but if water be put on the seed and any part of the dead body get on to it it will be unclean to you . and if any beast which may be use for food come to a natural death anyone touch it dead body will be unclean till even . and he who make use of any part of it body for food be to have his clothing wash and be unclean till even and anyone take away it body be to have his clothing wash and be unclean till even . everything which go flat on it body on the earth be disgust and be not to be use for food . whatever go on it stomach or on four foot or have a great number of foot even all those go flat on the earth may not be use for food for they be disgust . you be not to make yourselves disgust with anything which go about flat on the earth you may not make yourselves unclean with them in such a way that you be not holy to me . for i be the lord your god for this reason make and keep yourselves holy for i be holy you be not to make yourselves unclean with any sort of thing which go about flat on the earth . for i be the lord who take you out of the land of egypt to be your god so be you holy for i be holy . this be the law about beast and bird and every living thing move in the water and every living thing which go flat on the earth mark out the unclean from the clean and the living thing which may be use for food from that which may not .and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel if a woman be with child and give birth to a male child she will be unclean for seven day a when she be unwell . and on the eighth day let him be give circumcision . and she will be unclean for thirty three day till the flow of her blood be stop no holy thing may be touch by her and she may not come into the holy place till the day for make her clean be end . but if she give birth to a female child then she will be unclean for two week a when she be unwell and she will not be completely clean for sixty six day . and when the day be end for make her clean for a son or a daughter let her take to the priest at the door of the tent of meet a lamb of the first year for a burned offering and a young pigeon or a dove for a sin offering and the priest be to make an offering of it before the lord and take away her sin and she will be make clean from the flow of her blood . this be the law for a woman who give birth to a male or a female . and if she have not money enough for a lamb then let her take two dove or two young pigeon one for a burned offering and the other for a sin offering and the priest will take away her sin and she will be cleanand the lord say to moses and aaron if a man have on his skin a growth or a mark or a white place and it become the disease of a leper let him be take to aaron the priest or to one of the priest his son and if when the priest see the mark on his skin the hair on the place be turn white and the mark seem to go deep than the skin it be the mark of a leper and the priest after look at him will say that he be unclean . but if the mark on his skin be white and do not seem to go deep than the skin and the hair on it be not turn white then the priest will keep him shut up for seven day and the priest be to see him on the seventh day and if in his opinion the place on his skin have not become bad and be not increase in size then the priest will keep him shut up for seven day more and the priest be to see him again on the seventh day and if the mark be less bright and be not increase on his skin then let the priest say that he be clean it be only a skin mark and after his clothing have be wash he will be clean . but if the size of the mark on his skin be increase after he have be see by the priest let him go to the priest again and if after look at him he see that the mark be increase in his skin let the priest say that he be unclean he be a leper . when the disease of a leper be see on a man let him be take to the priest and if the priest see that there be a white growth on the skin and the hair be turn white and there be diseased flesh in the growth it be an old disease in the skin of his flesh and the priest will say that he be unclean he will not have to be shut up for he be clearly unclean . and if the disease come out all over his skin from his head to his foot as far a the priest be able to see and if the priest see that all his flesh be cover with the leper 's disease the priest will say that he be clean it be all turned white he be clean . but whenever diseased flesh be see on him he will be unclean . and when the priest see the diseased flesh he will say that he be unclean the diseased flesh be unclean he be a leper . or if the diseased flesh be turn again and change to white then he be to come to the priest and the priest will see him and if the place be turn white then the priest will say that he be free from the disease . and if a bad place have come out on the skin and be well again and on the same place there be a white growth of a bright mark red and white then let the priest see it and after look at it if it seem to go deep than the skin and the hair on it be turn white then the priest will say that the man be unclean it be the leper 's disease it have come out in the bad place . but if after look at it he see that there be no white hair on it and it be not deep than the skin and it be not very bright then let the priest keep him shut up for seven day and if it be increase on the skin the priest will say that he be unclean it be a disease . but if the bright mark keep in the same place and get no great it be the mark of the old wound and the priest will say that he be clean . or if there be a burn on the skin of the flesh and if the diseased flesh in the burn become a bright place red and white or white the priest be to see it and if the hair on the bright place be turn white and it seem to go deep than the skin he be a leper it have come out in the burn and the priest will say that he be unclean it be the leper 's disease . but if after look at it the priest see that there be no white hair on the bright place and it be not deep than the skin and be not very bright then let the priest keep him shut up for seven day and the priest be to see him again on the seventh day if it be increase in the skin then the priest will say that he be unclean it be the leper 's disease . and if the bright place keep the same size and get no great on the skin but be less bright it be the effect of the burn and the priest will say that he be clean it be the mark of the burn . and when a man or a woman have a disease on the head or in the hair of the chin then the priest be to see the diseased place and if it seem to go deep than the skin and if there be thin yellow hair in it then the priest will say that he be unclean he have the mark of the leper 's disease on his head or in the hair of his chin . and after look at the diseased place if it do not seem to go deep than the skin and there be no black hair in it then the priest will have him shut up for seven day and on the seventh day the priest will see the place and if it be not increase and there be no yellow hair in it and it do not seem to go deep than the skin then his hair be to be cut off but not on the diseased place and he be to be shut up for seven day more and on the seventh day the priest will see the place and if it be not increase and do not seem to go deep than the skin the priest will say that he be clean and after his clothing have be wash he will be clean . but if the disease in his skin become bad after he have be make clean then the priest be to see him and if the mark be increase the priest without look for the yellow hair will say that he be unclean . but if in his opinion the growth be stop and black hair have come up on it the disease have go he be clean and the priest will say that he be clean . and if a man or a woman have bright mark on the skin of their flesh that be bright white mark then the priest be to see them and if the white mark on their skin be not very bright it be a skin disease which have come out on the skin he be clean . and if a man 's hair have come out and he have no hair still he be clean . and if the hair have go from the front part of his head so that he have no hair there still he be clean . but if on his head or on his brow where he have no hair there be a red and white place it be the disease of the leper come out on his head or on his brow . then if the priest see that the growth of the disease have become red and white on his head or on his brow where there be no hair like the mark in the skin of a leper he be a leper and unclean the priest be to say that he be most certainly unclean the disease be in his head . and the leper who have the disease on him be to go about with sign of grief with his hair loose and his mouth cover cry unclean unclean . while the disease be on him he will be unclean . he be unclean let him keep by himself live outside the tent circle . and any clothing of wool or of linen in which be the mark of the disease if it be in the thread of the linen or of the wool or in leather or in anything make of skin if there be red or green mark on the clothing or on the leather or in the thread of the cloth or in anything make of skin it be the leper 's disease let the priest see it . and after it have be see by the priest the thing which be so marked be to be shut up for seven day and he be to see the mark on the seventh day if the mark be increase in the clothing or in the thread of the material or in the leather whatever the leather be use for it be the disease bite into it it be unclean . and the clothing or the wool or linen material or anything of leather in which be the disease be to be burn for the disease be bite into it let it be burn in the fire . and if the priest see that the mark be not increase in the clothing or in any part of the material or in the leather then the priest will give order for the thing on which the mark be to be wash and to be shut up for seven day more and if after the mark have be wash the priest see that the colour of it be not change and it be not increase it be to be burn in the fire the disease be work in it though the damage may be inside or outside . and if the priest see that the mark be less bright after the wash then let him have it cut out of the clothing or the leather or from the thread of the material and if the mark be still see in the clothing or in the thread of the material or in the leather it be the disease come out the thing in which the disease be will have to be burn with fire . and the material of the clothing or anything of skin which have be wash if the mark have go out of it let it be wash a second time and it will be clean . this be the law about the leper 's disease in the thread of wool or linen material in clothing or in anything of skin say how it be to be judge clean or unclean .and the lord say to moses this be the law of the leper on the day when he be make clean he be to be take to the priest and the priest be to go outside the tent circle and if after look the priest see that the mark of the disease have go from him then the priest be to give order to take for him who be to be make clean two live clean bird and some cedar wood and red thread and hyssop . and the priest will give order for one of the bird to be put to death in a vessel make of earth over flowing water . and he will take the living bird and the wood and the red thread and the hyssop and put them in the blood of the bird which be put to death over flowing water . and shake it seven time over the man who be to be make clean he will say that he be clean and will let the living bird go free into the open country . and he who be to be make clean will have his clothing wash and his hair cut and have a bath and he will be clean . and after that he will come back to the tent circle but he be to keep outside his tent for seven day . and on the seventh day he be to have all the hair cut off his head and his chin and over his eye all his hair be to be cut off and he will have his clothing wash and his body bath in water and he will be clean . and on the eighth day let him take two male lamb without any mark on them and one female lamb of the first year without a mark and three tenth part of an ephah of the best meal mixed with oil and one log of oil . and the priest who be make him clean will put the man who be be make clean together with these thing before the door of the tent of meeting . and the priest be to take one of the male lamb and give it a an offering for wrongdoing and the log of oil wave them for a wave offering before the lord and he be to put the male lamb to death in the place where they put to death the sin offering and the burned offering in the holy place for a the sin offering be the property of the priest so be the offering for wrongdoing it be most holy . and let the priest take some of the blood of the offering for wrongdoing and put it on the point of the right ear of him who be to be make clean and on the thumb of his right hand and on the great toe of his right foot and take some of the oil and put it in the hollow of his left hand and let the priest put his right finger in the oil which be in his left hand shake it out with his finger seven time before the lord and of the rest of the oil which be in his hand the priest will put some on the point of the right ear of the man who be to be make clean and on the thumb of his right hand and on the great toe of his right foot over the blood of the offering for wrongdoing and the rest of the oil in the priest 's hand he will put on the head of him who be to be make clean and so the priest will make him free from sin before the lord . and the priest will give the sin offering and take away the sin of him who be to be make clean from his unclean condition and after that he will put the burned offering to death . and the priest be to have the burn offering and the meal offering burn on the altar and the priest will take away his sin and he will be clean . and if he be poor and not able to get so much then he may take one male lamb a an offering for wrongdoing to be wave to take away his sin and one tenth part of an ephah of the best meal mixed with oil for a meal offering and a log of oil and two dove or two young pigeon such a he be able to and the priest will take some of the blood of the offering for wrongdoing and put it on the point of the right ear of him who be to be make clean and on the thumb of his right hand and on the great toe of his right foot and the priest will put out some of the oil in the hollow of his left hand shake out drop of oil with his right finger before the lord seven time and the priest will put some of the oil which be in his hand on the point of the ear of the man who be to be make clean and on the thumb of his right hand and on the great toe of his right foot on the place where the blood of the away the sin of him who be to be make clean before the lord . this be the law for the man who have the disease of the leper on him and who be not able to get that which be necessary for make himself clean . and the lord say to moses and aaron when you have come into the land of canaan which i will give you for your heritage if i put the leper 's disease on a house in the land of your heritage then let the owner of the house come and say to the priest it seem to me that there be a sort of leper 's disease in the house . and the priest will give order for everything to be take out of the house before he go in to see the disease so that the thing in the house may not become unclean and then the priest be to go in to see the house and if he see that the wall of the house be mark with hollow of green and red and if it seem to go deep than the face of the wall then the priest will go out of the door of the house and keep the house shut up for seven day and the priest be to come again on the seventh day and have a look and see if the mark on the wall of the house be increase in size then the priest will give order to them to take out the stone in which the disease be see and put them out into an unclean place outside the town and he will have the house rub all over inside and the paste which be rub off will be put out into an unclean place outside the town and they will take other stone and put them in place of those stone and he will take other paste and put it on the wall of the house . and if the disease come out again in the house after he have take out the stone and after the wall have be rub and the new paste put on then the priest will come and see it and if the disease in the house be increase in size it be the leper 's disease work out in the house it be unclean . and the house will have to be pull down the stone of it and the wood and the paste and everything be to be take out to an unclean place outside the town . and in addition anyone who go into the house at any time while it be shut up will be unclean till even . and anyone who have be sleep in the house will have to have his clothing wash and anyone who take food in that house will have to have his clothing wash . and if the priest come in and see that the disease be not increase after the new paste have be put on the house then the priest will say that the house be clean because the disease be go . and in order to make the house clean let him take two bird and cedar wood and red thread and hyssop and put one of the bird to death in a vessel of earth over flowing water and take the cedar wood and the hyssop and the red thread and the living bird and put them in the blood of the dead bird and in the flowing water shake it over the house seven time . and he will make the house clean with the blood of the bird and the flowing water and with the living bird and with the cedar wood and the hyssop and the red thread . but he will let the living bird go out of the town into the open country so he will take away sin from the house and it will be clean . this be the law for all sign of the leper 's disease and for skin disease and for sign of disease in clothing or in a house and for a growth or a bad place or a bright mark on the skin to make clear when it be unclean and when it be clean this be the law about the disease of the leper .and the lord say to moses and to their regular time . in the first month on the fourteenth day of the month at nightfall be the lord 's passover and on the fifteenth day of the same month be the feast of unleavened bread for seven day let your food be unleavened bread . on the first day you will have a holy meeting you may do no sort of field work . and every day for seven day you will give a burned offering to the lord and on the seventh day there will be a holy meeting you may do no field work . and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel when you have come to the land which i will give you and have get in the grain from it field take some of the first fruit of the grain to the priest and let the grain be wave before the lord so that you may be please to him on the day after the sabbath let it be wave by the priest . and on the day of the waving of the grain you be to give a male lamb of the first year without any mark for a burned offering to the lord . and let the meal offering with it be two tenth part of an ephah of the best meal mixed with oil an offering make by fire to the lord for a sweet smell and the drink offering with it be to be of wine the fourth part of a hin . and you may take no bread or dry grain or new grain for food till the very day on which you have give the offering for your god this be a rule for ever through all your generation wherever you be live . and let seven full week be number from the day after the sabbath the day when you give the grain for the wave offering let fifty day be number to the day after the seventh sabbath then you be to give a new meal offering to the lord . take from your house two cake of bread make of a fifth part of an ephah of the best meal cook with leaven to be wave for first fruit to the lord . and with the bread take seven lamb of the first year without any mark and one ox and two male sheep to be a burned offering to the lord with their meal offering and their drink offering an offering of a sweet smell make by fire to the lord . and you be to give one male goat for a sin offering and two male lamb of the first year for peace offering . and these will be wave by the priest with the bread of the first fruit for a wave offering to the lord with the two lamb they will be holy to the lord for the priest . and on the same day let it be give out that there will be a holy meeting for you you may do no field work on that day it be a rule for ever through all your generation wherever you be live . and when you get in the grain from your land do not let all the grain at the edge of the field be cut and do not take up the grain which have be drop in the field let that be for the poor and for the man from another country i be the lord your god . and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel in the seventh month on the first day of the month let there be a special day of rest for you a day of memory mark by the blowing of horn a meeting for worship . do no field work and give to the lord an offering make by fire . and the lord say to moses the tenth day of this seventh month be the day for the take away of sin let it be a holy day of worship you be to keep from pleasure and give to the lord an offering make by fire . and on that day you may do no sort of work for it be a day of take away sin to make you clean before the lord your god . for any person whoever he may be who take his pleasure on that day will be cut off from his people . and if any person whoever he may be on that day do any sort of work i will send destruction on him from among his people . you may not do any sort of work this be an order for ever through all your generation wherever you may be live . let this be a sabbath of special rest to you and keep yourselves from all pleasure on the ninth day of the month at nightfall from even to even let this sabbath be keep . and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel on the fifteenth day of this seventh month let the feast of tent be keep to the lord for seven day . on the first day there will be a holy meeting do no field work . every day for seven day give an offering make by fire to the lord and on the eighth day there be to be a holy meeting when you be to give an offering make by fire to the lord this be a special holy day you may do no field work on that day . these be the fixed feast of the lord to be keep by you a holy day of worship for make an offering by fire to the lord a burn offering a meal offer an offering of beast and drink offering every one on it special day in addition to the sabbath of the lord and in addition to the thing you give and the oath you make and the free offering to the lord . but on the fifteenth day of the seventh month when you have get in all the fruit of the land you will keep the feast of the lord for seven day the first day will be a sabbath and the eighth day the same . on the first day take the fruit of fair tree branch of palm tree and branch of thick tree and tree from the riverside and be glad before the lord for seven day . and let this feast be keep before the lord for seven day in the year it be a rule for ever from generation to generation in the seventh month let it be keep . for seven day you will be live in tent all those who be israelite by birth be to make tent their living place so that future generation may keep in mind how i give the child of israel tent a their living place when i take them out of the land of egypt i be the lord your god . and moses make clear to the child of israel the order about the fixed feast of the lord .and the lord say to moses give order to the child of israel to give you clean olive oil for the light so that a light may be burn at all time outside the veil of the ark in the tent of meet let aaron see that it be burn from even till morning at all time before the lord it be a rule for ever through all your generation . let aaron put the light in order on the support before the lord at all time . and take the best meal and make twelve cake of it a fifth part of an ephah in every cake . and put them in two line six in a line on the holy table before the lord . and on the line of cake put clean sweet smell spice for a sign on the bread an offering make by fire to the lord . every sabbath day regularly the priest be to put it in order before the lord it be offer for the child of israel an agreement make for ever . and it will be for aaron and his son they be to take it for food in a holy place it be the most holy of all the offering make by fire to the lord a rule for ever . and a son of an israelite woman whose father be an egyptian go out among the child of israel and have a fight with a man of israel by the tent and the son of the israelite woman say evil against the holy name with curse and they take him to moses . his mother 's name be shelomith the daughter of dibri of the tribe of dan . and they keep him shut up till a decision might be give by the mouth of the lord . and the lord say to moses take the curser outside the tent circle and let all in whose hear the word be say put their hand on his head and let him be stone by all the people . and say to the child of israel a for any man curse god his sin will be on his head . and he who say evil against the name of the lord will certainly be put to death he will be stone by all the people the man who be not of your nation and one who be an israelite by birth whoever say evil against the holy name be to be put to death . and anyone who take another 's life be certainly to be put to death . and anyone wound a beast and cause it death will have to make payment for it a life for a life . and if a man do damage to his neighbour a he have do so let it be do to him wind for wound eye for eye tooth for tooth whatever damage he have do so let it be do to him . he who put a beast to death will have to make payment for it he who put a man to death will himself be put to death . you be to have the same law for a man of another nation living among you a for an israelite for i be the lord your god . and moses say these word to the child of israel and they take the man who have be curse outside the tent circle and have him stone . the child of israel do a the lord give order to moses .and the lord say to moses on mount sinai say to the child of israel when you come into the land which i will give you let the land keep a sabbath to the lord . for six year put seed into your land and for six year give care to your vine and get in the produce of them but let the seventh year be a sabbath of rest for the land a sabbath to the lord do not put seed into your land or have your vine cut . that which come to growth of itself may not be cut and the grape of your uncared for vine may not be take off let it be a year of rest for the land . and the sabbath of the land will give food for you and your man servant and your woman servant and those work for payment and for those of another country who be live among you and for your cattle and the beast on the land all the natural increase of the land will be for food . and let seven sabbath of year be number to you seven time seven year even the day of seven sabbath of year that be forty nine year then let the loud horn be sound far and wide on the tenth day of the seventh month on the day of take away sin let the horn be sound through all your land . and let this fiftieth year be keep holy and say publicly that everyone in the land be free from debt it be the jubilee and every man may go back to his heritage and to his family . let this fiftieth year be the jubilee no seed may be plant and that which come to growth of itself may not be cut and the grape may not be take from the uncared for vine . for it be the jubilee and it be holy to you your food will be the natural increase of the field . in this year of jubilee let every man go back to his heritage . and in the business of trading good for money do no wrong to one another . let your exchange of good with your neighbour have relation to the number of year after the year of jubilee and the number of time the earth have give her produce . if the number of year be great the price will be increase and if the number of year be small the price will be less for it be the produce of a certain number of year which the man be give you . and do no wrong one to another but let the fear of your god be before you for i be the lord your god . so keep my rule and my decision and do them and you will be safe in your land . and the land will give her fruit and you will have food in full measure and be safe in the land . and if you say where will our food come from in the seventh year when we may not put in seed or get in the increase then i will send my blessing on you in the sixth year and the land will give fruit enough for three year . and in the eighth year you will put in your seed and get your food from the old store till the fruit of the ninth year be ready . no exchange of land may be for ever for the land be mine and you be a my guest live with me for a time . wherever there be property in land the owner be to have the right of get it back . if your brother become poor and have to give up some of his land for money his near relation may come and get back that which his brother have give up . and if he have no one to get it back for him and later he himself get wealth and have enough money to get it back then let him take into account the year from the time when he give it up and make up the loss for the rest of the year to him who take it and so get back his property . but if he be not able to get it back for himself then it will be keep by him who give a price for it till the year of jubilee and in that year it will go back to it first owner and he will have his property again . and if a man give his house in a walled town for money he have the right to get it back for the space of a full year after he have give it up . and if he do not get it back by the end of the year then the house in the town will become the property of him who give the money for it and of his child for ever it will not go from him in the year of jubilee . but house in small unwalled town will be the same a property in the country they may be get back and they will go back to their owner in the year of jubilee . but the house in the town of the levite may be get back by the levite at any time . and if a levite do not give money to get back his property his house in the town which be exchange for money will come back to him in the year of jubilee . for the house of the town of the levite be their property among the child of israel . but the land on the outskirt of their town may not be exchange for money for it be their property for ever . and if your brother become poor and be not able to make a living then you be to keep him with you help him a you would a man from another country who be live among you . take no interest from him in money or in good but have the fear of your god before you and let your brother make a living among you . do not take interest on the money which you let him have or on the food which you give him . i be the lord your god who take you out of the land of egypt to give you the land of canaan that i might be your god . and if your brother become poor and give himself to you for money do not make use of him like a servant who be your property but let him be with you a a servant working for payment till the year of jubilee then he will go out from you he and his child with him and go back to his family and to the property of his father . for they be my servant whom i take out from the land of egypt they may not become the property of another . do not be a hard master to him but have the fear of god before you . but you may get servant a property from among the nation round about from them you may take men servant and woman servant . and in addition you may get for money servant from among the child of other nation who be live with you and from their family which have come to birth in your land and these will be your property . and they will be your child 's heritage after you to keep a their property they will be your servant for ever but you may not be hard master to your countryman the child of israel . and if one from another nation living among you get wealth and your countryman at his side become poor and give himself for money to the man from another nation or to one of his family after he have give himself he have the right to be make free for a price by one of his brother or his father 's brother or the son of his father 's brother or any near relation or if he get money he may make himself free . and let the year be number from the time when he give himself to his owner till the year of jubilee and the price give for him will be in relation to the number of year on the scale of the payment of a servant . if there be still a long time he will give back on account of it a part of the price which be give for him . and if there be only a short time he will take account of it with his master and in relation to the number of year he will give back the price of make him free . and he will be with him a a servant working for payment year by year his master be not to be cruel to him before your eye . and if he be not make free in this way he will go out in the year of jubilee he and his child with him . for the child of israel be servant to me they be my servant whom i take out of the land of egypt i be the lord your god .do not make image of false god or put up an image cut in stone or a pillar or any pictured stone in your land to give worship to it for i be the lord your god . keep my sabbath and give honour to my holy place i be the lord . if you be guide by my rule and keep my law and do them then i will give you rain at the right time and the land will give her increase and the tree of the field will give their fruit and the crushing of the grain will overtake the cutting of the grape and the cutting of the grape will overtake the planting of the seed and there will be bread in full measure and you will be live in your land safely . and i will give you peace in the land and you will take your rest and no one will give you cause for fear and i will put an end to all evil beast in the land and no sword of war will go through your land . and you will put to flight those who be against you and they will be put to death by your sword . then five of you will put to flight a hundred and a hundred of you will put to flight ten thousand and all who be against you will be put to death by your sword . and i will have pleasure in you and make you fertile and great in number and i will keep my agreement with you . and old store long kept will be your food and you will take out the old because of the new and i will put my holy house among you and my soul will not be turn away from you in disgust . and i will be present among you and will be your god and you will be my people . i be the lord your god who take you out of the land of egypt so that you might not be servant to them by me the cord of your yoke be break and i make you go upright . but if you do not give ear to me and do not keep all these my law and if you go against my rule and if you have hate in your soul for my decision and you do not do all my order but go against my agreement this will i do to you i will put fear in your heart even waste disease and burn pain dry up the eye and make the soul feeble and you will get no profit from your seed for your hater will take it for food . and my face will be turn from you and you will be break before those who be against you and your hater will become your ruler and you will go in flight when no man come after you . and if even after these thing you will not give ear to me then i will send you punishment seven time more for your sin . and the pride of your strength will be break and i will make your heaven a iron and your earth a brass and your strength will be use up without profit for your land will not give her increase and the tree of the field will not give their fruit . and if you still go against me and will not give ear to me i will put seven time more punishment on you because of your sin . i will let loose the beast of the field among you and they will take away your child and send destruction on your cattle so that your number will become small and your road become waste . and if by these thing you will not be turn to me but still go against me then i will go against you and i will give you punishment i myself seven time for all your sin . and i will send a sword on you to give effect to the punishment of my agreement and when you come together into your town i will send disease among you and you will be give up into the hand of your hater . when i take away your bread of life ten woman will be cook bread in one oven and your bread will be measure out by weight you will have food but never enough . and if after all this you do not give ear to me but go against me still then my wrath will be burn against you and i will give you punishment i myself seven time for your sin . then you will take the flesh of your son and the flesh of your daughter for food and i will send destruction on your high place overturn your perfume altar and will put your dead body on your broken image and my soul will be turn from you in disgust . and i will make your town waste and send destruction on your holy place i will take no pleasure in the smell of your sweet perfume and i will make your land a waste a wonder to your hater live in it . and i will send you out in all direction among the nation and my sword will be uncover against you and your land will be without any living thing and your town will be make waste . then will the land take pleasure in it sabbath while it be waste and you be live in the land of your hater then will the land have rest . all the day while it be waste will the land have rest such rest a it never have in your sabbath when you be live in it . and a for the rest of you i will make their heart feeble in the land of their hater and the sound of a leaf move by the wind will send them in flight and they will go in flight a from the sword fall down when no one come after them fall on one another a before the sword when no one come after them you will give way before your hater . and death will overtake you among strange nation and the land of your hater will be your destruction . and those of you who be still live will be waste away in their sin in the land of your hater in the sin of their father they will be waste away . and they will have grief for their sin and for the sin of their father when their heart be untrue to me and they go against me so that i go against them and send them away into the land of their hater if then the pride of their heart be break and they take the punishment of their sin then i will keep in mind the agreement which i make with jacob and with isaac and with abraham and i will keep in mind the land . and the land while she be without them will keep her sabbath and they will undergo the punishment of their sin because they be turn away from my decision and in their soul be hate for my law . but for all that when they be in the land of their hater i will not let them go or be turn away from them or give them up completely my agreement with them will not be break for i be the lord their god . and because of them i will keep in mind the agreement which i make with their father whom i take out of the land of egypt before the eye of the nation to be their god i be the lord . these be the rule decision and law which the lord make between himself and the child of israel in mount sinai by the hand of moses .and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel if a man make a special oath you will give your decision a to the value of the person for the lord . and you will put the value of a male from twenty year to sixty year old at fifty shekel of silver by the scale of the holy place . and if it be a female the value will be thirty shekel . and if the person be from five to twenty year old the value will be twenty shekel for a male and ten for a female . and if the person be from one month to five year old then the value for a male will be five shekel of silver and for a female three shekel . and for sixty year old and over for a male the value will be fifteen shekel and for a female ten . but if he be poor than the value which you have put on him then let him be take to the priest and the priest will put a value on him such a it be possible for him to give . and if it be a beast of which men make offering to the lord whatever any man give of such to the lord will be holy . it may not be change in any way a good give for a bad or a bad for a good if one beast be change for another the two will be holy . and if it be any unclean beast of which offering be not make to the lord then let him take the beast before the priest and let the priest put a value on it if it be good or bad whatever value the priest put on it so will it be . but if he have a desire to get it back for himself let him give a fifth more than your value . and if a man have give his house a holy to the lord then the priest will put a value on it if it be good or bad a the priest give decision so will the value be fix . and if the owner have a desire to get back his house let him give a fifth more than your value and it will be his . and if a man give to the lord part of the field which be his property then let your value be in relation to the seed which be plant in it a measure of barley grain will be value at fifty shekel of silver . if he give his field from the year of jubilee the value will be fix by your decision . but if he give his field after the year of jubilee the amount of the money will be work out by the priest in relation to the number of year till the come year of jubilee and the necessary amount will be take off your value . and if the man who have give the field have a desire to get it back let him give a fifth more than the price at which it be value and it will be his . but if he have no desire to get it back or if he have give it for a price to another man it may not be get back again . but the field when it become free at the year of jubilee will be holy to the lord a a field give under oath it will be the property of the priest . and if a man give to the lord a field which he have get for money from another which be not part of his heritage then the value fix by you up to the year of jubilee will be work out for him by the priest and in that day he will give the amount of your value a holy to the lord . in the year of jubilee the field will go back to him from whom he get it that be to him whose heritage it be . and let all your value be base on the shekel of the holy place that be twenty gerahs to the shekel . but a man may not give by oath to the lord the first fruit of cattle which be offer to the lord if it be an ox or a sheep it be the lord 's . and if it be an unclean beast then the owner of it may give money to get it back in agreement with the value fix by you by give a fifth more or if it be not take back let it be give for money in agreement with your valuing . but nothing which a man have give completely to the lord out of all his property of man or beast or of the land which be his heritage may be give away or get back in exchange for money anything completely give be most holy to the lord . any man give completely to the lord may not be get back he be certainly to be put to death . and every tenth part of the land of the seed plant or of the fruit of tree be holy to the lord . and if a man have a desire to get back any of the tenth part which he have give let him give a fifth more . and a tenth part of the herd and of the flock whatever go under the rod of the valuer will be holy to the lord . he may not make search to see if it be good or bad or make any change in it and if he make exchange of it for another the two will be holy he will not get them back again . these be the order which the lord give to moses for the child of israel in mount sinai .and the lord say to moses in the waste land of sinai in the tent of meeting on the first day of the second month thirty five thousand four hundred . the number of all the army of ephraim be a hundred and eight thousand one hundred . they go forward third . on the north side will be the flag of the child of dan they may not make unclean my resting place among them . so the child of israel do a the lord have say to moses and put them outside the tent circle . and the lord say to moses say to the child of
