fifth part and give it to him to whom the wrong be do . but if the man have no relation to whom the payment may be make then the payment for sin make to the lord will be the priest 's in addition to the sheep offer to take away his sin . and every offering lift up of all the holy thing which the child of israel give to the priest will be his . and every man 's holy thing will be his whatever a man give to the priest will be his . and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel if any man 's wife do wrong sin against him by take a her lover another man and keep it secret so that her husband have no knowledge of it and there be no witness against her and she be not take in the act if the spirit of doubt come into her husband 's heart and he have doubt of his wife with good cause or if he have doubt of her without cause then let him take her to the priest offering for her the tenth part of an ephah of barley meal without oil or perfume for it be a meal offering of a bitter spirit a meal offering keep wrongdoing in mind . and the priest will make her come near and put her before the lord and the priest will take holy water in a pot and put in it dust from the floor of the house and he will make the woman come before the lord with her hair loose and will put the meal offer the offering of a bitter spirit in her hand and the priest will take in his hand the bitter water cause the curse and he will make her take an oath and say to her if no man have be your lover and you have not be with another in place of your husband you be free from this bitter water cause the curse but if you have be with another in place of your husband and have make yourself unclean with a lover then the priest will put the oath of the curse on the woman and say to her may the lord make you a curse and an oath among your people send on you waste of the leg and disease of the stomach and this water of the curse will go into your body cause disease of your stomach and wasting of your leg and the woman will say so be it . and the priest will put these curse in a book wash out the write with the bitter water and he will give to the woman the bitter water for drink and the bitter water cause the curse will go into her . and the priest will take from her hand the meal offering of doubt wave it before the lord and will take it to the altar and he will take some of it in his hand burn it on the altar a a sign and then he will give the woman the bitter water . and it will be that if the woman have become unclean sin against her husband when she have take the bitter water it will go into her body cause disease of the stomach and wasting of the leg and she will be a curse among her people . but if she be clean she will be free and will have offspring . this be the law for test a wife who go with another in place of her husband and become unclean or for a husband who in a bitter spirit have doubt in his heart about his wife let him take her to the priest who will put in force this law . then the man will be free from all wrong and the woman 's sin will be on her .and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel if a man or a woman take an oath to keep himself separate and give himself to the lord he be to keep himself from wine and strong drink and take no mixed wine or strong drink or any drink make from grape or any grape green or dry . all the time he be separate he may take nothing make from the grape vine from it seed to it skin . all the time he be under his oath let no blade come near his head till the day while he be separate be end he be holy and his hair may not be cut . all the time he be separate he may not come near any dead body . he may not make himself unclean for his father or his mother his sister or his brother if death come to them because he be under an oath to keep himself separate for god . all the time he be separate he be holy to the lord . if death come suddenly to a man at his side so that he become unclean let his hair be cut off on the day when he be make clean on the seventh day . and on the eighth day let him take to the priest at the door of the tent of meet two dove or two young pigeon and the priest will give one for a sin offering and the other for a burned offering to take away the sin which come on him on account of the dead and he will make his head holy that same day . and he will give to the lord his day of be separate offering a he lamb of the first year a an offering for error but the early day will be a loss because he become unclean . and this be the law for him who be separate when the necessary day be end he be to come to the door of the tent of meeting and make his offering to the lord one he lamb of the first year without a mark for a burned offering and one female lamb of the first year without a mark for a sin offering and one male sheep without a mark for peace offering and a basket of unleavened bread cake of the best meal mixed with oil and thin unleavened cake cover with oil with their meal offering and drink offering . and the priest will take them before the lord and make his sin offering and his burned offering give the sheep of the peace offering with the basket of unleavened bread and at the same time the priest will make his meal offering and his drink offering . then let his long hair the sign of his oath be cut off at the door of the tent of meeting and let him put it on the fire on which the peace offering be burn . and the priest will take the cooked leg of the sheep and one unleavened cake and one thin cake out of the basket and put them on the hand of the separate one after his hair have be cut wave them for a wave offering before the lord this be holy for the priest together with the wave breast and the leg which be lift up after that the man may take wine . this be the law for him who take an oath to keep himself separate and for his offering to the lord on that account in addition to what he may be able to . and when moses go into the tent of meeting to have talk with him then the voice come to his ear from over the cover which be on the ark of witness from between the two wing one . and he have talk with him .and the lord say to moses say to aaron when you put the light in their place the seven light will give light in front of the support . and aaron do so he put the light in their place so that they give light in front of the support a the lord give order to moses . the support for the light be of hammered gold work from it base to it flower it be of hammered work from the design which the lord have give to moses he make the support for the light . and the lord say to moses take the levite out from among the child of israel and make them clean . and this be how you be to make them clean let the holy water which take away sin be put on them and let the hair all over their body be cut off with a sharp blade and let their clothing be wash and their body make clean . then let them take a young ox and it meal offering crush grain mixed with oil and take another ox for a sin offering . and make the levite come forward in front of the tent of meeting and let all the child of israel come together and you be to take the levite before the lord and the child of israel be to put their hand on them and aaron be to give the levite to the lord a a wave offering from the child of israel so that they may do the lord 's work . and the levite be to put their hand on the head of the ox and one of the ox be to be offer for a sin offering and the other for a burned offering to the lord to take away the sin of the levite . then the levite be to be put before aaron and his son to be offer a a wave offering to the lord . so you be to make the levite separate from the child of israel and the levite will be mine . after that the levite will go in to do whatever have to be do in the tent of meeting you be to make them clean and give them a a wave offering . for they have be give to me from among the child of israel in place of every mother 's first son the first to come to birth in israel i have take them for myself . for every mother 's first son among the child of israel be mine the first male birth of man or beast on the day when i send death on all the first son in the land of egypt i make them mine . and in place of the first son among the child of israel i have take the levite . and i have give them to aaron and to his son from among the child of israel to undertake for them all the work of the tent of meeting and to take away sin from the child of israel so that no evil may come on them when they come near the holy place . all these thing moses and aaron and the child of israel do to the levite a the lord give order to moses about the levite so the child of israel do . and the levite be make clean from sin and their clothing be wash and aaron give them for a wave offering before the lord and aaron take away their sin and make them clean . and then the levite go in to do their work in the tent of meeting before aaron and his son all the order which the lord have give moses about the levite be put into effect . and the lord say to moses this be the rule for the levite those of twenty five year old and over be to go in and do the work of the tent of meeting but after they be fifty year old they be to give up their work and do no more but be with their brother in the tent of meeting take care of it but do no work . this be what you be to do in connection with the levite and their work .and the lord say to moses in the waste land of sinai in the first month of the second year after they have come out of the land of egypt let the child of israel keep the passover at it regular time . in the fourteenth day of this month at even you be to keep it at the regular time and in the way order in the law . and moses give order to the child of israel to keep the passover . so they keep the passover in the first month on the fourteenth day of the month at even in the waste land of sinai a the lord give order to moses so the child of israel do . and there be certain men who be unclean because of a dead body so that they be not able to keep the passover on that day and they come before moses and before aaron on that day and these men say to him we have be make unclean by the dead body of a man why may we not make the offering of the lord at the regular time among the child of israel ? and moses say to them do nothing till the lord give me direction about you . and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel if any one of you or of your family be unclean because of a dead body or be on a journey far away still he be to keep the passover to the lord in the second month on the fourteenth day in the evening they be to keep it take it with unleavened bread and bitter tasting plant nothing of it be to be keep till the morning and no bone of it be to be break they be to keep it by the rule of the passover . but the man who not be unclean or on a journey do not keep the passover will be cut off from his people because he do not make the offering of the lord at the regular time his sin will be on him . and if a man from another country be among you and have a desire to keep the passover to the lord let him do a be order in the law of the passover there be to be the same rule for the man from another nation and for him who have his birth in the land . and on the day when the house be put up the cloud come down on it on the tent of witness and in the evening there be a light like fire over the house till the place where the cloud come to rest there the child of israel put up their tent . at the order of the lord the child of israel go forward and at the order of the lord they put up their tent as long a the cloud be rest on the house they do not go away from that place . when the cloud be rest on the house for a long time the child of israel wait for the order of the lord do not go on . sometimes the cloud be rest on the house for two or three day then by the order of the lord they keep their tent in that place and when the lord give the order they go on . and sometimes the cloud be there only from even to morning and when the cloud be take up in the morning they go on their journey again or if it be rest there by day and by night whenever the cloud be take up they go forward . or if the cloud come to rest on the house for two day or a month or a year without move the child of israel go on wait there and do not go on but whenever it be take up they go forward on their journey . at the word of the lord they put up their tent and at the word of the lord they go forward on their journey they keep the order of the lord a he give them by moses .and the lord say to moses make two silver horn of hammered work to be use for get the people together and to give the sign for the moving of the tent . when they be sound all the people be to come together to you at the door of the tent of meeting . if only one of them be sound then the chief the head of the thousand of israel be to come to you . when a loud note be sound the tent place on the east side be to go forward . at the sound of a second loud note the tent on the south side be to go forward the loud note will be the sign to go forward . but when all the people be to come together the horn be to be sound but not loudly . the horn be to be sound by the son of aaron the priest this be to be a law for you for ever from generation to generation . and if you go to war in your land against any who do you wrong then let the loud note of the horn be sound and the lord your god will keep you in mind and give you salvation from those who be against you . and on day of joy and on your regular feast and on the first day of every month let the horn be sound over your burn offering and your peace offering and they will put the lord in mind of you i be the lord your god . now in the second year on the twentieth day of the second month the cloud be take up from over the tent of witness . and the child of israel go on their journey out of the waste land of sinai and the cloud come to rest in the waste land of paran . undertaking have the force of an oath let him not go back from his word but let him do whatever he have say he will do . if a woman be young and under the authority of her father take an oath to the lord or give an undertaking if her father hearing of her oath or the undertaking she have give say nothing to her then all her oath and every undertaking she have give will have force . but if her father hearing of it make her take back her word then the oath or the undertakings she have give will have no force and she will have forgiveness from the lord because her oath be break by her father . and if she be marry to a husband at the time when she be under an oath or an undertaking give without thought if her husband hearing of it say nothing to her at the time then the oath she make and the undertakings she give will have force . but if her husband hearing of it make her take it back then the oath she make and the undertaking she give without thought will have no force or effect and she will have the lord 's forgiveness . but an oath make by a widow or one who be no longer marry to her husband and every undertaking she have give will have force . if she make an oath while she be under the authority of her husband and her husband hearing of it say nothing to her and do not put a stop to it then all her oath and every undertaking she give will have force . but if her husband on hearing of it make them without force or effect then whatever she have say about her oath or her undertaking have no force her husband have make them without effect and she will have the lord 's forgiveness . every oath and every undertaking which she give to keep herself from pleasure may be support or break by her husband . but if the day go on and her husband say nothing whatever to her then he be give the support of his authority to her oath and undertaking because at the time of hear them he say nothing to her . but if at some time after hear of them he make them without force then he be responsible for her wrongdoing . these be the law which the lord give moses in relation to a man and his wife or a father and a young daughter who be under his authority .then the lord say to to be their living place with land round them for their cattle and their food and all their beast stretch from the wall of the town a distance of a thousand cubit all round . the measure of this space of land be to be two thousand cubit outside the town on the east and two thousand cubit on the south and on the west and on the north the town be in the middle . this space will be the outskirt of be give to the levite all with land round them . and these town be to be give out of the heritage of the child of israel take the great number from those who have much and a small number from those who have little everyone in the measure of his heritage be to give of his property to the levite . and the lord say to moses say to the child of israel when you have go over jordan into the land of canaan then let certain town be mark out a safe place to which anyone who take the life of another in error may go in flight . in these town you may be safe from him who have the right of punishment so that death may not overtake the taker of life till he have be judge by the meeting of the people . six of the town which you give will be such safe place three on the other side of jordan and three in the land of canaan to be safe place for flight . for the child of israel and for the man from another country who be live among them these six town be to be safe place where anyone cause the death of another through error may go in flight . but if a man give another man a blow with an iron instrument cause his death he be a taker of life and be certainly to be put to death . or if he give him a blow with a stone in his hand cause his death he be a taker of life and be certainly to be put to death . or if he give him blow with a wood instrument in his hand cause his death he be a taker of life and be certainly to be put to death . he whose right it be to give punishment for blood may himself put to death the taker of life when he come face to face with him . if in his hate he put a sword through him or wait secretly for him send a spear or stone at him cause his death or in hate give him blow with his hand cause death he who give the death blow be to be put to death he be a taker of life he whose right it be to give punishment for blood may put to death the taker of life when he come face to face with him . but if a man have give a wound to another suddenly and not in hate or without design have send something against him or have give him a blow with a stone without see him so cause his death though he have nothing against him and no desire to do him evil then let the meeting of the people be judge between the man responsible for the death and him who have the right of punishment for blood acting by these rule and let the people keep the man responsible for the death safe from the hand of him who have the right of punishment for blood and send him back to his safe town where he have go in flight there let him be till the death of the high priest who be mark with the holy oil . but if ever he go outside the wall of the safe town where he have go in flight and the giver of punishment meeting him outside the wall of the town put him to death he will not be responsible for his blood because he have be order to keep inside the safe town till the death of the high priest but after the death of the high priest the taker of life may come back to the place of his heritage . these rule be to be your guide in judge through all your generation wherever you may be live . anyone cause the death of another be himself to be put to death on the word of witness but the word of one witness be not enough . further no price may be give for the life of one who have take life and whose right reward be death he be certainly to be put to death . and no price may be offer for one who have go in flight to a safe town for the purpose of let him come back to his place before the death of the high priest . so do not make the land where you be live unholy for blood make the land unholy and there be no way of make the land free from the blood which have come on it but only by the death of him who be the cause of it . do not make unclean the land where you be live in number . may the lord the god of your father make you a thousand time great in number than you be and give you his bless a he have say ! how be it possible for me by myself to be responsible for you and undertake the weight of all your trouble and your argument ? take for yourselves men who be wise far see and respect among you from your tribe and i will make them ruler over you . and you between a man and his brother or one from another nation who be with him . in judge do not let a man 's position have any weight with you give hear equally to small and great have no fear of any man for it be god who be judge and any cause in which you be not able to give a decision you be to put before me and i will give it a hearing . and at that time i give you all the order which you be to do . then we go on from horeb through all that great and cruel waste which you saw on our way to the hill country of the amorites a the lord give u order and we come to kadesh barnea . and i say to you you have come to the hill country of the amorites which the lord our god be give u . see now the lord your god have put the land into your hand go up and take it a the lord the god of your father have without care into the hill country . and the lord say to me say to them do not go up to the attack for i be not among you and you will be overcome by those who be against you . this i say to you but you give no attention and go against the order of the lord and in your pride go up into the hill country . and the amorites who be in the hill country come out against you and put you to flight rushing after you like bee and overcame you in seir driving you even as far a hormah . and you come back weep before the lord but the lord give no attention to your cry and do not give ear to you . so you be keep wait in kadesh for a long time .then we go back journey into the waste land by the way to the red sea a the lord have say to me and we be a long time go round mount seir . and the lord say and they will have fear of you so take care what you do make no attack on them for i will not give you any of their land not even space enough for a man 's foot because i have give mount seir to esau for his heritage . you may get food for your need from them for a price and water for drinking . for the blessing of the lord your god have be on you in all the work of your hand he have knowledge of your wandering through this great waste these forty year the lord your god have be with you and you have be short of nothing . so we go on past our brother the child of esau living in seir by the road .you be the child of the lord your god you be not to make cut on your body or take off the hair on your brow in honour of the dead for you be a holy people to the lord your god and the lord have take you to be his special people out of all the nation on the face of the earth . no disgust thing may be your food . these be the beast which you may have for food the ox the sheep and the goat the hart the gazelle and the roe the mountain goat and the pygarg and the antelope and the mountain sheep . any beast which have a division in the horn of it foot and whose food come back into it mouth to be crush again may be use for food . but even among these there be some which may not be use for food such a the camel the hare and the coney which be unclean to you because though their food come back the horn of their foot be not part in two . and the pig be unclean to you because though it have a division in the horn of it foot it food do not come back their flesh may not be use for food or their dead body touch by you . and of the thing live in the water you may take all those who have wing for swim with and skin form of thin plate . but any which have no skin plat or wing for swim you may not take they be unclean for you . all clean bird may be use for food . but these bird you may not take the eagle and the gier eagle and the ospray the falcon and the kite and bird of that sort every may take . you may not have a food anything which have come to a natural death the man from another country who be live with you may take it for food or you may get a price for it from one of another nation for you be a holy people to the lord your god . the young goat be not to be cook in it mother 's milk . put on one side a tenth of all the increase of your seed produce year by year . and make for himself and with the money get whatever you have a desire for ox or sheep or wine or strong drink whatever your soul 's desire may be and make a feast there before the lord your god and be glad you and all your house and give a thought to the levite who be live among you for he have no part or heritage in the land . at the end of every three year take a tenth part of all your increase for live among you will come and take food and have enough and so the blessing of the lord your god will be on you in everything you do .at the end of every seven year there be to be a general forgiveness of debt . this be how it be to be do every creditor be to give up his right to whatever he have let his neighbour have he be not to make his neighbour his countryman give it back because a general forgiveness have be order by the lord . a man of another nation may be force to make payment of his debt but if your brother have anything of yours let it go but there will be no poor among you for the lord will certainly give you his bless in the land which the lord your god be give you for your heritage if only you give ear to the voice of the lord your god and take care to keep all these order which i give you today . for the lord your god will give you his bless a he have say you will let other nation have the use of your money but you will not make use of theirs you will be ruler over a number of nation but they will not be your ruler . if in any of your town in the land which the lord your god be give you there be a poor man one of your countryman do not let your heart be hard or your hand shut to him but let your hand be open to give him the use of whatever he be in need of . and see that there be no evil thought in your heart move you to say to yourself the seventh year the year of forgiveness be near and so look coldly on your poor countryman you give him nothing and he will make an outcry to the lord against you and it will be judge a sin in you . but it be right for you to give to him without grief of heart for because of this the blessing of the lord your god will be on all your work and on everything to which you put your hand . for there will never be a time when there be no poor in the land and so i give order to you let your hand be open to your countryman to those who be poor and in need in your land . if one of your countryman a hebrew man or woman become your servant for a price and do work for you six year in the seventh year let him go free . and when you make him free do not let him go away with nothing in his hand but give him freely from your flock and from your grain and your wine in the measure of the wealth which the lord your god have give you you be to give to him . and keep in mind that you yourself be a servant in the land of egypt and the lord your god make you free so i give you this order today . but if he say to you i have no desire to go away from you because you and your family be dear to him and he be happy with you then take a sharp pointed instrument drive it through his ear into the door and he will be your servant for ever . and you may do the same for your servant girl . let it not seem hard to you that you have to send him away free for he have be work for you for six year which be twice the regular time for a servant and the blessing of the lord your god will be on you in everything you do . all the first male to come to birth in your herd and your flock be to be holy to the lord your god the first birth of your ox be not to be use for work the wool of your first lamb be not to be cut . but year by year you and all your house be to take a meal of it before the lord in the place of his selection . but if it have any mark on it if it be blind or have damage leg or if there be for food but let it be drain out on the earth like water .take note of the month of abib and keep the passover to the lord your god for in the month of abib the lord your god take you out of egypt by your food be unleavened bread that be the bread of sorrow for you come out of the land of egypt quickly so the memory of that day when you come out of the land of egypt will be with you all your life give a he be able in the measure of the blessing which the lord your god have give you . you be to make judge and overseer in all your town which the lord your god give you for every tribe and they be decision of the upright false . let righteousness be your guide so that you may have life and take for your heritage the land which the lord your god be give you . let no holy tree of any sort be be offer to the lord your god for that be disgust to the lord your god . if there be any man or woman among you in any of the town which the lord your god give you who do evil in the eye of the lord your god sin against his agreement by become a servant of other god and worship them or the sun or the moon or all the star of heaven against my order if word of this come to your ear then let this thing be look into with care and if there be no doubt that it be true and such evil have be do in israel then you be to take the man or woman who have do the evil to the public place of your town and they be to be stone with stone till they be dead . on the word of two or three witness a man may be give the punishment of death but he be not to be put to death on the word of one witness . the hand of the witness will be the first to put him to death and after them the hand of all the people . so you be to put away the evil from among you . if you be not able to give a decision a to who be responsible for a death or who be right in a cause or who give the first blow in a fight and there be a division of opinion about it in your town then go to the place mark out by the lord your god and will not give ear to the priest whose place be there before the lord your god or to the judge be to be put to death you be to put away the evil from israel . and all the people hearing of it will be full of fear and put away their pride . when you have come into the land which the lord your god be give you and have take it for a heritage and be live in it if it be your desire to have a king over you like the other nation round about you then see that you take a your king the man name by the lord your god let your king be one of your countryman not a man of another nation who be not one of yourselves . and he be not to get together a great army of horse for himself or make the people go back to egypt to get horse for him because the lord have say you will never again go back that way . and he be not to have a great number of wife for fear that his heart may be turn away or great wealth of silver and gold . and when he have take his place on the seat of his kingdom he be to make in a book a copy of this law from that which the priest the levite have in their care and it be to be with him for his read all the day of his life so that he may be train in the fear of the lord his god to keep and do all the word of this teaching and these law so that his heart may not be lift up over his countryman and he may not be turn away from the order to one side or the other but that his life and the life of his child may be long in his kingdom in israel .the priest the levite that be all the tribe of levi will have no part or heritage with israel their food and their heritage will be the offering of the lord make by fire . and they will have no heritage among their countryman the lord be their heritage a he have say to them . and this be to be the priest ' right those who make an and the first wool cut from your sheep . for he and his son after him for ever have be mark out by the lord your god from all your tribe to do the work of priest in the name of the lord . and if a brother the levite who be there before the lord . his food will be the same a theirs in addition to what have come to him a the price of his property . when you have come into the land which the lord your god be give you do not take a your example the disgust way of those nation . let there not be see among you anyone who make his son or his daughter go through the fire or anyone use secret art or a maker of strange sound or a reader of sign or any wonder worker or anyone use secret force on people or put question to a spirit or have secret knowledge or go to the dead for direction . for all who do such thing be disgust to the lord and because of these disgust thing the lord your god be drive them out before you . you be to be upright in heart before the lord your god . for these nation whose land you be take give attention to reader of sign and to those use secret art but the lord your god will not let you do so . the lord your god will give you a prophet from among your people like me you will give ear to him in answer to the request you make to the lord your god in horeb on the day of the great meeting when you say let not the voice of the lord my god come to my ear again and let me not see this great fire any more or death will overtake me . then the lord say to me what they have say be well say . i will give them a prophet from among themselves like you and i will put my word in his mouth and he will say to them whatever i give him order to say . and whoever do not give ear to my word which he will say in my name will be responsible to me . but the prophet who take it on himself to say word in my name which i have not give him order to say or who say anything in the name of other god will come to his death . and if you say in your heart how be we to be certain that the word do not come from the lord ? when a prophet make a statement in the name of the lord if what he say do not take place and his word do not come true then his word be not the word of the lord the word of the prophet be say in the pride of his heart and you be to have no fear of him .when the nation whose land the lord your god be give you have be cut off by him and you have take their place and be live in their town and in their house you be to have three town mark out in the land which the lord your god be give you for your heritage . you be to make ready a way and see that the land which the lord your god be give you for your heritage be mark out into three part to which any taker of life may go in flight . this be to be the rule for anyone who go in flight there after cause the death of his neighbour in error and not through hate for example if a man go into the wood with his neighbour for the purpose of cut down tree and when he take his axe to give a blow to the tree the head of the axe come off and fall on to his neighbour give him a wound cause his death then the man may go in flight to one of these town and be safe for if not he who have the right of punishment may go run after the taker of life in the heat of his wrath and overtake him because the way be long and give him a death blow though it be not right for him to be put to death because he be not move by hate . and so i be order you to see that three town be mark out for this purpose . and if the lord your god make wide the limit of your land a he say in his oath to your father and give you all the land which he undertake to give to your father if you keep and do all these order which i give you today love the lord your god and walk ever in his way then let three more town in addition to these three be mark out for you so that in all your land which the lord your god be give you for your heritage no man may be wrongly put to death for which you will be responsible . but if any man have hate for his neighbour and wait for him secretly make an attack on him and give him a blow cause his death and then go in flight to one of these town the responsible men of his town be to send and take him and give him up to the one who have the right of punishment to be put to death . have no pity on him so that israel may be clear from the crime of put a man to death without cause and it will be well for you . your neighbour 's landmark which be put in it place by the men of old time be not to be move or take away in the land of your heritage which the lord your god be give you . one witness may not make a statement against a man in relation to any sin or wrongdoing which he have do on the word of two or three witness a question be to be judge . if a false witness make a statement against a man say that he have do wrong then the two men between whom the argument have take place be to come before the lord before the priest and judge who be then in power and the judge will have the question look into with care and if the witness be see to be false and to have make a false statement against his brother then do to him what it be his purpose to do to his brother and so put away the evil from among you . and the rest of the people hearing of it will be full of fear and never again do such evil among you . have no pity let life be give for life eye for eye tooth for tooth hand for hand foot for foot .when you go out to war against other nation and come face to face with horse and war carriage and army great in number than yourselves have no fear of them for the lord your god be with you who take you up out of the land of egypt . and when you be on the point of attack let the priest come forward and say to the people give ear o israel today you be go forward to the fight let your heart be strong do not let uncontrolled fear overcome you because of those who be against you for the lord your god go with you fight for you to give you salvation from those who be against you . and let the overseer say to the people if there be any man who have make for himself a new house and have not go into it let him go back to his house so that in the event of his death in the fight another may not take his house for himself . or if any man have make a vine garden without take the first fruit of it let him go back to his house so that in the event of his death in the fight another may not be the first to make use of the fruit . or if any man be newly marry and have have no sex relation with his wife let him go back to his house so that in the event of his death in the fight another man may not take her . and let the overseer go on to say to the people if there be any man whose heart be feeble with fear let him go back to his house before he make the heart of his countryman feeble . then after say these word to the people let the overseer put captain over the army . when you come to a town before attack it make an offer of peace . and if it give you back an answer of peace open it door to you then all the people in it may be put to force work a your servant . if however it will not make peace with you but war then let it be shut in on all side and when the lord your god have give it into your hand let every male in it be put to death without mercy . but the woman and the child and the cattle and everything in the town and all it wealth you may take for yourselves the wealth of your hater which the lord your god have give you will be your food . so you be to do to all the town far away which be not the town of these nation . but in the town of these people whose land the lord your god be give you for your heritage let no living thing be keep from death give them up to the curse the hittite the amorite the canaanite the perizzite the hivite and the jebusite a the lord your god have give you order so that you may not take them a your example and do all the disgusting thing which they do in the worship of their god so sin against the lord your god . if in war a town be shut in by your army for a long time do not let it tree be cut down and make waste for their fruit will be your food be the tree of the countryside men for you to take up arm against them ? only those tree which you be certain be not use for food may be cut down and put to destruction and you be to make wall of attack against the town till it be take .if in the land which the lord your god be give you you come across the dead body of a man in the open country and you have no idea who have put him to death then your responsible men and your judge be to come out and give order for the distance from the dead body to the town round about it to be measure and whichever town be near to the body the responsible men of that town be to take from the herd a young cow which have never be use for work or put under the yoke and they be to take the cow into a valley where there be flow water and which be not plough or plant and there the neck of the cow be to be break then the priest the son of levi be to come near for they have be mark out by the lord your god to be his servant and to give blessing in the name of the lord and by their decision every argument and every blow be to be judge and all the responsible men of that town which be near to the dead man wash their hand over the cow whose neck be break in the valley will say this death be not the work of our hand and our eye have not see it . have mercy o lord on your people israel whom you have make free and take away from your people the crime of a death without cause . then they will no longer be responsible for the man 's death . so you will take away the crime of a death without cause from among you when you do what be right in the eye of the lord . when you go out to war against other nation and the lord your god give them up into your hand and you take them a prisoner if among the prisoner you see a beautiful woman and it be your desire to make her your wife then take her back to your house and let her hair and her nail be cut and let her take off the dress in which she be make prisoner and go on living in your house and weep for her father and mother for a full month and after that you may go in to her and be her husband and she will be your wife . but if you have no delight in her you be to let her go wherever she will you may not take a price for her a if she be your property for you have make use of her for your pleasure . if a man have two wife one greatly love and the other hated and the two of them have have child by him and if the first son be the child of the hated wife then when he give his property to his son for their heritage he be not to put the son of his loved one in the place of the first son the son of the hated wife but he be to give his first son his birthright and twice as great a part of his property for he be the first fruit of his strength and the right of the first son be his . if a man have a son who be hard hearted and uncontrolled who give no attention to the voice of his father and mother and will not be rule by them though they give him punishment then let his father and mother take him to the responsible men of the town to the public place and say to them this son of ours be hard hearted and uncontrolled he will not give attention to u he give himself up to pleasure and strong drink . then he be to be stone to death by all the men of the town so you be to put away the evil from among you and all israel hearing of it will be full of fear . if a man do a crime for which the punishment be death and he be put to death by hang him on a tree do not let his body be on the tree all night but put it to rest in the earth the same day for the man who undergo hanging be curse by god so do not make unclean the land which the lord your god be give you for your heritage .if you see your brother 's ox or his sheep wandering do not go by without help but take them back to your brother . if their owner be not near or if you be not certain who he be then take the beast to your house and keep it till it owner come in search of it and then you be to give it back to him . do the same with his as or his robe or anything which have go from your brother 's keep and which you have come across do not keep it to yourself . if you see your brother 's ox or his as fall down on the road do not go by without give him help in lift it up again . it be not right for a woman to be dress in man 's clothing or for a man to put on a woman 's robe whoever do such thing be disgust to the lord your god . if by chance you see a place which a bird have make for itself in a tree or on the earth with young one or egg and the mother bird seat on the young one or on the egg do not take the mother bird with the young see that you let the mother bird go but the young one you may take so it will be well for you and your life will be long . if you be build a house make a railing for the roof so that the blood of any man fall from it will not come on your house . do not have your vine garden plant with two sort of seed or all of it may become a loss the seed you have put in as well a the increase . do not do your plough with an ox and an as yoke together . do not have clothe make of two sort of thread wool and linen together . on the four edge of your robe with which your body be cover put ornament of twisted thread . if any man take a wife and have have connection with her have no delight in her and say evil thing about her and give her a bad name say i take this woman and when i have connection with her it be clear to me that she be not a virgin then let the girl 's father and mother put before the responsible men of the town in the public place sign that the girl be a virgin and let the girl 's father say to the responsible men i give my daughter to this man for his wife but he have no love for her and now he have put shame on her say that she be not a virgin but here be the sign that she be a virgin . then they be to put her clothing before the responsible men of the town . then the responsible men of the town be to give the man his punishment they will take from him a hundred shekel of silver which be to be give to the father of the girl because he have give an evil name to a virgin of israel she will go on be his wife he may never put her away all his life . but if what he have say be true and she be see to be not a virgin then they be to make the girl come to the door of her father 's house and she will be stone to death by the men of the town because she have do evil and put shame on israel by act a a loose woman in her father 's house so you be to put away evil from among you . if a man be take in the act of go in to a marry woman the two of them the man as well a the woman be to be put to death so you be to put away the evil from israel . if a young virgin have give her word to be marry to a man and another man meet her in the town have connection with her then you be to take the two of them to the doorway of the town and have them stone to death the young virgin because she give no cry for help though it be in the town and the man because he have put shame on his neighbour 's wife so you be to put away evil from among you . but if the man meeting such a virgin in the open country take her by force then only the man be to be put to death nothing be to be do to the virgin because there be no cause of death in her it be the same a if a man make an attack on his neighbour and put him to death for he come across her in the open country and there be no one to come to the help of the virgin in answer to her cry . if a man see a young virgin who have not give her word to be marry to anyone and he take her by force and have connection with her and discovery be make of it then the man will have to give the virgin 's father fifty shekel of silver and make her his wife because he have put shame on her he may never put her away all his life . a man may not take his father 's wife or have sex relation with a woman who be his father 's .no man whose private part have be wound or cut off may come into the meeting of the lord 's people . one whose father and mother be not marry may not come into the meeting of the lord 's people or any of his family to the tenth generation . no ammonite or moabite or any of their people to the tenth generation may come into the meeting of the lord 's people because they give you no bread or water on your way when you come out of egypt and they get balaam the son of peor from pethor in aram naharaim to put curse on you . but the lord your god would not give ear to balaam but let the curse be change into a blessing to you because of his love for you . do nothing for their peace or well be for ever . but have no hate for an edomite because he be your brother or for an egyptian for you be live in his land . their child in the third generation may come into the meeting of the lord 's people . when you go out to war and put your tent in position keep from every evil thing . if any man among you become unclean through anything which have take place in the night he be to go out from the tent circle and keep outside it but when even come near let him take a bath and after sundown he may come back to the tent . let there be a place outside the tent circle to which you may go and have among your arm a spade and when you have be to that place let that which come from you be cover up with earth for the lord your god be walk among your tent to keep you safe and to give up into your hand those who be fight against you then let your tent be holy so that he may see no unclean thing among you and be turn away from you . do not give back to his master a servant who have go in flight from his master and come to you let him go on living among you in whatever place be most pleasing to him do not be hard on him . no daughter of israel be to let herself be use a a loose woman for a strange god and no son of israel be to give himself to a man . do not take into the house of the lord your god a an offering for an oath the price of a loose woman or the money give to one use for sex purpose in the worship of the god for these two thing be disgust to the lord your god . do not take interest from an israelite on anything money or food or any other good which you let him have from men of other nation you may take interest but not from an israelite so that the blessing of the lord your god may be on everything to which you put your hand in the land which you be about to take a your heritage . when you take an oath to the lord do not be slow to give effect to it for without doubt the lord your god will make you responsible and will put it to your account a sin . but if you take no oath there will be no sin . whatever your lip have say see that you do it for you give your word freely to the lord your god . when you go into your neighbour 's vine garden you may take of his grape at your pleasure but you may not take them away in your vessel . when you go into your neighbour 's field you may take the head of grain with your hand but you may not put your blade to his grain .if a man take a wife and after they be married she be unpleasing to him because of some bad quality in her let him give her a statement in writing and send her away from his house . and when she have go away from him she may become another man 's wife . and if the second husband have no love for her and give her a statement in write sends her away or if death come to the second husband to whom she be marry her first husband who have send her away may not take her back after she have be wife to another for that be disgust to the lord and you be not to be a cause of sin in the land which the lord your god be give you for your heritage . a newly marry man will not have to go out with the army or undertake any business but may be free for one year living in his house for the comfort of his wife . no one be to take on account of a debt the stone with which grain be crush for in do so he take a man 's living . if a man take by force one of his countryman the child of israel use him a his property or get a price for him that thief be to be put to death so you be to put away evil from among you . in connection with the leper 's disease take care to keep and do every detail of the teaching of the priest the levite a i give them order so you be to do . keep in mind what the lord your god do to miriam on the way when you come out of egypt . if you let your brother have the use of anything which be yours do not go into his house and take anything of his a a sign of his debt but keep outside till he come out and give it to you . if he be a poor man do not keep his property all night but be certain to give it back to him when the sun go down so that he may have his clothing for sleep in and will give you his blessing and this will be put to your account a righteousness before the lord your god . do not be hard on a servant who be poor and in need if he be one of your countryman or a man from another nation live with you in your land . give him his payment day by day not keep it back over night for he be poor and his living be dependent on it and if his cry against you come to the ear of the lord it will be judge a sin in you . father be not to be put to death for their child or child for their father every man be to be put to death for the sin which he himself have do . be upright in judge the cause of the man from a strange country and of him who have no father do not take a widow 's clothing on account of a debt but keep in mind that you be a servant in the land of egypt and the lord your god make you free for this be why i give you order to do this . when you get in the grain from your field if some of the grain have be drop by chance in the field do not go back and get it but let it be for the man from a strange land the child without a father and the widow so that the blessing of the lord your god may be on all the work of your hand . when you be shake the fruit from your olive tree do not go over the branch a second time let some be for the man from a strange land the child without a father and the widow . when you be pull the grape from your vine do not take up those which have be drop let them be for the man from a strange land the child without a father and the widow . keep in mind that you be a servant in the land of egypt for this be why i give you order to do this .if there be an argument between men and they go to law with one another let the judge give their decision for the upright and against the wrongdoer . and if the wrongdoer be to undergo punishment by whip the judge will give order for him to go down on his face and be whip before him the number of the blow be in relation to his crime . he may be give forty blow not more for if more be give your brother may be sham before you . do not keep the ox from take the grain when he be crush it . if brother be live together and one of them at his death have no son the wife of the dead man be not to be marry outside the family to another man let her husband 's brother go in to her and make her his wife do a it be right for a brother in law to do . then the first male child she have will take the right of the brother who be dead so that his name may not come to an end in israel . but if the man say he will not take his brother 's wife then let the wife go to the responsible men of the town and say my husband 's brother will not keep his brother 's name living in israel he will not do what it be right for a husband 's brother to do . then the responsible men of the town will send for the man and have talk with him and if he still say i will not take her then his brother 's wife be to come to him before the responsible men of the town and take his shoe off his foot and put shame on him and say so let it be do to the man who will not take care of his brother 's name . and his family will be name in israel the house of him whose shoe have be take off . if two men be fight and the wife of one of them come to the help of her husband take the other by the private part her hand be to be cut off have no pity on her . do not have in your bag different weight a great and a small or in your house different measure a great and a small . but have a true weight and a true measure so that your life may be long in the land which the lord your god be give you . for all who do such thing and all whose way be not upright be disgust to the lord your god . keep in mind what amalek do to you on your way from egypt how meeting you on the way he make an attack on you when you be tire and without strength cut off all the feeble one at the end of your line and the fear of god be not in him . so when the lord your god have give you rest from all who be against you on every side in the land which the lord your god be give you for your heritage see to it that the memory of amalek be cut off from the earth keep this in mind .now when you have come into the land which the lord be give you for your heritage and you have make it yours and be live in it you be to take a part of the first fruit of the earth which you get from the land which the lord your god be give you and put it in a basket and go to the place mark out by the lord your god a the rest place of his name . and you be to come to him who be priest at that time and say to him i give witness today before the lord your god that i have come into the land which the lord make an oath to our father to give u . then the priest will take the basket from your hand and put it down in front of the altar of the lord your god . and these be the word which you will say before the lord your god my father be a wandering aramaean and he go down with a small number of people into egypt there he become a great and strong nation and the egyptian be cruel to u crush u under a hard yoke and our cry go up to the lord the god of our father and the lord 's ear be open to the voice of our cry and his eye take note of our grief and the crush weight of our work and the lord take u out of egypt with a strong hand and a stretch out arm with work of power and sign and wonder and he have be our guide to this place and have give u this land a land flow with milk and honey . so now i have come here with the first of the fruit of the earth which you o lord have give me . then you will put it down before the lord your god and give him worship and you will have joy in every good thing which the lord your god have give to you and to your family and the levite and the man from a strange land who be with you will take part in your joy . when you have take out a tenth from the tenth of all your produce in the third year which be the year when this have to be do give it to the levite and the man from a strange land and the child without a father and the widow so that they may have food in your town and be full and say before the lord your god i have take all the holy thing out of my house and have give them to the levite and the man from a strange land and him who have be unclean or give for the dead i have give ear to the voice of the lord my god and have do all you have give me order to do . so look down from your holy place in heaven send your bless on your then keep and do them with all your heart and all your soul . today you have give witness that the lord be your god and that you will go in his way and keep his law and his order and his decision and give ear to his voice and the lord have make it clear this day that you be a special people to him a he give you his word and that you be to keep all his order and that he will make you high over all the nation he have make in praise in name and in honour and that you be to be a holy people to the lord your god a he have say .then moses and the responsible men of israel give the people these order keep all the order which i have give you this day and on the day when you go over jordan into the land which the lord your god be give you put up great stone coat them with building paste and write on them all the word of this law after you have go over so that you may take the heritage which the lord your god be give you a land flow with milk and honey a the lord the god of your father have say . and when you have go over jordan you be to put up these stone a i have say to you today in mount ebal and have them coat with building paste . there you be to make an altar to the lord your god of stone on which no iron instrument have be use . you be to make the altar of the lord your god of uncut stone offer on it burn offering to the lord your god and you be to make your peace offering feast there with joy before the lord your god . and put on the stone all the word of this law write them very clearly . then moses and the priest the levite say to all israel be quiet and give ear o israel today you have become the people of the lord your god . for this cause you be to give ear to the voice of the lord your god and do his order and his law which i give you this day . that same day moses say to the people these be to take their place on mount gerizim for bless the people when you have go over jordan simeon and levi and judah and issachar and joseph and benjamin and these be to be on and let all the people say so be it . curse be he who take his neighbour 's life secretly . and let all the people say so be it . curse be he who for a reward put to death one who have do no wrong . and let all the people say so be it . curse be he who do not take this law to heart to do it . and let all the people say so be it .now if you give ear to the voice of the lord your god and keep with care all these order which i have give you today then the lord your god will put you high over all the nation of the earth and all these blessing will come on you and overtake you if your ear be open to the voice of the lord your god . a blessing will be on you in the town and a blessing in the field . a blessing will be on the fruit of your body and on the fruit of your land on the fruit of your cattle the increase of your herd and the young of your flock . a blessing will be on your basket and on your bread basin . a blessing will be on your come in and on your go out . by the power of the lord those who take arm against you will be overcome before you they will come out against you one way and will go in flight from you seven way . the lord will send his bless on your store house and on everything to which you put your hand his blessing will be on you in the land which the lord your god be give you . the lord will keep you a a people holy to himself a he have say to you in his oath if you keep the order of the lord your god and go on walking in his way . and all the people of the earth will see that the name of the lord be on you and they will go in fear of you . and the lord will make you fertile in every good thing in the fruit of your body and the fruit of your cattle and the fruit of your field in the land which the lord by his oath to your father say he would give you . open his store house in heaven the lord will send rain on your land at the right time bless all the work of your hand other nation will make use of your wealth and you will have no need of theirs . the lord will make you the head and not the tail and you will ever have the high place if you give ear to the order of the lord your god which i give you today to keep and to do them not turn away from any of the order which i give you today to the right hand or to the left or go after any other god to give them worship . but if you do not give ear to the voice of the lord your god and take care to do all his order and his law which i give you today then all these curse will come on you and overtake you you will be curse in the town and curse in the field . a curse will be on your basket and on your bread basin . a curse will be on the fruit of your body and on the fruit of your land on the increase of your cattle and the young of your flock . you will be curse when you come in and curse when you go out . the lord will send on you curse and trouble and punishment in everything to which you put your hand till sudden destruction overtakes you because of your evil way in which you have be false to me . the lord will send disease after disease on you till you have be cut off by death from the land to which you be go . the lord will send waste disease and burning pain and flame heat against you keep back the rain till your land be waste and dead so will it be till your destruction be complete . and the heaven over your head will be brass and the earth under you hard a iron . the lord will make the rain of your land powder and dust send it down on you from heaven till your destruction be complete . the lord will let you be overcome by your hater you will go out against them one way and you will go in flight before them seven way you will be the cause of fear among all the kingdom of the earth . your body will be meat for all the bird of the air and the beast of the earth there will be no one to send them away . the lord will send on you the disease of egypt and other sort of skin disease which nothing will make well . he will make your mind diseased and your eye blind and your heart waste with fear you will go feel your way when the sun be high like a blind man for whom all be dark and nothing will go well for you you will be crush and make poor for ever and you will have no saviour . you will take a wife but another man will have the use of her the house which your hand have make will never be your rest place you will make a vine garden and never take the fruit of it . your ox will be put to death before your eye but it flesh will not be your food your as will be violently take away before your face and will not be give back to you your sheep will be give to your hater and there will be no saviour for you . your son and your daughter will be give to another people and your eye will be waste away with look and weep for them all the day and you will have no power to do anything . the fruit of your land and all the work of your hand will be food for a nation which be strange to you and to your father you will only be crush down and keep under for ever so that the thing which your eye have to see will send you out of your mind . the lord will send a skin disease attack your knee and your leg burst out from your foot to the top of your head so that nothing will make you well . and you and the king whom you have put over you will the lord take away to a nation strange to you and to your father there you will be servant to other god of wood and stone . and you will become a wonder and a name of shame among all the nation where the lord will take you . you will take much seed out into the field and get little in for the locust will get it . you will put in vine and take care of them but you will get no wine or grape from them for they will be food for worm . your land will be full of olive tree but there will be no oil for the comfort of your body for your olive tree will give no fruit . you will have son and daughter but they will not be yours for they will go away prisoner into a strange land . all your tree and the fruit of your land will be the locust 's . the man from a strange land who be live among you will be lift up high and high over you while you go down lower and low . he will let you have his wealth at interest and will have no need of yours he will be the head and you the tail . and all these curse will come after you and overtake you till your destruction be complete because you do not give ear to the voice of the lord your god or keep his law and his order which he give you these thing will come on you and on your seed to be a sign and a wonder for ever because you do not give honour to the lord your god worship him gladly with joy in your heart on account of all your wealth of good thing for this cause you will become servant to those whom the lord your god will send against you without food and drink and clothing and in need of all thing and he will put a yoke of iron on your neck till he have put an end to you . the lord will send a nation against you from the farthest end of the earth come with the flight of an eagle a nation whose language be strange to you a hard face nation who will have no respect for the old or mercy for the young he will take the fruit of your cattle and of your land till death put an end to you he will let you have nothing of your grain or wine or oil or any of the increase of your cattle or the young of your flock till he have make your destruction complete . your town will be shut in by his army till your high wall in which you put your faith have come down his army will be round your town through all your land which the lord your god have give you . and your food will be the fruit of your body the flesh of the son and daughter which the lord your god have give you because of your bitter need and the cruel grip of your hater . that man among you who be soft and use to comfort will be hard and cruel to his brother and to his dear wife and to of those his child who be still live and will not give to any of them the flesh of his child which will be his food because he have no other in the cruel grip of your hater on all your town . the most soft and delicate of your woman who would not so much a put her foot on the earth so delicate be she will be hard hearted to her husband and to her son and to her daughter and to her baby newly come to birth and to the child of her body for have no other food she will make a meal of them secretly because of her bitter need and the cruel grip of your hater on all your town . if you will not take care to do all the word of this law record in this book honour that name of glory and of fear the lord your god then the lord your god will make your punishment and the punishment of your seed a thing to be wonder at great punishment and cruel disease stretch on through long year . he will send on you again all the disease of egypt which be a cause of fear to you and they will take you in their grip . and all the disease and the pain not record in the book of this law will the lord send on you till your destruction be complete . and you will become a very small band though your number be like the star of heaven because you do not give ear to the voice of the lord your god . and a the lord take delight in do you good and increase you so the lord will take pleasure in cut you off and cause your destruction and you will be uproot from the land which you be about to take a your heritage . and the lord will send you wander among all people from one end of the earth to the other there you will be servant to other god of wood and stone god of which you and your father have no knowledge . and even among these nation there will be no peace for you and no rest for your foot but the lord will give you there a shaking heart and waste eye and weariness of soul your very life will be hang in doubt before you and day and night will be dark with fear and nothing in life will be certain in the morning you will say if only it be even ! and at even you will say if only morning would come ! because of the fear in your heart and the thing which your eye will see . and the lord will take you back to egypt again in ship by the way of which i say to you you will never see it again there you will be offer yourselves a men servant and woman servant to your hater for a price and no man will take you .these be the word of the agreement which moses be order by the lord to make with the child of israel in the land of moab in addition to the agreement which he make with them in horeb . and moses say in the hearing of all israel you have see all the lord do before your eye in the land of egypt to pharaoh and to all his servant and all his land the great test which your eye saw and the sign and wonder but even to this day the lord have not give you a mind open to knowledge or see eye or hear ear . for forty year i have be your guide through the waste land your clothing have not become old on your back or your shoe on your foot . you have have no bread or wine or strong drink so that you might see that i be the lord your god . when you come to this place sihon king of heshbon and og king of bashan come out to make war against u and we overcome them and we take their land and give it to the reubenites and the gadites and the half tribe of manasseh for their heritage . so keep the word of this agreement and do them so that it may be well for you in everything you do . you have come here today all of you before the lord your god the head of your tribe the overseer and those who be in authority over you with all the men of israel and your little one your wife and the men of other land who be with you in your tent down to the wood cutter and the servant who get water for you with the purpose of take part in the agreement of the lord your god and his oath which he make with you today and so that he may make you his people today and be your god a he have say to you and a he make an oath to your father abraham isaac and jacob . and not with you only do i make this agreement and this oath but with everyone who be here with u today before the lord our god as well a with those who be not here for you have in mind how we be live in the land of egypt and how we come through all the nation which be on your way and you have see their disgusting doings and the image of wood and stone and silver and gold which be among them so that there may not be among you any man or woman or family or tribe whose heart be turn away from the lord our god today to go after other god and give them worship or any root among you whose fruit be poison and bitter sorrow if such a man hear the word of this oath take comfort in the thought that he will have peace even if he go on in the pride of his heart take whatever chance may give him the lord will have no mercy on him but the wrath of the lord will be burn against that man and all the curse record in this book will be wait for him and the lord will take away his name completely from the earth . he will be mark out by the lord from all the tribe of israel for an evil fate in keep with all the curse of the agreement record in this book of the law . and future generation your child come after you and traveller from far country will say when they see the punishment of that land and the disease which the lord have send on it and that all the land be a salt and smoking waste not do so to this land ? what be the reason for this great and burn wrath ? then men will say because they give up the agreement of the lord the god of their father which he make with them when he take all the people whose birth have take place in the waste land on their journey from egypt have not . for the child of israel be wander in the waste land for forty year till all the nation that be all
