give his word to their father to give u a land flow with milk and honey . and their child who come up in their place now underwent circumcision by the hand of joshua not have have it before for there have be no circumcision on the journey . so when all the nation have undergone circumcision they keep in their tent till they be well again . and the lord say to joshua today the shame of egypt have be roll away from you . so that place be name gilgal to this day . so the child of israel put up their tent in gilgal and they keep the passover on the fourteenth day of the month in the evening in the lowland of jericho . and on the day after the passover they have for their food the produce of the land unleavened cake and dry grain on the same day . and there be no more manna from the day after they have for their food the produce of the land the child of israel have manna no longer but that year the produce of the land of canaan be their food . now when joshua be near jericho lift up his eye he saw a man in front of him with his sword uncover in his hand and joshua go up to him and say be you for u or against u ? and he say no but i have come a captain of the army of the lord . then joshua fall down with his face to the earth in worship say what have my lord to say to his servant ? and the captain of the lord 's army say to joshua take off your shoe from your foot for the place where you be be holy . and joshua do so .now jericho be all shut up because of the child of israel there be no go out or come in . and the lord say to joshua see i have give into your hand jericho with it king and all it men of war . now let all your fight men make a circle round the town go all round it once . do this for six day . and let seven priest go before the ark with seven loud sound horn in their hand on the seventh day you be to go round the town seven time the priest blow their horn . and at the sound of a long note on the horn let all the people give a loud cry and the wall of the town will come down flat and all the people be to go straight forward . then joshua the son of nun sent for the priest and say to them take up the ark of the agreement and let seven priest take seven horn in their hand and go before the ark of the lord . and he say to the people go forward circle the town and let the armed men go before the ark of the lord . so after joshua have say this to the people the seven priest with their seven horn go forward before the lord blow on their horn and the ark of the lord 's agreement go after them . and the arm men go before the priest who be blow the horn and the mass of the people go after the ark blow their horn . and to the people joshua give an order say you will give no cry and make no sound and let no word go out of your mouth till the day when i say give a loud cry then give a loud cry . so he make the ark of the lord go all round the town once then they go back to the tent for the night . and early in the morning joshua get up and the priest take up the ark of the lord . and the seven priest with their seven horn go on before the ark of the lord blow their horn the arm men go before them and the mass of the people go after the ark of the lord blow their horn . the second day they go all round the town once and then go back to their tent and so they do for six day . then on the seventh day they get up early at the dawn of the day and go round the town in the same way but that day they go round it seven time . and the seventh time at the sound of the priest ' horn joshua say to the people now give a loud cry for the lord have give you the town . and the town will be put to the curse and everything in it will be give to the lord only rahab the loose woman and all who be in the house with her will be keep safe because she keep secret the men we send . and a for you keep yourselves from the cursed thing for fear that you may get a desire for it and take some of it for yourselves and so be the cause of a curse and great trouble on the tent of israel . but all the silver and gold and the vessel of brass and iron be holy to the lord they be to come into the store house of the lord . so the people give a loud cry and the horn be sound and on hear the horn the people give a loud cry and the wall come down flat so that the people go up into the town every man go straight before him and they take the town . and they put everything in the town to the curse men and woman young and old ox and sheep and as they put to death without mercy . then joshua say to the two men who have be send to make a search through the land go into the house of the loose woman and get her out and all who be with her a you give her your oath . so the searcher go in and get out rahab and her father and mother and her brother and all she have and they get out all her family and they take them outside the tent of israel . then after burn up the town and everything in it they put the silver and gold and the vessel of brass and iron into the store house of the lord 's house . but joshua keep rahab the loose woman and her father 's family and all she have from death and so she get a living place among the child of israel to this day because she keep safe the men whom joshua have send to make a search through the land . then joshua give the people order with an oath say let that man be curse before the lord who put his hand to the building up of this town with the loss of his first son will he put the first stone of it in place and with the loss of his young son he will put up it door . so the lord be with joshua and news of him go through all the land .but the child of israel do wrong about the cursed thing for achan the son of carmi the son of zabdi the son of zerah of the family of judah take of the cursed thing move the lord to wrath against the child of israel . now joshua send men from jericho to ai which be by the side of beth aven on the east side of beth el and say to them go up and make a search through the land . and the men go up and saw how ai be place . then they come back to joshua and say to him do not send all the people up but let about two or three thousand men go up and make an attack on ai there be no need for all the people to be tire with the journey there for it be only a small town . so about three thousand of the people go up and be send in flight by the men of ai . the men of ai put to death about thirty six of them drive them from before the town as far a the stonework and overcome them on the way down and the heart of the people become like water . then joshua in great grief go down on the earth before the ark of the lord till the evening and all the chief of israel with him and they put dust on their head . and joshua say o lord god why have you take u over jordan only to give u up into the hand of the amorites for our destruction ? if only it have be enough for u to keep on the other side of jordan ! o lord what be i to say now that israel have give way before their attacker ? for when the news come to the canaanite and all the people of the land they will come up shut u in and cut off our name from the earth and what will you do for the honour of your great name ? then the lord say to joshua get up what be you do with your face to the earth ? israel have do wrong sin against the agreement which i make with them they have even take of the cursed thing act falsely like thief they have put it among their good . for this reason the child of israel have give way turn their back in flight before their attacker because they be curse i will no longer be with you if you do not put the cursed thing away from among you . up ! make the people holy say to them make yourselves holy before tomorrow for the lord the god of israel have say there be a cursed thing among you o israel and you will give way before your attacker in the fight till the cursed thing have be take away from among you . so in the morning you be to come near tribe by tribe and the tribe mark out by the lord be to come near family by family and the family mark out by the lord be to come near house by house and the house mark out by the lord be to come near man by man . then the man who be take with the cursed thing be to be burn with everything which be his because he have go against the agreement of the lord and have do an act of shame in israel . so joshua get up early in the morning and make israel come before him by their tribe and the tribe of judah be take then he make judah come forward and the family of the zerahites be take and he make the family of the zerahites come forward man by man and zabdi be take then the house of zabdi come forward man by man and achan the son of carmi the son of zabdi the son of zerah of the tribe of judah be take . and joshua say to achan my son give glory and praise to the lord the god of israel give me word now of what you have do and keep nothing back from me . and achan answering say to joshua truly i have do wrong against the lord the god of israel and this be what i have do when i saw among their good a fair robe of babylon and two hundred shekel of silver and a mass of gold fifty shekel in weight i be overcome by desire and take them and they be put away in the earth in my tent and the silver be under it . so joshua send men quickly and look in his tent they saw where the robe have be put away secretly with the silver under it . and they take them from the tent and come back with them to joshua and the child of israel and put them before the lord . then joshua and all israel take achan the son of zerah and the silver and the robe and the mass of gold and his son and his daughter and his ox and his ass and his sheep and his tent and everything he have and they take them up into the valley of achor . and joshua say why have you be a cause of trouble to u ? today the lord will send trouble on you . and all israel take part in stone him they have him stone to death and then burn with fire . and over him they put a great mass of stone which be there to this day then the heat of the lord 's wrath be turn away . so that place be name the valley of achor to this day .then the lord say to joshua have no fear and do not be troubled take with you all the fight men and go up against ai for i have give into your hand the king of ai and his people and his town and his land and you be to do to ai and it king a you do to jericho and it king but their good and their cattle you may take for yourselves let a secret force be station to make a surprise attack on the town from the back . so joshua and the fight men get ready to go up against ai and joshua take thirty thousand men of war and send them out by night . and he give them their order say go and take up your position secretly at the back of the town do not go very far away and let all of you be ready and i and all the people with me will come near the town and when they come out against u a they do before we will go in flight from them and they will come out after u till we have get them away from the town for they will say they have go in flight from u a before so we will go in flight before them then you will get up from your secret position and take the town for the lord your god will give it up into your hand . and when you have take the town put fire to it a the lord have say see i have give you your order . so joshua send them out and they take up a secret position between beth el and ai on the west side of ai but joshua keep with the people that night . and early in the morning joshua get up and put the people in order and he and the chief of israel go up before the people to ai . and all the fight men who be with him go up and come near the town and take up a position on the north side of ai face the town with a valley between him and the town . and take about five thousand men he put them in position for a surprise attack on the west side of ai between beth el and ai . so all the people be in their place the army on the north side of the town and the secret force on the west and that night joshua go down into the valley . now when the king of ai saw it he get up quickly and go out to war against israel he and all his people to the slope go down to the valley but he have no idea that a secret force be wait at the back of the town . then joshua and all israel acting a if they be overcome before them go in flight by way of the waste land . and all the people in ai come together to go after them and they go after joshua move away from the town . there be not a man in ai and beth el who do not go out after israel and the town be open and unwatched while they go after israel . and the lord say to joshua let your spear be stretch out against ai for i will give it into your hand . so joshua take up his spear stretch it out in the direction of the town . then the secret force come quickly from their place and run forward when they saw his hand stretch out go into the town and take it and put fire to it straight away . then the men of ai look back saw the smoke of the town go up to heaven and be unable to go this way or that and the people who have go in flight to the waste land be turn back on those who be come after them . and when joshua and all israel saw that the town have be take by the surprise attack and that the smoke of the town have go up turn round they overcome the men of ai . then the other force come out of the town against them so that they be be attack on this side and on that and israel overcame them and let not one of them get away with his life . but the king of ai they make prisoner and take him to joshua . then after the destruction of all the people of ai in the field and in the waste land where they go after them and when all the people have be put to death without mercy all israel go back to ai and put to death all who be in it without mercy . on that day twelve thousand be put to death men and woman all the people of ai . for joshua do not take back his hand with the outstretched spear till the destruction of the people of ai be complete . but the cattle and the good from that town israel take for themselves a the lord have give order to joshua . so joshua give ai to the flame and make it a waste mass of stone for ever a it be to this day . and he put the king of ai to death hang him on a tree till even and when the sun go down joshua give them order to take his body down from the tree and put it in the public place of the town cover it with a great mass of stone which be there to this day . then joshua put up an altar to the lord the god of israel in mount ebal in the way order by moses the servant of the lord a it be record in the book of the law of moses an altar of uncut stone untouched by any iron instrument and on it they make burn offering and peace offering to the lord . and he make there on the stone a copy of the law of moses write it before the eye of the child of israel . and all israel those who be israelite by birth as well a the men from other land live with them and their responsible men and their overseer and judge take their place round the ark in front of the priest the levite whose work it be to take up the ark of the lord 's agreement half of them be station in front of mount gerizim and half in front of mount ebal in agreement with the order for the blessing of the child of israel which moses the servant of the lord have give . and after he give them all the word of the law the blessing and the curse a it be all record in the book of the law reading to all the meeting of israel with the woman and the child and the men from other land who be live among them every word of the order which moses have give .now on hear the news of these thing all the king on the west side of jordan in the hill country and the lowland and by the great sea in front of lebanon the hittite and the amorites the canaanite the perizzites the hivites and the jebusites come together with one purpose to make war against joshua and israel . and the men of gibeon hear what joshua have do to jericho and ai act with deceit get food together a if for a long journey and take old food bag for their ass and old and cracked wine skin keep together with cord and put old stitch up shoe on their foot and old clothing on their back and all the food they have with them be dry and break up . and they come to joshua to the tent circle at gilgal and say to him and to the men of israel we have come from a far country so now make an agreement with u . and the men of israel say to the hivites it may be that you be live among u how then may we make an agreement with you ? and they say to joshua we be your servant . then joshua say to them who be you and where do you come from ? and they say to him your servant have come from a very far country because of the name of the lord your god for the story of his great name and of all he do in egypt have come to our ear and what he do to the two king of the amorites east of jordan to sihon king of heshbon and to og king of bashan at ashtaroth . so the responsible men and all the people of our country say to u take food with you for the journey and go to them and say to them we be your servant so now make an agreement with u . this bread which we have with u for our food we take warm and new from our house when start on our journey to you but now see it have become dry and break up . and these wine skin be new when we put the wine in them and now they be crack a you see and our clothing and our shoe have become old because of our very long journey here . and the men take some of their food without request direction from the lord . so joshua make peace with them and make an agreement with them that they be not to be put to death and the chief of the people take an oath to them . now three day after when they have make this agreement with them they have word that these men be their neighbour live near them . and the child of israel go forward on their journey and on the third day come to their town . now their town be gibeon and chephirah and beeroth and kiriath jearim . and the child of israel do not put them to death because the chief of the people have take an oath to them by the lord the god of israel . and all the people make an outcry against the chief . but all the chief say to the people we have take an oath to them by the lord the god of israel and so we may not put our hand on them . this be what we will do to them we will not put them to death for fear that wrath may come on u because of our oath to them . keep them live and let them be servant cut wood and get water for all the people . and all the people do a the chief have say to them . then joshua sent for them and say to them why have you be false to u say we be very far from you when you be live among u ? now because of this you be curse and you will for ever be our servant cut wood and get water for the house of my god . and answer joshua they say because it come to the ear of your servant that the lord your god have give order to his servant moses to give you all this land and to send destruction on all the people live in it because of you so fear greatly for our life because of you we have do this . and now we be in your hand do to u whatever seem good and right to you . so he keep them safe from the child of israel and do not let them be put to death . and that day joshua make them servant cut wood and get water for the people and for the altar of the lord in the place mark out by him to this day .now when it come to the ear of adoni zedek king of jerusalem that joshua have take ai and have give it up to the curse for a he have do to jericho and it king so he have do to ai and it king and that the people of gibeon have make peace with israel and be live among them he be in great fear because gibeon be a great town like one of the king 's town great than ai and all the men in it be men of war . so adoni zedek king of jerusalem send to hoham king of hebron and to piram king of jarmuth and to japhia king of lachish and to debir king of eglon say come up to me jarmuth the king of lachish and the king of eglon be band together and go up with all their army and take up their position before gibeon and make war against it . and the men of gibeon send to joshua to the tent circle at gilgal say be not slow to send help to your servant come up quickly to our support and keep u safe for all the king of the amorites from the hill country have come together against u . so joshua go up from gilgal with all his army and all his men of war . and the lord say to joshua have no fear of them for i have give them into your hand they will all give way before you . so joshua have come up from gilgal all night make a sudden attack on them . and the lord make them full of fear before israel and they put great number of them to death at gibeon and go after them by the way go up to beth horon drive them back to azekah and makkedah and in their flight before israel on the way down from beth horon the lord send down great stone from heaven on them all the way to azekah cause their death those whose death be cause by the stone be more than those whom the child of israel put to death with the sword . it be on the day when the lord give up the amorites into the hand of the child of israel that joshua say to the lord before the eye of israel sun be at rest over gibeon and you o moon in the valley of aijalon . and the sun be at rest and the moon keep it place till the nation have give punishment to their attacker . be it not record in the book of jashar ? so the sun keep it place in the middle of the heaven and be wait and do not go down for the space of a day . and there be no day like that before it or after it when the lord give ear to the voice of a man for the lord be fight for israel . and joshua with all israel go back to the tent circle at gilgal . but these five king go in flight secretly to a hole in the rock at makkedah . and word be give to joshua that the five king have be take in a hole in the rock at makkedah . and joshua say let great stone be roll against the mouth of the hole and let men keep watch by it but do you without wait go after their army attack them from the back do not let them get into their town for the lord your god have give them into your hand . now when joshua and the child of israel have come to the end of their war of complete destruction and have put to death all but a small band who have get safely into the walled town all the people go back to joshua to the tent circle at makkedah in peace and no one say a word against the child of israel . then joshua say take away the stone from the mouth of the hole in the rock and make those five king come out to me . and they do so and make those five king come out of the hole to him the king of jerusalem the king of hebron the king of jarmuth the king of lachish and the king of eglon . and when they have make those king come out to joshua joshua send for all the men of israel and say to the chief of the men of war who have go by joshua 's order and put into the hole where they have go to be safe and great stone be place at the mouth of the hole where they be to this day . that day joshua take makkedah and put it and it the child of judah go to joshua in gilgal and caleb the son of jephunneh the kenizzite say to him you have knowledge of what the lord say to moses the man of god about me and about you in kadesh barnea . i be forty year old when moses the servant of the lord send me from kadesh barnea to make a search through the land and the account which i give him be in keep with his desire . my brother however who go up with me make the heart of the people like water but i be true to the lord with all my heart . and on that day moses take an oath say truly the land where your foot have be place will become a heritage for you and your child for ever because you have be true to the lord your god with all your heart . and now a you see the lord have keep me safe these forty five year from the time when the lord say this to moses while israel be wander in the waste land and now i be eighty five year old . and still i be a strong today a i be when moses send me out a my strength be then so be it now for war and for all the business of life . so now give me this hill country name by the lord at that time for you have an account of it then how the anakim be there and great walled town it may be that the lord will be with me and i will be able to take their land a the lord say . and joshua give him his blessing and he give hebron to caleb the son of jephunneh for his heritage . so hebron become the heritage of caleb the son of jephunneh the kenizzite to this day because with all his heart he be true to the lord the god of israel . in early time the name of hebron have be kiriath arba name after arba the great of the anakim . and the land have rest from war .now the part of the land mark out for the child of judah by family go up to the edge of edom as far a the waste land of zin blood . and if anyone go in flight to one of those town and come into the public place of the town and put his cause before the responsible men of the town they will take him into the town and give him a place among them where he may be safe . and if the one who have the right of punishment come after him they be not to give the taker of life up to him because he be the cause of his neighbour 's death without design it and not in hate . and he be to go on living in that town till he have to come before the meeting of the people to be judge till the death of him who be high priest at that time then the taker of life may come back to his town and to his house to the town from which he have go in flight . so they make selection of kedesh in galilee in the hill country of naphtali and shechem good which he say he would do for them and all his word come true .then joshua send for the reubenites and the gadites and the half tribe of manasseh and say to them you have keep all the order of the head of the family of israel god even god the lord god even god the lord he see and israel will see if it be in pride or in sin against the lord that we have make ourselves an altar be false to the lord keep u not safe from death this day and if for the purpose of offer burn offering on it and meal offering or peace offering let the lord himself send punishment for it and if we have not in fact do this designedly and with purpose have in our mind the fear that in time to come your child might say to our child what have you to do with the lord the god of israel ? for the lord have make altar for ourselves not for burn offering or for the offering of beast but to be a witness between u and you and between the future generation that we have the right of worship the lord with our burn offering and our offering of beast and our peace offering so that your child will not be able to say to our child in time to come you have no part in the lord . for we say to ourselves if they say this to u or to future generation then we will say see this copy of the lord 's altar which our father make not for burn offering or offering of beast but for a witness between u and you . never let before his house . then phinehas the priest and the chief of the meeting and the head of the family of israel who be with him hear what the child of reuben and the child of gad and the child of be name by you or use in your oath do not be their servant or give them worship but be true to the lord your god a you have be till this day . for the lord have send out from before you nations great and strong and they have all give way before you till this day . one man of you be able to put to flight a thousand for it be the lord your god who be fight for you a he have say to you . so keep watch on yourselves and see that you have love for the lord your god . for if you go back join yourselves to the rest of these nation who be still among you get marry to them and live with them and they with you then you may be certain that the lord your god will not go on drive these nation out from before you but they will become a danger and a cause of sin to you a whip for your side and thorn in your eye till you be cut off from this good land which the lord your god have give you . now i be about to go the way of all the earth and you have see and be certain all of you in your heart and soul that in all the good thing which the lord say about you he have keep faith with you everything have come true for you . and you will see that a all the good thing which the lord your god undertook to do for you have come to you so the lord will send down on you all the evil thing till he have make your destruction complete and you be cut off from the good land which the lord your god have give you . if the agreement of the lord your god which be give to you by his order be broken and you become the servant of other god and give them worship then the wrath of the lord will be burn against you and you will quickly be cut off from the good land which he have give you .then joshua get all the tribe of israel together at shechem and he send for the responsible men of israel and . but barak go after the war carriage and the army as far a harosheth of the gentile and all sisera 's army be put to the sword not a man get away . but sisera go in flight on foot to the tent of jael the wife of heber the kenite for there be peace between jabin king of hazor and the family of heber the kenite . and jael go out to sisera and say to him come in my lord come in to me without fear . so he go into her tent and she put a cover over him . then he say to her give me now a little water for i have need of a drink . and open a skin of milk she give him drink and put the cover over him again . and he say to her take your place at the door of the tent and if anyone come and say to you be there any man here say no . then jael heber 's wife take a tent pin and a hammer and go up to him help of the lord i overcome them will you make me your head ? and the responsible men of gilead say to jephthah may the lord be our witness we will certainly do a you say . so jephthah go with the responsible men of gilead and the people make him head and chief over them and jephthah say all these thing before the lord in mizpah . then jephthah send men to the king of the child of ammon say what have you against me that you have come to make war against my land ? and the king of the child of ammon say to the men send by jephthah because israel when he come up out of egypt take away my land from the arnon as far a the jabbok and as far a jordan so now give me back those land quietly . and jephthah sent again to the king of the child of ammon and say to him this be the word of jephthah israel do not take away the land of moab or the land of the child of ammon but when they come up from egypt israel go through the waste land to the red sea and come to kadesh then israel send men to the king of edom say let me now go through your land but the king of edom do not give ear to them . and in the same way he send to the king of moab but he would not so israel go on living in kadesh . then he go on through the waste land and round the land of edom and the land of moab and come by the east side of the land of moab and put up their tent on the other side of the arnon they do not come inside the limit of moab for the arnon be the limit of moab . and israel send men to sihon king of the amorites the king of heshbon and israel say to him let me now go through your land to my place . but sihon would not give way and let israel go through his land and sihon get together all his people and put his army in position in jahaz and make war on israel . and the lord the god of israel give sihon and all his people into the hand of israel and they overcome them so all the land of the amorites the people of that land become israel 's . all the limit of the amorites be theirs from the arnon as far a the jabbok and from the waste land even to jordan . so now the lord the god of israel have take away their land from the amorites and give it to his people israel be you then to have it ? do you not keep the land of those whom chemosh your god send out from before you ? so we will keep all the land of those whom the lord our god send out from before u . what ! be you any good than balak the son of zippor king of moab ? do he ever take up a cause against israel or make war against them ? while israel be live in heshbon and it daughter town and in aroer and it daughter town and in all the town which be by the side of the arnon for three hundred year why do you not get them back at that time ? so i have do no wrong against you but you be do wrong to me in fight against me may the lord who be judge this day be judge between the child of israel and the child of ammon . the king of the child of ammon however do not give ear to the word which jephthah send to 's and i will give him a a burned offering . so jephthah go over to the child of ammon to make war on them and the lord give them into his hand . and he make an attack on them from aroer all the way to minnith overrun twenty town as far a abel cheramim and put great number to the sword . so the child of ammon be crush before the child of israel . then jephthah come back to his house in mizpah and his daughter come out meet him on his way with music and with dance she be his only child he have no other son or daughter . and when he saw her he be overcome with grief and say ah ! my daughter ! i be crush with sorrow and it be you who be the chief cause of my trouble for i have make an oath to the lord and i may not take it back . and she say to him my father you have make an oath to the lord do then to me whatever you have say for the lord have send a full reward on your hater on the child of ammon . then she say to her father only do this for me let me have two month to go away into the mountain with my friend weep for my sad fate . and he say go then . so he send her away for two month and she go with her friend to the mountain weep for her sad fate . and at the end of two month she go back to her father who do with her a he have say in his oath and she have never be touch by a man . so it become a rule in israel for the woman to go year by year sorrowing for the daughter of jephthah the gileadite four day in every year .now the men of ephraim come together and take up arm and go over to zaphon and they say to jephthah why do you go over to make war against the child of for you you give me no help against them . so when i saw that there be no help to be have from you i put my life in my hand and go over against the child of ammon and the lord give them into my hand why then have you come up to me this day to make war on me ? then jephthah get together all the men of gilead and make war on ephraim and the men of gilead overcame ephraim . and the gileadites take the crossing place of jordan against the ephraimites and when any of the men of ephraim who have go in flight say let me go over the men of gilead say to him be you an ephraimite ? and if he say no then they say to him now say shibboleth and he say sibboleth and be not able to say it in the right way then they take him and put him to death at the cross place of jordan and at that time forty two thousand ephraimites be put to death . now jephthah be judge of israel for six year . and jephthah the gileadite come to his death and his body be put to rest in his town mizpeh of gilead . and after him ibzan of beth lehem be judge of israel . he have thirty son and thirty daughter whom he send to other place and he get thirty wife from other place for his son . and he be judge of israel for seven year . and ibzan come to his death and his body be put to rest at beth lehem . and after him elon the zebulonite be judge of israel and he be judge of israel for ten year . and elon the zebulonite come to his death and his body be put to rest in aijalon in the land of zebulun . and after him abdon the son of hillel the pirathonite be judge of israel . he have forty son and thirty son ' son who go on seventy young ass and he be judge of israel for eight year . and abdon the son of hillel come to his death and his body be put to rest in pirathon in the land of ephraim in the hill country of the amalekites .and the child of israel again do evil in the eye of the lord and the lord give them into the hand of the philistine for forty year . now there be a certain man of zorah of the family of the danites and his name be manoah and his wife have never give birth to a child . and the angel of the lord come to the woman and say to her see now ! though you have never give birth to child you will be with child and give birth to a son . now then take care to have no wine or strong drink and to take no unclean thing for food for you be with child and will give birth to a son his hair be never to be cut for the child be to be separate to god from his birth and he will take up the work of free israel from the hand of the philistine . then the woman come in and say to her husband a man come to me and his form be like the form of a god cause great fear i put no question to him about where he come from and he do not give me his name but he say to me you be with child and will give birth to a son and now do not take any wine or strong drink or let anything unclean be your food for the child will be separate to god from his birth to the day of his death . then manoah make prayer to the lord and say o lord let the man of god whom you send come to u again and make clear to u what we be to do for the child who be to come . and god give ear to the voice of manoah and the angel of god come to the woman again when she be seat in the field but her husband manoah be not with her . so the woman run quickly give her husband the news say i have see the man who come to me the other day . and manoah get up and go after his wife and come up to the man and say to him be you the man who be talk to this woman ? and he say i be . and manoah say now when your word come true what be to be the rule for the child and what will be his work ? and the angel of the lord say to manoah let the woman take note of what i have say to her . she be to have nothing which come from the vine for her food and let her take no wine or strong drink or anything which be unclean let her take care to do all i have give her order to do . and manoah say to the angel of the lord now let u keep you while we make ready a young goat for you . and the angel of the lord say to manoah though you keep me i will not take of your food but if you will make a burned offering let it be offer to the lord . for it have not come into manoah 's mind that he be the angel of the lord . then manoah say to the angel of the lord what be your name so that when your word come true we may give you honour ? but the angel of the lord say to him why be you question me about my name see that it be a wonder ? so manoah take the young goat with it meal offering offer it on the rock to the lord who do strange thing . and when the flame go up to heaven from the altar the angel of the lord go up in the flame of the altar while manoah and his wife be look on and they go down on their face to the earth . but the angel of the lord be see no more by manoah and his wife . then it be clear to manoah that he be the angel of the lord . and manoah say to his wife death will certainly be our fate for it be a god whom we have see . but his wife say to him if the lord be purpose our death he would not have take our burned offering and our meal offering or have give u such order about the child . so the woman give birth to a son and give him the name samson and he become a man and the blessing of the lord be on him . and the spirit of the lord first come on him in mahaneh dan between zorah and eshtaol .now samson go down to timnah and saw a woman in timnah of the daughter of the philistine and when he come back he say to his father and mother i have see a woman in timnah of the daughter of the philistine get her now for me for my wife . then his father and mother say to him be there no woman among the daughter of your relation or among all my people that you have to go for your wife to the philistine who be without circumcision ? but samson say to his father get her for me for she be please to me . now his father and mother have no knowledge that this be the purpose of the lord who have the destruction of the philistine in mind . now the philistine at that time be rule over israel . then samson go down to timnah and his father and his mother and come to the vine garden of timnah and a young lion come rush out at him . and the spirit of the lord come on him with power and unarm a he be pull the lion in two a one might do to a young goat he put him to death but he say nothing to his father and mother of what he have do . so he go down and have talk with the woman and she be please to samson . then after a time he go back to take her and turn from the road to see the dead body of the lion he saw a mass of bee in the body of the lion and honey there . and he take the honey in his hand and go on taste it on the way and when he come to his father and mother he give some to them but do not say that he have take the honey from the body of the lion . then samson go down to the woman and make a feast there a be the way among young men . and he take thirty friend and they be with him . and samson say now i have a hard question for you if you be able to give me the answer before the seven day of the feast be over i will give you thirty linen robe and thirty change of clothing but if you be not able to give me the answer then you will have to give me thirty linen robe and thirty change of clothing . and they say to him put your hard question and let u see what it be . and he say out of the taker of food come food and out of the strong come the sweet . and at the end of three day they be still not able to give the answer . so on the fourth day they say to samson 's wife get from your husband the answer to his question by some trick or other or we will have you and your father 's house burn with fire do you get u here to take all we have ? then samson 's wife weeping over him say truly you have no love for me but only hate you have put a hard question to the child of my people and have not give me the answer . and he say to her see i have not give a lion ? and he say to them if you have not be plough with my cow you would not have get the answer to my question . and the spirit of the lord come rush on him and he go down to ashkelon and attack thirty men there take their clothing from them and give it to the men who have give the answer to his hard question . then full of wrath he go back to his father 's house . but samson 's wife be give a the living grain and the vine garden and the olive go up in flame . then the philistine say who have do this ? and they say samson the son in law of the timnite because he take his wife and give her this people who be without circumcision . then god make a crack in the hollow rock in lehi and water come out of it and after drink his spirit come back to him and he be strong again so that place be name en hakkore it be in lehi to this day . and he be judge of israel in the day of the philistine for twenty year .now samson go to gaza and there he saw a loose woman and go in to her . and it be shekel of silver . so delilah say to samson make clear to me now what be the secret of your great strength and how you may be put in band and make feeble . and samson say to her if seven new bow cord which have never be make dry be knot round me i will become feeble and will be like any other man . so the chief of the philistine give her seven new bow cord which have never be make dry and she have quickly pull up cloth and machine together . and she say to him why do you say you be my lover when your heart be not mine ? three time you have make sport of me and have not make clear to me the secret of your great strength . so day after day she give him no peace for ever question him till his soul be trouble to death . and open all his heart to her he say to her my head have never be touch by a blade for i have be separate to god from the day of my birth if my hair be cut off then my strength will go from me and i will become feeble and will be like any other man . and when delilah saw philistine take him and put out his eye then they take him down to gaza and chain him with band of brass put him to work crush grain in the prison house . but the growth of his hair be start again after it have be cut off . and the chief of the philistine come together to make a great offering to dagon their god and to be glad for they say our god have give into our hand samson our hater . and when the people saw him they give praise to their god for they say our god have give into our hand the one who be fight against u who make our country waste and who put great number of u to death . and samson say to the boy who take him by the hand let me put my hand on the pillar support the house so that i may put my back against them . now the house be full of men and woman and all the lord of the philistine be there and about three thousand men and woman be on the roof look on while samson make sport . and samson cry out to the lord say o lord god do have me now in mind and do make me strong only this once o god so that i may take one last payment from the philistine for my two eye . then samson put his arm round the two middle pillar support the house put his weight on them on one with his right hand and on the other with his left . and samson say let death overtake me with the philistine . and he put out all his strength and the house come down on the chief and on all the people who be in it . so the dead whom he send to destruction by his death be more than all those on whom he have send destruction in his life . then his brother and his father 's people come down and take him up and put his body to rest in the earth between zorah and eshtaol in the rest place of manoah his father . and he have be judge of israel for twenty year .now there be a man of the hill country of ephraim name micah . and he say to his mother the eleven hundred shekel of silver which be take from you about which you take an oath and say in my hearing i have give this silver to the lord from my hand for myself to make a pictured image and a metal image see i have the silver for i take it so now i will give it back to you . and his mother say may the blessing of the lord be on my son . and he give back the eleven hundred shekel of silver to his mother and his mother say i have make the silver holy to the lord from me for my son to make a pictured image and a metal image . so he give the silver back to his mother . then his mother take two hundred shekel of silver and give them to a metal worker who make a pictured image and a metal image from them and it be in the house of micah . and the man micah have a house of god and he make an ephod and family god and put one of his son in the position of priest . in those day there be no king in israel every man do a seemed somewhere to make his living place and on his journey he come to the hill country of ephraim to the house of micah . and micah say to him where do you come from ? and he say to him i be a levite from beth lehem judah and i be look for a living place . then micah say to him make your live place with me and be a father and a priest to me and i will give you ten shekel of silver a year and your clothing and food . and the levite say he would make his live place with the man and he become to him a one of his son . and micah give the position to the levite and the young man become his priest and be in the house of micah . then micah say now i be certain that the lord will do me good see that the levite have become my priest .in those day there be no king in israel and in those day the danites be look for a heritage for themselves to be their living place for up to that time no distribution of land have be make to them among the tribe of israel . so the child of dan send five men from among their number strong men from zorah and from eshtaol to take a look at the land and make a search through it and they say to them go and make a search through the land and they come to the hill country of ephraim to the house of micah where they make a stop for the night . when they be near the house of micah hear a voice which be not strange to them that of the young levite they go out of their road to his place and say to him how do you come here ? and what be you do in this place ? and why be you here ? and he say to them this be what micah do for me and he give me payment and i become his priest . then they say do get direction from god for u to see if the journey on which we be go will have a good outcome . and the priest say to them go in peace your way be guide by the lord . then the five men go on their way and come to laish and saw the people who be there live without thought of danger like the zidonians quiet and safe for they have everything on earth for their need and they be far from the zidonians and have no business with aram . so they come back to their brother in zorah and eshtaol and their brother say to them what news have you ? and they say up ! and let u go against laish for we have see the land and it be very good why be you do nothing ? do not be slow to go in and take the land for your heritage . when you come there you will come to a people live without thought of danger and the land be wide and god have give it into your hand a place where there be everything on earth for man 's need . so six hundred men of the danites from zorah and eshtaol go out arm with instrument of war . and they go up and put up their tent in kiriath jearim in judah so that place be name mahaneh dan to this day . it be to the west of kiriath jearim . the house of micah and say to him be it well with you ? and the six hundred arm men of the danites take their place by the doorway . then the five men who have go to make a search through the land go micah 's house come together and overtake the child of dan cry out to them . and the danites turn round say to micah what be your trouble that you have take up arm ? and he say you have take my god
