attack on you cause loss of your life and the life of your people . then the child of dan go on their way and when micah saw that they be strong than he he go back to his house . and they take that which micah have make and his priest and come to laish to a people live quietly and without thought of danger and they put them to the sword without mercy burn down their town . and they have no saviour because it be far from zidon and they have no business with aram and it be in the valley which be the property of beth rehob . and build up the town again they take it for their living place . and they give the town the name of dan after dan their father who be the son of israel though the town have be name laish at first . and the child of dan put up the pictured image for themselves and jonathan the son of gershom the son of moses and his son be priest for the tribe of the danites till the day when the ark be take prisoner . and they put up for themselves the image which micah have make and it be there all the time that the house of god be in shiloh .now in those day when there be no king in israel a certain levite be live in the inmost part of the hill country of ephraim and he get for himself a servant wife from beth lehem judah . and his servant wife be angry with him and go away from him to her father 's house at beth lehem judah and be there for four month . then her husband get up and go after her with the purpose of talk kindly to her and take her back with him he have with him his young man and two ass and she take him into her father 's house and her father when he saw him come forward to him with joy . and his father in law the girl 's father keep him there for three day and they have food and drink and take their rest there . now on the fourth day they get up early in the morning and he make ready to go away but the girl 's father say to his son in law take a little food to keep up your strength and then go on your way . so seat themselves they have food and drink the two of them together and the girl 's father say to the man if it be your pleasure take your rest here tonight and let your heart be glad . and the man get up to go away but his father in law would not let him go so he take his rest there again for the night . then early on the morning of the fifth day he get up to go away but the girl 's father say keep up your strength so the two of them have a meal and the man and his woman and his servant do not go till after the middle of the day . and when they get up to go away his father in law the girl 's father say to him now even be come on so do not go tonight see the day be almost go take your rest here and let your heart be glad and tomorrow early go on your way back to your house . but the man would not be keep there that night and he get up and go away and come opposite to jebus which be jerusalem and he have with him the two ass ready for travel and his woman . when they get near jebus the day be far go and the servant say to his master now let u go from our road into this town of the jebusites and take our night 's rest there . but his master say to him we will not go out of our way into a strange town whose people be not of the child of israel but we will go on to gibeah . and he say to his servant come let u go on to one of these place stop for the night in gibeah or ramah . so they go on their way and the sun go down when they be near gibeah in the land of benjamin . and they go off the road there with the purpose of stop for the night in gibeah and he go in seat himself in the street of the town for no one take them into his house for the night . now when it be even they saw an old man come back from his work in the field he be from the hill country of ephraim and be live in gibeah but the men of the place be benjamites . and when he saw the traveller in the street of the town the old man say where be you go ? and where do you come from ? and he say to him we be on our way from beth lehem judah to the inmost part of the hill country of ephraim i come from there and go to beth lehem judah now i be on my way back to my house but no man will take me into his house . but we have dry grass and food for our ass as well a bread and wine for me and for the woman and for the young man with u we have no need of anything . and the old man say peace be with you let all your need be my care only do not take your rest in the street . so he take them into his house and give the ass food and after wash their foot they take food and drink . while they be take their pleasure at the meal the good for nothing men of the town come round the house give blow on the door and they say to the old man the master of the house send out that man who come to your house so that we may take our pleasure with him . so the man the master of the house go out to them and say no my brother do not this evil thing this man have come into my house and you be not to do him this wrong . see here be my daughter a virgin and his servant wife i will send them out for you to take them and do with them whatever you will . but do no such thing of shame to this man . but the men would not give ear to him so the man take his woman and send her out to them and they take her by force use her for their pleasure all night till the morning and when dawn come they let her go . then at the dawn of day the woman come and fall down at the door of the man 's house where her master be be stretch there till it be light . in the morning her master get up and open the door of the house go out to go on his way and he saw his servant wife stretch on the earth at the door of the house with her hand on the step . and he say to her get up and let u be go but there be no answer so he take her up and put her on the as and go on his way and come to his house . and when he have come to his house he get his knife and take the woman cut her up bone by bone into twelve part which he send through all israel . and he give order to the men whom he send say this be what you be to say to all the men of israel have ever an act like this be do from the day when the child of israel come out of egypt to this day ? give thought to it turn it over in your mind and give your opinion of it .then all the child of israel take up arm and the people come together like one man from dan to beer sheba and the land of gilead before the lord at mizpah . and the chief of the people out of all the tribe of israel take their place in the meeting of the people of god four hundred thousand footman arm with sword . now the child of benjamin have word that the child of israel have go up to mizpah . and the child of israel say make clear how this evil thing take place . then the levite the husband of the dead woman say in answer i come to gibeah in the land of benjamin i and my servant wife for the purpose of stop there for the night . and the townsman of gibeah come together against me go round the house on all side by night it be their purpose to put me to death and my servant wife be violently use by them and be dead . so i take her cut her into part which i send through all the country of the heritage of israel for they have do an act of shame in israel . here you all be you child of israel give now your suggestion about what be to be do . then all the people get up a one man and say not one of u will go to his tent or go back to his house but this be what we will do to gibeah we will go up against it by the decision of the lord and we will take ten men out of every hundred through all the tribe of israel a hundred out of every thousand a thousand out of every ten thousand to get food for the people so that they may give to gibeah of benjamin the right punishment for the act of shame they have do in israel . so all the men of israel be band together against the town unite like one man . and the tribe of israel send men through all the tribe of benjamin say what be this evil which have be do among you ? now give up those good for nothing person in gibeah so that we may put them to death clear away the evil from israel . but the child of benjamin would not give ear to the voice of their brother the child of israel . and the child of benjamin come together from all their town to gibeah to go to war with the child of israel . and the child of benjamin who come that day from the town be twenty six thousand men arm with sword in addition to the people of gibeah number seven hundred of the best fight men who be leave hand able to send a stone at a hair without error . and the men of israel other than benjamin be four hundred thousand in number all arm with sword they be all men of war . and they get up and go up to beth el to get direction from god and the child of israel say who be to be the first to go up to the fight against the child of benjamin ? and the lord say judah be to go up first . so the child of israel get up in the morning and put themselves in position against gibeah . and the men of israel go out to war against benjamin and the men of israel put their force in fight order against them at gibeah . then the child of benjamin come out from gibeah cut down twenty two thousand of the israelite that day . but the people the men of israel take heart again put their force in order and take up the same position a on the first day . now the child of israel go up weep before the lord till even request the lord and say be i to go forward again to the fight against the child of benjamin my brother ? and the lord say go up against him . so the child of israel go forward against the child of benjamin the second day . and the second day benjamin go out against them from gibeah cut down eighteen thousand men of the child of israel all swordsman . then all the child of israel and all the people go up to beth el weeping and wait there before the lord go without food all day till even and offer burn offering and peace offering before the lord . and the child of israel make request to the lord for the ark of the agreement of the lord be there in those day and phinehas the son of eleazar the son of aaron be in his place before it and say be i still to go on with the fight against the child of benjamin my brother or be i to give it up ? and the lord say go on for tomorrow i will give him into your hand . so israel put men secretly all round gibeah to make a surprise attack on it . and the child of israel go up against the child of benjamin on the third day and put themselves in fight order against gibeah a before . and the child of benjamin go out against the people move away from the town and a before at their first attack they put to death about thirty men of israel on the highway of which one go up to beth el and the other to gibeah and in the open country . and the child of benjamin say they be give way before u a at first . but the child of israel say let u go in flight and get them away from the town into the highway . so all the men of israel get up and put themselves in fight order at baal tamar and those who have be wait secretly to make a surprise attack come rush out of their place on the west of geba . and they come in front of gibeah ten thousand of the best men in all israel and the fighting become more violent but the child of benjamin be not conscious that evil be come on them . then the lord send sudden fear on benjamin before israel and that day the child of israel put to death twenty five thousand one hundred men of benjamin all of them swordsman . so the child of benjamin saw that they be overcome and the men of israel have give way before benjamin put their faith in the watcher who be to make the surprise attack on gibeah . and the watcher rush on gibeah and overrun it put all the town to the sword without mercy . now the sign fix between the men of israel and those make the surprise attack be that when they make a pillar of smoke go up from the town the men of israel be to make a turn about in the fight . and benjamin have overcome and put to death about thirty of the men of israel and be say certainly they be fall back before u a in the first fight . then the sign go up out of the town in the pillar of smoke and the benjamites turn back saw all the town go up in smoke to heaven . and the men of israel have make a turn about and the men of benjamin be overcome with fear for they saw that evil have overtake them . so turn their back on the men of israel they go in the direction of the waste land but the fight overtake them and those who come out of the town be head them off and put them to the sword . and crush benjamin down they go after them drive them from nohah as far a the east side of gibeah . eighteen thousand men of benjamin come to their death all strong men of war . and turn they go in flight to the rock of rimmon in the waste land and on the highway five thousand of them be cut off by the men of israel who push on hard after them to geba put to death two thousand more . so twenty five thousand of the swordsman of benjamin come to their end that day all strong men of war . but six hundred men turn back go in flight to the rock of rimmon in the waste land and be live on the rock of rimmon for four month . and the men of israel turn again against the child of benjamin put to the sword without mercy all the town and the cattle and everything there be burn every town which come into their hand .now the men of israel have take an oath in mizpah say not one of u will give his daughter a a wife to benjamin . and the people come to beth el wait there till even before god and give themselves up to bitter weep . and they say o lord the god of israel why have this fate come on israel that today one tribe have be cut off from israel ? then on the day after the people get up early and make an altar there offer burn offering and peace offering . and the child of israel say who be there among all the tribe of israel who do not come up to the lord at the meeting of all israel ? for they have take a great oath that whoever do not come up to mizpah to the lord be to be put to death . and the child of israel be move with pity for benjamin their brother say today one tribe have be cut off from israel . what be we to do about wife for those who be still live ? for we have take an oath by the lord that we will not give them our daughter for wife . and they say which one of the tribe of israel do not come up to mizpah to the lord ? and it be see that no one have come from jabesh gilead to the meeting . for when the people be number not one man of the people of jabesh gilead be present . so they the meeting send twelve thousand of the best fight men and give them order say go and put the people of jabesh gilead to the sword without mercy with their woman and their little one . and this be what you be to do every male and every woman who have have sex relation with a man you be to put to the curse but you be to keep safe the virgin . and they do so . now there be among the people of jabesh gilead four hundred young virgin who have never have sex relation with a man these they take to their tent in shiloh in the land of canaan . and all the meeting send to the men of benjamin who be in the rock of rimmon offer them peace . then benjamin come back and they give them the woman whom they have keep from death among the woman of jabesh gilead but still there be not enough for them . and the people be move with pity for benjamin because the lord have let his wrath loose on the tribe of israel . then the responsible men of the meeting say what be we to do about wife for the rest of them see that the woman of benjamin be dead ? and they say how be the rest of benjamin to be give offspring so that one tribe of israel may not be put out of existence see that we may not give them our daughter a wife ? for the child of israel have take an oath say curse be he who give a wife to benjamin . and they say see every year there be a feast of the lord in shiloh which be to the north of beth el on the east side of the highway which go up from beth el to shechem and on the south of lebonah . and they say to the men of benjamin go into the vine garden wait there secretly and watch and if the daughter of shiloh come out to take part in the dance then come from the vine garden and take a wife for every one of you from among the daughter of shiloh and go back to the land of benjamin . and when their father or their brother come and make trouble you be to say to them give them to u a an act of grace for we do not take them a wife for ourselves in war and if you yourselves have give them to u you would have be responsible for the broken oath . so the men of benjamin do this and get wife for themselves for every one of their number take them away by force from the dance then they go back to their heritage build up their town and living in them . then the child of israel go away from there every man to his tribe and his family every man go back to his heritage . in those day there be no king in israel every man do what seem right to him .now there come a time in the day of the judge when there be no food in the land . and a certain man go from beth lehem judah he and his wife and his two son to make a living place in the country of moab . and the name of the man be elimelech and the name of his wife naomi and the name of his two son mahlon and chilion ephrathites of beth lehem judah . and they come into the country of moab and be there for some time . and elimelech naomi 's husband come to his end and only her two son be with her . and they take two woman of moab a their wive the name of the one be orpah and the name of the other ruth and they go on living there for about ten year . and mahlon and chilion come to their end and the woman be without her two son and her husband . so she and her daughter in law get ready to go back from the country of moab for news have come to her in the country of moab that the lord in mercy for his people have give them food . and she go out of the place where she be and her two daughter in law with her and they go on their way to go back to the land of judah . and naomi say to her two daughter in law go back to your mother ' house may the lord be good to you a you have be good to the dead and to me may the lord give you rest in the house of your husband . then she give them a kiss and they be weep bitterly . and they say to her no but we will go back with you to your people . but naomi say go back my daughter why will you come with me ? have i more son in my body to become your husband ? go back my daughter and go on your way i be so old now that i may not have another husband . if i say i have hope if i have a husband tonight and might have son would you keep yourselves till they be old enough ? would you keep from have husband for them ? no my daughter but i be very sad for you that the hand of the lord be against me . then again they be weep and orpah give her mother in law a kiss but ruth would not be part from her . and naomi say see your sister in law have go back to her people and to her god go back after your sister in law . but ruth say give up request me to go away from you or to go back without you for where you go i will go and where you take your rest i will take my rest your people will be my people and your god my god . wherever death come to you death will come to me and there will be my last resting place the lord do so to me and more if we be part by anything but death . and when she saw that ruth be strong in her purpose to go with her she say no more . so the two of them go on till they come to beth lehem . and when they come to beth lehem all the town be move about them and they say be this naomi ? and she say to them do not let my name be naomi but mara for the ruler of all have give me a bitter fate . i go out full and the lord have send me back again with nothing why do you give me the name naomi see that the lord have give witness against me and the ruler of all have send sorrow on me ? so naomi come back out of the country of moab and ruth the moabitess her daughter in law with her and they come to beth lehem in the first day of the grain cutting .and naomi have a relation of her husband a man of wealth of the family of elimelech and his name be boaz . and ruth the moabitess say to naomi now let me go into the field and take up the head of grain after him in whose eye i may have grace . and she say to her go my daughter . and she go and come and take up the head of grain in the field after the cutter and by chance she go into that part of the field which be the property of boaz who be of the family of elimelech . and boaz come from beth lehem and say to the grain cutters the lord be with you . and they make answer the lord give you his bless . then boaz say to his servant who be in authority over the cutter whose girl be this ? and the servant who be in authority over the cutter say it be a moabite girl who come back with naomi out of the country of moab and she say to me let me come into the grain field and take up the grain after the cutter . so she come and have be here from morning till now without rest even for a minute . then say boaz to ruth give ear to me my daughter do not go to take up the grain in another field or go away from here but keep here by my young woman keep your eye on the field they be cut and go after them have i not give order to the young men not to put a hand on you ? and when you be in need of drink go to the vessel and take of what the young men have put there . then she go down on her face to the earth and say to him why have i grace in your eye that you give attention to me see i be from a strange people ? and boaz answering say to her i have have news of everything you have do for your mother in law after the death of your husband how you go away from your father and mother and the land of your birth and come to a people who be strange to you . the lord give you a reward for what you have do and may a full reward be give to you by the lord the god of israel under whose wing you have come to take cover . then she say may i have grace in your eye my lord for you have give me comfort and you have say kind word to your servant though i be not like one of your servant . and at meal time boaz say to her come here and take some of the bread and put your bit into the wine . and she take her seat among the grain cutter and he give her dry grain and she take it and there be more than enough for her meal . and when she get ready to take up the grain boaz give his young men order say let her take it even from among the cut grain and say nothing to her . and let some head of grain be pull out of what have be cord up and drop for her to take and let no sharp word be say to her . so she go on get together the head of grain till even and after crush out the seed it come to about an ephah of grain . and she take it up and go into the town and she let her mother in law see what she have got and after take enough for herself she give her the rest . and her mother in law say to her where do you take up the grain today and where be you work ? may a blessing be on him who give such attention to you . and she give her mother in law an account of where she have be work and say the name of the man with whom i be work today be boaz . and naomi say to her daughter in law may the blessing of the lord who have at all time be kind to the living and to the dead be on him . and naomi say to her the man be of our family one of our near relation . and ruth the moabitess say truly he say to me keep near my young men till all my grain be cut . and naomi say to ruth her daughter in law it be well my daughter for you to go out with his servant girl so that no danger may come to you in another field . so she keep near the servant girl of boaz to take up the grain till the cutting of the early grain and the cutting of the late grain be end and she go on living with her mother in law .and naomi her mother in law say to her my daughter be i not to get you a rest place where you may be in comfort ? and now be there not boaz our relation with whose young woman you be ? see tonight he be separate the grain from the waste in his grain floor . so take a bath and after rub your body with sweet oil put on your best robe and go down to the grain floor but do not let him see you till he have come to the end of his meal . but see to it when he go to rest that you take note of the place where he be sleep and go in there and uncover his foot take your place by him and he will say what you be to do . and she say i will do all you say . so she go down to the grain floor and do all her mother in law have say to her . now when boaz have take meat and drink and his heart be glad he go to take his rest at the end of the mass of grain then she come softly and uncover his foot go to rest . now in the middle of the night the man awake from his sleep in fear and lift himself up saw a woman stretch at his foot . and he say who be you ? and she answer say i be your servant ruth take your servant a wife for you be a near relation . and he say may the lord give you his bless my daughter even well than what you do at the first be this last kind act you have do in not go after young men with or without wealth . and now my daughter have no fear i will do for you whatever you say for it be clear to all my townspeople that you be a woman of virtue . now it be true that i be a near relation but there be a relation nearer than i. take your rest here tonight and in the morning if he will do for you what it be right for a relation to do very well let him do so but if he will not then by the living lord i myself will do so . and she take her rest at his foot till the morning and she get up before it be light enough for one to see another . and he say let it not come to anyone 's knowledge that the woman come to the grain floor . and he say take your robe stretch it out in your hand and she do so and he take six measure of grain and put them into it and give it her to take and she go back to the town . and when she come back her mother in law say to her how do it go with you my daughter ? and she give her an account of all the man have do to her . and she say he give me these six measure of grain say do not go back to your mother in law with nothing in your hand . then she say do nothing now my daughter till you see what will come of this for the man will take no rest till he have put this thing through .and boaz go up to the public place of the town and take his seat there and the near relation of whom he have be talk come by and boaz cry out to him by name say come and be seat here . and he come and be seat . then he get ten of the responsible men of the town and say be seat here . and they take their seat . then he say to the near relation naomi who have come back from the country of moab be offer for a price that bit of land which be our brother elimelech 's and it be in my mind to give you the chance of take it with the approval of those seat here and of the responsible men of my people . if you be ready to do what it be right for a relation to do then do it but if you will not do it say so to me now for there be no one who have the right to do it but you and after you myself . and he say i will do it . then boaz say on the day when you take this field you will have to take with it ruth the moabitess the wife of the dead so that you may keep the name of the dead living in his heritage . and the near relation say i be not able to do the relation 's part for fear of damage the heritage i have you may do it in my place for i be not able to do it myself . now in early time this be the way in israel when property be take over by a near relation or when there be a change of owner . to make the exchange certain one man take off his shoe and give it to the other and this be a witness in israel . so the near relation say to boaz take it for yourself . and he take off his shoe . then boaz say to the responsible men and to all the people you be witness today that i have take at a price from naomi all the property which be elimelech 's and everything which be chilion 's and mahlon 's . and further i have take ruth the moabitess who be the wife of mahlon to be my wife to keep the name of the dead man living in his heritage so that his name may not be cut off from among his countryman and from the memory of his town you be witness this day . and all the people who be in the public place and the responsible men say we be witness . may the lord make this woman who be about to come into your house like rachel and leah which two be the builder of the house of israel and may you have wealth in ephrathah and be great in beth lehem may your family be like the family of perez the son whom tamar give to judah from the offspring which the lord may give you by this young woman . so boaz take ruth and she become his wife and he go in to her and the lord make her with child and she give birth to a son . and the woman say to naomi a blessing on the lord who have not let you be this day without a near relation and may his name be great in israel . he will be a giver of new life to you and your comforter when you be old for your daughter in law who in her love for you be good than seven son have give birth to him . and naomi take the child and put her arm round it and she take care of it . and the woman who be her neighbour give it a name say naomi have a child and they give him the name of obed he be the father of jesse the father of david . now these be the generation of perez perez become the father of hezron and hezron become the father of ram and ram become the father of amminadab and amminadab become the father of nahshon and nahshon become the father of salmon and salmon become the father of boaz and boaz become the father of obed and obed become the father of jesse and jesse become the father of david .now there be a certain man of ramathaim a zuphite of the hill country of ephraim name elkanah he be the son of jeroham the son of elihu the son of tohu the son of zuph an ephraimite and he have two wife one name hannah and the other peninnah and peninnah be the mother of child but hannah have no child . now this man go up from his town every year to give worship and to make offering to the lord of army in shiloh . and the two son of eli hophni and phinehas the priest of the lord be there . and when the day come for elkanah to make his offering he give to peninnah his wife and to all her son and daughter their part of the feast but to hannah he give one part though hannah be very dear to him but the lord have not let her have child . and the other wife do everything possible to make her unhappy because the lord have not let her have child and year by year whenever she go up to the house of the lord she keep on attack her so that hannah give herself up to weeping and would take no food . then her husband elkanah say to her hannah why be you weep ? and why be you take no food ? why be your heart trouble ? be i not more to you than ten son ? so after they have take food and wine in the guest room hannah get up . now eli the priest be seat by the pillar of the doorway of the temple of the lord . and with grief in her soul weep bitterly she make her prayer to the lord . and she make an oath and say o lord of army if you will truly take note of the sorrow of your servant not turn away from me but keep me in mind and will give me a man child then i will give him to the lord all the day of his life and his hair will never be cut . now while she be a long time in prayer before the lord eli be watch her mouth . for hannah 's prayer come from her heart and though her lip be move she make no sound so it seem to eli that she be overcome with wine . and eli say to her how long be you go to be the bad for drink ? put away the effect of your wine from you . and hannah answer him say no my lord i be a woman whose spirit be break with sorrow i have not take wine or strong drink but i have be open my heart before the lord . do not take your servant to be a good for nothing woman for my word have come from my store up sorrow and pain . then eli say to her go in peace and may the god of israel give you an answer to the prayer you have make to him . and she say may your servant have grace in your eye . so the woman go away and take part in the feast and her face be no long sad . and early in the morning they get up and after worship before the lord they go back to ramah to their house and elkanah have connection with his wife and the lord keep her in mind . now the time come when hannah be with child give birth to a son and she give him the name samuel because she say i make a prayer to the lord for him . and the man elkanah with all his family go up to make the year 's offering to the lord and to give effect to his oath . but hannah do not go for she say to her husband i will not go till the child have be take from the breast and then i will take him with me and put him before the lord where he may be for ever . and her husband elkanah say to her do whatever seem right to you but not till you have take him from the breast only may the lord do a he have say . so the woman wait there give her son milk till he be old enough to be take from the breast . then when she have do so she take him with her with a three year old ox and an ephah of meal and a skin full of wine and take him to the house of the lord at shiloh now the child be still very young . and when they have make an offering of the ox they take the child to eli . and she say o my lord a your soul be live my lord i be that woman who be make a prayer to the lord here by your side my prayer be for this child and the lord have give him to me in answer to my request so i have give him to the lord for all his life he be the lord 's . then he give the lord worship there .and hannah in prayer before the lord say my heart be glad in the lord my horn be lift up in the lord my mouth be open wide over my hater because my joy be in your salvation . no other be holy a the lord for there be no other god but you there be no rock like our god . say no more word of pride let not uncontrolled saying come out of your mouth for the lord be a god of knowledge by him act be judge . the bow of the men of war be break and the feeble be clothe with strength . those who be full be offer themselves a servant for bread those who be in need be at rest truly she who have no child have become the mother of seven and she who have a family be waste with sorrow . the lord be the giver of death and life send men down to the underworld and lift them up . the lord give wealth and take a man 's good from him crush men down and again lift them up lift the poor out of the dust and him who be in need out of the low place to give them their place among ruler and for their heritage the seat of glory for the pillar of the earth be the lord 's and he have make them the base of the world . he will keep the foot of his holy one but the evil doer will come to their end in the dark night for by strength no man will overcome . those who make war against the lord will be break against them he will send his thunder from heaven the lord will be judge of the end of the earth he will give strength to his king lift up the horn of him on whom the holy oil have be put . then elkanah go to ramah to his house . and the child become the servant of the lord under the direction of eli the priest . now the son of eli be evil and good for nothing men have no knowledge of the lord . and the priest ' way with the people be this when any man make an offer the priest 's servant come while the flesh be be cook have in his hand a meat hook with three teeth this he put into the pot and everything which come up on the hook the priest take for himself . this they do in shiloh to all the israelite who come there . and more than this before the fat be burn the priest 's servant would come and say to the man who be make the offering give me some of the flesh to be cook for the priest he have no taste for meat cook in water but would have you give it uncooked . and if the man say to him first let the fat be burn then take as much a you will then the servant would say no you be to give it to me now or i will take it by force . and the sin of these young men be very great before the lord for they give no honour to the lord 's offering . but samuel do the work of the lord 's house while he be a child dress in a linen ephod . and his mother make him a little robe and take it to him every year when she come with her husband for the year 's offering . and every year eli give elkanah and his wife a blessing say may the lord give you offspring by this woman in exchange for the child you have give to the lord . and they go back to their house . and the lord have mercy on hannah and she give birth to three son and two daughter . and the young samuel become old before the lord . now eli be very old and he have news from time to time of what his son be do to all israel . and he say to them why be you do such thing ? for from all this people i get account of your evil way . no my son the account which be give me which the lord 's people be send about be not good . if one man do wrong to another god will be his judge but if a man 's sin be against the lord who will take up his cause ? but they give no attention to the voice of their father for it be the lord 's purpose to send destruction on them . and the young samuel become old have the approval of the lord and of men . and a man of god come to eli and say to him the lord say do i let myself be see by your father 's people when they be in egypt servant in pharaoh 's house ? do i take him out of all the tribe of israel to be my priest and to go up to my altar to make the smoke of the offering go up and to take up the ephod ? do i give to your father 's family all the offering make by fire by the child of israel ? why then be you look with envy on my offering of meat and of meal which be order by my word honour your son before me and make yourselves fat with all the best of the offering of israel my people ? for this reason the lord god of israel have say truly i do say that your family and your father 's people would have their place before me for ever but now the lord say let it not be so i will give honour to those by whom i be honour and those who have no respect for me will be of small value in my eye . see the day be come when your arm and the arm of your father 's people will be cut off and never again will there be an old man in your family . but one man of your family will not be cut off by my hand and his eye will be make dark and grief will be in his heart and all the offspring of your family will come to their end by the sword of men . and this will be the sign to you which will come on hophni and phinehas your son death will overtake them on the same day . and i will make a true priest for myself one who will do what be in my heart and in my mind and i will make for him a family which will not come to an end and his place will be before my holy one for ever . then it will be that the rest of your family anyone who have not be cut off will go down on his knee to him for a bit of silver or a bit of bread and say be please to put me into one of the priest 's place so that i may have a little food .now the young samuel be the servant of the lord before eli . in those day the lord keep his word secret from men there be no open vision . and at that time when eli be rest in his place now his eye be become cloud so that he be not able to see and the light of god be still burn while samuel be sleep in the temple of the lord where the ark of god be the voice of the lord say samuel 's name and he say here be i. and run to eli he say here be i for you say my name . and eli say i do not say your name go to your rest again . so he go back to his bed . and again the lord say samuel . and samuel get up and go to eli and say here be i for you certainly say my name . but he say in answer i say nothing my son go to your rest again . now at that time samuel have no knowledge of the lord and the revelation of the word of the lord have not come to him . and for the third time the lord say samuel 's name . and he get up and go to eli and say here be i for you certainly say my name . then it be clear to eli that the voice which have say the child 's name be the lord 's . so eli say to samuel go back and if the voice come again let your answer be say on lord for the ear of your servant be open . so samuel go back to his bed . then the lord come and say a before samuel samuel . then samuel make answer say on lord for the ear of your servant be open . and the lord say to samuel see i will do a thing in israel at which the ear of everyone hearing of it will be burn . in that day i will do to eli everything which i have say about his family from first to last . and you be to say to him that i will send punishment on his family for ever for the sin which he have knowledge of because his son have be curse god and he have no control over them . so i have make an oath to the family of eli that no offering of meat or of meal which they may make will ever take away the sin of his family . and samuel kept where he be not move till the time come for open the door of the house of god in the morning . and fear keep him from give eli an account of his vision . then eli say samuel my son . and samuel answering say here be i. and he say what do the lord say to you ? do not keep it from me may god 's punishment be on you if you keep from me anything he say to you . then samuel give him an account of everything keep nothing back . and he say it be the lord let him do what seem good to him . and samuel become old and the lord be with him and let not one of his word be without effect . and it be clear to all israel from dan to beer sheba that samuel have be make a prophet of the lord . and the lord be see again in shiloh for the lord give to samuel in shiloh the revelation of his word .now at that time the philistine come together to make war against israel and the men of israel go out to war against the philistine and take up their position at the side of eben ezer and the philistine put their force in position in aphek . and the philistine put their force in order against israel and the fighting be hard and israel be overcome by the philistine who put to the sword about four thousand of their army in the field . and when the people come back to their tent the responsible men of israel say why have the lord let the philistine overcome u today ? let u get the ark of the lord 's agreement here from shiloh so that it may be with u and give u salvation from the hand of those who be against u . so the people send to shiloh and get the ark of the agreement of the lord of army whose rest place be between the winged one and hophni and phinehas the two son of eli be there with the ark of god 's agreement . and when the ark of the lord 's agreement come into the tent circle all israel give a great cry so that the earth be sound with it . and the philistine hear the noise of their cry say what be this great cry among the tent of the hebrew ? then it become clear to them that the ark of the lord have come to the tent circle . and the philistine full of fear say god have come into their tent . and they say trouble be ours ! for never before have such a thing be see . trouble be ours ! who will give u salvation from the hand of these great god ? these be the god who send all sort of blow on the egyptian in the waste land . be strong o philistine be men ! do not be servant to the hebrew a they have be to you go forward to the fight without fear . so the philistine go to the fight and israel be overcome and every man go in flight to his tent and great be the destruction for thirty thousand footman of israel be put to the sword . and the ark of god be take and hophni and phinehas the son of eli be put to the sword . and a man of benjamin go run from the fight and come to shiloh the same day with his clothe out of order and earth on his head . and when he come eli be seat by the wayside watching and in his heart be fear for the ark of god . and when the man come into the town and give the news there be a great outcry . and eli hear the noise and the cry say what be the reason of this outcry ? and the man come quickly and give the news to eli . now eli be ninety eight year old and his eye be fix so that he be not able to see . and the man say to eli i have come from the army and have come in flight today from the fight . and he say how do it go my son ? and the man say israel go in flight from the philistine and there have be great destruction among the people and your two son hophni and phinehas be dead and the ark of god have be take . and at these word about the ark of god eli fall back off his seat by the side of the doorway into the town come down on the earth so that his neck be break and death overtook him for he be an old man and of great weight . he have be judge israel for forty year . and his daughter in law the wife of phinehas be with child and near the time when she would give birth and when she have the news that the ark of god have be take and that her father in law and her husband be dead her pain come on her suddenly and she give birth . and when she be very near death the woman who be with her say have no fear for you have give birth to a son . but she make no answer and give no attention to it . and she give the child the name of ichabod say the glory have go from israel because the ark of god be take and because of her father in law and her husband . and she say the glory be go from israel for the ark of god have be take .now the philistine have take the ark of god take it with them from eben ezer to ashdod . they take the ark of god into the house of dagon and put it by the side of dagon . and when the people of ashdod get up early on the morning after they saw that dagon have come down to the earth on his face before the ark of the lord . and they take dagon up and put him in his place again . and when they get up early on the morning after dagon have come down to the earth on his face before the ark of the lord and his head and his hand be break off on the doorstep only the base be in it place . so to this day no priest of dagon or any who come into dagon 's house will put his foot on the doorstep of the house of dagon in ashdod . but the hand of the lord be hard on the people of ashdod and he send disease on them through all the country of ashdod . and when the men of ashdod saw how it be they say let not the ark of the god of israel be with u for his hand be hard on u and on dagon our god . so they send for all the lord of the philistine to come together there and say what be we to do with the ark of the god of israel ? and their answer be let the ark of the god of israel be take away to gath . so they take the ark of the god of israel away . but after they have take it away the hand of the lord be stretch out against the town for it destruction and the sign of disease come out on all the men of the town small and great . so they send the ark of god to ekron . and when the ark of god come to ekron the people of the town make an outcry say they have send the ark of the god of israel to u for the destruction of u and of our people . so they send and get together all the lord of the philistine and they say send away the ark of the god of israel and let it go back to it place so that it may not be the cause of death to u and to our people for there be a great fear of death through all the town the hand of god be very hard on them there . and those men who be not overtake by death be cruelly diseased and the cry of the town go up to heaven .now the ark of the lord be in the country of the philistine for seven month . and the philistine send for the priest and those who be wise in secret art and say to them what be we to do with the ark of the lord ? how be we to send it away to it place ? and they say if you send away the ark of the god of israel do not send it without an offering but send him a sin offering with it then you will have peace again and it will be clear to you why the weight of his hand have not be lift from you . then they say what sin offering be we to send to him ? and they say five gold image of the growth cause by your disease and five gold mouse one for every lord of the philistine for the same disease come on you and on your lord . so make image of the growth cause by your disease and of the mouse which be damage your land and give glory to the god of israel it may be that the weight of his hand will be lift from you and from your god and from your land . why do you make your heart hard like the heart of pharaoh and the egyptian ? when he have make sport of them do they not let the people go and they go away ? so now take and make ready a new cart and two cow which have never come under the yoke and have the cow yoke to the cart and take their young one away from them and put the ark of the lord on the cart and the gold image which you be send a a sin offering in a chest by it side and send it away so that it may go . if it go by the land of israel to beth shemesh then this great evil be his work but if not then we may be certain that the evil be not his do but be the working of chance . and the men do so they take beth shemesh . and the people of beth shemesh be cut their grain in the valley and lift up their eye they saw the ark and be full of joy when they saw it . and the cart come into the field of joshua carriage . your daughter he will take to be maker of perfume and cook and bread maker . he will take your field and your vine garden and your olive garden all the best of them and give them to his give themselves to weep . now saul come from the field drive the ox before him and he say why be the people weep ? and they give him word of what the men of jabesh have say . and at their word the spirit of god come on saul with power and he become very angry . and he take two ox and cut them up send them through all the land of israel by the hand of runner say if any man do not come out after saul and samuel this will be do to his ox . and the fear of the lord come on the people and they come out like one man . and he have them number in bezek the child of israel be three hundred thousand and the men of judah thirty thousand . then he say to the representative who have come say to the men of jabesh gilead tomorrow by the time the sun be high you will be make safe . and the after saul put the people into three band and in the morning watch they come to the tent of the ammonite and they go on attack them till the heat of the day and those who be not put to death be put to flight in every direction so that no two of them be together . and the people say to samuel who be it who say be saul to be our king ? give the men up so that we may put them to death . and saul say not a man be to be put to death today for today the lord have make israel safe . then samuel say to the people come let u go to gilgal and there make the kingdom strong in the hand of saul . so all the people go to gilgal and there in gilgal they make saul king before the lord and peace offering be offer before the lord and there saul and all the men of israel be glad with great joy .and samuel say to all israel you see that i have give ear to everything you say to me and have make a king over you . and now see the king be before you and i be old and grey head and my son be with you i have be live before your eye from my early day till now . here i be give witness against me before the lord and before the man on whom he have put the holy oil whose ox or as have i take ? to whom have i be untrue ? who have be crush down by me ? from whose hand have i take a price for the blinding of my eye ? i will give it all back to you . and they say you have never be untrue to u or cruel to u you have take nothing from any man . then he say the lord be witness against you and the man on whom he have put the holy oil be witness this day that you have see no wrong in me . and they say he be witness . and samuel say to the people the lord be witness who give authority to moses and aaron and who take your father up out of the land of egypt . keep your place now while i take up the argument with you before the lord and give you the story of the righteousness of the lord which he have make clear by his act to you and to your father . when jacob and his son have come into egypt and be crush by the egyptian the prayer of your father come up to the lord and the lord send moses and aaron who take your father out of egypt and he put them into this place . but they be false to the lord their god and he give them up into the hand of sisera captain of the army of jabin king of hazor and into the hand of the philistine and into the hand of the king of moab who make war against them . then cry out to the lord they say we have do evil because we have be turn away from the lord worship the baal and the astarte but now make u safe from those who be against u and we will be your servant . so the lord send jerubbaal and barak and jephthah and samuel and take you out of the power of those who be fight against you on every side and make you safe . and when you saw that nahash the king of the ammonite be come against you you say to me no more of this we will have a king for our ruler when the lord your god be your king . here then be the king mark out by you the lord have put a king over you . if in the fear of the lord you be his servant hear his voice and not go against the order of the lord but be true to the lord your god you and the king ruling over you then all will be well but if you do not give ear to the voice of the lord but go against his order then the hand of the lord will be against you and against your king for your destruction a it be against your father . now keep where you be and see this great thing which the lord will do before your eye . be it not now the time of the grain cutting ? my cry will go up to the lord and he will send thunder and rain so that you may see and be conscious of your great sin which you have do in the eye of the lord in desire a king for yourselves . so samuel make prayer to the lord and the lord send thunder and rain that day and all the people be in fear of the lord and of samuel . and all the people say to samuel make prayer for u to the lord your god so that death may not overtake u for in addition to all our sin we have do this evil in desire a king . then samuel say to the people have no fear truly you have do evil but do not be turn away from the lord be his servant with all your heart and do not go from the right way turn to those false god in which there be no profit and no salvation for they be false . for the lord will not give his people up because of the honour of his name for it be the lord 's pleasure to make of you a people for himself . and a for me never will i go against the order of the lord by give up my prayer for you but i will go on teach you the good and right way . only go in the fear of the lord and be his true servant with all your heart keep in mind what great thing he have do for you . but if you still do evil destruction will overtake you and your king .and saul take for himself three thousand men of israel of whom he keep two thousand with him in michmash and in the mountain of beth el and a thousand be with jonathan in gibeah in the land of benjamin the rest of the people he send back to their tent . and jonathan make an attack on the arm force of the philistine station at gibeah and news be give to the philistine that the hebrew be turn against them . and saul have a horn sound through all the land and all israel have the news that saul have make an attack on the philistine and that israel be bitterly hat by the philistine . and the people come together after saul to gilgal . and the philistine come together to make war on israel three thousand war carriage and six thousand horseman and an army of people like the sand of the sea in number they come up and take up their position in michmash to the east of beth aven . when the men of israel saw the danger they be in for the people be troubled they take cover in crack in the hillside and in the wood and in rock and hole and hollow . and a great number of the people have go over jordan to the land of gad and gilead but saul be still in gilgal and all the people go after him shake in fear . and he go on wait there for seven day the time fix by samuel but samuel do not come to gilgal and the people be start to go away from him . then saul say come here and give me the burned offering and the peace offering . and he make a burned offering to the lord . and when the burn offering be end samuel come and saul go out to see him and to give him a blessing . and samuel say what have you do ? and saul say because i saw that the people be go away from me and you have not come at the time which have be fix and the philistine have come together at michmash i say now the philistine will come down on me at gilgal and i have make no prayer for help to the lord and so force myself to do it i make a burned offering . and samuel say to saul you have do a foolish thing you have not keep the rule which the lord your god give you it be the purpose of the lord to make your authority over israel safe for ever . but now your authority will not go on the lord search for a man who be please to him in every way have give him the place of ruler over his people because you have not do what the lord give you order to do . then samuel go up from gilgal and the rest of the people go up after saul against the men of war and they come from gilgal to gibeah in the land of benjamin and saul take the number of the people who be with him about six hundred men . and saul with attack one band go by the road which go to ophrah into the land of shual and another go in the direction of beth horon and another go by the hill look down on the valley of zeboiim in the direction of get their plough and blade and ax and hook make sharp for they have instrument for put an edge on their plough and blade and fork and ax and for put iron point on their ox drive rod . so on the day of make his way to the philistine ' force there be a sharp overhanging rock on one side and a sharp rock on the other side one be name bozez and the other seneh . the one rock go up on the north in front of michmash and the other on the south in front of geba . and jonathan say to his young servant who have his arm come let u go over to the army of these men who have no circumcision it may be that the lord will give u help for there be no limit to his power the lord be able to give salvation by a great army or by a small band . and his servant say to him do whatever be in your mind see i be with you in every impulse of your heart . then jonathan say now we will go over to these men and let them see u . if they say to u keep quiet where you be till we come to you then we will keep our place and not go up to them . but if they say come up to u then we will go up for the lord have give them into our hand and this will be the sign to u . and they let the philistine force see the two of them and all the people be with saul about twenty thousand men and the fight be general through all the hill country of ephraim but saul make a great error that day by put the people under an oath say let that man be curse who take food before even come and i have give punishment to those who be against me . so the people have not a taste of food . and there be honey on the face of the field and all the people come to the honey the bee have go from it but not a man put his hand to his mouth for fear of the curse . but jonathan have no knowledge of the oath his father have put on the people stretch out the rod which be in his hand put the end of it in the honey and put it to his mouth then his eye be make bright . then one of the people say to him your father put the people under an oath . and all the men of israel when they saw him go in flight overcome with fear . and the men of israel say have you see this man ? clearly he have come out to put shame on israel and it be certain that your servant have overcome lion and bear and the fate of this philistine who be without circumcision will be like theirs seeing that he have put shame on the army of the living god . and david say the his brow and he go down to the earth fall on his face . so david overcame the philistine with his leather band and a stone wound the philistine and cause his death but david have no sword in his hand . so run up to the philistine and put his foot on him david take his sword out of it cover and put him to death cut off his head with it . and when the philistine saw that their fighter be dead they jerusalem but the metal war dress and the arm he put in his tent . and when saul saw david go out against the philistine he say to abner the captain of the army abner whose son be this young man ? and abner say on your life o king i have no idea . and the king say make search and see whose son this young man be . and when david be come back after the destruction of the philistine abner take him to saul with the head of the philistine in his hand . and saul say to him young man whose son be you ? and david in answer say i be the son of your servant jesse of beth lehem .now after david 's talk with saul be end the soul of jonathan be join with the soul of david and david become a dear to him a his very life . and that day saul take david and would not let him go back to his father 's house . then jonathan and david make an agreement together because of jonathan 's love for david . and jonathan take off the robe he have on and give it to david with all his military dress even to his 's servant . now on their way when david come back after the destruction of the philistine the woman come out of all the town of israel with song and dance meeting david with melody and joy and instrument of music . and the woman answer one another in their song say saul have put to death his thousand and david his ten of thousand . and saul be very angry and this saying be unpleasing to him and he say they have give david credit for ten of thousand and to me for only thousand what more be there for him but the kingdom ? and from that day saul be look with envy on david . now on the day after an evil spirit from god come on saul with great force and he be act like a prophet among the men of his house while david be make music for him a he do day by day and saul have his spear in his hand . and saul balance the spear in his hand say i will give david a blow pin him to the wall . and david get away from him twice . and saul go in fear of david because the lord be with david and have go away from saul . so saul send him away and make him a captain over a thousand and he go about his business before the people . and in all his undertaking david do wisely and the lord be with him . and when saul saw how wisely he do he be in fear of him . but david be love by all israel and judah for he go out and come in before them . and saul say to david here be my old daughter merab whom i will give you for your wife only be strong for me fight in the lord 's war . for saul say let it not be through me that his fate come to him but through the philistine . and david say to saul 's daughter michal be in love with david and saul have word of it and be please . and saul say i will give her to him so that she may be a cause of danger to him and so that the hand of the philistine may be against him . so saul say to david today you be to become my son in law for the second time . and saul give his servant order say have talk with david secretly and say to him see how the king at naioth in ramah . and saul sent men to take david and when they saw the band of prophet at work with samuel in his place at their head the spirit of god come on saul 's men and they become like all that day and all that night . this be the reason for the saying be even saul among the prophet ?and david go in flight from naioth in ramah and come to jonathan and say what have i do ? what be my away say david make a request to me for himself that he might go to beth lehem to his town for it be the time when his family make their offering year by year . if he say it be well your servant will be at peace but if he be angry then it will be clear to you that he have an evil purpose in mind against me . so then be kind to your servant for you have be unite with your servant in an agreement evil doer come evil but my hand will never be lift up against you . after whom have the king of israel come out ? for whom be you search ? for a dead dog an insect . so let the lord be judge and give a decision between me and you and see and give support to my cause and keep me from fall into your hand . now when david have say these word to saul saul say be this your voice david my son ? and saul when the lord give me up into your hand you do not put me to death . if a man come across his hater will he let him get away safe ? so may you be reward by the lord for what you have do for me today . and now i be certain that you will be king and that the kingdom of israel will be make strong under your authority . so give me your oath by the lord that you will not put an end to my seed after me israel come together weep for him and put his body in it rest place in his house at ramah . then david go down to the waste land of maon . now there be a man in maon whose business be in carmel he be a great man and have three thousand sheep and a thousand goat and he be cut the wool of his sheep in carmel . now this man be name nabal and his wife 's name be abigail she be a woman of good sense and pleasing look but the man be cruel and evil in his way he be of the family of caleb . and david have word in the waste land that nabal be cut the wool of his sheep . and david sent ten young men and say to them go up to carmel and go to nabal and say kind word to him in my name and say this to my brother may all be well for you peace be to you and your house and all you have . i have have word that you have wool cutter now the keeper of your sheep have be with u and we have do them no evil and take nothing of theirs while they be in carmel . if your young men be question they will say men come they say all this to nabal in david 's name and say nothing more . and nabal give them his answer and say who be david ? who be the son of jesse ? there be a number of servant in these day run away from their master . be i to take my bread and my wine and the meat i have get ready for my wool cutter and give it to men come from i have no idea where ? so david 's young men turn away go rough answer . but these men have be very good to u they do u no wrong and nothing of ours be touch while we be with them in the field but day and night they be like a wall round u while we be with them look after the sheep . so now give thought to what you be go to do for evil be in store for our master and all his house for he be such a good for nothing person that it be not possible to say anything to him . then abigail quickly take two hundred cake of bread and two skin full of wine and five sheep ready for cook and five measure of dry grain and a hundred parcel of dry grape and two hundred cake of fig and put them on ass . and she say to her young men go on in front of me and i will come after you . but she say nothing to her husband nabal . now while she be go down under cover of the mountain on her as david and his men come down against her and suddenly she come face to face with them . now david have say what be the use of my take care of this man 's good in the waste land so that there be no loss of anything which be his ? he have only give me back evil for good . may god 's punishment be on david if when morning come there be so much a one male of his people still live . and when abigail saw david she quickly get off her as fall down on her face before him . and fall at his foot she say may the wrong be on me my lord on me let your servant say a word to you and give ear to the word of your servant . let my lord give no attention to nabal that good for nothing for a his name be so be he a man without sense but i your servant do not see the young men whom my lord sent . so now my lord by the living god and by your living soul see that the lord have keep you from the crime of blood and from take into your hand the punishment for your wrong may all your hater and those who would do evil to my lord be like nabal . and let this offering which your servant give to my lord be give to the young men who be with my lord . and may the sin of your servant have forgiveness for the lord will certainly make your family strong because my lord be fight in the lord 's war and no evil will be see in you all your day . and though a man have take up arm against you put your life in danger still the soul of my lord will be keep safe among the band of the living with the lord your god and the soul of those who be against you he will send violently away from him like stone from a bag . and when the lord have do for my lord all those good thing which he have say he will do for you and have make you a ruler over israel then you will have no cause for grief and my lord 's heart will not be trouble because you have take life without cause and have yourself give punishment for your wrong and when the lord have be good to you then give a thought to your servant . and david say to abigail may the lord the god of israel be praise who send you to me today a blessing on your good sense and on you who have keep me today from the crime of blood and from take into my hand the punishment for my wrong . for truly by the living lord the god of israel who have keep me from do you evil if you have not be so quick in come to me and meet me by dawn there would not have be in nabal 's house so much a one male living . then david take from her hand her offering and he say to her go back to your house in peace see i have give ear to your voice and come . and in the morning when the effect of the wine be go nabal 's wife give him an account of all these thing and all the heart go out of him and he become like stone . and about ten day after the keep back his servant from evil and have send on nabal 's head the reward of his evil do . and david sent word to abigail desire to take her a his wife . and when david 's servant come to carmel to to be his wife these two be his wife . now saul have give his daughter michal david 's wife to palti the son of laish of gallim .and the ziphites come to saul at gibeah and say be not david wait brother of joab who will go down with me to the tent of saul ? and abishai say i will go down with you . so david and abishai come down to the army by night and saul be sleep inside the ring of cart with his spear plant in the earth by his head and abner and the people be sleep round him . then abishai say to david god have give up your hater into your hand today now let me give him one blow through to the earth with his spear and there will be no need to give him a second . and david say to abishai do not put him to death for who without sin may put out his hand against the man on whom will my hand be stretch out against the man mark with the holy oil but take the spear which be by his head and the vessel of water and let u go . so david take the spear and the vessel of water from saul 's head and they get away without any man see them or be conscious of their coming or awake for they be all sleeping because a deep sleep from the lord have come on them . then david go over to now to the word of his servant . if it be the lord who be move you against me let him take an offering but if it be the child of men may they be curse before the lord for drive me out today and keep to the lord and may he make me free from all my trouble . then saul say to david may a blessing be on you david my son you will do great thing and without doubt you will overcome . then david go on his way and saul go back to his place .and david say to himself some day death will come to me by the hand of saul the only thing for me to do be to get away into the land of the philistine then saul will give up hope of take me in any part of the land of israel and so i may be able to get away from him . so david and the six hundred men who be with him go over to achish the son of maoch king of place for it be not right for your servant to be live with you in the king 's town . so achish straight away give him ziklag and for that reason ziklag have be the property of the king of judah to this day . and david be live in the land of the philistine for the space of a year and four month . and david and his men go up and make attack on the geshurites and the girzites and the amalekites for these be the people who be live in the land from telam on the way to shur as far a egypt . and david again and again make attack on the land till not a man or a woman be still live and he take be what david do and so have he be do all the time while he have be live in the land of the philistine . and achish have belief in what david say say he have make himself hat by all his people israel and so he will be my servant for ever .now in those day the philistine get their force together to make war on israel . and achish say to david certainly you and your men be to go out with me to the fight . and david say to achish you will see now what your servant will do . and achish say to david then i will make you keeper of my head for ever . now samuel be dead and all israel after weep for together and put their force in position in shunem and saul get all israel together and they take up their position in gilboa . and when saul saw the philistine army he be trouble and his heart be spirit so that i may go to her and get direction . and his servant say to him there be such a woman at en dor . so saul put on other clothing so that he might not be see to be the king take two men with him and go to the woman by night and he say now with the help of the spirit which you have make the person whose name i will give you come up . and the woman say to him but you have knowledge of what saul have do how he have put away out of the land those who have control of spirit and the user of secret art why would you by a trick put me in danger of death ? and saul make an oath to her by the lord say by the living lord no punishment will come to you for this . then the woman say who be i to let you see ? and he say make samuel come up for me . and the woman saw that it be saul and she
