while there be war between saul 's people and david 's people abner be make himself strong among the supporter of saul . now saul have among his wife a woman name rizpah the daughter of aiah and ish bosheth say to abner why have you take my father 's wife ? and abner be very angry at the word of ish bosheth and he say be i a dog 's head of judah ? i be this day do all in my power for the cause of your father saul and for his brother and his friend and have not give you up into the hand of david and now you say i have do wrong with a woman . may god 's punishment be on abner if i do not for david a the lord in his oath have say and if i do not take away the kingdom from the family of saul and make david ruler over israel and judah from dan as far a beer sheba ! and so great be ish bosheth 's fear of abner that he be not able to say a word in answer . and abner send men to david at hebron say make an agreement with me and i will give you my support in get all israel on your side . and he say it be well i will make an agreement with you but on one condition which be that when you come before me saul 's daughter michal be to come with you till she come you will not see my face . and david sent men to saul 's son ish bosheth say give me back michal my wife whom i make mine for the price of the private part of a hundred philistine . so ish bosheth sent and take her from her husband paltiel the son of laish . and her husband go with her as far a bahurim weep while he go . then abner say to him go back . and he go back . then abner have a talk with the chief men of israel say in the past it be your desire to make david your king so now do it for the lord have say of david by the hand of my servant david i will make my people israel safe from the philistine and from all who be against them . and abner say the same thing to benjamin and he go to david in hebron to make clear to him what seem good to israel and to all the people of benjamin . so abner with twenty men come to hebron to david . and david make a feast for abner and the men who be with him . and abner say to david now i will go and make all israel come to my lord the king so that they may make an agreement with you and your kingdom may be as wide a your heart 's desire . then david send abner away and he go in peace . now the servant of david and joab have be out attack a band of arm men and they come back with a great store of good take in the fight but abner be no longer in hebron with david for he have send him away and he have go in peace . when joab and his men come news be give them that abner the son of ner have come to the king who have let him go away again in peace . then joab come to the king and say what have you do ? when abner come to you why do you send him away and let him go ? be it not clear to you that abner the son of ner come with deceit to get knowledge of your go out and your come in and of all you be do ? and when joab have come out from david he send men after abner and they overtake him at the water spring of sirah and make him come back with them but david have no knowledge of it . and when abner be back in hebron joab take him on one side by the doorway of the town to have a word with him quietly and there he give him a wound in the stomach cause his death in payment for the death of his brother asahel . and when david have word of it he say may i and my kingdom be clear for ever in the eye of the lord from the blood of abner the son of ner may it come on the head of joab and all his father 's family among the men of joab 's family may there ever be some who be diseased or leper or who do the work of woman or be put to the sword or be waste from need of food ! so joab and abishai his brother put abner to death because he have put to death their brother asahel in the fight at gibeon . and david say to joab and all the people who be with him go in grief and put haircloth about you in sorrow for abner . and king david go after the dead body . and they put abner 's body to rest in hebron and the king and all the people be weep loudly by the rest place of abner 's body . and the king make a song of grief for abner and say be the death of abner to be like the death of a foolish man ? your hand be free your foot be not chain like the downfall of a man before evil men so be your fall . and the weeping of the people over him go on again . and the people come to make david take food while it be still day but david with an oath say may god 's punishment be on me if i take a taste of bread or any other thing till the sun have go down ! and all the people take note of it and be please like everything the king do it be please to the people . so it be clear to israel and to all the people on that day that the king be not responsible for the death of abner the son of ner . and the king say to his servant do you not see that a chief and a great man have come to his end today in israel ? while i though i be crown king have little strength and these men the son of zeruiah be out of my control may the lord give to the evil doer the reward of his evil do !and when saul 's son ish bosheth have news that abner be dead benjamin for beeroth be at one time take to be part of benjamin but the people of beeroth have go in flight to gittaim where they have be live to this day . now jonathan saul 's son have a son whose give him for his news how much more when evil men have put an upright person to death in his house sleep on his bed will i take payment from you for his blood and have you cut off from the earth ? and it last resting place with abner 's body in hebron .then all the tribe of israel come to david in hebron and say truly we be your bone and your flesh . in the past when saul be king over u it be you take the strong place of zion which be the town of david . and that day david say whoever make an attack on the jebusites let him go up by the water pipe and put to death all the blind and feeble foot ready for the man who have come . and david be full of wrath against that man and he say to nathan by the living lord death be the right punishment for the man who have do this and he will have to give back four time the value of the lamb because he have do this and because he have no pity . and nathan say to david you be that man . the lord god of israel say i make you king over israel put be enough i would have give you such and such thing . why then have you have no respect for the word of the lord do what be evil in his eye ? you have put uriah the hittite to death with the sword and child who have newly come to birth . then nathan go back to his house . and the hand of the lord be on david 's son the child of uriah 's wife and it become very ill. so david make prayer to god for the child and he take no food day after day and go in and stretch himself out on the earth be there all night . and the chief men of his house get up and go to his side to make him get up from the earth but he would not and he would not take food with them . and then on the seventh day the child 's death take place . and david 's servant be in fear of give him the news of the child 's death for they say truly while the child be still live he give no attention when we say anything to him what will he do to himself if we give him word that the child be dead ? but when david saw that his servant be talk together quietly he be certain that the child be dead and he say to his servant be the child dead ? and they say he be . then david get up from the earth and after wash and rub himself with oil and change his clothing he go into the house of the lord and give worship then he go back to his house and at his order they put food before him and he have a meal . then his servant say to him why have you be act in this way ? you be weep and go without food while the child be still live but when the child be dead you get up and have a meal . and he say while the child be still live i go without food and give myself up to weep for i say who be able to say that the lord will not have mercy on me and give the child life ? but now that the child be dead there be no reason for me to go without food be i able to make him come back to life ? i will go to him but he will never come back to me . and david give comfort to his wife bath sheba and he go in to her and have connection with her and she have a son to whom she give the name solomon . and he be dear to the lord . and he send word by nathan the prophet who give him the name jedidiah by the word of the lord . now joab be fight against rabbah in the land of the child of ammon and he take the water town . and joab send men to david say i have make war against rabbah and have take the water town . so now get the rest of the people together and put them in position against the town and take it for if i take it it will be name after my name . then david get all the people together and go to rabbah and make war on it and take it . and he take the crown of milcom from his head the weight of it be a talent of gold and in it be stone of great price and it be put on david 's head . and he take a great store of good from the town . and he take the people out of the town and put them to work with wood cut instrument and iron grain crusher and iron ax and at brick making this he do to all the town of the child of ammon . then david and all the people go back to jerusalem .now after this it come about that absalom david 's son have a beautiful sister whose name be tamar and david 's son amnon be in love with the son of shimeah david 's brother and jonadab be a very wise man . and he say to him o son of the king why be you get thin day by day ? will you not say what your trouble be ? and amnon say to him i be in love with tamar my brother absalom 's sister . then jonadab say to him go to your bed and let it seem that you be ill and when your father come to see you say to him let my sister tamar come and please let my sister tamar come and make me one or two cake before my eye so that i may take food from her hand . then david sent to the house for tamar and say go now to your brother amnon 's house and get a meal for him . so tamar go to her brother amnon 's house and he be in bed . and she take paste and make cake before his eye cook them over the fire . and she take the cooking pot and put the cake before him but he would not take them . and amnon say let everyone go away from me . so they all go out . then amnon say to tamar take the food and come into my bedroom so that i may take it from your hand . so tamar take the cake she have make and go with them into her brother amnon 's bedroom . and when she take them to give them to him he put his arm round her and say come to bed my sister . and answer him she say o my brother do not put shame on me it be not right for such a thing to be do in israel do not this evil thing . what will become of me in my shame ? and a for you you will be look down on with disgust by all israel . now then go and make your request to the king for he will not keep me from you . but he would not give attention to what she say but be strong than she he so my brother for this great wrong in send me away be bad than what you do to me before . but he give no attention to her . then he give a cry to the servant who be wait on him and say put this woman do not make trouble for amnon his son for he be dear to david be his old son . but absalom say nothing to his brother amnon good or bad for he be full of hate for him because he have take his sister tamar by force . now after two full year absalom have men cut the wool of his sheep in baal hazor which be near ephraim and he send for all the king 's son to come to his feast . and absalom come to the king and say see now your servant be cut the wool of his sheep will the king and his servant be please to come ? and the king say to absalom no my son let u not all go or the number will be over great for you . and he make his request again but he would not go but he give him his blessing . then absalom say if you will not go then let my brother amnon go with u . and the king say to him be and the woman of tekoa come to the king and fall on her face give him honour and say give me help o king . and the king say to her what be your trouble ? and her answer be truly i be a widow and my husband be dead . and i have two son and the two of them have a fight in the field and there be no one to come between them and one with a blow put the other to death . and now all the family be turn if anyone say anything to you make him come to me and he will do you no more damage . then she say let the king keep in mind the lord your god so that he who give punishment for blood may be keep back say may the lord your god be please with your offering ! and the king say to araunah no but i will give you a price for it i will not give to the lord my god burn offering for which i have give for the land and the disease come to an end in israel .now king david be old and far on in year and though they put cover over him his body be cold . so his servant say to him let search be make for a young virgin for my lord the king to take care of him and be wait on him and you may take her in your arm and so my lord the king will be warm . so after search through all the land of israel for a fair young girl they saw abishag the shunammite and take her to the king . now she be very beautiful and she take care of the king wait on him at all time but the king have no connection with her . then adonijah the son of haggith lift himself up in pride say i will become king and he make ready his carriage of war and his horseman with fifty runner to go before him . now all his life his father have never go against him or say to him why have you do so ? and he be a very good look man and young than absalom . and he have talk with joab the son of zeruiah and with abiathar the priest and they be on his side and give him their support . but zadok the priest and benaiah the son of jehoiada and nathan the prophet and shimei and rei and david 's men of war do not take the side of adonijah . then adonijah put to death sheep and ox and fat beast by the stone of zoheleth by en rogel and he send for all his brother the king 's son and all the men of judah the king 's servant to come to him but he do not send for nathan the prophet and benaiah and the other men of war and solomon his brother . then nathan say to bath sheba the mother of solomon have it not come to your ear that adonijah the son of haggith have make himself king without the knowledge of david our lord ? so now let me make a suggestion so that you may keep your life safe and the life of your son solomon . come now go to king david and say to him do you not o my lord take an oath to me your servant say truly solomon your son will be king after me seat on the seat of my kingdom ? why then be adonijah act a king ? and while you be still talk there with the king see i will come in after you and say that your story be true . then bath sheba go into the king 's room now the king be very old and abishag the shunammite be wait on him . and bath sheba go down on her face on the earth before the king give him honour . and he say what be your desire ? and she say to him my lord you take an oath by the lord your god and give your word to your servant say truly solomon your son will be king after me seat on the seat of my kingdom . and now see adonijah have make himself king without my lord 's knowledge and have put to death ox and fat beast and sheep in great number and have send for all the son of the king and abiathar the priest and joab the captain of the army but he have not send for solomon your servant . and now my lord the king the eye of all israel be on you wait for you to say who be to take the place of my lord the king after him . for a thing be it will come about when my lord the king be sleep with his father that i and solomon my son will be make outlaws . and while she be still talk with the king nathan the prophet come in . and they say to the king here be nathan the prophet . and when he come in before the king he go down on his face on the earth . and nathan say o my lord king have you say adonijah be to be king after me seat on the seat of my kingdom ? because today he have go down and have put to death ox and fat beast and sheep in great number and have send for all the king 's son to come to him with the captain of the army and abiathar the priest and they be feast before him and cry long life to king adonijah ! but me your servant and zadok the priest and benaiah the son of jehoiada and your servant solomon he have not send for . have this thing be do by my lord the king without give word to your servant who be to be place on my lord the king 's seat after him ? then king david in answer say send for bath sheba to come to me . and she come in and take her place before the king . and the king take an oath and say by the living lord who have be my saviour from all my trouble a i take an oath to you by the lord the god of israel say certainly solomon your son will become king after me seat on my seat in my place so will i do this day . then bath sheba go down on her face on the earth before the king give him honour and say may my lord king david go on living for ever . and king david say send for zadok the priest and nathan the prophet and benaiah the son of jehoiada . and they come before the king . and the king say to them take with you the servant of your lord and put solomon my son on my beast yes mine and take him down to gihon and there let zadok the priest and nathan the prophet put the holy oil on him to make him king over israel and sound the horn say long life to king solomon ! then come up after him and he will come in and take his place on the seat of my kingdom for he be to be king in my place and i have give order that he be to be ruler over israel and over judah . and benaiah the son of jehoiada answer the king say so be it and may the lord the god of my lord the king say so . a the lord have be with my lord the king even so may he be with solomon and make the seat of his authority great than that of my lord king david . so zadok the priest and nathan the prophet and benaiah the son of jehoiada and the cherethites and the pelethites go down and put solomon on king david 's beast and take him to gihon . and zadok the priest take the vessel of oil out of the tent and put the holy oil on solomon . and when the horn be sound all the people say long life to king solomon ! and all the people come up after him pip with pipe and they be glad with great joy so that the earth be shake with the sound . and it come to the ear of adonijah and all the guest who be with him when their meal be end . and joab hear the sound of the horn say what be the reason of this noise a if the town be work up ? and while the word be on his lip jonathan the son of abiathar the priest come and adonijah say come in for you be a man of good faith and the news which you have for u will be good . and jonathan answering say to adonijah not so but our lord king david have make solomon king and he send with him zadok the priest and nathan the prophet and benaiah the son of jehoiada and the cherethites and the pelethites and they put him on the king 's beast and zadok the priest and nathan the prophet put the holy oil on him and make him king in gihon and they come back from there with joy and the town be all work up . this be the noise which have come to your ear . and now solomon be seat on the seat of the kingdom . and the king 's servant come to our lord king david bless him and say may god make the name of solomon well than your name and the seat of his authority great than your seat and the king be bent low in worship on his bed . then the king say may the god of israel be praise who have give one of my seed to be king in my place this day and have let my eye see it . and all the guest of adonijah get up in fear and go away every man to his place . and adonijah himself be full of fear because of solomon and he get up and go to the altar and put his hand on it horn . and they give solomon word of it say see adonijah go in such fear of king solomon that he have put his hand on the horn of the altar say let king solomon first give me his oath that he will not put his servant to death with the sword . and solomon say if he be see to be a man of good faith not a hair of him will be touch but if any wrongdoing be see in him he be to be put to death . so king solomon send and they take him down from the altar . and he come and give honour to king solomon and solomon say to him go to your house .now the time of david 's death come near and he give order to solomon his son say i be go the way of all the earth so be strong and be a man and keep the order of the lord your god walking in his way keep his law and his order and his rule and his word a they be record in the law of moses so that you may do well in all you do and wherever you go so that the lord may give effect to what he say of me if your child give attention to their way live uprightly before me with all their heart and their soul you will never be without a man to be king in israel . now you have knowledge of what joab the son of zeruiah do to me and to the two captain of the army of israel abner the son of ner and amasa the son of jether whom he put to death take payment for the blood of war in time of peace and make the band of my clothing and the shoe on my foot red with the blood of one put to death without cause . so be guide by your wisdom and let not his white head go down to the underworld in peace . but be good to the son of barzillai the gileadite and let them be guest at your table for so they come to me when i go in flight from absalom your brother . now you have with you shimei the son of gera the benjamite of bahurim who put a bitter curse on me on the day when i go to mahanaim but he come down to see me at jordan and i give him my oath by the lord say i will not put you to death by the sword . but do not let him be free from punishment for you be a wise man and it will be clear to you what you have to do with him see that his white head go down to the underworld in blood . then david go to rest with his father and his body be put into the earth in the town of david . david be king over israel for forty year for seven year he be king in hebron and for thirty three year in jerusalem . and solomon take his place on the seat of david his father and his kingdom be make safe and strong . then adonijah the son of haggith come to bath sheba the mother of solomon . and she say come you in peace ? and he say yes in peace . then he say i have something to say to you . and she say say on . and he say you saw how the kingdom be mine and all israel have the idea that i would be their king but now the kingdom be turn about and have become my brother 's for it be give to him by the lord . now i have one request to make to you and do not say no to me . and she say to him say on . then he say will you go to solomon the king for he will not say no to you and put before him my request that he will give me abishag the shunammite for a wife ? and bath sheba say good ! i will make your request to the king . so bath sheba go to king solomon to have talk with him on adonijah 's account . and the king get up to come to her and go down low to the earth before her then he take his place on the king 's seat and have a seat make ready for the king 's mother and she take her place at his right hand . then she say i have one small request to make to you do not say no to me . and the king say say on my mother for i will not say no to you . and she say let abishag the shunammite be give to adonijah your brother for a wife . then king solomon make answer and say to his mother why be you request me to give abishag the shunammite to adonijah ? take the kingdom for him in addition for he be my old brother and abiathar the priest and joab the son of zeruiah be on his side . then king solomon take an oath by the lord say may god 's punishment be on me if adonijah do not give payment for these word with his life . now by the living lord who have give me my place on the seat of david my father and make me one of a line of king a he give me his word truly adonijah will be put to death this day . and king solomon sent benaiah the son of jehoiada and he make an attack on him and put him to death . and to abiathar the priest the king say go to anathoth to your field for death would be your right reward but i will not put you to death now because you take up the ark of the lord god before david my father and you be with him in all his trouble . so solomon let abiathar be priest no longer so that he might make the word of the lord come true which he say about the son of eli in shiloh . and news of this come to joab for joab have be one of adonijah 's supporter though he have not be on absalom 's side . then joab go in flight to the tent of the lord and put his hand on the horn of the altar . and they say to king solomon joab have go in flight to the tent of the lord and be by the altar . then solomon send benaiah the son of jehoiada say go make an attack on him . and benaiah come to the tent of the lord and say to him the king say come out . and he say no but let death come to me here . and benaiah go back to the king and give him word of the answer which joab have give . and the king say do a he have say and make an attack on him there and put his body into the earth so that you may take away from me and from my family the blood of one put to death by joab without cause . and the lord will send back his blood on his head because of the attack he make on two men more upright and good than himself put them to the sword without my father 's knowledge even abner the son of ner captain of the army of israel and amasa the son of jether captain of the army of judah . so their blood will be on the head of joab and on the head of his seed for ever but for david and his seed and his family and the seat of his kingdom there will be peace for ever from the lord . so benaiah the son of jehoiada go up and fall on him put him to death and his body be put to rest in his house in the waste land . and the king put benaiah the son of jehoiada in his place over the army and zadok the priest he put in the place of abiathar . then the king sent for shimei and say to him make a house for yourself in jerusalem and keep there and go to no other place . for be certain that on the day when you go out and go over the stream kidron death will overtake you and your blood will be on your head . and shimei say to the king very well ! a my lord the king have say so will your servant do . and for a long time shimei go on living in jerusalem . but after three year two of the servant of shimei go in flight to achish son of maacah king of gath . and word be give to shimei that his servant have go to gath . then shimei get up and make ready his as he go to gath to achish in search of his servant and he send and get them from gath . and news be give to solomon that shimei have go from jerusalem to gath and have come back again . then the king sent for shimei and say to him do i not make you take an oath by the lord protest to you and say be certain that on the day when you go out from here wherever you go death will overtake you ? and you say to me very well ! why then have you not keep the oath of the lord and the order which i give you ? and the king say to shimei you have knowledge of all the evil which you do to david my father and now the lord have send back your evil on yourself . but a blessing will be on king solomon and the kingdom of david will keep it place before the lord for ever . so the king give order to benaiah the son of jehoiada and he go out and fall on him put him to death . and solomon 's authority over the kingdom be complete .solomon become the son in law of pharaoh king of egypt and take pharaoh 's daughter a his wife keep her in the town of david till the house he be build for himself and the house of the lord and the wall round jerusalem be complete . but all this time the people be make their offering in the high place because no house have be put up to the name of the lord till those day . and solomon in his love for the lord keep the law of david his father but he make offering and let them go up in smoke on the high place . and the king go to gibeon to make an offering there because that be the chief high place it be solomon 's way to make a thousand burn offering on that altar . in gibeon solomon have a vision of the lord in a dream by night and god say to him say what i be to give you . and solomon say great be your mercy to david my father a his life before you be true and upright and his heart be true to you and you have keep for him this great mercy a son to take his place this day . and now o lord my god you have make your servant king in the place of david my father and i be only a young boy with no knowledge of how to go out or come in . and your servant have round him the people of your selection a people so great that they may not be number and no account of them may be give . give your servant then a wise heart for judge your people able to see what be good and what evil for who be able to be the judge of this great people ? now these word and solomon 's request be please to the lord . and god say to him because your request be for this thing and not for long life for yourself or for wealth or for the destruction of your hater but for wisdom to be a judge of cause i have do a you say i have give you a wise and far see heart so that there have never be your equal in the past and never will there be any like you in the future . and with this i have give you what you make no request for wealth and honour so that no king be ever your equal . and if you go on in my way keep my law and my order a your father david do i will give you a long life . and solomon awakening saw that it be a dream then he come to jerusalem where he go before the ark of the agreement of the lord offering burn offering and peace offering and he make a feast for all his servant . then two loose woman of the town come and take their place before the king and one of them say o my lord i and this woman be live in the same house and i give birth to a child by her side in the house . and three day after the birth of my child this woman have a child we be together no other person be with u in the house but we two only . in the night this woman sleep on her child be the cause of it death . and she get up in the middle of the night and take my son from my side while your servant be sleep and she take it in her arm and put her dead child in my arm . and when i get up to give my child the breast i saw that it be dead but in the morning look at it with care i saw that it be not my son . and the other woman say no but the living child be my son and the dead one yours . but the first say no the dead child be your son and the live one mine . so they keep on talk before the king . then the king say one say the living child be my son and yours be the dead and the other say not so but your son be the dead one and mine be the living . then he say get me a sword . so they go and put a sword before the king . and the king say let the living child be cut in two and one half give to one woman and one to the other . then the mother of the living child come forward for her heart go out to her son and she say o my lord give her the child do not on any account put it to death . but the other woman say it will not be mine or yours let it be cut in two . then the king make answer and say give her the child and do not put it to death she be the mother of it . and news of this decision which the king have make go through all israel and they have fear of the king for they saw that the wisdom of god be in him to give decision .now solomon be king over all israel . and these be his chief men azariah the son of zadok be the priest elihoreph and ahijah the son of shisha be scribe jehoshaphat the son of ahilud be the recorder benaiah the son of jehoiada be head as far a the edge of egypt men give him offering and be his servant all the day of his life . and the amount of solomon 's food for one day be thirty measure of crushed grain and sixty measure of meal ten fat ox and twenty ox from the field and a hundred sheep in addition to hart and gazelle and roe and fat fowl . for he have authority over all the country on this side of the river from tiphsah to gaza over all the king on this side of the river and he have peace round him on every side . so judah and israel be live safely every man under his vine and his fig tree from dan as far a beer sheba all the day of solomon . and solomon have four thousand box off space for horse for his carriage and twelve thousand horseman . and those overseer every man in his month saw that food be produce for solomon and all his guest they take care that nothing be overlook . and they take grain and dry grass for the horse and the carriage horse to the right place every man a he be order . and god give solomon a great store of wisdom and good sense and a mind of wide range as wide a the sand by the seaside . and solomon 's wisdom be great than the wisdom of all the people of the east and all the wisdom of egypt . for he be wise than all men even than ethan the ezrahite and heman and calcol and darda the son of mahol and he have a great name among all the nation round about . he be the maker of three thousand wise saying and of song to the number of a thousand and five . he make saying about all plant from the cedar in lebanon to the hyssop hang on the wall and about all beast and bird and fish and the small thing of the earth . people come from every nation to give ear to the wisdom of solomon from all the king of the earth who have word of his wisdom .now hiram king of tyre hearing that solomon have be make king in place of his father send his servant to him for hiram have ever be a friend to david . and solomon send back word to hiram say you have knowledge that david my father be not able to make a house for the name of the lord his god because of the war which be round him on every side till the lord put all those who be against him under his foot . but now the lord my god have give me rest on every side no one be make trouble and no evil be take place . and so it be my purpose to make a house for the name of the lord my god a he say to david my father your son whom i will make king in your place will be the builder of a house for my name . so now will you have cedar tree from lebanon cut down for me and my servant will be with your servant and i will give you payment for your servant at whatever rate you say for it be common knowledge that we have no such wood cutter among u a the men of zidon . and these word of solomon make hiram glad and he say now may the lord be praise who have give to david a wise son to be king over this great people . then hiram sent to solomon say the word you send have be give to me i will do all your desire in the question of cedar wood and cypress wood . my men will take them down from lebanon to the sea where i will have them cord together to go by sea to whatever place you say and i will have them cut up there so that you may take them away a for payment it will be enough if you give me food for my people . so hiram give solomon all the cedar wood and cypress wood he have need of and solomon give hiram twenty thousand measure of grain a food for his people and twenty measure of clear oil this he do every year . now the lord have give solomon wisdom a he have say to him and there be peace between hiram and solomon and they make an agreement together . then king solomon get together men for the forced work through all israel thirty thousand men in number and send them to lebanon in band of ten thousand every month for a month they be work in lebanon and for two month in their country and adoniram be in control of them . then he have seventy thousand for the work of transport and eighty thousand stone cutter in the mountain in addition to the chief of the responsible men put by solomon to oversee the work three thousand and three hundred in authority over the workman . by the king 's order great stones stone of high price be cut out so that the base of the house might be make of squared stone . solomon 's builder and hiram 's builder do the work of cut them and put edge on them and get the wood and the stone ready for the building of the house .in the four hundred and eightieth year after the child of israel come out of the land of egypt in the fourth year that solomon be king of israel in the month ziv which be the second month the building of the lord 's house be start . the house which solomon make for the lord be sixty cubit long twenty cubit wide and thirty cubit high . the covered way before the temple of the house be twenty cubit long as wide a the house and ten cubit wide in front of the house . and for the house he make window with network across . and against the wall all round and against the wall of the temple and of the inmost room he put up wing with side room all round the low line of them be five cubit wide the middle six cubit wide and the third seven cubit for there be a space all round the outside wall of the house so that the board support the room do not have to be fix in the wall of the house . and the stone use in the building of the house be square at the place where they be cut out there be no sound of hammer or axe or any iron instrument while they be build the house . the door to the low side room be in the right side of the house and they go up by twist step into the middle room and from the middle into the third . so he put up the house and make it complete roof it with board of cedar wood . and he put up the line of side room against the wall of the house fifteen cubit high rest against the house on board of cedar wood . and the word of the lord come to solomon say about this house which you be build if you will keep my law and give effect to my decision and be guide by my rule i will give effect to my word which i give to david your father . and i will be ever among the child of israel and will not go away from my people . so solomon make the building of the house complete . the wall of the house be cover inside with cedar wood board from the floor to the roof of the house they be cover inside with wood and the floor be cover with board of cypress wood . and at the back of the house a further space of twenty cubit be shut in with board of cedar wood for the inmost room . and the house that be the temple in front of the holy place be forty cubit long . all the inside of the house be cedar wood ornament with design of bud and flower no stonework be to be see inside . and he make ready an inmost room in the middle of the house in which to put the ark of the agreement of the lord . and the inmost room be twenty cubit square and twenty cubit high plat over with clear gold and he make an altar of cedar wood plat it with gold . solomon have all the inside of the house cover with gold and he put chain of gold across in front of the inmost room which itself be cover with gold . plate of gold be put all through the house till it be cover completely and the altar in the inmost room be all cover with gold . in the inmost room he make two winged being of olive wood ten cubit high with outstretched wing five cubit wide the distance from the edge of one wing to the edge of the other be ten cubit . the two wing one be ten cubit high of the same size and form . the two of them be ten cubit high . these be place inside the inner house their outstretched wing touch the wall of the house one touch one wall and one the other while their other wing be touch in the middle . these winged one be plat over with gold . and all the wall of the house inside and out be ornament with form of winged one and palm tree and open flower . and the floor of the house be cover with gold inside and out . for the way into the inmost room he make door of olive wood the arch and the door support form a five sided opening . on the olive wood door be cut design of winged one and palm tree and open flower all of them with the door plat with gold . then he make pillar of olive wood for the way into the temple the pillar be square and two fold door of cypress wood with two leaf . these be ornament with design of winged one and palm tree and open flower plat over with gold . and the inner space be wall with three line of squared stone and a line of cedar wood board . in the fourth year the base of the house be put in it place in the month ziv . and in the eleventh year in the month bul which be the eighth month the building of the house be complete in every detail a it have be design . so he be seven year build it .solomon be thirteen year build a house for himself till it be complete . and he make the house of the wood of lebanon which be a hundred cubit long and fifty cubit wide and thirty cubit high rest on four line of cedar wood pillar with cedar wood support on the pillar . and it be cover with cedar over the forty five support which be on the pillar fifteen in a line . there be three line of window frame window face window in every line . and all the door and window have square frame with the window face one another in three line . and he make a covered room of pillar fifty cubit long and thirty cubit wide and ... with step before it . then he make a covered room for his high seat when he give decision this be the covered room of judge it be cover with cedar wood from floor to roof . and the house for his living place the other open square in the covered room be make in the same way . and then he make a house like it for pharaoh 's daughter whom solomon have take a his wife . all these building be make inside and out from base to crown stone and outside to the great walled square of highly price stone cut to different size with cut instrument . and the base be of great mass of highly price stone some ten cubit and some eight cubit square . overhead be highly price stone cut to measure and cedar wood . the great outer square all round be wall with three line of squared stone and a line of cedar wood board round about the open square inside the house of the lord and the covered room of the king 's house . then king solomon sent and get hiram from tyre . he be the son of a widow of the tribe of naphtali and his father be a man of tyre a worker in brass he be full of wisdom and knowledge and an expert worker in brass . he come to king solomon and do all his work for him . he it be who make the two brass pillars the first pillar be eighteen cubit high and a line of twelve cubit go round it and the second be the same . and he make the two crown to be put on the top of the pillar of brass make soft in the fire the crown be five cubit high . there be net of open work for the crown on the top of the pillar a net of open work for one and a net of open work for the other . and he make ornament of apple and two line of apple all round over the network cover the crown of the pillar the two crown in the same way . the crown on the every crown . he put up the pillar at the doorway of the temple name the one on the right jachin and that on the left boaz . the top of the pillar have a design of flower and the work of make the pillar be complete . and he make a great metal water vessel ten cubit across from edge to edge five cubit high and thirty cubit round . and under the edge of it circle it all round for ten cubit be two line of flower bud make together with it from liquid metal . it be support on twelve ox with their back part turn to the middle of it three of them face to the north three to the west three to the south and three to the east the vessel be rest on top of them . it be as thick a a man 's open hand and be curve like the edge of a cup like the flower of a lily it would take two thousand bath . and he make ten wheeled base of brass every one four cubit long four cubit wide and three cubit high . and the base be make in this way their side be square fix in a framework and on the square side between the frame be lion ox and wing one and the same on the frame and over and under the lion and the ox and the winged one be step . every base have four wheel of brass turn on brass rod and their four angle have angle plate under them the angle plat under the base be of metal and there be ornament at the side of every one . the mouth of it inside the angle plate be one cubit across it be round like a pillar a cubit and a half across it have design cut on it the side be square not round . the four wheel be under the frame and the rod on which the wheel be fix be in the base the wheel be a cubit and a half high . the wheel be make like carriage wheel the rod on which they be fix the part form their edge their rod and the middle point of them be all form out of liquid metal . and there be four angle plate at the four angle of every base form part of the structure of the base . and at the top of the base there be a round vessel half a cubit high in the space of the flat side and on the frame of them he make design of winged one lion and palm tree with ornamented edge all round . all the ten base be make in this way after the same design of the same size and form . and he make ten brass wash vessel everyone take forty bath and measure four cubit one vessel be place on every one of the ten base . and he put the base by the house five on the right side and five on the left and the tribe of benjamin a hundred and eighty thousand of his best fight men to make war against israel and get the kingdom back for rehoboam the son of solomon . but the word of god come to shemaiah the child of israel go back every man to his house because this thing be my purpose . so they give ear to the word of the lord and go back a the lord have say . then jeroboam make the town of shechem in the hill country of ephraim a strong place and be live there and from there he go out and do the same to penuel . and jeroboam say in his heart now the kingdom will go back to the family of david if the people go up to make offering in the house of the lord at jerusalem their heart will be turn again to their lord to rehoboam king of judah and they will put me to death and go back to rehoboam king of judah . so after take think the king make two ox of gold and he say to the people you have be go up to jerusalem long enough see ! these be your god o israel who take you out of the land of egypt . and he put one in beth el and the other in dan . and this become a sin in israel for the people go to give worship to the one at beth el and to the other at dan . and he make place for worship at the high place and make priest who be not levites from among all the people . and jeroboam give order for a feast in the eighth month on the fifteenth day of the month like the feast which be keep in judah and he go up to the altar . and in the same way in beth el he give offering to the ox which he have make placing in beth el the priest of the high place he have make . he go up to the altar he have make in beth el on the fifteenth day of the eighth month the month fix by him at his pleasure and he give order for a feast for the people of israel and go up to the altar and there he make the smoke of his offering go up .then a man of god come from judah by the order of the lord to beth el where jeroboam be by the altar burning offering . and by the order of the lord he make an outcry against the altar say o altar altar the lord have say from the seed of david will come a child name josiah and on you he will put to death the priest of the high place who be burn offering on you and men 's bone will be burn on you . the same day he give them a sign say this be the sign which the lord have give see the altar will be break and the burn waste on it overturn . then the king hear the man of god cry out against the altar at beth el put out his hand from the altar say take him prisoner . and his hand stretch out against him become dead and he have no power of pull it back . and the altar be break and the burn waste on it overturn this be the sign which the man of god have give by the word of the lord . then the king make answer and say to the man of god make a prayer now for the grace of the lord your god and for me that my hand may be make well . and in answer to the prayer of the man of god the king 's hand be make well again a it be before . and the king say to the man of god come with me to my house for food and rest and i will give you a reward . but the man of god say to the king even if you give me half of all you have i would not go in with you and i would not take food or a drink of water in this place for so i be order by the word of the lord who say you be not to take food or a drink of water and you be not to go back the way you come . so he go another way and not by the way he come to beth el . now there be an old prophet living in beth el and one of his son come and give him word of all the man of god have do that day in beth el and they give their father an account of the word he have say to the king . then their father say to them which way do he go ? now his son have see which way the man of god who come from judah have go . so the prophet say to his son make ready an as for me . so they make an as ready and he get on it and go after the man of god and come up with him while he be seat under an oak tree . and he say to him be you the man of god who come from judah ? and he say i be . then he say to him come back to the house with me and have a meal . but he say i may not go back with you or go into your house and i will not take food or a drink of water with you in this place for the lord say to me you be not to take food or water there or go back again by the way you come . then he say to him i be a prophet like you and an angel say to me by the word of the lord take him back with you and give him food and water . but he say false word to him . so he go back with him and have a meal in his house and a drink of water . but while they be seat at the table the word of the lord come to the prophet who have take him back and cry out to the man of god who come from judah he say the lord say because you have go against the voice of the lord and have not do a you be order by the lord but have come back and have take food and water in this place where he say you be to take no food or water your dead body will not be put to rest with your father . now after the meal he make ready the as for him for the prophet whom he have take back . and he go on his way but on the road a lion come rush at him and put him to death and his dead body be stretch in the road with the as by it side and the lion be there by the body . and some men go by saw the body stretch out in the road with the lion by it side and they come and give news of it in the town where the old prophet be live . then the prophet who have make him come back hear it say it be the man of god who go against the word of the lord that be why the lord have give him to the lion to be wound to death a the lord say . and he say to his son make ready the as for me . and they do so . and he go and saw the dead body stretch out in the road with the as and the lion by it side the lion have not take the body for it food or do any damage to the as . then the prophet take up the body of the man of god and put it on the as and take it back and he come to the town to put the body to rest with weep . and he put the body in the resting place make ready for himself weep and sorrow over it say o my brother ! and when he have put it to rest he say to his son when i be dead then you be to put my body into the earth with the body of this man of god and put me by his bone so that my bone may be keep safe with his bone . for the outcry he make by the word of the lord against the altar in beth el and against all the house of the high place in the town of samaria will certainly come about . after this jeroboam not turn back from his evil way still make priest for his altar from among all the people he make a priest of anyone desire it so that there might be priest of the high place . and this become a sin in the family of jeroboam cause it to be cut off and send to destruction from the face of the earth .at that time abijah the son of jeroboam become ill. and jeroboam say to his wife now come put on different clothing so that you may not seem to be the wife of jeroboam and go to shiloh see ahijah be there the prophet who say i would be king over this people . and take with you ten cake of bread and dry cake and a pot of honey and very old . and the lord have say to ahijah the wife of jeroboam be come to get news from you about her son who be ill give her such and such an answer for she will make herself seem to be another woman . then ahijah hear the sound of her footstep come in at the door say come in o wife of jeroboam why do you make yourself seem like another ? for i be send to you with bitter news . go say to jeroboam these be the word of the lord the god of israel though i take you from among the people lift you up to be a ruler over my people israel and take the kingdom away by force from the seed of david and give it to you you have not be like my servant david who keep my order and be true to me with all his heart do only what be right in my eye . but you have do evil more than any before you and have make for yourself other god and image of metal move me to wrath and turn your back on me . so i will send evil on the line of jeroboam cut off from his family every male child those who be shut up and those who go free in israel the family of jeroboam will be brush away like a man brush away waste till it be all go . those of the family of jeroboam who come to death in the town will become food for the dog and those on whom death come in the open country will be food for the bird of the air for the lord have say it . up then ! go back to your house and in the hour when your foot and that on the other side of the river because they have make for themselves image move the lord to wrath . and he will give israel up because of the sin which jeroboam have do and make israel do . then jeroboam 's wife get up and go away and come to tirzah and when she come to the doorway of the house death come to the child . and all israel put his body to rest weep over him a the lord have say by his servant ahijah the prophet . now the rest of the act of jeroboam how he make war and how he become king be record in the book of the history of the king of israel . and jeroboam be king for twenty two year and be put to rest with his father and nadab his son become king in his place . and rehoboam the son of solomon be king in judah . rehoboam be forty one year old when he become king and he be king for seventeen year in jerusalem the town which the lord have make his out of all the tribe of israel to put his name there his mother 's name be naamah an ammonite woman . and judah do evil in the eye of the lord and make him more angry than their father have do by their sin . for they make high place and upright stone and wood pillar on every high hill and under every green tree and more than this there be those in the land who be use for sex purpose in the worship of the god do the same disgust crime a the nation which the lord have send out before the child of israel . now in the fifth year of king rehoboam shishak king of egypt come up against jerusalem and take away all the stored wealth from the house of the lord and from the king 's house and all the gold body cover which solomon have make . so in their place king rehoboam have other body cover make of brass and give them into the care of the captain of the arm men who be station at the door of the king 's house . and whenever the king go into the house of the lord the arm men go with him take the body cover and then take them back to their room . now the rest of the act of rehoboam and all he do be they not . so they take the ox which be give them and make it ready cry out to baal from morning till the middle of the day and say o baal give ear to u . but there be no voice and no answer . and they be jump up and down before the altar they have make . and in the middle of the day elijah make sport of them say give louder cry for he be a god he may be deep in thought or he may have go away for some them . and from the middle of the day they go on with their prayer till the time of the offering but there be no voice or any answer or any who give attention to them . then elijah say to all the people come near to me and all the people come near . and he put up again the altar of the lord which have be break down . and elijah take twelve stone the number of the tribe of the son of jacob to he put the wood in order and cut up the ox put it on the wood . then he say get four vessel full of water and put it on the burn offering and on the wood . and he say do it a second time and they do it a second time and he say do it a third time and they do it a third time . and the water go all round the altar till the drain be full . then at the time of the offering elijah the prophet come near and say o lord the god of abraham of isaac and of israel let it be see this day that you be god in israel and that i be your servant and that i have do all these thing by your order . give me an answer o lord give me an answer so that this people may see that you be god and that you have make their heart come back again . then the fire of the lord come down burn up the offering and the wood and the stone and the dust and drinking up the water in the drain . and when the people saw it they all go down on their face and say the lord he be god the lord he be god . and elijah say to them take the prophet of baal let not one of them get away . so they take them and elijah make them go down to the stream kishon and put them to death there . then elijah say to ahab up ! take food and a cloud come up out of the sea as small a a man 's hand . then he say go up and say to ahab get your carriage ready and go down or the rain will keep you back . and after a very little time the heaven now get me a player of music and it will come about that while the man be play the hand of the lord will come on me and i will give you the word of the lord and they get a player of music and while
