and you and your army and your beast will have drink . and this will be only a small thing to the lord in addition he will give the moabites into your hand . and you be to put every walled town to destruction cut down every good tree and stop up every water spring and make all the good land rough with stone . now in the morning about the time when the offering be make they saw water flow from the direction of edom till the country be full of water . now all moab hearing that the king have come to make war against them get together all who be able to take up arm and go forward to the edge of the country . and early in the morning they get up when the sun be shin on the water and they saw the water face them as red a blood . then they say this be blood it be clear that destruction have come on the king they have be fight one another now come moab let u take their good . but when they come to the tent of israel the israelite come out and make a violent attack on the moabites so that they go in flight before them and they go forward still attack them pull down the town cover every good field with stone stop up all the water spring and cut down all the good tree they go on drive moab before them till only in kir hareseth be there any moabites and the fight men go round the town rain stone on it . and when the king of moab saw that the fight be go against him he take with him seven hundred men arm with sword with the idea of force a way through to the king of aram but they be not able to do so . then he take his old son who would have be king after him offer him a a burned offering on the wall . so there be great wrath against israel and they go away from him back to their country .now a certain woman the wife of one of the son of the prophet come cry to elisha and say your servant my husband be dead and to your knowledge he be a worshipper of the lord but now the creditor have come to take my two child a servant in payment of his debt . then elisha say to her what be i to do for you ? say now what have you in the house ? and she say your servant have nothing in the house but a pot of oil . then he say go out to all your neighbour and get vessel a very great number of them . then go in and shut the door on yourself and your son put oil into all these vessel put on one side the full one . so she go away and when the door be shut on her and her son they take the vessel to her and she put oil into them . and when all the vessel be full she say to her son get me another vessel . and he say there be no more . and the flow of oil be stop . so she come to the man of god and give him word of what she have do . and he say go and get money for the oil and make payment of your debt and let the rest be for the need of yourself and your son . now there come a day when elisha go to shunem and there be a woman of high position living there who make him come in and have a meal with her . and after that every time he go by he go into her house for a meal . and she say to her husband now i see that this be a holy man of god who come by day after day . so let u make a little room on the wall and put a bed there for him and a table and a seat and a light so that when he come to u he will be able to go in there . now one day when he have go there he go into the little room and take his rest there . and he say to gehazi his servant send for this shunammite . so in answer to his voice she come before him . and he say to him now say to her see you have take all this trouble for u what be to be do for you ? will you have any request make for you to the king or the captain of the army ? but she say i be live among my people . so he say what then be to be do for her ? and gehazi make answer still there be this she have no son and her husband be old . then he say send for her . and in answer to his voice she take her place at the door . and elisha say at this time in the come year you will have a son in your arm . and she say no my lord o man of god do not say what be false to your servant . then the woman become with child and give birth to a son at the time name in the year after a elisha have say to her . now one day when the child be old he go out to his father to where the grain be be cut . and he say to his father my head my head ! and the father say to a servant take him in to his mother . and he take him in to his mother and she take him on her knee and keep him there till the middle of the day when his life go from him . then she go up and put him on the bed of the man of god shut the door on him and go out . and she say to her husband send me one of the servant and one of the ass so that i may go quickly to the man of god and come back again . and he say why be you go to him today ? it be not a new moon or a sabbath . but she say it be well . then she make the as ready and say to her servant keep driving on do not make a stop without order from me . so she go and come to mount carmel to the man of god . and when the man of god saw her come in his direction he say to gehazi his servant see there be the shunammite go quickly to her and on meet her say to her be you well ? and your husband and the child be they well ? and she say in answer all be well . and when she come to where the man of god be on the hill she put her hand round his foot and gehazi come near with the purpose of push her away but the man of god say let her be for her soul be bitter in her and the lord have keep it secret from me and have not give me word of it . then she say do i make a request to my lord for a son ? do i not say do not give me false word ? then he say to gehazi make yourself ready and take my stick in your hand and go if you come across anyone on the way give him no blessing and if anyone give you a bless give him no answer . and put my stick on the child 's face . but the mother of the child say a the lord be live and a your soul be live i will not go back without you . so he get up and go with her . and gehazi go on before them and put the stick on the child 's face but there be no voice and no one give attention . so he go back and meet him give him the news say the child be not awake . and when elisha come into the house he saw the child dead stretch on his bed . so he go in and shut the door on the two of them make prayer to the lord . then he get up on the bed stretch himself out on the child and put his mouth on the child 's mouth his eye on his eye and his hand on his hand and the child 's body become warm . then he come back and after walk once through the house and back he go up stretch himself out on the child seven time and the child 's eye become open . and he give order to gehazi and say send for the shunammite . and she come in answer to his voice . and he say take up your son . and she come in and go down on her face to the earth at his foot then she take her son in her arm and go out . and elisha go back to gilgal now there be very little food in the land and the son of the prophet be seat before him . and he say to his servant put the great pot on the fire and make soup for the son of the prophet . and one go out into the field to get green plant and saw a vine of the field and pull off the fruit of it till the fold of his robe be full he come back and put the fruit cut up small into the pot of soup have no idea what it be . then they give the men soup from the pot . and while they be drink the soup they give a cry and say o man of god there be death in the pot and they be not able to take any more food . but he say get some meal . and he put it into the pot and say now give it to the people so that they may have food . and there be nothing bad in the pot . now a man come from baal shalishah with an offering of first fruit for the man of god twenty barley cake and garden fruit in his bag . and he say give these to the people for food . but his servant say how be i to put this before a hundred men ? but he say give it to the people for food for the lord say there will be food for them and some over . so he put it before them and they have a meal and there be more than enough a the lord have say .now naaman chief of the army of the king of aram be a man of high position with his master and greatly respect because by him the lord have give salvation to aram but he be a leper . now the aramaean have go out in band and take prisoner from israel a little girl who become servant to naaman 's wife . and she say to her master 's wife if only my lord would go to the prophet in samaria he would make him well . and someone go and say to his lord this be what the girl from the land of israel say . so the king of aram say go then and i will send a letter to the king of israel . and he go take with him ten talent of silver and six thousand shekel of gold and ten change of clothing . and he take the letter to the king of israel in which the king of aram have say see i have send my servant naaman to you to be make well for he be a leper . but the king of israel after read the letter be greatly troubled and say be i god to give death and life ? why do this man send a leper to me to be make well ? be it not clear that he be look for a cause of war ? now elisha the man of god hearing that the king of israel have do this sent to the king say why be you trouble ? send the man to me so that he may see that there be a prophet in israel . so naaman with all his horse and his carriage come to the door of elisha 's house . and elisha send a servant to him say go to jordan and after wash seven time in it water your flesh will be well again and you will be clean . but naaman be angry and go away and say i have the idea that he would come out to see such an important person a i be and make prayer to the lord his god and with a wave of his hand over the place make the leper well . be not abana and pharpar river of damascus well than all the water of israel ? may i not be wash in them and become clean ? so turn he go away in wrath . then his servant come to him and say if the prophet have give you order to do some great thing would you not have do it ? how much more then when he say to you be wash and become clean ? then he go down seven time into the water of jordan a the man of god have say and his flesh become like the flesh of a little child again and he be clean . then he go back to the man of god with all his train and take his place before him say now i be certain that there be no god in all the earth but only in israel now then take an offering from me . but he say by the life of the lord whose servant i be i will take nothing from you . and he do his best to make him take it but he would not . then naaman say if you will not then let there be give to your servant a much earth a two beast be able to take on their back because from now on your servant will make no offering or burn offering to other god but only to the lord . but may your servant have the lord 's forgiveness for this one thing when my master go into the house of rimmon for worship there support on my arm and my head be bent in the house of rimmon when his head be bent in the house of rimmon may your servant have the lord 's forgiveness for this thing . and he say to him go in peace . and he go from him some distance . but gehazi the servant of elisha the man of god say now my master have take nothing from naaman this aramaean of what he would have give him by the living lord i will go after him and get something from him . so gehazi go after naaman . and when naaman saw him run after him he get down from his carriage and go back to him and say be all well ? and he say all be well but my master have send me say even now two young men of the son of the prophet have come to me from the hill country of ephraim will you give me a talent of silver and two change of clothing for them ? and naaman say be good enough to take two talent . and force him to take them he put two talent of silver in two bag with two change of clothing and give them to his two servant to take before him . when he come to the hill he take them from their hand and put them away in the house and he send the men away and they go . then he come in and take his place before his master . and elisha say to him where have you come from gehazi ? and he say your servant go nowhere . and he say to him do not my heart go with you when the man get down from his carriage and go back to you ? be this a time for get money and clothing and olive garden and vine garden and sheep and ox and men servant and woman servant ? because of what you have do the disease of naaman the leper will take you in it grip and your seed after you for ever . and he go out from before him a leper as white a snow .now the son of the prophet say to elisha there be not room enough for u in the place where we be live under your care so let u go to jordan and let everyone get to work cutting board and we will make a living place for ourselves there . and he say to them go then . and one of them say be please to go with your servant . and he say i will go . so he go with them . and when they come to jordan they get to work cut down tree . but one of them while cut a board let the head of his axe go into the water and he give a cry and say this be a bad business my master for it be another 's . and the man of god say where do it go in ? and when he saw the place where it have go into the water cut a stick he put it into the water and the iron come up to the top of the water . then he say take it up . so he put out his hand and take it . at that time the king of aram be make war against israel and he have a meeting with the chief of his army and say i will be wait in secret in some named place . and the man of god sent to the king of israel say take care to keep away from that place for the aramaean be wait there in secret . so the king of israel sent to the place where the man of god have say there be danger and keep clear of it more than once . and at this the mind of the king of aram be greatly troubled and he send for his servant and say to them will you not make clear to me which of u be help the king of israel ? and one of them say not one of u my lord king but elisha the prophet in israel give the king of israel news of the word you say even in your bedroom . then he say go and see where he be so that i may send and get him . and news come to him that he be in dothan . so he send there horse and carriage and a great army and they come by night circle the town . now the servant of the man of god have get up early and go out saw an army with horse and carriage of war all round the town . and the servant say to him o my master what be we to do ? and he say in answer have no fear those who be with u be more than those who be with them . then elisha make a prayer to the lord say lord let his eye be open so that he may see . and the lord make the young man 's eye open and he saw that all the mountain be full of horse and carriage of fire round elisha . now when the aramaean come down to elisha he make a prayer to the lord say lord make this people blind . and he make them blind at elisha 's request . and elisha say to them this be not the way and this be not the town come after me so that i may take you to the man you be search for . and he take them to samaria . and when they have come into samaria elisha say lord let the eye of these men be open so that they may see . and the lord make their eye open and they saw that they be in the middle of samaria . and the king of israel when he saw them say to elisha my father be i to put them to the sword ? but he say in answer you be not to put them to death have you any right to put to death those whom you have not take prisoner with your sword and your bow ? put bread and water before them so that they may have food and drink and go to their master . so he make ready a great feast for them and when they have have food and drink he send them away and they go back to their master . and no more band of aramaean come into the land of israel . now after this ben hadad king of aram get together all his army and go up to make an attack on samaria shut the town in on all side with his force . and they become very short of food in samaria for they keep it shut in till the price of an as 's head be eighty shekel of silver and a small measure of dove ' droppings be five shekel of silver . and when the king of israel be go by on the wall a woman come cry out to him and say help ! my lord king . and he say if the lord do not give you help where be i to get help for you ? from the grain floor or the grape crusher ? and the king say to her what be trouble you ? and she say in answer this woman say to me give your son to be our food today and we will have my son tomorrow . so boiling my son we have a meal of him and on the day after i say to her now give your son for our food but she have put her son in a secret place . then the king hear what the woman say take his robe in his hand violently part them and while he be walk on the wall the people look saw that under his robe he have haircloth on his flesh . then he say may god 's punishment come on me if elisha the son of shaphat keep his head on his body after this day . but elisha be in his house and the responsible men be seat there with him and before the king get there elisha say to those who be with him do you see how this cruel and violent man have send to take away my life ? while he be still talk to them the king come down and say this evil be from the lord why be i to go on wait any long for the lord ?then elisha say give ear to the word of the lord the lord say tomorrow about this time a measure of good meal will be offer for the price of a shekel and two measure of barley for a shekel in the market place of samaria . then the captain whose arm be support the king say to the man of god even if the lord make window in heaven would such a thing be possible ? and he say your eye will see it but you will not have a taste of the food . now there be four leper seat at the doorway into the town and they say to one another why be we wait here for death ? if we say we will go into the town there be no food in the town and we will come to our end there and if we go on wait here death will come to u . come then let u give ourselves up to the army of aram if they let u go on living then life will be ours and if they put u to death then death will be ours . so in the half light they get up to go to the tent of aram but when they come to the out line of tent there be no one there . for the lord have make the sound of carriage and horse and the noise of a great army come to the ear of the aramaean so that they say to one another truly the king of israel have get the king of the hittite and of the egyptian for a price to make an attack on u . so they get up and go in flight in the half light without their tent or their horse or their ass or any of their good they go in flight fear for their life . and when those leper come to the out line of tent they go into one tent and have food and drink and take from it silver and gold and clothing which they put in a secret place then they come back and go into another tent from which they take more good which they put away in a secret place . then they say to one another we be not do right . today be a day of good news and we say nothing if we go on wait here till the morning punishment will come to u . so let u go and give the news to those of the king 's house . so they come in and cry out to the door keeper of the town they give them the news say we come to the tent of the aramaean and there be no one there and no voice of man only the horse and the ass in their place and the tent a they be . then the door keeper cry out give the news to those inside the king 's house . then the king get up in the night and say to his servant this be my idea of what the aramaean have do to u . they have knowledge that we be without food and so they have go out of their tent and be wait secretly in the open country say when they come out of the town we will take them live and get into the town . and one of his servant say in answer send men and let them take five of the horse which we still have in the town if they keep their life they will be the same a those of israel who be still live here if they come to their death they will be the same a all those of israel who have go to destruction let u send and see . so they take two horseman and the king send them after the army of the aramaean say go and see . and they go after them as far a jordan and all the road be cover with clothing and vessel drop by the aramaean in their flight . so those who be send go back and give the news to the king . then the people go out and take the good from the tent of the aramaean . so a measure of good meal be to be have for the price of a shekel and two measure of barley for a shekel a the lord have say . and the king give authority to that captain on whose arm he be support to have control over the doorway into the town but he be crush to death there under the foot of the people a the man of god have say when the king go down to him . so the word of the man of god come true which he say to the king two measure of barley will be offer for the price of a shekel and a measure of good meal for a shekel tomorrow about this time in the market place of samaria . and that captain say to the man of god even if the lord make window in heaven would such a thing be possible ? and he say to him your eye will see it but you will not have a taste of the food . and such be his fate for he be crush to death under the foot of the people in the doorway into the town .now elisha have say to the woman whose son he have give back to life go now with all the people of your house and get a living place for yourselves wherever you be able for by the word of the lord there will be great need of food in the land and this will go on for seven year . so the woman get up and do a the man of god say and she and the people of her house be live in the land of the philistine for seven year . and when the seven year be end the woman come back from the land of the philistine and go to the king with a request for her house and her land . now the king be talk with gehazi the servant of the man of god say now give me an account of all the great thing elisha have do . and while he be give the king the story of how elisha have give life to the dead the woman whose son have come back to life come to the king with a request for her house and her land . and gehazi say my lord king this be the woman and this be her son whose life elisha give back to him . and in answer to the king 's question the woman give him all the story . so the king give order to one of his unsexed servant say give her back all her property and all the produce of her field from the day when she go away from the land up till now . and elisha come to damascus and ben hadad king of aram be ill and they say to him the man of god have come . then the king say to hazael take an offering with you and go to see the man of god and get direction from the lord by him say be i go to get well from my disease ? so hazael go to see him take with him forty camel with offering on their back of every sort of good thing from damascus and when he come before him he say your son ben hadad king of aram have send me to you say will i get well from this disease ? and elisha say to him go say to him you will certainly get good but the lord have make it clear to me that only death be before him . and he keep his eye fix on him till he be sham and the man of god be overcome with weep . and hazael say why be my lord weep ? then he say in answer because i see the evil which you will do to the child of israel burn down their strong town put their young men to death with the sword smash their little one against the stone and cut open the woman who be with child . and hazael say how be it possible that your servant who be only a dog will do this great thing ? and elisha say the lord have make it clear to me that you will be king over aram . then he go away from elisha and come in to his master who say to him what do elisha say to you ? and his answer be he say that you would certainly get well . now on the day after hazael take the bed cover and make it wet with water put it over ben hadad 's face cause his death and hazael become king in his place . in the fifth year of joram the son of ahab king of israel jehoram the son of jehoshaphat king of judah become king . he be thirty two year old when he become king and he be rule in jerusalem for eight year . he go in the way of the king of israel a the family of ahab do for the daughter of ahab be his wife and he do evil in the eye of the lord . but it be not the lord 's purpose to send destruction on judah because of david his servant to whom he have give his word that he would have a light for ever . in his time edom make themselves free from the rule of judah and take a king for themselves . then joram go over to zair with all his war carriage ... make an attack by night on the edomites whose force be all round him ... the captain of the war carriage and the people go in flight to their tent . so edom make themselves free from the rule of judah to this day . and at the same time libnah make itself free . now the rest of the act of joram and all he do be they not record in the book of the history of the king of judah ? and joram go to rest with his father and be put into the earth with his father in the town of david and ahaziah his son become king in his place . in the twelfth year that joram the son of ahab be king of israel ahaziah the son of jehoram king of judah become king ahaziah be twenty two year old when he become king and he be rule in jerusalem for one year . his mother 's name be athaliah the daughter of omri king of israel . he go in the way of the family of ahab and do evil in the eye of the lord a the family of ahab do for he be a son in law of the family of ahab . he go with joram the son of ahab to make war on hazael king of aram at ramoth gilead and joram be wound by the aramaean . so king joram go back to jezreel to get well from the wound which the bowman have give him at ramah when he be fight against hazael king of aram . and ahaziah the son of jehoram king of judah go down to see joram the son of ahab in jezreel because he be ill .and elisha the prophet send for one of the son of the prophet and say to him make yourself ready for a journey and take this bottle of oil in your hand and go to ramoth gilead . and when you get there go in search of jehu the son of jehoshaphat the son of nimshi and go in and make him get up from among his brother and take him to an inner room . then take the bottle and put the oil on his head and say the lord say i have put the holy oil on you to make you king over israel . then open the door go in flight without wait . so the young prophet go to ramoth gilead . and when he come he saw the captain of the army seat together and he say i have something to say to you o captain . and jehu say to which of u ? and he say to you o captain . and he get up and go into the house then he put the holy oil on his head and say to him the lord the god of israel say i have make you king over the people of the lord over israel . you be to see that the family of ahab your master be cut off so that i may take from jezebel payment for the blood of my servant the prophet and for the blood of all the servant of the lord . for the family of ahab will come to an end every male of ahab 's family will be cut off he who be shut up and he who go free in israel . i will make the family of ahab like that of jeroboam the son of nebat and baasha the son of ahijah . and jezebel will become food for the dog in the heritage of jezreel and there will be no one to put her body into the earth . then open the door he go in flight . then jehu come out again to the servant of his lord and one say to him be all well ? why do this man who be off his head come to you ? and he say to them you have knowledge of the man and of his talk . and they say that be not true now give u his story . then he say this be what he say to me the lord say i have make you king over israel . then straight away everyone take his robe and put it under him on the top of the step and sound the horn they say jehu be king . so jehu the son of jehoshaphat the son of nimshi make design against joram . now joram and all the army of israel be keep watch on ramoth gilead because of hazael king of aram but king joram have go back to jezreel to get well from the wound which the aramaean have give him when he be fight against hazael king of aram . and jehu say if this be your purpose then let no one get away and go out of the town to give news of it in jezreel . so jehu get into his carriage and go to jezreel for joram be ill in bed there and ahaziah king of judah have come down to see joram . and the watchman on the tower in jezreel saw jehu and his band come and say i see a band of people . and joram say send out a horseman to them and let him say be it peace ? so a horseman go out to them and say the king say be it peace ? and jehu say what have you to do with peace ? come after me . and the watchman give them word say the horseman go up to them but have not come back . then he send out a second horseman who come up to them and say the king say be it peace ? and jehu say in answer what have you to do with peace ? come after me . and the watchman give them word say he go up to them and have not come back again and the driving be like the driving of jehu son of nimshi for he be drive violently . then joram say make ready . so they make his carriage ready and joram king of israel with ahaziah king of judah go out in their carriage for the purpose of meet jehu and they come face to face with him at the field of naboth the jezreelite . now when joram saw jehu he say be it peace jehu ? and he say in answer what peace be possible while all the land be full of the disgusting sin of your mother jezebel and her secret art ? then joram turn his horse in flight say to ahaziah broken faith o ahaziah ! then jehu take his bow in his hand and with all his strength send an arrow wound joram between the arm and the arrow come out at his heart and he go down on his face in his carriage . then jehu say to bidkar his captain take him up and put him in the field of naboth the jezreelite for be not that day in your memory when you and i together on our horse be go after ahab his father and the lord put this fate on him say i saw the blood of naboth and of his son yesterday and i will give you full payment in this field say the lord ? so now take him and put him in this field a the lord say . now when ahaziah king of judah saw this he go in flight by the way of the garden house . and jehu come after him and say put him to death in the same way and they give him a death wound in his carriage on the slope up to gur by ibleam and he go in flight to megiddo where death come to him . and his servant take him in a carriage to jerusalem and put him into the earth with his father in the town of david . in the eleventh year of the rule of joram the son of ahab ahaziah become king over judah . and when jehu come to jezreel jezebel have news of it and paint her eye and dress her hair with ornament she put her head out of the window . and when jehu be come into the town she say be all well o zimri taker of your master 's life ? then look up to the window he say who be on my side who ? and two or three unsexed servant put out their head . and he say take her and put her out of the window . so they send her down with force and her blood go in a shower on the wall and on the horse and heritage of jezreel so that they will not be able to say this be jezebel .now there be in samaria seventy of ahab 's son . and jehu sent letter to samaria to the ruler of the town and to the responsible men and to those who have the care of the son of ahab say straight away when you get this letter see that your master 's son be with you and that you have carriage and horse and a walled town and arm take the best and most upright of your master 's son and make him king in his father 's place and put up a fight for your master 's family . but they be full of fear and say the two king have go down before him how may we keep our place ? so the controller of the king 's house with the ruler of the town and the responsible men and those who have the care of ahab 's son send to jehu say we be your servant and will do all your order we will not make any man king do whatever seem best to you . then he send them a second letter say if you be on my side and if you will do my order come to me at jezreel by this time tomorrow with the head of your master 's son . now the king 's seventy son be with the great men of the town who have the care of them . and when the letter come to them they take the king 's son and put them to death all the seventy and put their head in basket and send them to him at jezreel . and a man come and say to him they have come with the head of the king 's son . and he say put them down in two mass at the doorway of the town till the morning . and in the morning he go out and stop say to all the people there you be upright men it be true that i make design against my master and put him to death but who be responsible for the death of all these ? you may be certain that nothing which the lord have say about the family of ahab will be without effect for the lord have do what he say by his servant elijah . so jehu put to death all the rest of the seed of ahab in jezreel and all his relation and his near friend and his priest till there be no more of them . then he get up and come to samaria . and he be at the meeting place of the keeper of sheep by the way when he come across the brother of ahaziah king of judah and say who be you ? and they say we be the brother of ahaziah king of judah we be go down to see the child of the king and of the queen . and he say take them live . so they take them live and put them to death in the water hole of beth eked of the forty two men he put every one to death and when he have go away from there he come across jehonadab the son of rechab and he say good day to him and say to him be your heart true to mine a mine be to yours ? and jehonadab in answer say it be and jehu say if it be give me your hand . and he give him his hand and he make him come up into his carriage . and he say come with me and see how i be on fire for the lord 's cause . so he make him go with him in his carriage . and when he come to samaria he put to death all those of ahab 's family who be still in samaria till there be no more of them a the lord have say to elijah . then jehu get all the people together and say to them ahab be baal 's servant in a small way but jehu will be his servant on a great scale . now send for all the prophet of baal and all his servant and all his priest to come to me let no one keep away for i have a great offering to make to baal anyone who be not present will be put to death . this jehu do with deceit his purpose be the destruction of the servant of baal . and jehu say let there be a special holy meeting for the worship of baal . so a public statement be make . and jehu send out through all israel and all the servant of baal come not one keep away . and they come into the house of baal so that it be full from end to end . and jehu say to him who keep the robe get out robe for all the servant of baal . so he get out robe for them . and jehu with jehonadab the son of rechab go into the house of baal and he say to the servant of baal make a search with care to see that no servant of the lord be with you but only servant of baal . then they go in to make offering and burn offering . now jehu have put eighty men outside and say to them if any man whom i give into your hand get away the life of him who let him go will be the price of his life . then when the burn offering be end straight away jehu say to the arm men and the captain go in and put them to death let not one come out . so they put them to the sword and pull the image to the earth they go into the holy place of the house of baal . and they take out the image of asherah from the house of baal and have it burn . the altar of baal be pull down and the house of baal be break up and make an unclean place a it be to this day . so jehu put an end to the worship of baal in israel . but jehu do not keep himself from all the sin of jeroboam the son of nebat and the evil he make israel do the gold ox be still in beth el and in dan . and the lord say to jehu because you have do well in his heart he do not keep himself from the sin which jeroboam do and make israel do . in those day the lord be angry first with israel and hazael make attack on all the land of israel east of jordan in disgust thing though the lord have say you be not to do this . and he give witness to israel and judah by every prophet and seer say come back from your evil way and do my order and keep my rule and be guide by the law which i give to your father and send to you by my servant the prophet . and they do not give ear but become stiff necked like their father who have no faith in the lord their god . and they go against his rule and the agreement which he make with their father and his law which he give them they give themselves up to thing without sense or value and become foolish like the nation round them of whom the lord have say do not a they do . and turn their back on all the order which the lord have give them they make for themselves image of metal and the image of asherah worship all the star of heaven and become servant to baal . and they make their son and their daughter go through the fire and they make use of secret art and unnatural power and give themselves up to do evil in the eye of the lord till he be move to wrath . so the lord be very angry with israel and his face be turn away from them only the tribe of judah keep it place . but even judah do not keep the order of the lord their god but be guide by the rule which israel have make . so the lord would have nothing to do with all the offspring of israel and send trouble on them and give them up into the hand of their attacker till he have send them away from before his face . for israel be break off from the family of david and they make jeroboam the son of nebat king who drive them away from the law of the lord make them do a great sin . and the child of israel go on with all the sin which jeroboam do they do not keep themselves from them till the lord put israel away from before his face a he have say by all his servant the prophet . so israel be take away from their land to assyria to this day . then the king of assyria take men from babylon and from cuthah and avva and hamath and sepharvaim and put them in the town of samaria in place of the child of israel so they get samaria for their heritage living in it town . now when first they be live there they do not give worship to the lord . so the lord send lion among them cause the death of some of them . so they say to the king of assyria the nation whom you have take a prisoner and put in the town of samaria have no knowledge of the way of the god of the land so he have send lion among them cause their death because they have no knowledge of his way . then the king of assyria give order say send there one of the priest whom you take away and let him be live there and teach the people the way of the god of the land . so one of the priest whom they have take away a a prisoner from samaria come back and living in beth el become their teacher in the worship of the lord . and every nation make god for themselves and put them in the house of the high place which the samaritan have make every nation in the town where they be live . the men of babylon make succoth benoth and the men of cuth make nergal and the men of hamath make ashima the avvites make nibhaz and tartak and the sepharvites give their child to be burn in the fire to adrammelech and anammelech the god of sepharvaim . so they go on worship the lord and make for themselves from among all the people priest for the high place to make offering for them in the house of the high place . they give worship to the lord but they give honour to their god like the nation do from whom they have be take a prisoner . so to this day they go on in their old way not worship the lord or keep his order or his way or the law and the rule which the lord give to the child of jacob to whom he give the name israel and the lord make an agreement with them and give them order say you be to have no other god you be not to give worship to them or be their servant or make them offering but the lord who take you out of the land of egypt with his great power and his outstretched arm he be your god to whom you be to give worship and make offering and the rule and the order and the law which he put in write for you you be to keep and do for ever you be to have no other god . and you be to keep in memory the agreement which i have make with you and you be to have no other god . and you be to give worship to the lord your god for it be he who will give you salvation from the hand of all who be against you . but they give no attention but go on in their old way . so these nation worship the lord still be servant to the image they have make their child and their child 's child do the same a their father do so do they to this day .now in the third year of hoshea son of elah king of israel hezekiah the son of ahaz become king of judah . he be twenty five year old when he become king ruling in jerusalem for twenty nine year his mother 's name be abi the daughter of zechariah . he do what be right in the eye of the lord a david his father have do . he have the high place take away and the stone pillars break to bit and the asherah cut down and the brass snake which moses have make be crush to powder at his order because in those day the child of israel have offering burn before it and he give it the name nehushtan . he have faith in the lord the god of israel so that there be no one like him among all the king of judah who be before him . for his heart be fix on the lord not turn from his way and he do his order which the lord give to moses . and the lord be with him he do well in all his undertaking and he take up arm against the king of assyria and be his servant no longer . he overcome the philistine as far a gaza and it limit from the tower of the watchman to the walled town . now in the fourth year of king hezekiah which be the authority ? see now you be base your hope on that broken rod of egypt which will go through a man 's hand if he make use of it for a support for so be pharaoh king of egypt to all who put their faith in him . and if you say to me our hope be in the lord our god be it not he whose high place and altar hezekiah have take away say to judah and jerusalem that worship may only be give before this altar in jerusalem ? and now take a chance with my master the king of assyria and i will give you two thousand horse if you be able to put horseman on them . how then may you put to shame the least of my master 's servant ? and you have put your hope in egypt for war carriage and horseman and have i now come up to send destruction on this place without the lord 's authority ? it be the lord himself who say to me go up against this land and make it waste . then eliakim the son of hilkiah and shebna and joah say to the rab shakeh will you kindly make use of the aramaean language in talk to your heat of the lord 's wrath be not turn back from judah because of all manasseh have do in move him to wrath . and the lord say i will send judah away from before my face a i have send israel i will have nothing more to do with this town which i have make mine even jerusalem and the holy house of which i say my name will be there . now the rest of the act of josiah and all he do be they not record in the book of the history of the king of judah ? in his day pharaoh necoh king of egypt send his army against the king of assyria to the river euphrates and king josiah go out against him and he put him to death at megiddo when he have see him . and his servant take his body in a carriage from megiddo to jerusalem and put him into the earth there . and the people of the land take jehoahaz the son of josiah and put the holy oil on him and make him king in place of his father . jehoahaz be twenty three year old when he become king ruling in jerusalem for three month his mother 's name be hamutal the daughter of jeremiah of libnah . he do evil in the eye of the lord a his father have do . and pharaoh necoh put him in chain at riblah in the land of hamath so that he might not be king in jerusalem and take from the land a tax of a hundred talent of silver and a talent of gold . then pharaoh necoh make eliakim the son of josiah king in place of josiah his father change his name to jehoiakim but jehoahaz he take away to egypt where he be till his death . and jehoiakim give the silver and gold to pharaoh tax the land by his order to get the money the people of the land have to give silver and gold everyone a he be tax to make the payment to pharaoh necoh . jehoiakim be twenty five year old when he become king he be rule in jerusalem for eleven year his mother 's name be zebidah the daughter of pedaiah of rumah . he do evil in the eye of the lord a his father have do .in his day nebuchadnezzar king of babylon come up and jehoiakim be his servant for three year then he take up arm against him . and the lord send against him band of the chaldaean and of the edomites and of the moabites and of the child of ammon send them against judah for it destruction a he have say by his servant the prophet . only by the word of the lord do this fate come on judah to take them away from before his face because of the sin of manasseh and all the evil he do and because of the death of those who have do no wrong for he make jerusalem full of the blood of the upright and the lord have no forgiveness for it . now the rest of the act of jehoiakim and all he do be they not record in the book of the history of the king of judah ? so jehoiakim go to rest with his father and jehoiachin his son become king in his place . and the king of egypt do not come out of his land again for the king of babylon have take all his country from the stream of egypt to the river euphrates . jehoiachin be eighteen year old when he become king he be rule in jerusalem for three month and his mother 's name be nehushta the daughter of elnathan of jerusalem . he do evil in the eye of the lord a his father have do . at that time the army of nebuchadnezzar come up to jerusalem and the town be shut in on every side . and nebuchadnezzar king of babylon come there while his servant be shut in the town then jehoiachin king of judah go out to the king of babylon with his mother and his servant and his chief and his unsexed servant and in the eighth year of his rule the king of babylon take him . and he take away all the stored wealth of the lord 's house and the good from the king 's store house cut up all the gold vessel which solomon king of israel have make in the house of the lord a the lord have say . and he take away all the people of jerusalem and all the chief and all the men of war ten thousand prisoner and all the expert workman and the metal worker only the poor sort of the people of the land be not take away . he take jehoiachin a prisoner to babylon with his mother and his wife and his unsexed servant and the great men of the land he take them all a prisoner from jerusalem to babylon . and all the men of war seven thousand of them and a thousand expert workman and metal worker all of them strong and able to take up arm the king of babylon take away a prisoner into babylon . and the king of babylon make mattaniah his father 's brother king in place of jehoiachin change his name to zedekiah . zedekiah be twenty one year old when he become king and he be king in jerusalem for eleven year his mother 's name be hamutal daughter of jeremiah of libnah . he do evil in the eye of the lord a jehoiakim have do . and because of the wrath of the lord this come about in jerusalem and judah till he have send them all away from before him and zedekiah take up arm against the king of babylon .now in the ninth year of his rule on the tenth day of the tenth month nebuchadnezzar king of babylon come against jerusalem with all his army and take up his position before it build earthworks all round the town . and the town be shut in by their force till the eleventh year of king zedekiah . now on the ninth day of the fourth month the store of food in the town be almost go so that there be no food for the people of the land . so an opening be make in the wall of the town and all the men of war go in flight by night through the doorway between the two wall which be by the king 's garden now the chaldaean be station round the town and the king go by the way of the arabah . but the chaldaean army go after the king and overtook him in the lowland of jericho and all his army go in flight from him in every direction . and they make the king a prisoner and take him up to the king of babylon at riblah to be judge . and they put the son of zedekiah to death before his eye and then they put out his eye and chain him with iron band take him to babylon . now in the fifth month on the seventh day of the month in the nineteenth year of nebuchadnezzar king of babylon nebuzaradan the captain of the arm men a servant of the king of babylon come to jerusalem and he have the house of the lord and the king 's house and all the house of jerusalem even every great house burn with fire and the wall round jerusalem be break down by the chaldaean army which be with the captain . and the rest of the people who be still in the town and all those who have give themselves up to the king of babylon and all the rest of the workman nebuzaradan the captain of the arm men take away a prisoner but he let the poor of the land go on living there to take care of the vine and the field . and the brass pillar in the house of the lord and the wheeled base and the great brass water vessel in the house of the lord be break up by the chaldaean who take the brass to babylon . and the pot and the spade and the scissors for the light and the spoon and all the brass vessel use in the lord 's house they take away . and the fire tray and the basin the gold of the gold vessel and the silver of the silver vessel be all take away by the captain of the arm men . the two pillar the great water vessel and the wheel base which solomon have make for the house of the lord the brass of all these vessel be without weight . one of the pillar be eighteen cubit high with a crown of brass on it the crown be three cubit high circle with a network and apples all of brass and the second pillar have the same . and the captain of the arm men take seraiah the chief priest and zephaniah the second priest and the three door keeper and from the town he take the unsexed servant who be over the men of war and five of the king 's near friend who be in the town and the scribe of the captain of the army who be responsible for get the people of the land together in military order and sixty men of the people of the land who be in the town . these nebuzaradan the captain of the arm men take with him to the king of babylon at riblah . and the king of babylon put them to death at riblah in the land of hamath . so judah be take away prisoner from his land . a for the people who be still live in the land of judah whom nebuchadnezzar king of babylon do not take away he make gedaliah the son of ahikam the son of shaphan ruler over them . now the captain of the armed force hear that the king of babylon have make gedaliah ruler come with their men to gedaliah at mizpah ishmael the son of nethaniah and johanan the son of kareah and seraiah the son of tanhumeth the netophathite and jaazaniah the son of the maacathite come with all their men . then gedaliah give his oath to them and their men say have no fear because of the servant of the chaldaean go on living in the land under the rule of the king of babylon and all will be well . but in the seventh month ishmael the son of nethaniah the son of elishama of the king 's seed come with ten men and make an attack on gedaliah cause his death and the death of the jew and the chaldaean who be with him at mizpah . then all the people small and great and the captain of the force get up and go away to egypt for fear of the chaldaean . and in the thirty seventh year after jehoiachin king of judah have be take prisoner in the twelfth month on the twenty seventh day of the month evil merodach king of babylon in the first year of his rule take jehoiachin king of judah out of prison and say kind word to him and put his seat high than the seat of the other king who be with him in babylon . and his prison clothing be change and he be a guest at the king 's table every day for the rest of his life . and and the archer come across him and he be wound by the archer . then saul say to the servant who have the care of his arm take your sword and put it through me before these men without circumcision come and make sport of me . but his servant full of fear would not do so . then saul take out his sword fall on it himself . and when his servant saw that saul be dead he do the same and come to his death . so death overtook saul and his three son all his family come to an end together . and when all the men of israel who be in the valley saw that the men of israel have go in flight and that saul and his son be dead they go in flight away from their town and the philistine come and take them for themselves . now the day after when the philistine come to take their good from the dead they saw saul and his son dead in mount gilboa . and they take everything off him and take his head and his war dress and send word into the land of the philistine round about to give the news to their god and to the people . and they put his war dress in the house of their god and put up his head in the house of dagon . and when the news come to jabesh gilead of what the philistine have do to saul all the fight men come up and take away saul 's body and the body of his son and take them to jabesh and put their bone to rest under the oak tree in jabesh and take no food for seven day . so death come to saul because of the sin which he do against the lord that be because of the word of the lord which he keep not and because he go for direction to one who have an evil spirit and not to the lord for this reason he put him to death and give the kingdom to david the son of jesse .then all israel come together to david at hebron and say truly we be your bone and your flesh . in the past when saul be king it be you who go at the head of israel when they go out or come in and the lord your god say to you you be to be the keeper of my people israel and their ruler . so all the responsible men of israel come to the king at hebron and david make an agreement with them in hebron before the lord and they put the holy oil on david and make him king over israel a the lord have say by samuel . then david and all israel go to jerusalem which be jebus and the jebusites the people of the land be there . and the people of jebus say to david you will not come in here . but still david take the strong place of zion which be the town of david . and david say the first to overcome the jebusites will be chief and captain . and joab the son of zeruiah go up first and become chief . and david take the strong tower for his living place so it be name the town of david . and he take in hand the building of the town all round start from the millo and joab put the rest of the town in order . and david become great and great in power because the lord of army be with him . now these be the chief of david 's men of war who be his strong supporter in the kingdom and with all israel make him king a the the people go in flight before the philistine . and he take up his position in the middle of the bit of land and keep back their attack and overcome the philistine and the lord give a great salvation . and three of the thirty go down to david to the rock into the strong place of adullam and the army of the philistine have take up their position in the valley of rephaim . at that time david have take cover in the strong place and an armed force of the philistine be in beth lehem . and david move by a strong desire say if only someone would give me a drink of the water from the water hole of beth lehem by the doorway into the town ! so the three force a way through the philistine army get water from the water hole of beth lehem by the doorway into the town and take it back to david but david would not take it but make an offering of it drain it out to the lord say by my god far be it from me to do this ! how may i take a drink the life blood of these men who have put their life in danger ? so he do not take it . these thing do the three great men of war . and abishai the brother of joab be chief of the thirty for he put to death three hundred with his spear but he have not a name among the three . of the thirty he be the noble and be make their captain but he be not equal to the first three . benaiah the son of jehoiada a fight man of kabzeel have do great act he put to death two young lion go into their secret place and he go down into a hole and put a lion to death in time of snow . and he make an attack on an egyptian a very tall man about five cubit high arm with a spear like a cloth worker 's rod he go down to him with a stick and pull his spear out of the hand of the egyptian put him to death with that same spear . these be the act of benaiah the son of jehoiada who have a great name among the thirty men of war . he be honour over the thirty but he be not equal to the first three and david put him over his servant . and these be the great men of war his father david in the place which david have make ready in the grain floor of ornan the jebusite . the building be start in the second month in the fourth year of his rule . and solomon put the base of the house of god in position by the old measure it be sixty cubit long and twenty cubit wide . and the covered way in front of the house be twenty cubit long as wide a the house and a hundred and twenty cubit high all plat inside with the best gold . and the great house be roof with cypress wood plat with the best gold and ornament with design of palm tree and chain . and the house be make beautiful with stone of great value and the gold be gold of parvaim . all the house be plat with gold the support the step the wall and the door and the wall be ornament with design of winged one . and he make the most holy place it be twenty cubit long and twenty cubit wide like the great house and be plat all over with the best gold six hundred talent be use for it . and fifty shekel weight of gold be use for the nail . he have all the high room plat with gold . and in the most holy place he make image of two winged being cover them with gold . their outstretched wing be twenty cubit across one wing five cubit long touch the wall of the house and the other of the same size meet the wing of the other wing one . and in the same way the wing of the other five cubit long be stretch out one touch the wall and the other meet the wing of the first wing one . their outstretched wing be twenty cubit across they be place upright on their foot face the inner part of the house . and he make the veil of blue and purple and red of the best linen work with winged one . and in front of the house he make two pillar thirty five cubit high with crown on the top of them five cubit high . and he make chain like neck ornament and put them on the top of the pillar and a hundred apple on the chain . he put up the pillar in front of the temple one on the right side and one on the left name the one on the right jachin and that on the left boaz .then he make a brass altar twenty cubit long twenty cubit wide and ten cubit high . and he make the great water vessel of metal round in form measuring ten cubit across from edge to edge it be five cubit high and thirty cubit round . and under it be a design of flower all round it ten to a cubit circle the water vessel in two line they be make from liquid metal at the same time a the water vessel . it be support on twelve ox three facing to the north three to the west three to the south and three to the east the water vessel rest on top of them their back part be all turn to the middle of it . it be as thick a a man 's open hand and the edge of it be curve like the edge of a cup like a lily flower it would take three thousand bath . and he make ten washing vessel put five on the right side and five on the left such thing a be use in make the burned offering be wash in them but the great water vessel be to be use by the priest for wash themselves . and he make the ten gold support for the light a direction have be give for them and he put them in the temple five on the right side and five on the left . he make ten table and put them in the temple five on the right side and five on the left . and he make a hundred gold basin . then he make the open space for the priest and the great open space and it door plat the door with brass . he put the great water vessel on the right side of the house to the east facing south . and huram make all the pot and the spade and the basin . so he come to the end of all the work he do for king of the open space on this he take his place and go down on his knee before all the meeting of israel stretch out his hand to heaven . and he say o lord the god of israel there be no god like you in heaven or on earth keep faith and mercy unchanging for your servant while they go in your way with all their heart for you have keep the word which you give to your servant david my father with your mouth you say it and with your hand you have make it come true this day . so now o lord the god of israel let your word to your servant david my father come true when you say you will never be without a man to take his place before me on the seat of the kingdom of israel if only your child give attention to their way walk in my law a you have do before me . so now o lord the god of israel make your word come true which you say to your servant david . but be it truly possible that god may be house with men on earth ? see heaven and the heaven of heaven be not wide enough to be your rest place how much less this house which i have make still let your heart be turn to the prayer of your servant and to his prayer for grace o lord my god and give ear to the cry and the prayer which your servant make before you that your eye may be open to this house day and night to this place of which you have say that you would put your name there to give ear to the prayer which your servant may make turn to this place . and give ear to the prayer of your servant and of your people israel when they make their prayer turn to this place give ear from heaven your living place and hearing have mercy . if a man do wrong to his neighbour and have to take an oath and come before your altar to take his oath in this house then let your ear be open in heaven and be the judge of your servant give punishment to the wrongdoer so that his sin may come on his head and by your decision keep from evil him who have do no wrong . and if your people israel be overcome in war because of their sin against you if they be turn to you again honour your name make prayer and request your grace in this house then give ear from heaven and let the sin of your people israel have forgiveness and take them back again to the land which you give to them and to their father . when heaven be shut up and there be no rain because of their sin against you if they make prayer with their face turn to this place honour your name and turn away from their sin when you send trouble on them then give ear from heaven so that the sin of your servant and the sin of your people israel may have forgiveness when you make clear to them the good way in which they be to go and send rain on your land which you have give to your people for their heritage . if there be no food in the land if there be disease if the fruit of the earth be damage by heat or water locust or worm if their town be shut in by their attacker whatever trouble or whatever disease there may be whatever prayer or request for your grace be make by any man or by all your people israel whatever his trouble may be whose hand be stretch out to this house then give ear from heaven your live place answer with forgiveness and give to every man whose secret heart be and on the eighth day they have a holy meeting the offering for make the altar holy go on for seven day and the feast for seven day . and on the twenty third day of the seventh month he send the people away to their tent full of joy and glad in their heart because of all the good which the lord have do to david and to solomon and to israel his people . so solomon come to the end of build the house of the lord and the king 's house and everything which it be in his mind to make in the house of the lord and for himself have be well do . now the lord come to solomon in a vision by night and say to him i have give ear to your prayer and have take this place for myself a a house where offering be to be make . if at my word heaven be shut up so that there be no rain or if i send locust on the land for it destruction or if i send disease on my people if my people on whom my name be name make themselves low and come to me in prayer searching for me and turn from their evil way then i will give ear from heaven overlook their sin and will give life again to their land . now my eye will be open and my ear awake to the prayer make in this place . for i have take this house for myself and make it holy so that my name may be there for ever and my eye and my heart will be there at all time . and a for you if you will go on your way before me a david your father do do whatever i have give you order to do and keep my law and my decision then i will make strong the seat of your kingdom a i give my word to david your father say you will never be without a man to be ruler in israel . but if you be turn away from me and do not keep my order and my law which i have put before you but go and make yourselves servant to other god give them worship then i will have this people uproot out of my land which i have give them and this house which i have make holy for my name i will put away from before my eye and make it an example and a word of shame among all people . and this house will become a mass of broken wall and everyone who go by will be overcome with wonder and will say why have the lord do so to this land and to this house ? and their answer will be because they be turn away from the lord the god of their father who take them out of the land of egypt and take for themselves other god and give them worship and become their servant that be why he have send all this evil on them .now at the end of twenty year in which time solomon have put up the house of the lord and a house for himself he take in hand the building up of the town which huram have give him authority whom king solomon have two hundred and fifty of them in authority over the people . then solomon make pharaoh 's daughter come up from the town of david to the house which he have make for talk with him of everything in her mind . and solomon give her answer to all her question there be no secret which he do not make clear to her . and when the queen of sheba have see the wisdom of have no faith in what be say about you till i come and saw for myself and truly word be not give me of half your great wisdom you be much great than they say . happy be your wife and happy these your servant whose place be ever before you hear your word of wisdom . praise be to the lord your god whose pleasure it be to put you on the seat of his kingdom to be king for the lord your god because in his love for israel it be the purpose of your god to make them strong for ever he make you king over them to be their judge in righteousness . and she give the king a hundred and twenty talent of gold
