of the country give gold and silver to solomon . and king solomon make two hundred body cover of hammered gold every one have six hundred shekel of gold in it . and he make three hundred small body cover of hammered gold use three hundred shekel of gold for every cover and the king put them in the house of the wood of lebanon . then the king make a great ivory seat plat with the best gold . there be six step up to it and a foot rest of gold fix to it and arm on the two side of the seat with two lion at the side of the arm . and twelve lion be place on one side and on the other side on the six step there be nothing like it in any kingdom . all king solomon 's drinking vessel be of gold and all the vessel of the house of the wood of lebanon be of the best gold no one give a thought to silver in the day of solomon . for the king have tarshish ship sail with the servant of huram once every three year the tarshish ship come back with gold and silver ivory and monkey and peacock . and king solomon be great than all the king of the earth in wealth and in wisdom . and all the king of the earth come to see solomon and to give ear to his wisdom which god have put into his heart . and everyone take with him an offering vessel of silver and vessel of gold and robe and coat of metal and spice and horse and beast for transport regularly year by year . solomon have four thousand building for his horse and his war carriage and twelve thousand horseman whom he keep some in the carriage town and some with the king in jerusalem . and he be ruler over all the king from the river to the land of the philistine as far a the limit of egypt . the king make silver as common a stone in jerusalem and cedar like the sycamore tree of the lowland in number . they get horse for solomon from egypt and from every land . now the rest of the act of solomon first and last be they not record in the history of nathan the prophet and in the word of ahijah the prophet of shiloh and in the vision of iddo the seer about jeroboam the son of nebat ? solomon be king over israel in jerusalem for forty year . and solomon go to rest with his father and be put into the earth in the town of david his father and rehoboam his son become king in his place .and rehoboam go to shechem where all israel have come together to make him king . and when jeroboam the son of nebat have news of it for he be in egypt where he have go in flight from king solomon he come back from egypt . and they send for him and jeroboam and all israel come to rehoboam and say your father put a hard yoke on u if you will make the condition under which your father keep u down less cruel and the weight of the yoke he put on u less hard then we will be your servant . and he say to them come to me again after three day . so the people go away . then king rehoboam take the opinion of the old men who have be with solomon his father when he be live and say in your opinion what answer be i to give to this people ? and they say to him if you be kind to this people please them and say good word to them then they will be your servant for ever . but he give no attention to the opinion of the old men but go to the young men of his generation who be wait before him . and he say to them what be your opinion ? what answer be we to give to this people who have say to me make less the weight of the yoke which your father put on u ? and the young men of his generation say to him this be the answer to give to the people who come to you say your father put a hard yoke on u but will you make it less say to them my little finger be thick than my father 's body if my father put a hard yoke on you i will make it hard my father give you punishment with whip but i will give you blow with snake . so jeroboam and all the people come to rehoboam on the third day a the king have give order say come to me again on the third day . and the king give them a rough answer . so king rehoboam give no attention to the suggestion of the old men but give them the answer put forward by the young men say my father make your yoke hard but i will make it hard my father give you punishment with whip but i will give it with snake . so the king do not give ear to the people for this come about by the purpose of god so that the lord might give effect to his word which he have say by ahijah the shilonite to jeroboam the son of nebat . and when all israel saw that the king would give no attention to them the people in answer say to the king what part have we in david ? what be our heritage in the son of jesse ? every man to your tent o israel now see to your house david . so all israel go to their tent . but rehoboam be still king over those of the child of israel who be live in the town of judah . then rehoboam sent adoniram the overseer of the forced work and he be stone to death by all israel . and king rehoboam go quickly and get into his carriage to go in flight to jerusalem . so israel be turn away from the family of david to this day .and rehoboam come to jerusalem and get together the men of judah and benjamin a hundred and eighty thousand of his best fight men to make war against israel and get the kingdom back for rehoboam . but the word of the lord come to shemaiah the man of god say say to rehoboam the son of solomon king of judah and to all israel in judah and benjamin the lord have say you be not to go to war against your brother let every man go back to his house for this thing be my purpose . so they give ear to the word of the lord and be turn back from fight against jeroboam . now rehoboam kept in jerusalem building wall town in judah . he be the builder of beth lehem and etam and tekoa and beth zur and soco and adullam and gath and mareshah and ziph and adoraim and lachish and azekah and zorah and aijalon and hebron wall town in judah and benjamin . and he make the walled town strong and he put captain in them and store of food oil and wine . and in every town he put store of body cover and spear and make them very strong . and judah and benjamin be his . and the priest and levite who be in all israel come together to him from every part of their country . for the levite give up their living place and their property and come to judah and jerusalem for jeroboam and his son have send them away not let them be priest to the lord and he himself make priest for the high place and for the image of he goats and ox which he have make . and after them from all the tribe of israel all those whose heart be fix and true to the lord the god of israel come to jerusalem to make offering to the lord the god of their father . so they go on increase the power of the kingdom of judah and make rehoboam the son of solomon strong for three year and for three year they go in the way of david and solomon . and rehoboam take a his wife mahalath the daughter of jerimoth the son of david and of abihail the daughter of eliab the son of jesse and she have son by him jeush shemariah and zaham . and after her he take maacah the daughter of absalom and she have abijah and attai and ziza and shelomith by him . maacah the daughter of absalom be dearer to rehoboam than all his wife and his servant wife for he have eighteen wife and sixty servant wife and be the father of twenty eight son and sixty daughter . rehoboam make abijah the son of maacah chief and ruler among his brother for it be his purpose to make him king . and in his wisdom he have his son station in every walled town through all the land of judah and benjamin and he give them a great store of food and take wife for them .now when rehoboam 's position a king have be make certain and he be strong he give up the law of the lord and all israel with him . now in the fifth year of king rehoboam shishak king of egypt come up against jerusalem because of their sin against the lord with twelve hundred war carriage and sixty thousand horseman and the people who come with him out of egypt be more than might be number lubim and sukkiim and ethiopian . and he take the walled town of judah and come as far a jerusalem . now shemaiah the prophet come to rehoboam and the chief of judah who have come together in jerusalem because of shishak and say to them the lord have say because you have give me up i have give you up into the hand of shishak . then the chief of israel and the king make themselves low and say the lord be upright . and the lord see that they have make themselves low say to shemaiah they have make themselves low i will not send destruction on them but in a short time i will give them salvation and will not let loose my wrath on jerusalem by the hand of shishak . but still they will become his servant so that they may see how different my yoke be from the yoke of the kingdom of the land . so shishak king of egypt come up against jerusalem and take away all the stored wealth of the house of the lord and the king 's house he take everything away and with the rest the gold body cover which solomon have make . and in their place king rehoboam have other body cover make of brass and give them into the care of the captain of the arm men who be station at the door of the king 's house . and whenever the king go into the house of the lord the arm men go with him take the body cover and then take them back to their room . and when he make himself low the wrath of the lord be turn back from him and complete destruction do not come on him for there be still some good in judah . so king rehoboam make himself strong in jerusalem and be rule there . rehoboam be forty one year old when he become king and he be rule for seventeen year in jerusalem the town which the lord have make his out of all the tribe of israel to put his name there and his mother 's name be naamah an ammonite woman . and he do evil because his heart be not true to the lord . now the act of rehoboam first and last be they not record in the word of shemaiah the prophet and iddo the seer ? and there be war between rehoboam and jeroboam all their day . and rehoboam go to rest with his father and be put into the earth in the town of david and abijah his son become king in his place .in the eighteenth year of king jeroboam abijah become king over judah . he be king in jerusalem for three year his mother 's name be maacah the daughter of uriel of gibeah . and there be war between abijah and jeroboam . and abijah go out to the fight with an army of men of war four hundred thousand of his best men and jeroboam put his force in line against him eight hundred thousand of his best men of war . and abijah take up his position on mount zemaraim in the hill country of ephraim and say give ear to me o jeroboam and all israel be it not clear to you that the lord the god of israel give the rule over israel to david and to his son for ever by an agreement make with salt ? but jeroboam the son of nebat the servant of solomon the son of david take up arm against his lord . and certain foolish and good for nothing men be join with him and make themselves strong against rehoboam the son of solomon when he be young and untested and not able to keep them back . and now it be your purpose to put yourselves against the authority which the lord have put into the hand of the son of david and you be a very great number and you have with you the gold ox which jeroboam make to be your god . and after drive out the priest of the lord the son of aaron and the levite have you not make priest for yourselves a the people of other land do ? so that anyone who come to make himself priest by offer an ox or seven sheep may be a priest of those who be no god . but a for u the lord be our god and we have not be turn away from him we have priest who do the work of the lord even the son of aaron and the levite in their place by whom burn offering and perfume be send up in smoke before the lord every morning and every evening and they put out the holy bread on it table and the gold support for the light with it light burn every evening for we keep the order give to u by the lord our god but you have go away from him . and now god be with u at our head and his priest with their loud horn sound against you . o child of israel do not make war on the lord the god of your father for it will not go well for you . but jeroboam have put some of his men to make a surprise attack on them from the back so some be facing judah and others be station secretly at their back . and judah turn their face saw that they be be attack in front and at the back and they give a cry for help to the lord while the priest be sound their horn . and the men of judah give a loud cry and at their cry god put fear into jeroboam and all israel before abijah and judah . and the child of israel go in flight before judah and god give them up into their hand . and abijah and his people put them to death with great destruction five hundred thousand of the best of israel be put to the sword . so at that time the child of israel be overcome and the child of judah get the good of them because they put their faith in the lord the god of their father . and abijah go after jeroboam and take some of his town beth el with it small town and jeshanah with it small town and ephron with it small town . and jeroboam do not get back his power again in the life time of abijah and the lord send death on him . but abijah become great and have fourteen wife and become the father of twenty two son and sixteen daughter . and the rest of the act of abijah and his way and his saying be record in the account of the prophet iddo .so abijah go to rest with his father and they put him into the earth in the town of david and asa his son become king in his place in his time the land be quiet for ten year . and asa do what be good and right in the eye of the lord his god for he take away the altar of strange god and the high place and have the upright stone break and the wood pillars cut down and he make judah go after the lord the god of their father and keep his law and his order . and he take away the high place and the sun image from all the town of judah and the kingdom be quiet under his rule . he make walled town in judah for the land be quiet and there be no war in those year because the lord have give him rest . he say to judah let u make these town building wall round them with tower and door and lock . the land be still ours because we have be true to the lord our god we have be true to him and he have give u rest on every side . so they go on building and all go well for them . and asa have an army of three hundred thousand men of judah arm with body cover and spear and two hundred and eighty thousand of benjamin arm with body cover and bow all these be men of war . and zerah the ethiopian with an army of a million and three hundred war carriage come out against them to mareshah . and asa go out against him and they put their force in position in the valley north of mareshah . and asa make prayer to the lord his god and say lord you only be able to give help against the strong to him who have no strength come to our help o lord our god for our hope be in you and in your name we have come out against this great army . o lord you be our god let not man 's power be great than yours . so the lord send fear on the ethiopian before asa and judah and the ethiopian go in flight . and asa and the people who be with him go after them as far a gerar and so great be the destruction among the ethiopian that they be not able to get their army together again for they be break before the lord and before his army and they take away a great amount of their good . and they overcome all the town round gerar because the lord send fear on them and they take away their good from the town for there be store of wealth in them . and they make an attack on the tent of the owner of the cattle and take away great number of sheep and camel and go back to jerusalem .and the spirit of god come on azariah the son of oded and he come face to face with asa and say to him give ear to me asa and all judah and benjamin the lord be with you while you be with him if your heart 's desire be for him he will be near you but if you give him up he will give you up . now for a long time israel have be without the true god and without a teaching priest and without the law but when in their trouble they be turn to the lord the god of israel search after him he let their search be reward . in those time there be no peace for him who go out or for him who come in but great trouble be on all the people of the land . and they be break by division nation against nation and town against town because god send all sort of trouble on them . but be you strong and let not your hand be feeble for your work will be reward . and asa hearing these word of azariah the son of oded the prophet take heart and put away all the disgust thing out of all the land of judah and benjamin and out of the town which he have take from the hill country of ephraim and he make new again the altar of the lord in front of the covered way of the lord 's house . and he get together all judah and benjamin and those of ephraim and manasseh and simeon who be live with them for number of them come to him out of israel when they saw that the lord his god be with him . so they come together at jerusalem in the third month in the fifteenth year of the rule of asa . and that day they make offering to the lord of the thing they have take in war seven hundred ox and seven thousand sheep . and they make an agreement to be true to the lord the god of their father with all their heart and all their soul and that anyone small or great man or woman who be not true to the lord the god of israel would be put to death . and they make an oath to the lord with a loud voice sound wind instrument and horn . and all judah be glad because of the oath for they have take it with all their heart turn to the lord with all their desire and he be with them and give them rest on every side . and asa would not let maacah his mother be queen because she have make a disgusting image for asherah and asa have her image cut down and break up and burn by the stream kidron . but the high place be not take away out of israel but still the heart of asa be true to the lord all his life . he take into the house of god all the thing which his father have make holy and those which he himself have make holy silver and gold and vessel . and there be no more war till the thirty fifth year of the rule of asa .in the thirty sixth year of the rule of asa baasha king of israel go up against judah building ramah so that no one be able to go out or in to asa king of judah . then asa take silver and gold out of the store of the lord 's house and of the king 's store house and send to ben hadad king of aram at damascus say let there be an agreement between me and you a there be between my father and your father see i have send you silver and gold go and put an end to your agreement with baasha king of israel so that he may give up attack me . and ben hadad do a king asa say and send the captain of his army against the town of israel attack ijon and dan and abel maim and all the store town of naphtali . then baasha hearing of it put a stop to the building of ramah and let his work come to an end . then king asa with all judah take away the stone and wood with which baasha be build ramah and he make use of them for build geba and mizpah . at that time hanani the seer come to asa king of judah and say to him because you have put your faith in the king of aram and not in the lord your god the army of the king of aram have get away out of your hand . be not the ethiopian and the lubim a very great army with war carriage and horseman more than might be number ? but because your faith be in the lord he give them up into your hand . for the eye of the lord go this way and that through all the earth let it be see that he be the strong support of those whose heart be true to him . in this you have do foolishly for from now you will have war . then asa be angry with the seer and put him in prison burn with wrath against him because of this thing . and at the same time asa be cruel to some of the people . now the act of asa first and last be record in the book of the king of judah and israel . in the thirty ninth year of his rule asa have a very bad disease of the foot but he do not go to the lord for help in his disease but to medical men . so asa go to rest with his father and death come to him in the forty first year of his rule . and they put him into the rest place which he have make for himself in the town of david in a bed full of sweet perfume of all sort of spice make by the perfumer 's art and they make a great burning for him .and jehoshaphat his son become king in his place and make himself strong against israel . he put force in all the walled town of judah and responsible chief in the land of judah and in the town of ephraim which asa his father have take . and the lord be with jehoshaphat because he go in the early way of his father not turn to the baal but turn to the god of his father and keep his law and not do a israel do . so the lord make his kingdom strong and all judah give offering to jehoshaphat and he have great wealth and honour . his heart be lift up in the way of the lord and he go so far a to take away the high place and the wood pillars out of judah . in the third year of his rule he send benhail and obadiah and and the fear of the lord be on all the kingdom of the land round judah so that they make no war against jehoshaphat . and some of the philistine take offering to jehoshaphat and make him payment of silver and the arabian give him flock seven thousand seven hundred sheep and seven thousand seven hundred he goats . jehoshaphat become great and great and make strong tower and store town in judah . people a your people we will be with you in the war . then jehoshaphat say to the king of israel let u now get direction from the lord . so the king of israel get together all the prophet four hundred from whom we may get direction ? and the king of israel say to jehoshaphat there be still one man by whom we may get direction from the lord but i have no love for him because he have never be a prophet of good to me but only of evil he be micaiah the son of imla . and jehoshaphat say let not the king say so . then the king of israel sent for one of his unsexed servant and say go quickly and come back with micaiah the son of imla . now the king of israel and jehoshaphat the king of judah be seat on their seat of authority dress in their robe by the doorway into samaria and all the prophet be act a prophet before them . and zedekiah the son of chenaanah make himself iron horn and say the lord say push back the aramaean with these you will put an end to them completely . and all the all the prophet with one voice be say good thing to the king so let your word be like theirs and say good thing . and micaiah say by the living lord whatever the lord say to me i will say . when he keeper and the lord say these have no master let them go back every man to his house in peace . and the king of israel say to jehoshaphat do i not say that he would not be a prophet of good to me but of evil ? then he say give ear now to the word of the lord i saw the lord seat on his seat of power and all the army of heaven in their place at his right hand and at his left . and the lord say how may ahab king of israel be trick into go up to ramoth gilead to his death ? and one say one thing and one another . then a spirit come forward and take his place before the lord and say i will get him to do it by a trick . and the lord say to him how ? and he say i will go out and be a spirit of deceit in the mouth of all his prophet . and the lord say your trick will have it effect on him go out and do so . and now see the lord have put a spirit of deceit in the mouth of these prophet of yours and the lord have say evil against you . then zedekiah the son of chenaanah come near and give micaiah a blow on the side of his face say where be the spirit of the lord whose word be in you ? and micaiah say truly you will see on that day when you go into an inner room to keep yourself safe . till i come back in peace . and micaiah say if you come back at all in peace the lord have not send his word by me . so the king of israel and jehoshaphat the king of judah go up to ramoth gilead . change in his dress and they go to the fight . now the king of aram have give order to the captain of his war carriage say make no attack on small or great but only on the king of israel . so when the of this the wrath of the lord have come on you . but still there be some good in you for you have put away the wood pillars out of the land and have give your heart to the worship of god . and jehoshaphat be live in jerusalem and he go out again among the people from beer sheba to the hill country of ephraim guide them back to the lord the god of their father . and he put judge through all lord be in you do your work with care for in the lord our god there be no evil or respect for high position or taking of payment to do wrong . then in jerusalem he give authority to certain of the order or rule or decision make them take care that they be not in the wrong before the lord so that wrath may not come on you and on your brother do this and you yourselves will not be in the wrong . levite will be overseer for you . be strong to do the work and may the lord be with the upright .now after this the child of moab and the child of ammon and with them some of the meunim make war after drive out the people of this land before your people israel give it to the seed of abraham your friend for ever ? and they make it their living place building there a holy house for your name fall out because of the disease he come to his death in cruel pain . and his people make no burning for him like the burning make for his father . he be thirty two year old when he become king and he evil do . and he do evil in the eye of the lord a the family of ahab do for after the death of his father they be his guide to his destruction . act on their suggestion he go with jehoram son of ahab fight against hazael king of aram . and ahaziah the son of jehoram king of judah go down to jezreel to see jehoram the son of ahab because he be ill. now by the purpose of god ahaziah 's journey to see jehoram be the cause of his downfall for when he come there he go out with jehoram against jehu the son of nimshi who have be mark out by the lord for the destruction of the family of ahab . now when jehu be effect the punishment of the family of ahab he come to the prince of judah and the son of ahaziah 's brother the servant of ahaziah and put them to death . and he go in search of ahaziah and when they come where he be for he be in a secret place in samaria they take him to jehu and put him to death then they put his body to rest in the earth for they say he be the son of jehoshaphat whose heart be true to the lord . so the family of ahaziah have no power to keep the kingdom . now when athaliah the mother of ahaziah saw that her son be dead she have all the rest of the seed of the kingdom of judah put to death . but jehoshabeath the daughter of the king secretly take joash the son of ahaziah away from among the king 's son who be put to death and put him and the woman who take care of him in a bedroom . so jehoshabeath the daughter of king jehoram the wife of jehoiada the priest and sister of ahaziah keep him safe from athaliah so that she do not put him to death . and she keep him safe with her in the house of god for six year while athaliah be rule the land .in the seventh year jehoiada make himself strong and make an agreement with the captain of hundred azariah the son of jeroham ishmael the son of jehohanan azariah the son of obed maaseiah the son of adaiah and elishaphat the son of zichri . and they go through judah get together the levite and the head of a the lord have say about the son of david . this be what you be to do let a third of you of the priest and levite who come in on the sabbath keep the door and a third be to be station at the king 's and any man who come into the house be to be put to death you be to keep with the king when he come in and when he go out . so the levite and all judah do a jehoiada the priest have give them order every one take with him his men those who be to come in and those who be to go out on the sabbath for jehoiada have not send away the division . then jehoiada the priest give to the captain of hundred the spear and body cover which have be king david 's and which be keep in the house of god . and he put all the people in position every man with his instrument of war in his hand from the right side of the house to the leave by the altar and the house and all round the king . then they make the king 's son come out and they put the crown on his head and give him the arm band and make him king and saw the king in his place by the pillar at the doorway and the captain and the horn by his side and all the people of the land be give sign of joy and sound the horn and the maker of melody be play on instrument of music take the chief part in the song of praise . then athaliah violently part her robe say broken faith break faith ! then jehoiada the priest give order to the captain of hundred who have authority over the army say take her outside the line and let anyone who go after her be put to death with the sword . for the priest say let her not be put to death in the house of the lord . so they put their hand on her and she go to the king 's house by the doorway of the king 's horse and there she be put to death . and jehoiada make an agreement between the lord and all the people and the king that they would be the lord 's people . then all the people go to the house of baal and have it pull down and it altar and image break up and mattan the priest of baal they put to death before the altar . and jehoiada put the work and the care of the house of the lord into the hand of the priest and the levite who have be group in division by david to make burned offering to the lord a it be record in the law of moses with joy and song a david have say . and he put door keeper at the door of the lord 's house to see that no one who be unclean in any way might come in . then he take the captain of hundred and the chief and the ruler of the people and all the people of the land and they come down with the king from the house of the lord through the high doorway into the king 's house and put the king on the seat of the kingdom . so all the people of the land be glad and the town be quiet for they have put athaliah to death with the sword .joash be seven year old when he become king and he be rule for forty year in jerusalem his mother 's name be zibiah of beer sheba . and joash do what be right in the eye of the lord as long a jehoiada the priest be live . and jehoiada take two wife for him and he become the father of son and daughter . now after this joash have a desire to put the house of the lord into good order again and get together the priest and levites he say to them go out into the town of judah year by year and get from all israel money to keep the house of your god in good condition and see that this be do without loss of time . the levite however be slow in do so . then the king sent for jehoiada the chief priest and say to him why have you not give the levite order that the tax fix by moses the servant of the lord and by the meeting of israel for the tent of witness be to be get in from judah and jerusalem and hand over ? for the house of the lord have be break up by athaliah that evil woman and her son and all it holy thing they have give to the baal . so at the king 's order they make a chest and put it outside the doorway of the house of the lord . and an order be send out through all judah and jerusalem that payment be to be make to the lord of the tax which moses the servant of god have put on israel in the waste land . and all the chief and all the people come gladly and put their money into the chest till they have all give . so when the chest be take to the king 's servant by the levite and they saw that there be much money in it the king 's scribe and the chief priest 's servant take the money out and put the chest back in it place . they do this day by day and get together a great amount of money . then the king and jehoiada give it to those who be responsible for get the work do on the lord 's house and with it they get wall builder and woodworker and metal worker to put the house of the lord in good order again . so the workman do their work make good what be damage and build up the house of god till it be strong and beautiful again . and when the work be do they take the rest of the money to the king and jehoiada and it be use for make the vessel for the house of the lord all the vessel need for the offering the spoon and the vessel of gold and silver . and as long a jehoiada be live the regular burn offering be offer in the house of the lord . but jehoiada become old and full of day and he come to his end he be a hundred and thirty year old at the time of his death . and they put him into his last resting place in the town of david among the king because he have do good in israel for god and for his house . now after the death of jehoiada the chief of judah come and go down on their face before the king . then the king give ear to them . and they give up the house of the lord god of their father and become worshipper of pillar of wood and of the image and because of this sin of theirs wrath come on judah and jerusalem . and the lord send them prophet to make them come back to him and they give witness against them but they would not give ear . then the spirit of god come on zechariah the son of jehoiada the priest and get up before the people he say to them god have say why do you go against the order of the lord so that everything go badly for you ? because you have give up the lord he have give you up . but when they have make a secret design against him he be stone with stone by the king 's order in the outer square of the lord 's house . so king joash do not keep in mind how good jehoiada his father have be to him but put his son to death . and in the hour of his death he say may the lord see it and take payment ! now in the spring the army of the aramaean come up against him they come against judah and jerusalem put to death all the great men of the people and send all the good they take from them to the king of damascus . for though the army of aram be only a small one the lord give a very great army into their hand because they have give up the lord the god of their father . so they put into effect the punishment of joash . and when they have go away from him for he be break with disease his servant make a secret design against him because of the blood of the son of jehoiada the priest and they put him to death on his bed and they put his body into the earth in the town of david but not in the rest place of the king . those who make design against him be zabad the son of shimeath an ammonite woman and jehozabad the son of shimrith a moabite woman . now the story of his son and all the word say by the prophet against him and the building up again of the lord 's house be record in the account in the book of the king . and amaziah his son become king in his place .amaziah be twenty five year old when he become king and he be rule in jerusalem for twenty nine year his mother 's name be jehoaddan of jerusalem . he do what be right in the eye of the lord but his heart be not completely true to the lord . now when he become strong in the kingdom he put to death those men who have take the life of the king his father . but he do not put their child to death for he keep the order of the lord record in the book of the law of moses say the father be not to be put to death for their child or the child for their father but a man be to be put to death for the sin which he himself have do . then amaziah get all judah together and put them in order by their family even all judah and benjamin under captain of thousand and captain of hundred and he have those of twenty year old and over numbered and they come to three hundred thousand of the best fight men train for war and in the use of the spear and the body cover . and for a hundred talent of silver he get a hundred thousand fight men from israel . but a man of god come to him say o king let not the army of israel go with you for the lord be not with israel that be the child of ephraim . but go yourself and be strong in war god will not let you go down before those who be fight against you for god have power to give help or to send you down before your attacker . then amaziah say to the man of god but what be to be do about the hundred talent which i have give for the armed band of israel ? and the man of god in answer say god be able to give you much more than this . so amaziah separate the arm band which have come to him from ephraim send them back again which make them very angry with judah and they go back burn with wrath . then amaziah take heart and go out at the head of his people and come to the valley of salt where he put to death ten thousand of the child of seir and ten thousand more the child of israel take living and make them go up to the top of the rock push them down from the top of the rock so that their body be break by the fall . but the men of the band which amaziah send back and do not take with him to the fight make attack on the town of judah from samaria to beth horon put to death three thousand of their people and take away a great store of their good . now when amaziah come back from the destruction of the edomites he take the god of the child of seir and make them his god worship them and burn offering before them . and so the wrath of the lord be move against amaziah and he send a prophet to him who say why have you go after the god of the people who have not give their people salvation from your hand ? but while he be talk to him the king say to him have we make you one of the king 's government ? say no more or it will be the cause of your death . then the prophet give up protesting and say it be clear to me that god 's purpose be your destruction because you have do this and have not give ear to my word . then amaziah king of judah act on the suggestion of his his house have be shut and the light put out no perfume have be burn or offering make to the god of israel in his holy place . and so the wrath of the lord have come on judah and jerusalem and he have of the lord with brass and cord instrument of music a order by david and gad the king 's seer and nathan the prophet for the order be the lord 's give by his prophet . so the levite take their place with david 's instrument and the priest with their horn . and hezekiah give the word for the burned offering to be offer on the altar . and when the burn offering be start then the song of the lord be start with the blowing of horn and with all the instrument of david king of israel . and all the people give worship to the sound of song and the blowing of horn and this go on till the burned offering be end . and at the end of the offer the king and all who be present with him give worship with bent head . then king hezekiah and the captain give order to the levite to give praise to god in the word of david and asaph the seer . and they make song of praise with joy and with bent head give worship . then hezekiah make answer and say now that you have give yourselves to the lord come near and take offering and praise offering into the house of the lord . so all the people take in offering and praise offering and those whose heart be move take in burned offering . the number of burn offering which the people take in be seventy ox a hundred male sheep and two hundred lamb all these be for burn offering to the lord . and the holy thing be six hundred ox and three thousand sheep . there be not enough priest for the work of cut up all the burn offering so their brother the levite give them help till the work be do and the priest have make themselves holy for the levite be more upright in heart to make themselves holy than the priest . and there be a great amount of burn offering with the fat of the peace offering and the drink offering for every burned offering . so the work of the lord 's house be put in order . and hezekiah and all the people be full of joy because god have make the people ready for the thing be do suddenly .then hezekiah sent word to all israel and judah and send letter to ephraim and manasseh request them to come to the house of the lord at jerusalem to keep the passover to the lord the god of israel . for the king after discussion with his chief and all the body of the people in jerusalem have make a decision to keep the passover in the second month . it be not possible to keep it at that time because not enough priest have make themselves holy and the people have not come together in jerusalem . and the thing be right in the eye of the king and all the people . so it be order that word be to be send out through all israel from beer sheba to dan that they be to come to keep the passover to the lord the god of israel at jerusalem because they have not keep it in great number in agreement with the law . so runner go with letter from the king and his chief through all israel and judah by the order of the king say o child of israel come back again to the lord the god of abraham isaac and israel so that he may come again to that small band of you which have be keep safe out of the hand of the king of assyria . do not be like your father and your brother who be sinner against the lord the god of their father so that he make them a cause of fear a you see . now do not be hard hearted a your father be but give yourselves to the lord and come into his holy place which he have make his for ever and be the servant of the lord your god so that the heat of his wrath may be turn away from you . for if you come back to the lord those who take away your brother and your child will have pity on them and let them come back to this land for the lord your god be full of grace and mercy and his face will not be turn away from you if you come back to him . so the runner go from town to town through all the country of ephraim and manasseh as far a zebulun but they be laugh at and make sport of . however some of asher and manasseh and zebulun put away their pride and come to jerusalem . and in judah the power of god give them one heart to do the order of the king and the captain which be take a the word of the lord . so a very great number of people come together at jerusalem to keep the feast of unleavened bread in the second month . and they get to work and take away all the altar in jerusalem and they put all the vessel for burn perfume into the stream kidron . then on the fourteenth day of the second month they put the passover lamb to death and the priest and the levite be sham and make themselves holy and take burn offering into the house of the lord . and they take their place in their right order a it be order in the law of moses the man of god the priest drain out on the altar the blood give them by the levite . for there be still a number of the people there who have not make themselves holy so the levite have to put passover lambs to death for those who be not clean to make them holy to the lord . for a great number of the people from ephraim and manasseh issachar and zebulun have not make themselves clean but they take the passover meal though not in the right way . for hezekiah have make prayer for them say may the good lord have mercy on everyone who with all his heart be turn to god the lord the god of his father even if he have not be make clean after the rule of the holy place . and the lord give ear to hezekiah and make the people well . so the child of israel who be present in jerusalem keep the feast of unleavened bread for seven day with great joy and the levite and the priest give praise to the lord day by day make melody to the lord with loud instrument . and hezekiah say kind word to the levite who be expert in the ordering of the worship of the lord so they keep the feast for seven day offer peace offering and praise the lord the god of their father . and by the desire of all the people the feast go on for another seven day and they keep the seven day with joy . for hezekiah king of judah give to the people for offering a thousand ox and seven thousand sheep and the ruler give a thousand ox and ten thousand sheep and a great number of priest make themselves holy . and all the people of judah with the priest and the levite and those who have come from israel and men from other land who have come from israel or who be live in judah be glad with great joy . so there be great joy in jerusalem for nothing like this have be see in jerusalem from the time of solomon the son of david king of israel . then the priest and the levite give the people a blessing and the voice of their prayer go up to the holy place of god in heaven .now when all this be over all the men of israel who be present go out into the town of judah cause the stone pillars to be break up and the wood pillar to be cut down pull down the high place and the altar in all judah and benjamin as well a in ephraim and manasseh till all be go . then all the child of israel go back to their town every man to his property . then hezekiah put in order the division of the priest and levites every man in his division in relation to his work for the burned offering and peace offering and for the ordering of worship and for give praise at the door of the lord 's house . and he give the king 's part of his private property for the burned offering that be for the morning and evening offering and the offering for the sabbath and the new moon and the regular feast a it be record in the law of the lord . in addition he give order to the people of jerusalem to give to the priest and levite that part which be theirs by right so that they might be strong in keep the law of the lord . and when the order be make public straight away the child of israel give in great amount the first fruit of their grain and wine and oil and honey and of the produce of their field and they take in a tenth part of everything a great store . and the child of israel and judah who be live in the town of judah come with the tenth part of their ox and sheep and a tenth of all the holy thing which be to be give to the lord their god and put them in great mass . the first store of thing be put down in the third month and in the seventh month the mass be complete . and when hezekiah and the ruler come and saw all the store of good they give praise to the lord and to his people israel . then hezekiah put question to the priest and levites about the store of good . and azariah the chief priest of the family of zadok say in answer from the time when the people first come with their offering into the house of the lord we have have food enough and more than enough for the blessing of the lord be on his people and there be this great store which have not be use . then hezekiah say that store room be to be make ready in the house of the lord and this be do . and in them they put all the offering and the tenth and the holy thing keep nothing back and over them be conaniah the levite with shimei his brother second to him . and jehiel and azaziah and nahath and asahel and jerimoth and jozabad and eliel and ismachiah and mahath and benaiah be overseer under the direction of conaniah and shimei his brother by the order of hezekiah the king and azariah the ruler of the house of god . and kore the son of imnah the levite the keeper of the east door have control of the offering freely give to god and the distribution of the offering of the lord and the most holy thing . and under him be eden and miniamin and jeshua and shemaiah and amariah and shecaniah in the town of the priest who be make responsible for give it to all their brother by division to small and great as well a to all the male of three year old and over list by their family who go into the house of the lord to do what be need day by day for their special work with their division . and the family of the priest be list by their father ' name but the levite of twenty year old and over be list in relation to their work in their division and in the list be all their little one and their wife and their son and daughter through all the people they make themselves holy in the position which they be give . and a for the son of aaron the priest live in the country on the outskirt of their town every different town there be men mark out by name to give their part of the good to all the male among the priest and to all who be list among the levite . this hezekiah do through all judah he do what be good and right and true before the lord his god . and for everything he undertake in connection with the work of the house of god and his law and order he get direction from god and do it with serious purpose and thing go well for him .now after these thing and this true hearted work sennacherib king of assyria come into judah and put his army in position before the walled town of judah design to make his way into them by force . and when hezekiah saw that sennacherib have come for the purpose of fight against jerusalem he take up with his ruler and men of war the question of stop up the water spring outside the town and they give him their support . so they get together a great number of people and have all the water spring and the stream flow through the land stop up say why let the king of assyria come and have much water ? then he take heart building up the wall where it be break down and make it tower higher and build another wall outside and he make strong the millo in the town of david and get together a great store of all sort of instrument of war . and he put war chief over the people and sent for them all to come together to him in the wide place at the doorway into the town and to give them heart he say to them be strong and take heart have no fear and do not be trouble on account of the king of assyria and all the great army with him for there be a great with u . with him be an arm of flesh but we have the lord our god help u and fight for u . and the people put their faith in what hezekiah king of judah say . after this sennacherib king of assyria send his servant to jerusalem at that time he be station with all his army in front of lachish to say to hezekiah and all the men of judah in jerusalem sennacherib king of assyria say in what be you place your hope wait here in the walled town of jerusalem ? be it not hezekiah who have get you to do it cause your death from need of food and water by say the lord our god will give u salvation out of the hand of the king of assyria ? have not this same hezekiah take away his high place and his altar say to judah and jerusalem give worship before one altar only burn offering on it ? have you no knowledge of what i and my father have do to all the people of every land ? be the god of the nation of those land able to keep their land from fall into my hand ? who be there among all the god of those nation which my father put to destruction who be able to keep his people safe from my hand ? and be it possible that your god will keep you safe from my hand ? so do not be trick by hezekiah or let him get you to do this and do not put any faith in what he say for no god of any nation or kingdom have be able to keep his people safe from my hand or the hand of my father how much less will your god keep you safe from my hand ! and his servant say even more against the lord god and against his servant hezekiah . and he send letter in addition to put shame on the lord the god of israel and to say evil against him say a the god of the nation of other land have not be able to keep their people safe from my hand no more will the god of hezekiah keep his people safe from my hand . these thing they say cry out with a loud voice in the jew ' language to the people of jerusalem who be on the wall with the purpose of trouble them and put fear into them so that they might take the town talk of the god of jerusalem a if he be like the god of the people of the earth the work of men 's hand . and hezekiah the king and isaiah the prophet the son of amoz make prayer because of this cry out to heaven . and the lord send an angel who put to death all the men of war and the chief and the captain in the army of the king of assyria . so he go back to his country in shame . and when he come into the house of his god his son the offspring of his body put him to death there with the sword . so the lord give hezekiah and the people of jerusalem salvation from the power of sennacherib the king of assyria and from all others give them rest on every side . and great number come to jerusalem with offering for the lord and thing of great price for hezekiah king of judah so that he be honour among all nation from that time . in those day hezekiah be ill and near death and he make prayer to the lord and the lord in answer give him a sign . but hezekiah do not do a have be do to him for his heart be lift up in pride and so wrath come on him and on judah and jerusalem . but then hezekiah in sorrow for what he have do put away his pride and he and all jerusalem make themselves low so that the wrath of the lord do not come on them in hezekiah 's life time . and hezekiah have very great wealth and honour and he make himself store house for his gold and silver and jewel and spice and for body cover and all sort of beautiful vessel . and store house for the produce of grain and wine and oil and building for all sort of beast and flock . and he make town for himself and get together much property in flock and herd for god have give him great wealth . it be hezekiah who have the high spring of the water of gihon stop and the water take down on the west side of the town of david . in everything he undertake hezekiah do well . however in the business of the representative send by the ruler of babylon to get news of the wonder which have take place in the land god give up guide him test him to see what be in his heart . now the rest of the act of hezekiah and the good he do be record in the vision of isaiah the prophet the son of amoz and in the book of the king of judah and israel . so hezekiah go to rest with his father and they put his body into the high part of the rest place of the son of david and all judah and the people of jerusalem give him honour at his death . and manasseh his son become king in his place .manasseh be twelve year old when he become king and he be rule for fifty five year in jerusalem . he do evil in the eye of the lord copy the disgust way of the nation whom the lord have send out of the land before the child of israel . for he put up again the high place which have be pull down by his father hezekiah and he make altar for the baal and pillar of wood and be a worshipper and servant of all the star of heaven and he make altar in the house of the lord of which the lord have say in jerusalem will my name be for ever . and he make altar for all the star of heaven in the two outer square of the house of the lord . more than this he make his child go through the fire in the valley of the son of hinnom and he make use of secret art and sign for read the future and unnatural power and give position to those who have control of spirit and to wonder worker he do much evil in the eye of the lord move him to wrath . and he put the image he have make in the house of god the house of which god have say to david and to solomon his son in this house and in jerusalem the town which i have make mine out of all the tribe of israel will i put my name for ever and never again will i let the foot of israel be move out of the land which i have give to their father if only they will take care to do all my order even all the law and the order and the rule give to them by moses . and manasseh make judah and the people of jerusalem go out of the true way so that they do more evil than those nation whom the lord give up to destruction before the child of israel . and the word of the lord come to manasseh and his people but they give no attention . so the lord send against them the captain of the army of assyria who make manasseh a prisoner and take him away in chain to babylon . and cry out to the lord his god in his trouble he make himself low before the god of his father and make prayer to him and in answer to his prayer god let him come back to jerusalem and to his kingdom . then manasseh be certain that the lord be god . after this he make an outer wall for the town of david on the west side of gihon in the valley as far a the way into the town by the fish doorway and he put a very high wall round the ophel and he put captain of the army in all the walled town of judah . he take away the strange god and the image out of the house of the lord and all the altar he have put up on the hill of the lord 's house and in jerusalem and put them out of the town . and he put the altar of the lord in order offering peace offering and praise offering on it and say that all judah be to be servant of the lord the god of israel . however the people still make offering in the high place but only to the lord their god . now the rest of the act of manasseh and his prayer to his god and the word which the seer say to him in the name of the lord the god of israel be record among the act of the king of israel . and the prayer which he make to god and how god give him an answer and all his sin and his wrongdoing and the place where he make high place and put up pillar of wood and image before he put away his pride be record in the history of the seer . so manasseh go to rest with his father and they put his body to rest in his house and amon his son become king in his place . amon be twenty two year old when he become king and he be rule for two year in jerusalem . he do evil in the eye of the lord a manasseh his father have do and amon make offering to all the image which his father manasseh have make and be their servant . he do not make himself low before the lord a his father manasseh have do but go on sin more and more . and his servant make a secret design against him and put him to death in his house . but the people of the land put to death all those who have take part in the design against king amon and make his son josiah king in his place .josiah be eight year old when he become king he be rule in jerusalem for thirty one year . and he do what be right in the eye of the lord walking in the way of his father david without turn to the right hand or to the left . in the eighth year of his rule while he be still young his heart be first turn to the god of his father david and in the twelfth year he undertake the clear away of all the high place and the pillar and the image of wood and metal from judah and jerusalem . he have the altar of the baal break down while he himself be present and the sun image which be place on high over them he have cut down and the pillar of wood and the metal image he have break up and crush to dust drop the dust over the resting place of the dead who have make offering to them . and he have the bone of the priest burn on their altar and so he make judah and jerusalem clean . and in all the town of manasseh and ephraim and simeon as far a naphtali he make waste their house round about . he have the altar and the pillar of wood pull down and the image crush to dust and all the sun image cut down through all the land of israel and then he go back to jerusalem . now in the eighteenth year of his rule when the land and the house have be make clean he send shaphan the son of azaliah and maaseiah the ruler of the town and joah the son of joahaz the recorder to make good what be damage in the house of the lord his god . and they come to hilkiah the chief priest and give him all the money which have be take into the house of god which the levites the keeper of the door have get from manasseh and ephraim and those of israel who have not be take away a prisoner and from all judah and benjamin and the people of jerusalem . and they give it to the overseer of the work of the lord 's house and the overseer give it to the workman work in the house for build it up and make good what be damage even to the woodworker and builder to get cut stone and wood for join the structure together and for make board for the house which the king of judah have give up to destruction . and the men do the work well and those who have authority over them be jahath and obadiah levite of the son of merari and zechariah and meshullam of the son of the kohathites who be to be responsible for see that the work be do and others of the levite who be expert with instrument of music have authority over the transport worker give direction to all who be do any sort of work and among the levite there be scribe and overseer and door keeper . now when they be take out the money which have come into the lord 's house hilkiah the priest come across the book of the law of the lord which he have give by the mouth of moses . then hilkiah say to shaphan the scribe i have make discovery of the book of the law in the house of the lord . and hilkiah give the book to shaphan . and shaphan take the book to the king and he give him an account of what have be do say your servant be do all they have be give to do they have take out all the money which be in the lord 's house and have give it to the overseer and to the workman . then shaphan the scribe say to the king hilkiah the priest have give me a book and he make a start at read some of it to the king . and the king hear the word of the law take his robe in his hand violently part it a a sign of his grief . and he give order to hilkiah and to ahikam the son of shaphan and abdon the son of micah and shaphan the scribe and asaiah the king 's servant say go and get direction from the lord for me and for those who be still in israel and for judah about the word of this book which have come to light for great be the wrath of the lord which have be let loose on u because our father have not keep the word of the lord or do what be record in this book . so hilkiah and those whom the king send go to huldah the woman prophet the wife of shallum the son of tokhath the son of hasrah the keeper of the robe now she be live in jerusalem in the second part of the town and they have talk with her about this thing . and she say to them the lord the god of israel have say say to the man who send you to me these be the word of the lord see i will send evil on this place and on it people even all the curse in the book which they have be read before the king of judah because they have give me up burn offering to other god and move me to wrath by all the work of their hand so my wrath be let loose on this place and will not be put out . but to the king of judah who send you to get direction from the lord say this be what the lord the god of israel have say because you have give ear to my word and your heart be soft and you make yourself low before god on hear his word about this place and it people and with weep and sign of grief have make yourself low before me i have give ear to you say the lord god . see i will let you go to your father and be put in your last resting place in peace and your eye will not see all the evil which i will send on this place and on it people . so they take this news back to the king . then the king sent and get together all the responsible men of judah and of jerusalem . and the king go up to the house of the lord with all the men of judah and the people of jerusalem and the priest and the levite and all the people small and great and they be present at his reading of the book of the law which have come to light in the house of the lord . then the king take his place by the pillar make an agreement before the lord to go in the way of the lord and to keep his order and his decision and his rule with all his heart and with all his soul and to keep the word of the agreement record in this book . and he make all the people in jerusalem and benjamin give their word to keep it . and the people of jerusalem keep the agreement of god the god of their father . josiah take away all the disgust thing out of all the land of the child of israel and make all who be in israel servant of the lord their god . and as long a he be live they be true to the lord the god of their father .and josiah keep a passover to the lord in jerusalem on the fourteenth who be holy to the lord see the holy ark be in the house which solomon the son of david king of israel make it will no longer have to be transport on your back now be the servant of the lord your god take away the burned offering so that they might give them to be offer to the lord for the division of the family of the people a it be record in the book of moses . and they do the same with the ox . and the passover lamb be cook over the fire a it say in the law and the holy offering be cook in pot and basin and vessel and take quickly to all the people . and after that they make ready for . and the son of asaph the maker of melody be in their place a order by david and asaph and heman and jeduthun the king 's seer and the door keeper be station at every door there be no need for them to go away from their place for their brother the levite make ready for them . so everything need for the worship of the lord be make ready that same day for the keep of the passover and the offering of burned offering on the altar of the lord a king josiah have give order . and all the child of israel who be present keep the passover and the feast of unleavened bread at that time for seven day . no passover like it have be keep in israel from the day of samuel the prophet and not one of the king of israel have ever keep a passover like the one kept by josiah and the priest and the levite and all those of judah and israel who be present and the people of jerusalem . in the eighteenth year of the rule of josiah this passover be keep . after all this and after josiah have put the house in order neco king of egypt go up to make war at carchemish by the river euphrates and josiah go out against him . but he send representative to him say what have i to do with you o king of judah ? i have not come against you this day but against those with whom i be at war and god have give me order to go forward quickly keep out of god 's way for he be with me or he will send destruction on you . however josiah would not go back but keep to his purpose of fight against him and give no attention to the word of neco which come from god he go forward to the fight in the valley of megiddo . and the bowman send their arrow at king josiah and the king say to his servant take me away for i be badly wound . so his servant take him out of the line of war carriage and put him in his second carriage and take him to jerusalem where he come to his end and they put his body in the rest place of his father . and in all judah and jerusalem there be great weep for josiah . and jeremiah make a song of grief for josiah and to this day josiah be name by all the maker of melody men and woman in their song of grief they make it a rule in israel and the song be record among the song of grief . now the rest of the act of josiah and the good he do in keep with what be record in the law of the lord and all his act first and last be record in the book of the king of israel and judah .then the . then the king of egypt take the kingdom from him in jerusalem and put on the land a tax of a hundred talent of silver and a talent of gold . and the king of egypt make eliakim his brother king over judah and jerusalem change his name to jehoiakim . and neco take his brother jehoahaz away to egypt . jehoiakim be twenty five year old when he become king he be rule in jerusalem for eleven year and he do evil in the eye of the lord his god . nebuchadnezzar king of babylon come up against him and take him away in chain to babylon . and nebuchadnezzar take away some of the vessel of the lord 's the lord . in the spring of the year king nebuchadnezzar sent and take him away to babylon with the beautiful vessel of the house of the lord and make zedekiah his father 's brother king over judah and jerusalem . zedekiah be twenty one year old when he become king he be rule in jerusalem for eleven year . he do evil in the eye of the lord and do not make himself low before jeremiah the prophet god of israel . and more than this all the great men of judah and the priest and the people make their sin great turn to all the disgust way of the nation and they make unclean the house of the lord which he have make holy in jerusalem . and the lord the god of their father send word to them by his servant send early and frequently because he have pity on his people and on his living place but they put shame on the servant of god make sport of his word and laugh at his prophet till the wrath of god be move against his people till there be no help . so he send against them the king of the chaldaean who put their young men to death with the sword in the house of their holy place and have no pity for any young man or virgin old man or white haired god give them all into his hand . and all the vessel of the house of god great and small and the stored wealth of the lord 's house and the wealth of the king and his chief he take away to babylon . and the house of god be burn and the and they become servant to him and to his son till the kingdom of persia come to power so that the word of the lord which he say by the mouth of jeremiah might come true till the land have have pleasure in her sabbath for as long a she be waste the land keep the sabbath till seventy year be complete . now in the first year of cyrus king of persia in order that the word which the lord have say by the mouth of jeremiah might come true the spirit of cyrus king of persia be move by the lord and he make a public statement and have it give out through all his kingdom and put in write say
