make search for their record among the list of family but their name be nowhere to be see so they be look on a unclean and no long priest . and the tirshatha say that they be not to have the most holy thing for their food till a priest come to give decision by urim and thummim . the number of all the people together be forty two thousand three hundred and sixty as well a their men servant and their woman servant of whom there be seven thousand three hundred and thirty seven and they have two hundred men and woman to make music . they have seven hundred and thirty six horse two hundred and forty five transport beast four hundred and thirty five camel six thousand seven hundred and twenty ass . and some of the head of family when they come to the house of the lord which be in jerusalem give freely of their wealth for the building up of the house of god in it place every one a he be able give for the work sixty one thousand darics of gold five thousand pound of silver and a hundred priest ' robe . so the priest and the levite and the people and the music maker and the door keeper and the nethinim take up their place in their town even all israel in their town .and when the seventh month come and the child of israel be in the town the people come together like one man to jerusalem . then jeshua the son of jozadak and his brother the priest and zerubbabel the son of shealtiel with his brother get up and make the altar of the god of israel for burned offering a be record in the law of moses the man of god . they put the altar on it base for fear be on them because of the people of the country and they make burn offering on it to the lord even burn offering morning and evening . and they keep the feast of tent a it be record make the regular burn offering every day by number a it be order for every day what be need . and after that the regular burned offering and the offering for the new moon and all the fixed feast of the lord which have be make holy and the offering of everyone who freely give his offering to the lord . from the first day of the seventh month they make a start with the burned offering but the base of the temple of the lord have still not be put in it place . and they give money to the stoneworkers and woodworker and meat and drink and oil to the people of zidon and of tyre for the transport of cedar tree from lebanon to the sea to joppa a cyrus king of persia have give them authority to do . now in the second year of their come into the house of god in jerusalem in the second month the work be take in hand by zerubbabel the son of shealtiel and jeshua the son of jozadak and the rest of their brother the priest and the levite and all those who have come from the land where they be prisoner to jerusalem and they make the levite of twenty year old and over responsible for oversee the work of the house of the lord . then jeshua with his son and his brother kadmiel with his son the son of hodaviah together take up the work of oversee the workman in the house of god the son of henadad with their son and their brother the levite . and when the builder put in position the base of the temple of the lord the priest dress in their robe take their place with horn and the levite the son of asaph with brass instrument to give praise to the lord in the way order by david king of israel . and they give praise to the lord answer one another in their song and say for he be good for his mercy to israel be eternal . and all the people give a great cry of joy when they give praise to the lord because the base of the lord 's house be put in place . but a number of the priest and levite and the head of family old men who have see the first house when the base of this house be put down before their eye be overcome with weep and a number be cry out with joy so that in the ear of the people the cry of joy be mixed with the sound of weep for the cry of the people be loud and come to the ear of those who be a long way off .now news come to the hater of judah and benjamin that the people who have come back be build a temple to the lord the god of israel then they come to zerubbabel and to the head of family and say to them let u take part in the building with you for we be servant of your god even a you be and we have be make offering to him from the day of esar haddon king of assyria who put u here . but zerubbabel and jeshua and the rest of the head of family in israel say to them you have no part with u in the building of a house for our god we ourselves will do the work together for the lord the god of israel a cyrus king of persia have give u order . then the people of the land make the hand of the people of judah feeble trouble them with fear in their building and they give payment to men who make design against them and keep them from effect their purpose all through the time of cyrus king of persia till darius become king . and in the time of ahasuerus when he first become king they put on record a statement against the people of judah and jerusalem . and in the time of artaxerxes bishlam mithredath tabeel and the rest of his friend send a letter to artaxerxes king of persia write it in the aramaean writing and language . rehum the chief ruler and shimshai the scribe send a letter against jerusalem to artaxerxes the king the letter be send by rehum the chief ruler and shimshai the scribe and their friend the dinaites and the apharsathchites the tarpelites the apharsites the archevites the babylonian the shushanchites the dehaites the elamite and the rest of the nation which the great and noble osnappar take over and put in samaria and the rest of the country over the river this be a copy of the letter which they send to artaxerxes the king your servant live across the river send these word we give news to the king that the jew who come from you have come to u at jerusalem they be build up again that uncontrolled and evil town the wall be complete and they be join up the base . the king may be certain that when the building of this town and it wall be complete they will give no tax or payment in good or force payment and in the end it will be a cause of loss to the king . now because we be responsible to the king and it be not right for u to see the king 's honour damage we have send to give the king word of these thing so that search may be make in the book of the record of your father and you will see in the book of the record that this town have be uncontrolled and a cause of trouble to king and country and that there be outburst against authority there in the past for which reason the town be make waste . we give you word that if the building of this town and it wall be make complete there will be an end of your power in the country across the river . then the king send an answer to rehum the chief ruler and shimshai the scribe and their friend live in samaria and to the rest of those across the river say peace to you and now the sense of the letter which you send to u have be make clear to me and i give order for a search to be make and it be certain that in the past this town have make trouble for king and that outbursts against authority have take place there . far there have be great king in jerusalem ruling over all the country across the river to whom they give tax and payment in good and forced payment . give an order now that these men be to do nothing more and that the building of the town be to be stop till i give an order . be certain to do this with all care do not let trouble be increase to the king 's damage . then after read the king 's letter rehum and shimshai the scribe and their friend go quickly to jerusalem to the jew and have them stop by force . so the work of the house of god at jerusalem come to an end so it be stop till the second year of the rule of darius king of persia .now the prophet haggai and zechariah the son of iddo be preach to the jew in judah and jerusalem in the name of the god of israel . then zerubbabel the son of shealtiel and jeshua the son of jozadak get up and make a start at build the house of god at jerusalem and the prophet of god be with them help them . at the same time tattenai ruler of the land across the river and shethar bozenai and their men come to them and say who give you order to go on building this house and this wall ? then they say these word to them what be the name of the men who be at work on this building ? but the eye of their god be on the chief of the jew and they do not make them give up work till the question have be put before darius and an answer have come by letter about it . this be a copy of the letter which tattenai the ruler of the land across the river and shethar bozenai and his friend the apharsachites live across the river send to darius the king they send him a letter say to darius the king all peace this be to give the king word that we go into the land of judah to the house of the great god which be make of great stone and have it wall support with wood and the work be go on with industry and they be do it well . then we say to the men responsible who give you authority for the building of this house and these wall ? and we make request for their name so that we might send you word and give you the name of the men at the head of them . and they make answer to u say we be the servant of the god of heaven and earth and we be build the house which be put up in time long past and be design and make complete by a great king of israel . but when the god of heaven be move to wrath by our father he give them up into the hand of nebuchadnezzar king of babylon the chaldaean who send destruction on this house and take the people away into babylon . but in the first year of cyrus king of babylon cyrus the king give an order for the building of this house of god and the gold and silver vessel of the house of god which nebuchadnezzar take from the temple which be in jerusalem and put into the house of his god in babylon these cyrus the king take from the house of his god in babylon and give to one name sheshbazzar whom he have make ruler and he say to him go take these vessel and put them in the temple in jerusalem and let the house of god be put up again in it place . then this same sheshbazzar come and put the house of god in jerusalem on it base and from that time till now the building have be go on but it be still not complete . so now if it seem good to the king let search be make in the king 's store house at babylon to see if it be true that an order be give by cyrus the king for the building of this house of god at jerusalem and let the king send u word of his pleasure in connection with this business .then darius the king give an order and a search be make in the house of the record where the thing of value be store up in babylon . and at achmetha in the great house of the king in the land of medium they come across a roll in which this statement be put on record in the first year of cyrus the king cyrus the king make an order in connection with the house of god at jerusalem let the house be put up the place where they make offering and let the earth for the base be put in place let it be sixty cubit high and sixty cubit wide with three line of great stone and one line of new wood support and let the necessary money be give out of the king 's store house and let the gold and silver vessel from the house of god which nebuchadnezzar take from the temple at jerusalem to babylon be give back and take again to the temple at jerusalem every one in it place and put them in the house of god . so now tattenai ruler of the land across the river and shethar bozenai and your people the apharsachites across the river keep far from that place let the work of this house of god go on let the ruler of the jew and their responsible men put up this house of god in it place . far i give order a to what you be to do for the responsible men of the jew in connection with the building of this house of god that from the king 's wealth that be from the tax get together in the land over the river the money need be to be give to these men readily so that their work may not be stop . and whatever they have need of young ox and sheep and lamb for burn offering to the god of heaven grain salt wine and oil whatever the priest in jerusalem say be necessary be to be give to them day by day regularly so that they may make offering of a sweet smell to the god of heaven with prayer for the life of the king and of his son . and i have give order that if anyone make any change in this word one of the support be to be pull out of his house and he be to be lift up and fix to it and his house be to be make waste for this and may the god who have make it a rest place for his name send destruction on all king and people whose hand be outstretched to make any change in this or to do damage to this house of god at jerusalem . i darius have give this order let it be do with all care . then tattenai the ruler across the river and shethar bozenai and their people because of the order give by king darius do a he have say with all care . and the responsible men of the jew go on with their building and do well help by the teaching of haggai the prophet and zechariah the son of iddo . they go on building till it be complete in keep with the word of the god of israel and the order give by cyrus and darius and artaxerxes king of persia . and the building of this house be complete on the third day of the month adar in the sixth year of the rule of darius the king . and the child of israel the priest and the levite and the rest of those who have come back kept the feast of the opening of this house of god with joy . and across the river that whatever ezra the priest the scribe of the law of the god of heaven may have need of from you be to be do with all care up to a hundred talent of silver a hundred measure of grain a hundred measure of wine and a hundred measure of oil and salt without measure . whatever be order by the god of heaven let it be do completely for the house of the god of heaven so that there may not be wrath against the kingdom of the king and his son . in addition we make it clear to you that it will be against the law to put any tax or payment in good or force payment on any of the priest or levites the music maker door keeper nethinim or any servant of this house of god . and you ezra by the wisdom of your god which be in you be to put ruler and judge to have authority over all the people across the river who have knowledge of the law of your god and you be to give teaching to him who have no knowledge of them . and if anyone do not keep the law of your god and the law of the king take care that punishment be give to him by death or by drive him from his country or by take away his good or by put him in prison . praise be to the lord the god of our father who have put the silver and the gold be an offering freely give to the lord the god of your father . take care of them and keep them till you put them on the scale before the chief of the priest and the levite and the chief of the family of israel in jerusalem in the room of the house of the lord . so the priest and the levite take the weight of silver and gold and the vessel to take them to jerusalem into the be wait to make an attack on u by the way . and we come to jerusalem and be there for three day . and on the fourth day the silver and the gold and the vessel be measure out by weight in the house of our god into the hand of meremoth the son of uriah the priest and with him be eleazar the son of phinehas and with them be jozabad the son of jeshua and noadiah the son of binnui the levite all be across the river and they give the people and the house of god the help which be need .now after these thing be do the captain come to me and say the people of israel and the priest and levite have not keep themselves separate from the people of the land but have take part in the disgusting way of the canaanite the hittite the perizzites the jebusites the ammonite the moabites the egyptian and the amorites . for they have take their daughter for themselves and for their son so that the holy seed have be mix with the people of the land and in fact the captain and ruler have be the first to do this evil . and hear this with sign of grief and pull out the hair of my head and my chin i take my seat on the earth deeply troubled . then everyone who go in fear of the word of the god of israel because of the sin of those who have come back come together to me and i keep where i be overcome with grief till the evening offering . and at the even offering have make myself low before god i get up and with sign of grief fall down on my knee with my hand stretch out to the lord my god i say o my god shame keep me from lift up my face to you my god for our sin be increase high than our head and our evil do have come up to heaven . from the day of our father till this day we have be great sinner and for our sin we and our king and our priest have be give up into the hand of the king of the land to the sword and to prison and to loss of good and to shame of face a it be this day . and now for a little time grace have come to u from the lord our god to let a small band of u get free and to give u a nail in his holy place so that our god may give light to our eye and a measure of new life in our prison chain . for we be servant but our god have not be turn away from u in our prison but have have mercy on u before the eye of the king of persia to give u new strength to put up again the house of our god and to make fair it waste place and to give u a wall in judah and jerusalem . and now o our god what be we to say after this ? for we have not keep your law which you give to your servant the prophet say the land into which you be go to take it for a heritage be an unclean land because of the evil life of the people of the land and their disgusting way which have make the land unclean from end to end . so now do not give your daughter to their son or take their daughter for your son or do anything for their peace or well be for ever so that you may be strong living on the good of the land and hand it on to your child for a heritage for ever . and after everything which have come on u because of our evil do and our great sin and see that the punishment which you o god have give u be less than the measure of our sin and that you have keep from death those of u who be here be we again to go against your order take wife from among the people who do these disgust thing ? would you not be angry with u till our destruction be complete till there be not one who get away safe ? o lord god of israel righteousness be yours we be only a small band which have be keep from death a at this day see we be before you in our sin for no one may keep his place before you because of this .now while ezra be make his prayer and his statement of wrongdoing weep and fall down before the house of god a very great number of men and woman and child out of israel come together round him for the people be weep bitterly . and shecaniah the son of jehiel one of the son of elam answer say to ezra we have do evil against our god and have take a our wife strange woman of the people of the land but still there be hope for israel in this question . let u now make an agreement with our god to put away all the wife and all their child if it seem right to my lord and to those who go in fear of the word of our god and let it be do in keep with the law . up now ! for this be your business and we be with you take heart and do it . then ezra get up and make the chief of the priest and the levite and all israel take an oath that they would do this . so they take an oath . then ezra get up from before the house of god and go into the room of jehohanan the son of eliashib but when he come there he take no food or drink for he be sorrow for the sin of those who have come back . and they make a public statement through all judah and jerusalem to all those who have come back that they be to come together to jerusalem and that if anyone do not come before three day be past a order by the ruler and the responsible men all his good would be put under the curse and he himself would be cut off from the meeting of the people who have come back . then all the men of judah and benjamin come together to jerusalem before three day be past it be the ninth month on the twentieth day of the month and all the people be seat in the wide square in front of the house of god shake with fear because of this business and because of the great rain . and ezra the priest get to his foot and say to them you have do wrong and take strange woman for your wife so increase the sin of israel . so now give praise to the lord the god of your father and do his pleasure and make yourselves separate from the people of the land and from the strange woman . then all the people answer say with a loud voice a you have say so it be right for u to do . but the number of people be great and it be a time of much rain it be not possible for u to go on wait outside and this be not a thing which may be do in one day or even two for our sin in this business be great . so now let our ruler be representative for all the people and let all those in our town who be marry to strange woman come at fixed time and with them the responsible men and the judge of every town till the burn wrath of our god be turn away from u and this have be do . only jonathan the son of asahel and jahzeiah the son of tikvah be against this meshullam and shabbethai the levite support them . so history of nehemiah the son of hacaliah . now it come about in the month chislev in the twentieth year when i be in shushan the king 's town that hanani one of my brother come with certain men from judah and in answer to my request for news of the jew who have be prisoner and have get away and of jerusalem they say to me the small band of jew now live there in the land be in great trouble and shame the wall of jerusalem have be break down and it doorway burn with fire . then after hear these word for some day i give myself up to weep and sorrow seat on the earth and take no food i make prayer to the god of heaven and say o lord the god of heaven the great god greatly to be fear keep faith and mercy with those who have love for him and be true to his law let your ear now take note and let your eye be open so that you may give ear to the prayer of your servant which i make before you at this time day and night for the child of israel your servant while i put before you the sin of the child of israel which we have do against you truly i and my father 's people be sinner . we have do great wrong against you and have not keep the order the rule and the decision which you give to your servant moses . keep in mind o lord the order you give your servant moses say if you do wrong i will send you wander among the people but if you come back to me and keep my order and do them even if those of you who have be force out be live in the farthest part of heaven i will get them from there and take them back to the place mark out by me for the rest place of my name . now these be your servant and your people whom you have make yours by your great power and by your strong hand . o lord let your ear take note of the prayer of your servant and of the prayer of your servant who take delight in worship your name give help o lord to your servant this day and let him have mercy in the eye of this man . now i be the king 's wine servant .and it come about in the month nisan in the twentieth year of artaxerxes the king when wine be before him that i take up the wine and give it to the king . now i have never before be sad when the king be present . and the king say to me why be your face sad see that you be not ill ? this be nothing but sorrow of heart . then i be full of fear and say to the king may the king be live for ever be it not natural for my face to be sad when the town the place where the body of my father be at rest have be make waste and it doorway burn with fire ? then the king say to me what be your desire ? so i make prayer to the god of heaven . and i say to the king if it be the king 's pleasure and if your servant have your approval send me to judah to the town where the body of my father be at rest so that i may take in hand the building of it . and the king say to me the queen be seat by his side how long will your journey take and when will you come back ? so the king be pleased to send me and i give him a fixed time . far i say to the king if it be the king 's pleasure let letter be give to me for the ruler across the river so that they may let me go through till i come to judah and a letter to asaph the keeper of the king 's park so that he may give me wood to make board for the door of the tower of the house and for the wall of the town and for the house which be to be mine . and the king give me this for the hand of my god be on me . then i come to the ruler of the land across the river and give them the king 's letter . now the king have send with me captain of the army and horseman . and sanballat the horonite and tobiah the servant the ammonite hearing of it be greatly troubled because a man have come to the help of the child of israel . so i come to jerusalem and be there three day . and in the night i get up take with me a small band of men i say nothing to any man of what god have put into my heart to do for jerusalem and i have no beast with me but the one on which i be seat . and i go out by night through the doorway of the valley and past the dragon 's water spring as far a the place where waste material be put view the wall of jerusalem which be break down and the doorway which have be burn with fire . then i go on to the door of the fountain and to the king 's pool but there be no room for my beast to get through . then in the night i go up by the stream view the wall then turn back i go in by the door in the valley and so come back . and the chief have no knowledge of where i have be or what i be do and i have not then say anything to the jew or to the priest or the great one or the chief or the rest of those who be do the work . then i say to them you see what a bad condition we be in how jerusalem be a waste and it doorway burn with fire come let u get to work build up the wall of jerusalem so that we may no longer be put to shame . then i give them an account of how the hand of my god be on me help me and of the king 's word which he have say to me . and they say let u get to work on the building . so they make their hand strong for the good work . but sanballat the horonite and tobiah the servant the ammonite and geshem the arabian hearing of it make sport of u laugh at u and say what be you do ? will you go against the king ? then answer them i say the god of heaven he will be our help so we his servant will go on with our building but you have no part or right or any name in jerusalem .then eliashib the chief priest get up with his brother the priest and take in hand the building of the sheep doorway they make it holy and put it door in position as far a the tower of hammeah they make it holy even to the tower of hananel . and by his side the men of jericho be build . and after them zaccur the son of imri . the son of hassenaah be the builder of the fish doorway they put it board in place and put up it door with their lock and rod . by their side meremoth the son of uriah the son of hakkoz be make good the wall . then meshullam the son of berechiah the son of meshezabel and by him zadok the son of baana . near them the tekoites be at work but their chief do not put their neck to the work of their lord . joiada the son of paseah and meshullam the gibeon and of mizpah from the seat of the ruler across the river . near them be work uzziel the son of harhaiah the gold worker . and by him be hananiah one of the perfume maker build up jerusalem as far a the wide wall . near them be work rephaiah the son of hur the ruler of half jerusalem . by his side be jedaiah the son of harumaph opposite his house . and by him be hattush the son of with his daughter . hanun and the people of zanoah be work on the doorway of the valley they put it up and put up it door with their lock and rod and a thousand cubit of wall as far a the doorway where the waste material be place . and malchijah the son of rechab the ruler of the division of beth haccherem make good the doorway of the waste building it up and put up it door with their lock and the pool of shelah by the king 's garden as far a the step which go down from the town of david . by his side be work nehemiah the son of azbuk ruler of half the division of beth zur as far a the of mizpah make good another part opposite the way up to the store of arm at the turning of the wall . after him baruch the son of zabbai be hard at work on another part from the turning of the wall to the door of the house of eliashib the chief priest . after him meremoth the son of uriah the son of hakkoz be work on another part from the door of the house of eliashib as far a the end of his house . after him be work the priest the men of the lowland . after them come benjamin and hasshub opposite their house . after them azariah the son of maaseiah the son of ananiah make good the wall by the wall opposite his room . after him malchijah one of the gold worker to the nethinim and the trader make good the wall opposite the doorway of hammiphkad and as far a the way up to the angle . and between the way up to the angle and the sheep door the gold worker and the trader make good the wall .now sanballat hearing that we be build the wall be very angry and in his wrath make sport of the jew . and in the hearing of his countryman and the army of samaria he say what be these feeble jew do ? will they make themselves strong ? will they make offering ? will they get the work do in a day ? will they make the stone which have be burn come again out of the dust ? now tobiah the ammonite be by him and he say such be their building that if a fox go up it their stone wall will be break down . give ear o our god for we be look down on let their word of shame be turn back on themselves and let them be give up to waste in a land where they be prisoner let not their wrongdoing be cover or their sin wash away from before you for they have make you angry before the builder . so we go on build the wall and all the wall be join together half way up for the people be work hard . but when it come to the ear of sanballat and tobiah and the arabian and the ammonite and the ashdodites that the building of the wall of jerusalem be go forward and the broken place be be make good they be full of wrath and they make design all of them together to come and make an attack on jerusalem cause trouble there . but we make our prayer to god and have men on watch against them day and night because of them . and judah say the strength of the workman be give way and there be much waste material it be impossible for u to put up the wall . and those who be against u say without their knowledge and without their see u we will come among them and put them to death cause the work to come to a stop . and it come about that when the jew who be live near them come they say to u ten time from all direction they be come against u . so in the low part of the space at the back of the wall in the open place i put the people by family with their sword their spear and their bow . and after look i get up and say to the great one and to the chief and to the rest of the people have no fear of them keep in mind the lord who be great and greatly to be fear and take up arm for your brother your son and your daughter your wife and your house . and when it come to the ear of those who be against u that we have knowledge of their design and that god have make their purpose come to nothing we all go back to the wall everyone to his work and from that time half of my servant be do their part of the work and half keep the spear and body cover and the bow and the metal war dress and the chief be at the back of the men of judah . those who be build the wall and those who be move material do their part everyone work with one hand with his spear in the other every builder be work with his sword at his side . and by my side be a man for sound the horn . and i say to the great one and the chief and the rest of the people the work be great and widely space and we be far away from one another on the wall wherever you may be when the horn be sound come here to u our god will be fight for u . so we go on with the work and half of them have spear in their hand from the dawn of the morning till the star be see . and at the same time i say to the people let everyone with his servant come inside jerusalem for the night so that at night they may keep watch for u and go on work by day . so not one of u i or my brother or my servant or the watchman who be with me take off his clothing everyone go arm to the water .then there be a great outcry from the people and their wife against their countryman the jew . for there be some who say we our son and our daughter be a great number let u get grain so that we may have food for our need . and there be some who say we be give our field and our vine garden and our house for debt let u get grain because we be in need . and there be others who say we have give up our field and our vine garden to get money for the king 's tax . but our flesh be the same a the flesh of our countryman and our child a their child and now we be give our son and daughter into the hand of others to be their servant and some of our daughter be servant even now and we have no power to put a stop to it for other men have our field and our vine garden . and on hear their outcry and what they say i be very angry . and after turn it over in my mind i make a protest to the chief and the ruler and say to them every one of you be take interest from his countryman . and i get together a great meeting of protest . and i say to them we have give whatever we be able to give to make our brother the jew free who be servant and prisoner of the nation and would you now give up your brother for a price and be they to become our property ? then they say nothing answer not a word . and i say what you be do be not good be it not the more necessary for you to go in the fear of our god because of the shame which the nation may put on u ? even i and my servant have be take interest for the money and the grain we have let them have . so now let u give up this thing . give back to them this very day their field their vine garden their olive garden and their house as well a a hundredth part of the money and the grain and the wine and the oil which you have take from them . then they say we will give them back and take nothing for them we will do a you say . then i send for the priest and make them take an oath that they would keep this agreement . and shake out the fold of my robe i say so may god send out from his house and his work every man who do not keep this agreement even so let him be send out and make a nothing . and all the meeting of the people say so be it and give praise to the lord . and the people do a they have say . now from the time when i be make ruler of the people in the land of judah from the twentieth year till the thirty second year of artaxerxes the king for twelve year i and my servant have never take the food which be the right of the ruler . but early ruler who be before me make the people responsible for their upkeep and take from them bread and wine at the rate of forty shekel of silver and even their servant be lord over the people but i do not do so because of the fear of god . and i keep on with the work of this wall and we get no land for ourselves and all my servant be help with the work . and more than this a hundred and fifty of the jew and the ruler be guest at my table in addition to those who come to u from the nation round about u . now the food make ready for one day be one ox and six fat sheep as well a fowl and once in ten day a store of all sort of wine but all the same i do not take the food to which the ruler have a right because the people be crush under a hard yoke . keep in mind o my god for my good all i have do for this people .now when word be give to sanballat and tobiah and to geshem the arabian and to the rest of our hater that i have do the building of the wall and that there be no more broken place in it though even then i have not put up the door in the doorway sanballat and geshem sent to me say come let u have a meeting in one of the little town in the lowland of ono . but their purpose be to do me evil . and i send men to them say i be do a great work so that it be not possible for me to come down be the work to be stop while i go away from it and come down to you ? and four time they send to me in this way and i send them the same answer . then sanballat send his servant to me a fifth time with an open letter in his hand and in it these word be record it be say among the nation and geshem say so that you and the jew be hop to make yourselves free from the king 's authority and that this be why you be build the wall and they say that it be your purpose to be their king and that you have prophet preach about you in jerusalem and say there be a king in judah now an account of these thing will be send to the king . so come now and let u have a discussion . then i send to him say no such thing a you say be be do they be only a fiction you have make up yourself . for they be hop to put fear in u say their hand will become feeble and give up the work so that it may not get do . but now o god make my hand strong . and i go to the house of shemaiah the son of delaiah the son of mehetabel who be shut up and he say let u have a meeting in the house of god inside the temple and let the door be shut for they will come to put you to death truly in the night they will come to put you to death . and i say be i the sort of man to go in flight ? what man in my position would go into the temple to keep himself safe ? i will not go in . then it become clear to me that god have not send him he have give this word of a prophet against me himself and tobiah and sanballat have give him money to do so . for this reason they have give him money in order that i might be overcome by fear and do what he say and do wrong and so they would have reason to say evil about me and put shame on me . keep in mind o my god tobiah and sanballat and what they do and noadiah the woman prophet and the rest of the prophet whose purpose be to put fear into me . so the wall be complete on the twenty fifth day of the month elul in fifty two day . and when our hater have news of this all the nation round about u be full of fear and be greatly sham for they saw that this work have be do by our god . and far in those day the chief of judah send a number of letter to tobiah and his letter come to them . for in judah there be a number of people who have make an agreement by oath with him because he be the son in law of shecaniah the son of arah and his son jehohanan have take a his wife the daughter of meshullam the son of berechiah . and they say much before me of the good he have do and give him account of my word . and tobiah send letter with the purpose of cause me fear .now when the building of the wall be complete and i have put up the door and the door keeper and the music maker and the levite have be give their place i make my brother hanani and hananiah the ruler of the tower responsible for the government of jerusalem for he be a man of good faith fear god more than most . and i say to them do not let the door of jerusalem be open till the sun be high and while the watchman be in their place let the door be shut and lock and let the people of jerusalem be put on watch every one in his watch opposite his house . now the town be wide and great but the people in it be only a small number and the house have not be put up . and my god put it into my heart to get together the ruler and the chief and the people so that they might be list by family . and i come across a record of the name of those nethinim and all israel be live in their town .and when the seventh month come the child of israel be in their town . and all the people come together like one man into the wide place in front of the water doorway and they make a request to ezra the scribe that he would put before them the book of the law of moses which the lord have give to israel . and ezra the priest put the law before the meeting of the people before the men and woman and all those who be able to take it in on the first day of the seventh month . he be read it in the wide place in front of the water doorway from early morning till the middle of the day in the hearing of all those men and woman whose mind be able to take it in and the ear of all the people be open to the book of the law . and ezra the scribe take his place on a tower of wood which they have make for the purpose and by his side be place mattithiah and shema and anaiah and uriah and hilkiah and maaseiah on the right and on the left pedaiah and mishael and malchijah and hashum and hashbaddanah zechariah and meshullam . and ezra take the book open it before the eye of all the people for he be high than the people and when it be open all the people get to their foot and ezra give praise to the lord the great god . and all the people in answer say so be it so be it lift up their hand and with bent head they give worship to the lord go down on their face to the earth . and jeshua and ban and sherebiah and jamin akkub shabbethai hodiah maaseiah kelita azariah jozabad hanan pelaiah and the levite make the law clear to the people and the people keep in their place . and they give out the word of the book the law of god clearly and give the sense of it so that their mind be able to take it in . and nehemiah who be the tirshatha and ezra the priest and scribe and the levite who be the teacher of the people say to all the people this day be holy to the lord your god let there be no sorrow or weep for all the people be weep on hear the word of the law . then he say to them go away now and take the fat for your food and the sweet for your drink and send some to him for whom nothing be make ready for this day be holy to our lord and let there be no grief in your heart for the joy of the lord be your strong place . so the levite make all the people quiet say be quiet for the day be holy and do not give way to grief . and all the people go away to take food and drink and to send food to others and to be glad because the word which be say to them have be make clear . and on the second day the head of family of all the people and the priest and the levite come together to ezra the scribe to give attention to the word of the law . and they saw that it be record in the law that the lord have give order by moses that the child of israel be to have tent for their living place in the feast of the seventh month and that they be to give out an order and make it public in all their town and in jerusalem say go out to the mountain and get olive branch and branch of field olive and of myrtle and palm branch and branch of thick tree to make tent a it say in the book . and the people go out and get them and make themselves tent every one on the roof of his house and in the open space and in the open square of the house of god and in the wide place of the water doorway and the wide place of the doorway of ephraim . all the people who have be prisoner and have come back make tent and be live in them for from the time of jeshua the son of nun till that day the child of israel have not do so . and there be very great joy . and day by day from the first day till the last he be read from the book of the law of god . and they keep the feast for seven day and on the eighth day there be a holy meeting a it be order in the law .now on the twenty fourth day of this month the child of israel come together take no food and put haircloth and dust on their body . and the seed of israel make themselves separate from all the men of other nation publicly request forgiveness for their sin and the wrongdoing of their father . and for a fourth part of the day upright in their place they be read from the book of the law of their god and for a fourth part of the day they be request forgiveness and worship the lord their god . then jeshua and ban kadmiel shebaniah bunni sherebiah ban and chenani take their place on the step of the levite cry in a loud voice to the lord their god . then the levite jeshua and kadmiel ban hashabneiah sherebiah hodiah shebaniah and pethahiah say get up and give praise to the lord your god for ever and ever . praise be to your great name which be lift up high over all blessing and praise . you be the lord even you only you have make heaven the heaven of heaven with all their army the earth and all thing in it the sea and everything in them and you keep them from destruction and the army of heaven be your worshipper . you be the lord the god who take abram and make him yours guide him from ur of the chaldee and give him the name of abraham you saw that his heart be true to you and make an agreement with him to give the land of the canaanite the hittite the amorite and the perizzite and the jebusite and the girgashite even to give it to his seed and you have do what you say for righteousness be yours and you saw the trouble of our father in egypt and their cry come to your ear by the red sea and you do sign and wonder on pharaoh and all his servant and all the people of his land for you saw how cruel they be to them . so you get yourself a name a it be today . by you the sea be part before them so that they go through the sea on dry land and those who go after them go down into the deep like a stone into great water . and you go before them by day in a pillar of cloud and in a pillar of fire by night to give them light on the way they be to go . and you come down on mount sinai and your voice come to them from heaven give them right decision and true law good rule and order and you give them word of your holy sabbath and give them order and rule and a law by the hand of moses your servant and you give them bread from heaven when they be in need and make water come out of the rock for their drink and give them order to go in and take for their heritage the land which your hand have be lift up to give them . but they and our father in their pride make their neck stiff and give no attention to your order and would not do them and give no thought to the wonder you have do among them but make their neck stiff and turn away from you make a captain over themselves to take them back to their prison in egypt but you be a god of forgiveness full of grace and pity slow to wrath and great in mercy and you do not give them up . even when they have make for themselves an ox of metal and say this be your god who take you up out of egypt and have do so much to make you angry even then in your great mercy you do not give them up in the waste land the pillar of cloud still go before them by day guide them on their way and the pillar of fire by night to give them light and make clear the way they be to go . and you give your good spirit to be their teacher and do not keep back your manna from their mouth and give them water when they have need of it . truly for forty year you be their support in the waste land and they be in need of nothing their clothing do not get old or their foot become tired . and you give them kingdom and people make distribution to them in every part of the land so they take for their heritage the land of sihon even the land of the king of heshbon and the land of og king of bashan . and you make their child a great in number a the star of heaven and take them into the land of which you have say to their father that they be to go in and take it for themselves . so the child go in and take the land and you overcome before them the people of the land the canaanite and give them up into their hand with their king and the people of the land so that they might do with them whatever it be their pleasure to do . and they take wall town and a fat land and become the owner of house full of all good thing water hole cut in the rock vine garden and olive garden and a wealth of fruit tree so they have food enough and become fat and have joy in the good you give them . but they be hard hearted and go against your authority turn their back on your law and put to death your prophet who give witness against them with the purpose of turn them back again to you and they do much to make you angry . and so you give them up into the hand of their hater who be cruel to them and in the time of their trouble when they make their prayer to you you give ear to them from heaven and in your great mercy give them saviour who make them free from the hand of their hater . but when they have rest they do evil again before you so you give them into the hand of their hater who have rule over them but when they come back and make their prayer to you you give ear to them from heaven again and again in your mercy you give them salvation and give witness against them so that you might make them come back again to your law but their heart be lift up and they give no attention to your order and go against your decision which if a man keep them will be life to him and turn their back on you make their neck stiff and do not give ear . year after year you put up with them and give witness against them by your spirit through your prophet still they do not give ear and so you give them up into the hand of the people of the land . even then in your great mercy you do not put an end to them completely or give them up for you be a god of grace and mercy . and now our god the great the strong the god who be to be fear who keep faith and mercy let not all this trouble seem small to you which have come on u and on our king and our ruler and on our priest and our prophet and our father and on all your people from the time of the king of assyria till this day . but still you have be in the right in everything which have come on u you have be true to u but we have do evil and our king our ruler our priest and our father have not keep your law or give attention to your order and your witness with which you give witness against them . for they have not be your servant in their kingdom and in all the good thing you give them and in the great and fat land you give them and they have not be turn away from their evil do . now today we be servant and a for the land which you give to our father so that the produce of it and the good might be theirs see we be servant in it and it give much increase to the king whom you have put over u because of our sin and they have power over our body and over our cattle at their pleasure and we be in great trouble . and because of all this we be make an agreement in good faith and put it in write and our ruler our levite and our his decision and his rule and that we would not give our daughter to the people of the land or take their daughter for our son and if the people of the land come to do trade in good or food on the keeper day by day and they make the offering holy for the levite and the levite do the same for the son of aaron .on that day there be a reading from the book of moses in the hearing of the people and they saw that it say in the book that no ammonite or moabite might ever come into the meeting of god because they do not give the child of israel bread and water when they come to them but get balaam to put a curse on them though the curse be turn into a blessing by our god . so after hear the law they take out of israel all the mixed people . now before this eliashib the priest who have be place over the room of the house of our god be a friend of tobiah have make ready for him a great room where at one time they keep the meal offer the perfume and the vessel and the tenth of the grain and wine and oil which be give by order to the levite and the music maker and the door keeper and the lifted offering for the priest . but all this time i be not at jerusalem for in the thirty second year of artaxerxes king of babylon i go to the king and after some day i get the king to let me go and i come to jerusalem and it be clear to me what evil eliashib have do for tobiah in make ready for him a room in the building of the house of god . and it be evil in my eye so i have all tobiah 's thing put out of the room . then i give order and they make the room clean and i put back in them the vessel of the house of god with the meal offering and the perfume . and i saw that the levite have not be give what be need for their support so that the levite and the music maker who do the work have go away everyone to his field . then i make protest to the chief and say why have the house of god be give up ? and i get them together and put them in their place . then all judah come with the tenth part of the grain and wine and oil and put it into the store house . and i make controller over the store house shelemiah the priest and zadok the scribe and of the levite pedaiah and with them be hanan the son of zaccur the son of mattaniah they be take to be true men and their business be the distribution of these thing to their brother . keep me in mind o my god in connection with this and do not let the good which i have do for the house of my god and it worship go from your memory completely . in those day i saw in judah some who be crush grape on the sabbath and get in grain and put it on ass as well a wine and grape and fig and all sort of good which they take into jerusalem on the sabbath day and i give witness against them on the day when they be market food . and there be men of tyre there who come with fish and all sort of good trade with the child of judah and in jerusalem on the sabbath . then i make protest to the chief of judah and say to them what be this evil which you be do not keep the sabbath day holy ? do not your father do the same and do not our god send all this evil on u and on this town ? but you be cause more wrath to come on israel by not keep the sabbath holy . and so when the street of jerusalem be get dark before the sabbath i give order for the door to be shut and not to be open again till after the sabbath and i put some of my servant by the door so that nothing might be take in on the sabbath day . so the trader in all sort of good take their night 's rest outside jerusalem once or twice . then i give witness against them and say why be you wait all night by the wall ? if you do so again i will have you take prisoner . from that time they do not come again on the sabbath . and i give the levite order to make themselves clean and come and keep the door and make the sabbath holy . keep this in mind to my credit o my god and have mercy on me for great be your mercy . and in those day i saw the jew who be marry to woman of ashdod and ammon and moab and their child be talk half in the language of ashdod they have no knowledge of the jew ' language but make use of the language of the two people . and i take up the cause against them curse them and give blow to some of them and pull out their hair and i make them take an oath by god say you be not to give your daughter to their son or take their daughter for your son or for yourselves . be it not in these thing that solomon king of israel do wrong ? among a number of nation there be no king like him and he be dear to his god and god make him king over all israel but even he be make to do evil by strange woman . be we then without protest to let you do all this great evil sinning against our god by take strange woman for your wife ? and one of the son of joiada the son of eliashib the chief priest be son in law to sanballat the horonite so i send him away from me . keep them in mind o my god because they have put shame on the priest ' name and on the agreement of the priest and the levite . so i make them clean from all strange people and have regular watch fix for the priest and for the levite everyone in his work and for the wood offering at fix time and for the first fruit . keep me in mind o my god for good .now it come about in the day of ahasuerus that ahasuerus who be ruler of a hundred and twenty seven division of the kingdom from india as far a ethiopia that in those day when king ahasuerus be rule in shushan his strong town in the third year of his rule he give a feast to all his captain and his servant and the captain of the army of persia and medium the great men and the ruler of the division of his kingdom be present before him and for a long time even a hundred and eighty day he let them see all the wealth and the glory of his kingdom and the great power and honour which be his . and at the end of that time the king give a feast for all the people who be present in shushan the king 's town small as well a great for seven day in the outer square of the garden of the king 's house . there be fair hanging of white and green and blue fix with cord of purple and the best linen to silver ring and pillar of polished stone the seat be of gold and silver on a floor of red and white and yellow and black stone . and they give them drink in gold vessel every vessel be different and wine of the kingdom freely give by the king . and the drinking be in keep with the law no one be force for the king have give order to all the chief servant of his house to do a be please to every man . and vashti the queen give a feast for the woman in the house of king ahasuerus . on the seventh day when the heart of the king be glad with wine he give order to mehuman biztha harbona bigtha and abagtha zethar and carcas the seven unsexed servant who be wait before ahasuerus the king that vashti the queen be to come before him crown with her crown and let the people and the captain see her for she be very beautiful . but when the servant give her the king 's order vashti the queen say she would not come then the king be very angry and his heart be burn with wrath . and the king say to the wise men who have knowledge of the time for this be the king 's way with all who be expert in law and in the give of decision and second only to him be carshena shethar admatha tarshish mere marsena and memucan the seven ruler of persia and medium who be friend of the king and have the first place in the kingdom what be to be do by law to vashti the queen because she have not do what king ahasuerus by his servant give her order to do ? and before the king and the captain memucan give his answer vashti the queen have do wrong not only to the king but to all the captain and to all the people in all the division of the kingdom of king ahasuerus for news of what the queen have do will come to the ear of all woman and they will no longer give respect to their husband when it be say to them king ahasuerus give order for vashti the queen to come before him and she come not . and the wife of the captain of persia and medium hear what the queen have do will say the same to all the king 's captain . so there will be much shame and wrath . if it be please to the king let an order go out from him and let it be record among the law of the persian and the medes so that it may never be change that vashti be never again to come before king ahasuerus and let the king give her place to another who be good than she . and when this order give by the king be make public through all his kingdom for it be great all the wife will give honour to their husband great as well a small . and this suggestion seem good to the king and the captain and the king do a memucan say and send letter to all the division of the kingdom to every division in the writing commonly use there and to every people in the language which be theirs say that every man be to be the ruler in his house and that this order be to be give out in the language of his people .after these thing when the king 's feeling be calm the thought of vashti and what she have do and the order he have make against her come back to his mind . then the servant who be wait on the king say to him let search be make for some fair young virgin for the king let the king give authority to certain men in all the division of his kingdom to get together all the fair young virgin and send them to shushan the king 's town to the woman 's house under the care of hegai the king 's servant the keeper of the woman and let the thing need for make them clean be give to them and let the girl who be please to the king be queen in place of vashti . and the king be pleased with this suggestion and he do so . now there be a certain jew in shushan name mordecai the son of jair the son of shimei the son of kish a benjamite who have be take away from jerusalem among those who have be make prisoner with jeconiah king of judah when nebuchadnezzar king of babylon have take him away . and he have be a father to hadassah that be esther the daughter of his father 's brother for she have no father or mother and she be very beautiful and when her father and mother be dead mordecai take her for his daughter . so when the order make by the king be publicly give out and a number of girl have be place in the care of hegai in the king 's house in shushan esther be take into the king 's house and put in the care of hegai the keeper of the woman . and he be pleased with the girl and be kind to her and he quickly give her what be need for make her clean and the thing which be hers by right and seven servant girl who be to be hers from the king 's house and he have her and her servant girl move to the best place in the woman 's part of the house . esther have not say what family or people she come from for mordecai have give her order not to do so . and every day mordecai take his walk before the square of the woman 's house to see how esther be and what would be do to her . now every girl when her turn come have to go in to king ahasuerus after undergo for a space of twelve month what be order by the law for the woman for this be the time necessary for make them clean that be six month with oil of myrrh and six month with sweet perfume and such thing a be need for make woman clean and in this way the girl go in to the king whatever she have a desire for be give to her to take with her from the woman 's house into the house of the king . in the evening she go and on the day after she come back to the second house of the woman into the keep of shaashgaz one of the king 's unsexed servant who have the care of the king 's wife only if the king have delight in her and sent for her by name do she go in to him again . now when the time come for esther the daughter of abihail his father 's brother whom mordecai have take a his daughter to go in to the king she make request for nothing but what hegai the king 's servant and keeper of the woman have give her . and esther be look on kindly by all who saw her . so esther be take in to king ahasuerus in his house in the tenth month which be the month tebeth in the seventh year of his rule . and esther be more pleasing to the king than all the woman and to his eye she be fair and more full of grace than all the other virgin so he put his crown on her head and make her queen in place of vashti . then the king give a great feast for all his captain and his servant even esther 's feast and he give order through all the division of his kingdom for a day of rest from work and give wealth from his store . and when the virgin come together in the second house of the woman mordecai take his seat in the doorway of the king 's house . esther have still say nothing of her family or her people a mordecai have give her order for esther do what mordecai say a when she be live with him . in those day while mordecai be seat at the king 's doorway two of the king 's servant bigthan and people through all the kingdom of ahasuerus . in the first month the month nisan in the twelfth year of king ahasuerus from day to day and from month to month they go on look for a sign give by pur that be chance before haman till the sign come out for the thirteenth day of the twelfth month the month adar . and haman say to king ahasuerus there be a certain nation living here and there in small let them be . if it be the king 's pleasure let a statement order their destruction be put in writing and i will give to those responsible for the king 's business ten thousand talent of silver for the king 's store house . and the king take his ring from his hand and give it to haman the son of hammedatha the agagite the hater of the jew . and the king say to haman the money be yours and the mordecai it be common knowledge among all the king 's servant and the people of every part of the kingdom that if anyone man or woman come to the king in his inner room without be send for there be say nothing then help and salvation will come to the jew from some other place but you and your father 's family will come to destruction and who be to say that you have not come to the kingdom even second only to king ahasuerus and great among the jew and respect by the body of his countryman work for the good of his people and say word of peace to all his seed .there be a man in the land of uz whose name be job . he be without sin and upright fearing god and keep himself far from evil . and he have seven son and three daughter . and of cattle he have seven thousand sheep and goat and three thousand camel and a thousand ox and five hundred she asses and a very great number of servant . and the man be great than any of the son of the east . his son regularly go to one another 's house and every one on his day give a feast and at these time they send for their three sister to take part in their feast with them . and at the end of their day of feast job sent and make them clean get up early in the morning and offering burn offering for them all . for job say it may be that my son have do wrong and say evil of god in their heart . and job do this whenever the feast come round . and there be a day when the son of the god come together before the lord and the satan come with them . and the lord say to the satan where do you come from ? and the satan say in answer from wander this way and that on the earth and walk about on it . and the lord say to the satan have you take note of my servant job for there be no one like him on the earth a man without sin and upright fearing god and keep himself far from evil ? and the satan say in answer to the lord be it for nothing that job be a god fear man ? have you yourself not put a wall round him and his house and all he have on there be a day when the son of the god come together before the lord and the satan come with them . and the lord say to the satan where do you come from ? and the satan say in answer from wander this his pain be very great .then open his mouth and curse the day of his birth job make answer and say let destruction take the day of my birth and the night on which it be say a man child have come into the world . that day let it be dark let not god take note of it from on high and let not the light be shin on it let the dark and the black night take it for themselves let it be cover with a cloud let the dark shade of day send fear on it . that night let the thick dark take it let it not have joy among the day of the year let it not come into the number of the month . a for that night let it have no fruit let no voice of joy be sound in it let it be curse by those who put a curse on the day who be ready to make leviathan awake . let it morning star be dark let it be look for light but may it not have any let it not see the eye of the dawn . because it do not keep the door of my mother 's body shut so that trouble might be veil from my eye . why do death not take me when i come out of my mother 's body why do i not when i come out give up my last breath ? why do the knee take me or why the breast that they might give me milk ? for then i might have go to my rest in quiet and in sleep have be in peace with king and the wise one of the earth who put up great house for themselves or with ruler who have gold and whose house be full of silver or a a child dead at birth i might never have come into existence like young child who have not see the light . there the passion of the evil be over and those whose strength have come to an end have rest . there the prisoner be at peace together the voice of the overseer come not again to their ear . the small and the great be there and the servant be free from his master . why do he give light to him who be in trouble and life to the bitter in soul to those whose desire be for death but it come not who be search for it more than for secret wealth who be glad with great joy and full of delight when they come to their last resting place to a man whose way be veil and who be shut in by god ? in place of my food i have grief and cry of sorrow come from me like water . for i have a fear and it come on me and my heart be greatly troubled . i have no peace no quiet and no rest nothing but pain come on me .and eliphaz the temanite make answer and say if one say a word will it be a weariness to you ? but who be able to keep from say what be in his mind ? truly you have be a helper to others and you have make feeble hand strong he who be near to fall have be lift up by your word and you have give strength to bend knee . but now it have come on you and it be a weariness to you you be touch by it and your mind be troubled . be not your fear of god your support and your upright way of life your hope ? have you ever see destruction come to an upright man ? or when be the god fear ever cut off ? what i have see be that those by whom trouble have be plough and evil plant get the same for themselves . by the breath of god destruction take them and by the wind of his wrath they be cut off . though the noise of the lion and the sounding of his voice may be loud the teeth of the young lion be break . the old lion come to his end for need of food and the young of the she lion go wander in all direction . a word be give to me secretly and the low sound of it come to my ear . in troubled thought from vision of the night when deep sleep come on men fear come on me and shake and my bone be full of trouble and a breath be move over my face the hair of my flesh become stiff something be present before me but i be not able to see it clearly there be a form before my eye a quiet voice come to my ear say may a man be upright before god ? or a man be clean before his maker ? truly he put no faith in his servant and he see error in his angels how much more those live in house of earth whose base be in the dust ! they be crush more quickly than an insect between morning and evening they be completely broken they come to an end for ever and no one take note . if their tent cord be pull up do they not come to an end and without wisdom ?give now a cry for help be there anyone who will give you an answer ? and to which of the holy one will you make your prayer ? for wrath be the cause of death to the foolish and he who have no wisdom come to his end through passion . i have see the foolish taking root but suddenly the curse come on his house . now his child have no safe place and they be crush before the judge for no one take up their cause . their produce be take by him who have no food and their grain go to the poor and he who be in need of water get it from their spring . for evil do not come out of the dust or trouble out of the earth but trouble be man 's fate from birth a the flame go up from the fire . but a for me i would make my prayer to god and i would put my cause before him who do great thing outside our knowledge wonder without number who give rain on the earth and send water on the field lift up those who be low and put the sad in a safe place who make the design of the wise go wrong so that they be unable to give effect to their purpose . he take the wise in their secret design and the purpose of the twist be cut off suddenly . in the daytime it become dark for them and in the sunlight they go feel about a if it be night . but he keep safe from their sword those who have no father and the poor from the power of the strong . so the poor man have hope and the mouth of the evil doer be stop . truly that man be happy who have training from the hand of work in the public place .the word of the preacher the son of david king in jerusalem . all be to no purpose say the preacher all the way of man be to no purpose . what be a man profit by all his work those who come after there will be no memory for those who be still to come after them . i the preacher be king over israel in jerusalem . and i give my heart to search out in wisdom all thing which
