lord say take a book and put down in it all the word i have say to you against israel and against judah and against all the nation from the day when my word come to you in the day of josiah till this day . it may be that the people of judah hearing of all the evil which it be my purpose to do to them will be turn every man from his evil way so that they may have my forgiveness for their evil do and their sin . then jeremiah sent for baruch the son of neriah and baruch take down from the mouth of jeremiah all the word of the lord which he have say to him write them in a book . and jeremiah give order to baruch say i be shut up and be not able to go into the house of the lord so you be to go read there from the book which you have take down from my mouth the word of the lord in the hearing of the people in the lord 's house on a day when they go without food and in the hearing of all the men of judah who have come out from their town . it may be that their prayer for grace will go up to the lord and that every man will be turn from his evil way for great be the wrath and the passion make clear by the lord against this people . and baruch the son of neriah do a jeremiah the prophet give him order to do read from the book the word of the lord in the lord 's house . now it come about in the fifth year of jehoiakim the son of josiah king of judah in the ninth month that it be give out publicly that all the people in jerusalem and all the people who come from the town of judah to jerusalem be to keep from food before the lord . then baruch give a public reading of the word of jeremiah from the book in the house of the lord in the room of gemariah the son of shaphan the scribe in the high square a one go in by the new doorway of the lord 's house in the hearing of all the people . and micaiah the son of gemariah the son of shaphan after hear all the word of the lord from the book go down to the king 's house to the scribe 's room and all the ruler be seat there elishama the scribe and delaiah the son of shemaiah and elnathan the son of achbor and gemariah the son of shaphan and zedekiah the son of hananiah and all the ruler . then micaiah give them an account of all the word which have come to his ear when baruch be read the book to the people . so all the ruler send jehudi the son of nethaniah the son of shelemiah the son of cushi to baruch say take in your hand the book from which you have be read to the people and come . so baruch the son of neriah take the book in his hand and come down to them . then they say to him be seat now and give u a reading from it . so baruch do so read it to them . now it come about that after hear all the word they say to one another in fear we will certainly give the king an account of all these word . and question baruch they say say now how do you put all these word down in write from his mouth ? then baruch answering say he say all these thing to me by word of mouth and i put them down with ink in the book . then the ruler say to baruch go and put yourself in a safe place you and jeremiah and let no man have knowledge of where you be . then they go into the open square to the king but the book they put away in the room of elishama the scribe and they give the king an account of all the word . so the king send jehudi to get the book and he take it from the room of elishama the scribe . and jehudi give a reading of it in the hearing of the king and all the ruler who be by the king 's side . now the king be seat in the winter house and a fire be burn in the fireplace in front of him . and it come about that whenever jehudi in his reading have get through three or four division the king cut them with his penknife put them into the fire till all the book be burn up in the fire which be burn in the fireplace . but they have no fear and give no sign of grief not the king or any of his servant after hear all these word . and elnathan and delaiah and gemariah have make a strong request to the king not to let the book be burn but he would not give ear to them . and the king give order to jerahmeel the king 's son and seraiah the son of azriel and shelemiah the son of abdeel to take baruch the scribe and jeremiah the prophet but the lord keep them safe . then after the book in which baruch have put down the word of jeremiah have be burn by the king the word of the lord come to jeremiah say take another book and put down in it all the word which be in the first book which jehoiakim king of judah put into the fire . and about jehoiakim king of judah you be to say this be what the lord have say you have put this book into the fire say why have you put in it that the king of babylon will certainly come cause the destruction of this land and put an end to every man and beast in it ? for this reason the lord have say of jehoiakim king of judah he will have no son to take his place on the seat of david his dead body will be put out to undergo the heat of the day and the cold of the night . and i will send punishment on him and on his seed and on his servant for their evil do i will send on them and on the people of jerusalem and the men of judah all the evil which i say against them but they do not give ear . then jeremiah take another book and give it to baruch the scribe the son of neriah who put down in it from the mouth of jeremiah all the word of the book which have be burn in the fire by jehoiakim king of judah and in addition a number of other word of the same sort .and zedekiah the son of josiah become king in place of coniah the son of jehoiakim whom nebuchadrezzar king of babylon make king in the land of judah . but he and his servant and the people of the land do not give ear to the word of the lord which he say by jeremiah the prophet . and zedekiah the king send jehucal the son of shelemiah and zephaniah the son of maaseiah the priest to the prophet jeremiah say make prayer now to the lord our god for u . now jeremiah be go about among the people for they have not put him in prison . and pharaoh 's army have come out from egypt and the chaldaean who be attack jerusalem hear news of them go away from jerusalem . then the word of the lord come to the prophet jeremiah say the lord the god of israel have say this be what you be to say to the king of judah who send you to get direction from me see pharaoh 's army which have come out to your help will go back to egypt to their land . and the chaldaean will come back again and make war against this town and they will take it and put it on fire . the lord have say have no false hop say to yourselves the chaldaean will go away from u for they will not go away . for even if you have overcome all the army of the chaldaean fight against you and there be only wound men among them still they would get up every man in his tent and put this town on fire . and it come about that when the chaldaean army outside jerusalem have go away for fear of pharaoh 's army jeremiah go out of jerusalem to go into the land of benjamin with the purpose of take up his heritage there among the people . but when he be at the benjamin door a captain of the watch name irijah the son of shelemiah the son of hananiah who be station there put his hand on jeremiah the prophet say you be go to give yourself up to the chaldaean . then jeremiah say that be not true i be not go to the chaldaean . but he would not give ear to him so irijah make him prisoner and take him to the ruler . and the ruler be angry with jeremiah and give him blow and put him in prison in the house of jonathan the scribe for they have make that the prison . so jeremiah come into the hole of the prison under the arch and be there for a long time . then king zedekiah sent and get him out and the king question him secretly in his house say be there any word from the lord ? and jeremiah say there be . then he say you will be give up into the hand of the king of babylon . then jeremiah say to king zedekiah what have be my sin against you or against your servant or against this people that you have put me in prison ? where now be your prophet who say to you the king of babylon will not come against you and against this land ? and now be please to give ear o my lord the king let my prayer for help come before you and do not make me go back to the house of jonathan the scribe for fear that i may come to my death there . then by the order of zedekiah the king jeremiah be put into the place of the arm watchman and they give him every day a cake of bread from the street of the bread maker till all the bread in the town be use up . so jeremiah be keep in the place of the armed watchman .now it come to the ear of shephatiah the son of mattan and gedaliah the son of pashhur and jucal the son of shelemiah and pashhur the son of malchiah that jeremiah have say to all the people these be the word of the lord whoever go on living in this town will come to his death by the sword or through need of food or by disease but whoever go out to the chaldaean will keep his life out of the power of the attacker and be safe . the lord have say this town will certainly be give into the hand of the army of the king of babylon and he will take it . then the ruler say to the king let this man be put to death because he be put fear into the heart of the men of war who be still in the town and into the heart of the people by say such thing to them this man be not work for the well be of the people but for their damage . then zedekiah the king say see he be in your hand for the king be not able to do anything against them . so they take jeremiah and put him into the water hole of malchiah the king 's son in the place of the arm watchman and they let jeremiah down with cord . and in the hole there be no water but wet earth and jeremiah go down into the wet earth . now it come to the ear of ebed melech the ethiopian an unsexed servant in the king 's house that they have put jeremiah into the water hole the king at that time be seat in the doorway of benjamin and ebed melech go out from the king 's house and say to the king my lord the king these men have do evil in all they have do to jeremiah the prophet whom they have put into the water hole and he will come to his death in the place where he be through need of food for there be no more bread in the town . then the king give order to ebed melech the ethiopian say take with you three men from here and get jeremiah out of the water hole before death overtakes him . so ebed melech take the men with him and go into the house of the king to the place where the clothing be keep and get from there old clothing and bit of old cloth and let them down by cord into the water hole where jeremiah be . and ebed melech the ethiopian say to jeremiah put these bit of old cloth under your arm under the cord . and jeremiah do so . so pull jeremiah up with the cord they get him out of the water hole and jeremiah be keep in the place of the armed watchman . then king zedekiah send for jeremiah the prophet and take him into the ruler ' doorway in the house of the lord and the king say to jeremiah i have a question to put to you keep nothing back from me . then jeremiah say to zedekiah if i give you the answer to your question will you not certainly put me to death ? and if i make a suggestion to you you will not give it a hearing . so king zedekiah give his oath to jeremiah secretly say by the living lord who give u our life i will not put you to death or give you up to these men who be desire to take your life . then jeremiah say to zedekiah these be the word of the lord the god of army the god of israel if you go out to the king of babylon 's captain then you will have life and the town will not be burn with fire and you and your family will be keep from death but if you do not go out to the king of babylon 's captain then this town will be give into the hand of the chaldaean and they will put it on fire and you will not get away from them . and king zedekiah say to jeremiah i be trouble on account of the jew who have go over to the chaldaean for fear that they may give me up to them and they will put me to shame . but jeremiah say they will not give you up be guide now by the word of the lord a i have give it to you and it will be well for you and you will keep your life . but if you do not go out this be what the lord have make clear to me see all the rest of the woman in the house of the king of judah will be take out to the king of babylon 's captain and these woman will say your near friend have be false to you and have get the good of you they have make your foot go deep into the wet earth and they be turn away back from you . and they will take all your wife and your child out to the chaldaean and you will not get away out of their hand but will be take by the hand of the king of babylon and this town will be burn with fire . then zedekiah say to jeremiah let no man have knowledge of these word and you will not be put to death . but if it come to the ear of the ruler that i have be talk with you and they come and say to you give u word now of what you have say to the king and what the king say to you keep nothing back and we will not put you to death then you be to say to them i make my request to the king that he would not send me back to my death in jonathan 's house . then all the ruler come to jeremiah question him and he give them an answer in the word the king have give him order to say . so they say nothing more to him for the thing be not make public . so jeremiah be keep in the place of the arm watchman till the day when jerusalem be take .and it come about that when jerusalem be take in the ninth year of zedekiah king of judah in the tenth month nebuchadrezzar king of babylon with all his army come against jerusalem shut it in on every side in the eleventh year of zedekiah in the fourth month on the ninth day of the month the town be break into all the captain of the king of babylon come in and take their place in the middle doorway of the town nergal shar ezer ruler of sin magir the rabmag and nebushazban the rab sari and all the captain of the king of babylon . and when zedekiah king of judah and all the men of war saw it they go in flight from the town by night by the way of the king 's garden through the doorway between the two wall and they go out by the arabah . but the chaldaean army go after them and overtake zedekiah in the lowland of jericho and they make him a prisoner and take him up to nebuchadrezzar king of babylon to riblah in the land of hamath to be judge by him . then the king of babylon put the son of zedekiah to death before his eye in riblah and the king of babylon put to death all the great men of judah . and more than this he put out zedekiah 's eye and have him put in chain to take him away to babylon . and the chaldaean put the king 's house on fire as well a the house of the people and have the wall of jerusalem break down . then nebuzaradan the captain of the arm men take away to babylon a prisoner all the rest of the workman who be still in the town as well a those who have give themselves up to him and all the rest of the people . but nebuzaradan the captain of the arm men let the poor of the people who have nothing whatever go on living in the land of judah and give them vine garden and field at the same time . now nebuchadrezzar king of babylon give order about jeremiah to nebuzaradan the captain of the arm men say take him and keep an eye on him and see that no evil come to him but do with him whatever he say to you . so nebuzaradan the captain of the arm men send nebushazban the rab sari and nergal shar ezer the rabmag and all the chief captain of the king of babylon and they send and take jeremiah out of the place of the watchman and give him into the care of gedaliah the son of ahikam the son of shaphan to take him to his house so he be live among the people . now the word of the lord come to jeremiah while he be shut up in the place of the arm watchman say go and say to ebed melech the ethiopian this be what the lord of army the god of israel have say see my word will come true for this town for evil and not for good they will come about before your eye on that day . but i will keep you safe on that day say the lord you will not be give into the hand of the men you be fear . for i will certainly let you go free and you will not be put to the sword but your life will be give to you out of the hand of your attacker because you have put your faith in me say the lord .the word which come to jeremiah from the lord after nebuzaradan the captain of the arm men have let him go from ramah when he have take him for he have be put in chain among all the prisoner of jerusalem and judah who be take away prisoner to babylon . and the captain of the arm men take jeremiah and say to him the lord your god give word of the evil which be to come on this place and the lord have make it come and have do a he say because of your sin against the lord in not give ear to his voice and that be why this thing have come on you . now see this day i be free you from the chain which be on your hand . if it seem good to you to come with me to babylon then come and i will keep an eye on you but if it do not seem good to you to come with me to babylon then do not come see all the land be before you if it seem good and right to you to go on living in the land then go back to gedaliah the son of ahikam the son of shaphan whom the king of babylon have make ruler over the town of judah and make your live place with him among the people or go wherever it seem right to you to go . so the captain of the arm men give him food and some money and let him go . so jeremiah go to gedaliah the son of ahikam in mizpah and be live with him among the people who be still in the land . now when it come to the ear of all the captain of the force who be in the field and their men that the king of babylon have make gedaliah the son of ahikam ruler in the land and have put under his care the men and woman and child all the poor of the land those who have not be take away to babylon then they come to gedaliah in mizpah even ishmael the son of nethaniah and johanan the son of kareah and seraiah the son of tanhumeth and the son of ephai the netophathite and jezaniah the son of the maacathite they and their men . and gedaliah the son of ahikam the son of shaphan take an oath to them and their men say have no fear of the servant of the chaldaean go on living in the land and become the servant of the king of babylon and all will be well . a for me i will be live in mizpah a your representative before the chaldaean who come to u but you be to get in your wine and summer fruit and oil and put them in your vessel and make living place for yourselves in the town which you have take . in the same way when all the jew who be in moab and among the child of ammon and in edom and in all the country have news that the king of babylon have let judah keep some of it people and that he have put over them gedaliah the son of ahikam the son of shaphan then all the jew come back from all the place to which they have go in flight and come to the land of judah to gedaliah to mizpah and get in a great store of wine and summer fruit . now johanan the son of kareah and all the captain of the force which be in the field come to gedaliah in mizpah and say to him have it come to your knowledge that baalis the king of the child of ammon have send ishmael the son of nethaniah to take your life ? but gedaliah the son of ahikam put no faith in what they say . then johanan the son of kareah say to gedaliah in mizpah secretly let me now go and put ishmael the son of nethaniah to death without anyone 's knowledge why let him take your life so that all the jew who have come together to you may be send in flight and the rest of the men of judah come to an end ? but gedaliah the son of ahikam say to johanan the son of kareah you be not to do this for what you say about ishmael be false .now it come about in the seventh month that ishmael the son of nethaniah the son of elishama of the king 's seed have with him ten men come to gedaliah the son of ahikam in mizpah and they have a meal together in mizpah . then ishmael the son of nethaniah and the ten men who be with him get up and attack gedaliah the son of ahikam the son of shaphan with the sword put to death him whom the king of babylon have make ruler over the land . and ishmael put to death all the jew who be with him even with gedaliah at mizpah and the chaldaean men of war . now on the second day after he have put gedaliah to death when no one have knowledge of it some people come from shechem from shiloh and samaria eighty men with the hair of their face cut off and their clothing out of order and with cut on their body and in their hand meal offering and perfume which they be take to the house of the lord . and ishmael the son of nethaniah go out from mizpah with the purpose of meet them weep on his way and it come about that when he be face to face with them he say come to gedaliah the son of ahikam . and when they come inside the town ishmael the son of nethaniah and the men who be with him put them to death and put their body into a deep hole . but there be ten men among them who say to ishmael do not put u to death for we have secret store in the country of grain and oil and honey . so he do not put them to death with their countryman . now the hole into which ishmael have put the dead body of the men whom he have put to death be the great hole which asa the king have make for fear of baasha king of israel and ishmael the son of nethaniah make it full of the body of those who have be put to death . then ishmael take away a prisoner all the rest of the people who be in mizpah the king 's daughter and all the people still in mizpah whom nebuzaradan the captain of the arm men have put under the care of gedaliah the son of ahikam ishmael the son of nethaniah take them away prisoner with the purpose of go over to the child of ammon . but when johanan the son of kareah and all the captain of the armed force who be with him have news of all the evil which ishmael the son of nethaniah have do they take their men and go out to make war on ishmael the son of nethaniah and they come face to face with him by the great water in gibeon . now when all the people who be with ishmael saw johanan the son of kareah and all the captain of the force with him then they be glad . and all the people whom ishmael have take away prisoner from mizpah turn round come back and go to johanan the son of kareah . but ishmael the son of nethaniah get away from johanan with eight men and go to the child of ammon . then johanan the son of kareah and all the captain of the force who be with him take all the rest of the people whom ishmael the son of nethaniah have make prisoner after he have put to death gedaliah the son of ahikam the people from mizpah that be the men of war and the woman and the child and the unsexed servant whom he have take back with him from gibeon and they go and be live in the rest place of chimham which be near beth lehem on the way into egypt because of the chaldaean for they be in fear of them because ishmael the son of nethaniah have put to death gedaliah the son of ahikam whom the king of babylon have make ruler over the land .then all the captain of the force and johanan the son of kareah and jezaniah the son of hoshaiah and all the people from the least to the great come near and say to jeremiah the prophet let our request come before you and make prayer for u to the lord your god even for this small band of u for we be only a small band out of what be a great number a your eye may see that the lord your god may make clear to u the way in which we be to go and what we be to do . then jeremiah the prophet say to them i have give ear to you see i will make prayer to the lord your god a you have say and it will be that whatever the lord may say in answer to you i will give you word of it keep nothing back . then they say to jeremiah may the lord be a true witness against u in good faith if we do not do everything which the lord your god send you to say to u . if it be good or if it be evil we will be guide by the voice of the lord our god to whom we be send you so that it may be well for u when we give ear to the voice of the lord our god . and it come about that after ten day the word of the lord come to jeremiah . and he send for johanan the son of kareah and all the captain of the force who be still with him and all the people from the least to the great and say to them these be the word of the lord the god of israel to whom you send me to put your request before him if you still go on living in the land then i will go on building you up and not pull you down plant you and not uproot you for my purpose of do evil to you have be change . have no fear of the king of babylon of whom you be now in fear have no fear of him say the lord for i be with you to keep you safe and to give you salvation from his hand . and i will have mercy on you so that he may have mercy on you and let you go back to your land . but if you say we have no desire to go on living in this land and do not give ear to the voice of the lord your god say no but we will go into the land of egypt where we will not see war or be hear the sound of the horn or be in need of food there we will make our live place then give ear now to the word of the lord o you last of judah the lord of army the god of israel have say if your mind be fix on go into egypt and stop there then it will come about that the sword which be the cause of your fear will overtake you there in the land of egypt and need of food which you be fear will go after you there in egypt and there death will come to you . such will be the fate of all the men whose mind be fix on go into egypt and stop there they will come to their end by the sword by be short of food and by disease not one of them will keep his life or get away from the evil which i will send on them . for this be what the lord of army the god of israel have say a my wrath and passion have be let loose on the people of jerusalem so will my passion be let loose on you when you go into egypt and you will become an oath and a cause of wonder and a curse and a name of shame and you will never see this place again . the lord have say about you o last of judah go not into egypt be certain that i have give witness to you this day . for you have be act with deceit in your heart for you send me to the lord your god say make prayer for u to the lord our god and give u word of everything he may say and we will do it . and this day i have make it clear to you and you have not give ear to the voice of the lord your god in anything for which he have send me to you . and now be certain that you will come to your end by the sword and by be short of food and by disease in the place to which you be pleased to go for a living place .and it come about that when jeremiah have come to the end of give all the people the word of the lord their god which the lord their god have send him to say to them even all these word then azariah the son of the son of kareah and all the captain of the force and all the people do not give ear to the order of the lord that they be to go on living in the land of judah . but johanan the son of kareah and all the captain of the force take all the rest of judah who have come back into the land of judah from all the nation where they have be force to go the men and the woman and the child and the king 's daughter and every person whom nebuzaradan the captain of the arm men have put under the care of gedaliah the son of ahikam the son of shaphan and jeremiah the prophet and baruch the son of neriah and they come into the land of egypt for they do not give ear to the voice of the lord and they come to tahpanhes . then the word of the lord come to jeremiah in tahpanhes say take in your hand some great stone and put them in a safe place in the paste in the brickwork which be at the way into pharaoh 's house in tahpanhes before the eye of the men of judah and say to them this be what the lord of army the god of israel have say see i will send and take nebuchadrezzar the king of babylon my servant and he will put the seat of his kingdom on these stone which have be put in a safe place here by you and his tent will be stretch over them . and he will come and overcome the land of egypt those who be for death will be put to death those who be to be prisoner will be make prisoner and those who be for the sword will be give to the sword . and he will put a fire in the house of the god of egypt and they will be burn by him and he will make egypt clean a a keeper of sheep make clean his clothing and he will go out from there in peace . and the stone pillar of beth shemesh in the land of egypt will be break by him and the house of the god of egypt burn with fire .the word which come to jeremiah about all the jew who be live in the land of egypt in migdol and at tahpanhes and at noph and in the country of pathros say the lord of army the god of israel have say you have see all the evil which i have send on jerusalem and on all the town of judah and now this day they be waste and unpeopled because of the evil which they have do move me to wrath by burn perfume in worship to other god who be not their god or yours or the god of their father . and i send all my servant the prophet to you get up early and send them say do not do this disgust thing which be hat by me . but they give no attention and their ear be not open so that they might be turn from their evil do and from burn perfume to other god . because of this my passion and my wrath be let loose burning in the town of judah and in the street of jerusalem and they be waste and unpeopled as at this day . so now the lord the god of army the god of israel have say why be you do this great evil against yourselves cause every man and woman little child and baby at the breast among you in judah to be cut off till not one be still live move me to wrath with the work of your hand burn perfume to other god in the land of egypt where you have go to make a place for yourselves so that you may become a curse and a name of shame among all the nation of the earth ? have you no memory of the evil do of your father and the evil do of the king of judah and the evil do of their wife and the evil which you yourselves have do and the evil which your wife have do in the land of judah and in the street of child of israel cause sin to come to mind when their eye be turn to them and they will be certain that i be the lord . now in the twenty seventh year in the first month on the first day of the month .in the second year of the rule of nebuchadnezzar nebuchadnezzar have dream and his spirit be trouble and his sleep go from him . then the king give order that the wonder worker and the user of secret art and those who make use of evil power and the chaldaean be to be send for to make clear to the king his dream . so they come and take their place before the king . and the king say to them i have have a dream and my spirit be trouble by the desire to have the dream make clear to me . then the chaldaean say to the king in the aramaean language o king have life for ever give your servant an account of your dream and we will make clear to you the sense of it . the king make answer and say to the chaldaean this be my decision if you do not make clear to me the dream and the sense of it you will be cut in bit and your house make waste . but if you make clear the dream and the sense of it you will have from me offering and reward and great honour so make clear to me the dream and the sense of it . a second time they say in answer let the king give his servant an account of his dream and we will make clear the sense . the king make answer and say i be certain that you be attempt to get more time because you see that my decision be fix that if you do not make my dream clear to me there be only one fate for you for you have make ready false and evil word to say before me till the time be change so give me an account of the dream and i will be certain that you be able to make the sense of it clear . then the chaldaean say to the king in answer there be not a man on earth able to make clear the king 's business for no king however great his power have ever make such a request to any wonder worker or user of secret art or chaldaean . the king 's request be a very hard one and there be no other who be able to make it clear to the king but the god whose live place be not with flesh . because of this the king be angry and full of wrath and give order for the destruction of all the wise men of babylon . so the order go out that the wise men be to be put to death and they be look for daniel and his friend to put them to death . then daniel give an answer with wisdom and good sense to arioch the captain of the king 's arm men who have go out to put to death the wise men of babylon he make answer and say to arioch o captain of the king why be the king 's order so cruel ? then arioch give daniel an account of the business . and daniel go in and make a request to the king to give him time and he would make clear the sense of his dream to the king . and daniel go to his house and give his friend hananiah mishael and azariah the news so that they might make a request for the mercy of the god of heaven in the question of this secret so that daniel and his friend might not come to destruction with the rest of the wise men of babylon . then the secret be make clear to daniel in a vision of the night . and daniel give bless to the god of heaven . and daniel say in answer may the name of god be praise for ever and ever for wisdom and strength be his by him time and year be change by him king be take away and king be lift up he give wisdom to the wise and .in the first year of belshazzar king of babylon daniel saw a dream and vision come into his head on his bed then he put the dream in write . i have a vision by night and saw the four wind of heaven
