egypt say get up and take the young child and his mother and go into the land of israel because they who be attempt to take the young child 's life be dead . and he get up and take the young child and his mother and come into the land of israel . but when it come to his ear that archelaus be rule over judaea in the place of his father herod he be in fear of go there and god have give him news of the danger in a dream he go out of the way into the country part of galilee . and he come and be live in a town name nazareth so that the word of the prophet might come true he will be name a nazarene .and in those day john the baptist come preach in the waste land of judaea say let your heart be turn from sin for the kingdom of heaven be near . for this be he of whom isaiah the prophet say the voice of one cry in the waste land make ready the way of the lord make his road straight . now john be clothe in camel 's hair with a leather band about him and his food be locust and honey . then jerusalem and all judaea go out to him and all the people from near jordan and they be give baptism by him in the river jordan say openly that they have do wrong . but when he saw a number of the pharisee and sadducee come to his baptism he say to them offspring of snake at whose word be you go in flight from the wrath to come ? let your change of heart be see in your work and say not to yourselves we have abraham for our father because i say to you that god be able from these stone to make child for abraham . and even now the axe be put to the root of the tree every tree then which do not give good fruit be cut down and put into the fire . truly i give baptism with water to those of you whose heart be change but he who come after me be great than i whose shoe i be not good enough to take up he will give you baptism with the holy spirit and with fire in whose hand be the instrument with which he will make clean his grain he will put the good grain in his store but the waste will be burn up in the fire which will never be put out . then jesus come from galilee to john at the jordan to be give baptism by him . but john would have keep him back say it be i who have need of baptism from you and do you come to me ? but jesus make answer say to him let it be so now because so it be right for u to make righteousness complete . then he give him baptism . and jesus have be give baptism straight away go up from the water and the heaven open he saw the spirit of god come down on him a a dove and a voice come out of heaven say this be my dearly love son with whom i be well pleased .then jesus be send by the spirit into the waste land to be test by the evil one . and after go without food for forty day and forty night he be in need of it . and the evil one come and say to him if you be the son of god give the word for these stone to become bread . but he make answer and say it be in the writing bread be not man 's only need but every word which come out of the mouth of god . then the evil one take him to the holy town and he put him on the high point of the temple and say to him if you be the son of god let yourself go down for it be in the writing he will give his angel care over you and in their hand they will keep you up so that your foot may not be crush against a stone . jesus say to him again it be in the writing you may not put the lord your god to the test . again the evil one take him up to a very high mountain and let him see all the kingdom of the world and the glory of them and he say to him all these thing will i give you if you will go down on your face and give me worship . then say jesus to him away satan for it be in the writing give worship to the lord your god and be his servant only . then the evil one go away from him and angel come and take care of him . now when it come to his ear that john have be put in prison he go away to galilee and go away from nazareth he come and make his living place in capernaum which be by the sea in the country of zebulun and naphtali so that the word of the prophet isaiah might come true the land of zebulun and the land of naphtali by the way of the sea the other side of jordan galilee of the gentile the people who be in the dark saw a great light and to those in the land of the shade of death do the dawn come up . from that time jesus go about preaching and say let your heart be turn from sin for the kingdom of heaven be near . and when he be walk by the sea of galilee he saw two brother simon whose other name be peter and andrew his brother who be put a net into the sea for they be fisherman . and he say to them come after me and i will make you fisher of men . and straight away they let go the net and go after him . and go on from there he saw two other brother jam the son of zebedee and john his brother in the boat with their father stitch up their net and he say come . and they go straight from the boat and their father and come after him . and jesus go about in all galilee teach in their synagogue and preach the good news of the kingdom and make well those who be ill with any disease among the people . and news of him go out through all syria and they take to him all who be ill with different disease and pain those have evil spirit and those who be off their head and those who have no power of move . and he make them well . and there go after him great number from galilee and decapolis and jerusalem and judaea and from the other side of jordan .and see great mass of people he go up into the mountain and when he be seat his disciple come to him . and with these word he give them teach say happy be the poor in spirit for the kingdom of heaven be theirs . happy be those who be sad for they will be comfort . happy be the gentle for the earth will be their heritage . happy be those whose heart 's desire be for righteousness for they will have their desire . happy be those who have mercy for they will be give mercy . happy be the clean in heart for they will see god . happy be the peacemaker for they will be name son of god . happy be those who be attack on account of righteousness for the kingdom of heaven will be theirs . happy be you when men give you a bad name and be cruel to you and say all evil thing against you falsely because of me . be glad and full of joy for great be your reward in heaven for so be the prophet attack who be before you . you be the salt of the earth but if it taste go from the salt how will you make it salt again ? it be then good for nothing but to be put out and crush under foot by men . you be the light of the world . a town put on a hill may be see by all . and a burning light be not put under a vessel but on it table so that it ray may be shin on all who be in the house . even so let your light be shin before men so that they may see your good work and give glory to your father in heaven . let there be no thought that i have come to put an end to the law or the prophet . i have not come for destruction but to make complete . truly i say to you till heaven and earth come to an end not the small letter or part of a letter will in any way be take from the law till all thing be do . whoever then go against the small of these law teach men to do the same will be name least in the kingdom of heaven but he who keep the law teach others to keep them will be name great in the kingdom of heaven . for i say to you if your righteousness be not great than the righteousness of the scribe and pharisee you will never go into the kingdom of heaven . you have knowledge that it be say in old time you may not put to death and whoever put to death will be in danger of be judge but i say to you that everyone who be angry with his brother will be in danger of be judge and he who say to his brother raca will be in danger from the sanhedrin and whoever say you foolish one will be in danger of the hell of fire . if then you be make an offering at the altar and there it come to your mind that your brother have something against you while your offering be still before the altar first go and make peace with your brother then come and make your offering . come to an agreement quickly with him who have a cause against you at law while you be with him on the way for fear that he may give you up to the judge and the judge may give you to the police and you may be put into prison . truly i say to you you will not come out from there till you have make payment of the very last farthing . you have knowledge that it be say you may not have connection with another man 's wife but i say to you that everyone whose eye be turn on a woman with desire have have connection with her in his heart . and if your right eye be a cause of trouble to you take it out and put it away from you because it be well to undergo the loss of one part than for all your body to go into hell . and if your right hand be a cause of trouble to you let it be cut off and put it away from you because it be well to undergo the loss of one part than for all your body to go into hell . again it be say whoever put away his wife have to give her a statement in write for this purpose but i say to you that everyone who put away his wife for any other cause but the loss of her virtue make her false to her husband and whoever take her a his wife after she be put away be no true husband to her . again you have knowledge that it be say in old time do not take false oath but give effect to your oath to the lord but i say to you take no oath at all not by the heaven because it be the seat of god or by the earth because it be the rest place for his foot or by jerusalem because it be the town of the great king . you may not take an oath by your head because you be not able to make one hair white or black . but let your word be simply yes or no and whatever be more than these be of the evil one . you have knowledge that it be say an eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth but i say to you do not make use of force against an evil man but to him who give you a blow on the right side of your face let the left be turn . and if any man go to law with you and take away your coat do not keep back your robe from him . and whoever make you go one mile go with him two . give to him who come with a request and keep not your property from him who would for a time make use of it . you have knowledge that it be say have love for your neighbour and hate for him who be against you but i say to you have love for those who be against you and make prayer for those who be cruel to you so that you may be the son of your father in heaven for his sun give light to the evil and to the good and he send rain on the upright man and on the sinner . for if you have love for those who have love for you what credit be it to you ? do not the tax farmer the same ? and if you say good day to your brother only what do you do more than others ? do not even the gentile the same ? be then complete in righteousness even a your father in heaven be complete .take care not to do your good work before men to be see by them or you will have no reward from your father in heaven . when then you give money to the poor do not make a noise about it a the false hearted men do in the synagogue and in the street so that they may have glory from men . truly i say to you they have their reward . but when you give money let not your left hand see what your right hand do so that your give may be in secret and your father who see in secret will give you your reward . and when you make your prayer be not like the false hearted men who take pleasure in get up and say their prayer in the synagogue and at the street turning so that they may be see by men . truly i say to you they have their reward . but when you make your prayer go into your private room and shut the door say a prayer to your father in secret and your father who see in secret will give you your reward . and in your prayer do not make use of the same word again and again a the gentile do for they have the idea that god will give attention to them because of the number of their word . so be not like them because your father have knowledge of your need even before you make your request to him . let this then be your prayer our father in heaven may your name be keep holy . let your kingdom come . let your pleasure be do a in heaven so on earth . give u this day bread for our need . and make u free of our debt a we have make those free who be in debt to u . and let u not be put to the test but keep u safe from the evil one . for if you let men have forgiveness for their sin you will have forgiveness from your father in heaven . but if you do not let men have forgiveness for their sin you will not have forgiveness from your father for your sin . and when you go without food be not sad face a the false hearted be . for they go about with changed look so that men may see that they be go without food . truly i say to you they have their reward . but when you go without food put oil on your head and make your face clean so that no one may see that you be go without food but your father in secret and your father who see in secret will give you your reward . make no store of wealth for yourselves on earth where it may be turn to dust by worm and weather and where thief may come in by force and take it away . but make a store for yourselves in heaven where it will not be turn to dust and where thief do not come in to take it away for where your wealth be there will your heart be . the light of the body be the eye if then your eye be true all your body will be full of light . but if your eye be evil all your body will be dark . if then the light which be in you be dark how dark it will be ! no man be able to be a servant to two master for he will have hate for the one and love for the other or he will keep to one and have no respect for the other . you may not be servant of god and of wealth . so i say to you take no thought for your life about food or drink or about clothing for your body . be not life more than food and the body more than it clothing ? see the bird of heaven they do not put seed in the earth they do not get in grain or put it in store house and your father in heaven give them food . be you not of much more value than they ? and which of you by take thought be able to make himself a cubit taller ? and why be you troubled about clothing ? see the flower of the field how they come up they do no work they make no thread but i say to you that even solomon in all his glory be not clothe like one of these . but if god give such clothing to the grass of the field which be here today and tomorrow be put into the oven will he not much more give you clothe o you of little faith ? then do not be full of care say what be we to have for food or drink ? or with what may we be clothe ? because the gentile go in search of all these thing for your father in heaven have knowledge that you have need of all these thing but let your first care be for his kingdom and his righteousness and all these other thing will be give to you in addition . then have no care for tomorrow tomorrow will take care of itself . take the trouble of the day a it come .be not judge of others and you will not be judge . for a you have be judge so you will be judge and with your measure will it be measure to you . and why do you take note of the grain of dust in your brother 's eye but take no note of the bit of wood which be in your eye ? or how will you say to your brother let me take out the grain of dust from your eye when you yourself have a bit of wood in your eye ? you false one first take out the bit of wood from your eye then will you see clearly to take out the grain of dust from your brother 's eye . do not give that which be holy to the dog or put your jewel before pig for fear that they will be crush under foot by the pig whose attack will then be make against you . make a request and it will be answer what you be search for you will get give the sign and the door will be open to you because to everyone who make a request it will be give and he who be search will get his desire and to him who give the sign the door will be open . or which of you if his son make a request for bread will give him a stone ? or if he make a request for a fish will give him a snake ? if you then be evil be able to give good thing to your child how much more will your father in heaven give good thing to those who make request to him ? all those thing then which you would have men do to you even so do you to them because this be the law and the prophet . go in by the narrow door for wide be the door and open be the way which go to destruction and great number go in by it . for narrow be the door and hard the road to life and only a small number make discovery of it . be on the watch for false prophet who come to you in sheep 's clothing but inside they be cruel wolf . by their fruit you will get knowledge of them . do men get grape from thorn or fig from thistle ? even so every good tree give good fruit but the bad tree give evil fruit . it be not possible for a good tree to give bad fruit and a bad tree will not give good fruit . every tree which do not give good fruit be cut down and put in the fire . so by their fruit you will get knowledge of them . not everyone who say to me lord lord will go into the kingdom of heaven but he who do the pleasure of my father in heaven . a great number will say to me on that day lord lord be we not prophet in your name and do we not by your name send out evil spirit and by your name do work of power ? and then will i say to them i never have knowledge of you go from me you worker of evil . everyone then to whom my word come and who do them will be like a wise man who make his house on a rock and the rain come down and there be a rush of water and the wind be drive against that house but it be not move because it be base on the rock . and everyone to whom my word come and who do them not will be like a foolish man who make his house on sand and the rain come down and there be a rush of water and the wind be drive against that house and it come down and great be it fall . and it come about when jesus have come to the end of these word that the people be surprise at his teaching for he be teach a one have authority and not a their scribe .and when he have come down from the mountain great number of people come after him . and a leper come and give him worship say lord if it be your pleasure you have power to make me clean . and he put his hand on him say it be my pleasure be clean . and straight away he be make clean . and jesus say to him see that you say nothing about this to anyone but go and let the priest see you and make the offering which be order by moses for a witness to them . and when jesus be come into capernaum a certain captain come to him with a request say lord my servant be ill in bed at the house with no power in his body and in great pain . and he say to him i will come and make him well . and the captain in answer say lord i be not good enough for you to come under my roof but only say the word and my servant will be make well . because i myself be a man under authority have under me fight men and i say to this one go and he go and to another come and he come and to my servant do this and he do it . and when these word come to the ear of jesus he be surprised and say to those who come after him truly i say to you i have not see such great faith no not in israel . and i say to you that number will come from the east and the west and will take their seat with abraham and isaac and jacob in the kingdom of heaven but the son of the kingdom will be put out into the dark and there will be weep and cry of pain . and jesus say to the captain go in peace a your faith be so let it be do to you . and the servant be make well in that hour . and when jesus have come into peter 's house he saw his wife 's mother in bed very ill. and he put his hand on hers and the disease go from her and she get up and take care of his need . and in the evening they take to him a number of people who have evil spirit and he send the spirit out of them with a word and make well all who be ill so that the word of isaiah the prophet might come true he himself take our pain and our disease . now when jesus saw a great mass of people about him he give an order to go to the other side . and there come a scribe and say to him master i will come after you wherever you go . and jesus say to him the fox have hole and the bird of heaven have a resting place but the son of man have nowhere to put his head . and another of the disciple say to him lord let me first go and give the last honour to my father . but jesus say to him come after me and let the dead take care of their dead . and when he have get into a boat his disciple go after him . and there come up a great storm in the sea so that the boat be cover with the wave but he be sleep . and they come to him and awake him say help lord destruction be near . and he say to them why be you full of fear o you of little faith ? then he get up and give order to the wind and the sea and there be a great calm . and the men be full of wonder say what sort of man be this that even the wind and the sea do his order ? and when he have come to the other side to the country of the gadarenes there come out to him from the place of the dead two who have evil spirit so violent that no man be able to go that way . and they give a loud cry say what have we to do with you you son of god ? have you come here to give u punishment before the time ? now there be some distance away a great herd of pig take their food . and the evil spirit make strong prayer to him say if you send u out let u go into the herd of pig . and he say to them go . and they come out and go into the pig and the herd go rush down a sharp slope into the sea and come to their end in the water . and their keeper go in flight to the town and give an account of everything and of the men who have the evil spirit . and all the town come out to jesus and see him they make request that he would go away from their part of the country .and he get into a boat and go across and come to his town . and they take to him a man stretch on a bed who have no power of move and jesus see their faith say to the man who be ill son take heart you have forgiveness for your sin . and some of the scribe say among themselves this man have no respect for god . and jesus have knowledge of what be in their mind say why be your thought evil ? for which be the simpler to say you have forgiveness for your sin or to say get up and go ? but so that you may see that on earth the son of man have authority for the forgiveness of sin then say he to the man who be ill get up and take up your bed and go to your house . and he get up and go away to his house . but when the people saw it they be full of fear and give glory to god who have give such authority to men . and when jesus be go from there he saw a man whose name be matthew seat at the place where tax be take and he say to him come after me . and he get up and go after him . and it come about when he be in the house take food that a number of tax farmer and sinner come and take their place with jesus and his disciple . and when the pharisee saw it they say to his disciple why do your master take food with tax farmer and sinner ? but on hearing this he say those who be well have no need of a medical man but those who be ill. but go and take to heart the sense of these word my desire be for mercy not offering for i have come not to get the upright but sinner . then the disciple of john come to him say why do we and the pharisee frequently go without food but your disciple do not ? and jesus say to them will the friend of the newly marry man be sad as long a he be with them ? but the day will come when he will be take away from them and then will they go without food . and no man put a bit of new cloth on an old coat for by pull away from the old it make a bad hole . and men do not put new wine into old wine skin or the skin will be burst and the wine will come out and the skin be of no more use but they put new wine into new wine skin and so the two will be safe . while he be say these thing to them there come a ruler and give him worship say my daughter be even now dead but come and put your hand on her and she will come back to life . and jesus get up and go after him and so do his disciple . and a woman who for twelve year have have a flow of blood come after him and put her hand on the edge of his robe because she say to herself if i may but put my hand on his robe i will be make well . but jesus turning and see her say daughter take heart your faith have make you well . and the woman be make well from that hour . and when jesus come into the ruler 's house and saw the player with their instrument and the people make a noise he say make room for the girl be not dead but sleep . and they be laugh at him . but when the people be send out he go in and take her by the hand and the girl get up . and the news of it go out into all that land . and when jesus go on from there two blind men come after him cry out have mercy on u you son of david . and when he have come into the house the blind men come to him and jesus say to them have you faith that i be able to do this ? they say to him yes lord . then he put his hand on their eye say a your faith be let it be do to you . and their eye be make open . and jesus say to them sharply let no man have knowledge of it . but they go out and give news of him in all that land . and while they be go away there come to him a man without the power of talk and with an evil spirit . and when the evil spirit have be send out the man have the power of talk and they be all surprised say such a thing have never be see in israel . but the pharisee say by the ruler of evil spirit he send evil spirit out of men . and jesus go about all the town and small place teach in their synagogue and preach the good news of the kingdom and make well all sort of disease and pain . but when he saw all the people he be move with pity for them because they be trouble and wander like sheep without a keeper . then he say to his disciple there be much grain but not enough men to get it in . make prayer then to the lord of the grain field that he may send out worker to get in his grain .and he get together his twelve disciple and give them the power of drive out unclean spirit and of make well all sort of disease and pain . now the name of the twelve be these the first simon who be name peter and andrew his brother jam the son of zebedee and john his brother philip and bartholomew thomas and matthew the tax farmer jam the son of alphaeus and thaddaeus simon the zealot and judas iscariot who be false to him . these twelve jesus send out and give them order say do not go among the gentile or into any town of samaria but go to the wander sheep of the house of israel and on your way say the kingdom of heaven be near . make well those who be ill give life to the dead make leper clean send evil spirit out of men freely it have be give to you freely give . take no gold or silver or copper in your pocket take no bag for your journey and do not take two coat or shoe or a stick for the workman have a right to his food . and into whatever town or small place you go make search there for someone who be respect and make his house your rest place till you go away . and when you go in say may peace be on this house . and if the house be good enough let your peace come on it but if not let your peace come back to you . and whoever will not take you in or give ear to your word when you go out from that house or that town put off it dust from your foot . truly i say to you it will be good for the land of sodom and gomorrah in the day of god 's judging than for that town . see i send you out a sheep among wolf . be then as wise a snake and as gentle a dove . but be on the watch against men for they will give you up to the sanhedrin and in their synagogue they will give you blow and you will come before ruler and king because of me for a witness to them and to the gentile . but when you be give up into their hand do not be trouble about what to say or how to say it for in that hour what you be to say will be give to you because it be not you who say the word but the spirit of your father in you . and brother will give up brother to death and the father his child and child will go against their father and mother and put them to death . and you will be hat by all men because of my name but he who be strong to the end will have salvation . but when they be cruel to you in one town go in flight to another for truly i say to you you will not have go through the town of israel before the son of man come . a disciple be not great than his master or a servant than his lord . it be enough for the disciple that he may be a his master and the servant a his lord . if they have give the name beelzebub to the master of the house how much more to those of his house ! have then no fear of them because nothing be cover which will not come to light or secret which will not be make clear . what i say to you in the dark say in the light and what come to your ear secretly say publicly from the house top . and have no fear of those who put to death the body but be not able to put to death the soul . but have fear of him who have power to give soul and body to destruction in hell . be not sparrows two a farthing ? and not one of them come to an end without your father but the hair of your head be all numbered . then have no fear you be of more value than a flock of sparrow . to everyone then who give witness to me before men i will give witness before my father in heaven . but if anyone say before men that he have no knowledge of me i will say that i have no knowledge of him before my father in heaven . do not have the thought that i have come to send peace on the earth i come not to send peace but a sword . for i have come to put a man against his father and the daughter against her mother and the daughter in law against her mother in law and a man will be hat by those of his house . he who have more love for his father or mother than for me be not good enough for me he who have more love for son or daughter than for me be not good enough for me . and he who do not take his cross and come after me be not good enough for me . he who have the desire to keep his life will have it take from him and he who give up his life because of me will have it give back to him . he who give honour to you give honour to me and he who give honour to me give honour to him who send me . he who give honour to a prophet in the name of a prophet will be give a prophet 's reward and he who give honour to an upright man in the name of an upright man will be give an upright man 's reward . and whoever give to one of these little one a cup of cold water only in the name of a disciple truly i say to you he will not go without his reward .and it come about that when jesus have come to the end of give these order to his twelve disciples he go away from there teach and preach in their town . now when john have news in prison of the work of the christ he send his disciple to say to him be you he who be to come or be we wait for another ? and jesus answering say to them go and give news to john of the thing which you be see and hear the blind see those who be not able to be walk leper be make clean those who be without hear now have their ear open the dead come to life again and the poor have the good news give to them . and a blessing will be on him who have no doubt about me . and when they be go away jesus talk of john say to all the people what go you out into the waste land to see ? a tall stem move in the wind ? but what go you out to see ? a man delicately clothe ? those who have fair robe be in king ' house . but why do you go out ? to see a prophet ? yes i say to you and more than a prophet . this be he of whom it have be say see i send my servant before your face who will make ready your way before you . truly i say to you among the son of woman there have not be a great than john the baptist but he who be least in the kingdom of heaven be great than he . and from the day of john the baptist till now the kingdom of heaven be force it way in and men of force take it . for all the prophet and the law be in force till john . and if you be able to see it this be elijah who be to come . he who have ear let him give ear . but what comparison may i make of this generation ? it be like child seat in the market place cry out to one another we make music for you and you do not take part in the dance we give cry of sorrow and you make no sign of grief . for john come take no food or drink and they say he have an evil spirit . the son of man have come feasting and they say see a lover of food and wine a friend of tax farmer and sinner ! and wisdom be judge to be right by her work . then he go on to say hard thing to the town where most of his work of power be do because they have not be turn from their sin . unhappy be you chorazin ! unhappy be you beth saida ! for if the work of power which be do in you have be do in tyre and sidon they would have be turn from their sin in day go by clothe themselves in haircloth and put dust on their head . but i say to you it will be good for tyre and sidon in the day of judge than for you . and you capernaum be you not to be lift up to heaven ? you will go down into hell for if the work of power which be do in you have be do in sodom it would have be here to this day . but i say to you that it will be good for the land of sodom in the day of judge than for you . at that time jesus make answer and say i give praise to you o father lord of heaven and earth because you have keep these thing secret from the wise and the men of learning and have make them clear to little child . yes father for so it be please in your eye . all thing have be give to me by my father and no one have knowledge of the son but the father and no one have knowledge of the father but the son and he to whom the son will make it clear . come to me all you who be trouble and weight down with care and i will give you rest . take my yoke on you and become like me for i be gentle and without pride and you will have rest for your soul for my yoke be good and the weight i take up be not hard .at that time jesus go through the field on the sabbath day and his disciple be in need of food be take the head of grain . but the pharisee when they saw it say to him see your disciple do that which it be not right to do on the sabbath . but he say to them have you no knowledge of what david do when he have need of food and those who be with him ? how he go into the house of god and take for food the holy bread which it be not right for him or for those who be with him to take but only for the priest ? or be it not say in the law how the sabbath be break by the priest in the temple and they do no wrong ? but i say to you that a great thing than the temple be here . but if these word have be in your mind my desire be for mercy and not for offering you would not have be judge those who have do no wrong . for the son of man be lord of the sabbath . and he go from there into their synagogue and there be a man with a dead hand . and they put a question to him say be it right to make a man well on the sabbath day ? so that they might have something against him . and he say to them which of you have a sheep if it get into a hole on the sabbath day will not put out a help hand and get it back ? of how much more value be a man than a sheep ! for this reason it be right to do good on the sabbath day . then say he to the man put out your hand . and he put it out and it be make as well a the other . but the pharisee go out and make design against him how they might put him to death . and jesus have knowledge of this go away from there and a great number go after him and he make them all well order them not to give people word of him so that what be say by isaiah the prophet might come true see my servant the man of my selection my love one in whom my soul be well pleased i will put my spirit on him and he will make my decision clear to the gentile . his come will not be with fight or loud cry and his voice will not be lift up in the street . the crushed stem will not be break by him and the feebly burn light will he not put out till he have make righteousness overcome all . and in his name will the gentile put their hope . then they take to him one with an evil spirit who be blind and have no power of talk and he make him well so that he have the power of talk and see . and all the people be surprised and say be not this the son of david ? but the pharisee hearing of it say this man only send evil spirit out of men by beelzebub the ruler of evil spirit . and have knowledge of their thought he say to them every kingdom have division in itself be make waste and every town or house have division in itself will come to destruction . and if satan send out satan he make war against himself how then will he keep his kingdom ? and if i by beelzebub send evil spirit out of men by whom do your son send them out ? so let them be your judge . but if i by the spirit of god send out evil spirit then be the kingdom of god come on you . or how may one go into a strong man 's house and take his good if he do not first put cord round the strong man ? and then he may take his good . whoever be not with me be against me and he who do not take part with me in get people together be drive them away . so i say to you every sin and every evil word against god will have forgiveness but for evil word against the spirit there will be no forgiveness . and whoever say a word against the son of man will have forgiveness but whoever say a word against the holy spirit will not have forgiveness in this life or in that which be to come . make the tree good and it fruit good or make the tree bad and it fruit bad for by it fruit you will get knowledge of the tree . you offspring of snake how be you be evil able to say good thing ? because out of the heart 's store come the word of the mouth . the good man out of his good store give good thing and the evil man out of his evil store give evil thing . and i say to you that in the day when they be judge men will have to give an account of every foolish word they have say . for by your word will your righteousness be see and by your word you will be judge . then some of the scribe and pharisee hear this say to him master we be look for a sign from you . but he answer say to them an evil and false generation be look for a sign and no sign will be give to it but the sign of the prophet jonah for a jonah be three day and three night in the stomach of the great fish so will the son of man be three day and three night in the heart of the earth . the men of nineveh will come up in the day of judging and give their decision against this generation because they be turn from their sin at the preaching of jonah and now a great than jonah be here . the queen of the south will come up in the day of judging and give her decision against this generation for she come from the end of the earth to give ear to the wisdom of solomon and now a great than solomon be here . but the unclean spirit when he be go out of a man go through dry place look for rest and get it not . then he say i will go back into my house from which i come out and when he come he see that there be no one in it but that it have be make fair and clean . then he go and take with him seven other spirit bad than himself and they go in and make it their living place and the last condition of that man be bad than the first . even so will it be with this evil generation . while he be still talk to the people his mother and his brother come desire to have talk with him . and one say to him see your mother and your brother be outside desire to have talk with you . but he in answer say to him who give the news who be my mother and who be my brother ? and he put out his hand to his disciple and say see my mother and my brother ! for whoever do the pleasure of my father in heaven he be my brother and sister and mother .on that day jesus go out of the house and be seat by the seaside . and great number of people come together to him so that he get into a boat and the people take up their position by the sea . and he give them teach in the form of a story say a man go out to put seed in the earth and while he do so some seed be drop by the wayside and the bird come and take them for food and some of the seed go among the stone where it have not much earth and straight away it come up because the earth be not deep and when the sun be high it be burn and because it have no root it become dry and dead . and some seed go among thorn and the thorn come up and they have no room for growth and some fall on good earth give fruit some a hundred some sixty some thirty time a much . he who have ear let him give ear . and the disciple come and say to him why do you say thing to them in the form of story ? and he say to them in answer to you be give the knowledge of the secret of the kingdom of heaven but to them it be not give . because whoever have to him will be give and he will have more but from him who have not even what he have will be take away . for this reason i put thing into the form of story because they see without see and give ear without hearing and the sense be not clear to them . and for them the word of isaiah have come true though you give ear you will not get knowledge and see you will see but the sense will not be clear to you for the heart of this people have become fat and their ear be slow in hear and their eye be shut for fear that they might see with their eye and give hearing with their ear and become wise in their heart and be turn again to me so that i might make them well . but a blessing be on your eye because they see and on your ear because they be open . for truly i say to you that prophet and upright men have a desire to see the thing which you see and saw them not and to have knowledge of the word which have come to your ear and they have it not . give ear then to the story of the man who put the seed in the earth . when the word of the kingdom come to anyone and the sense of it be not clear to him then the evil one come and quickly take away that which be put in his heart . he be the seed drop by the wayside . and that which go on the stone this be he who hear the word straight away take it with joy but have no root in himself he go on for a time and when trouble come or pain because of the word he quickly become full of doubt . and that which be drop among the thorn this be he who have the word and the care of this life and the deceit of wealth put a stop to the growth of the word and it give no fruit . and the seed which be put in good earth this be he who give ear to the word and get the sense of it who give fruit some a hundred some sixty some thirty time a much . and he give them another story say the kingdom of heaven be like a man who put good seed in his field but while men be sleep one who have hate for him come and put evil seed among the grain and go away . but when the green stem come up and give fruit the evil plant be see at the same time . and the servant of the master of the house come and say to him sir do you not put good seed in your field ? how then have it evil plant ? and he say someone have do this in hate . and the servant say to him be it your pleasure that we go and take them up ? but he say no for fear that by chance while you take up the evil plant you may be root up the grain with them . let them come up together till the get in of the grain and then i will say to the worker take up first the evil plant and put them together for burn but put the grain into my store house . he put another story before them say the kingdom of heaven be like a grain of mustard seed which a man take and put in his field which be small than all seed but when it have come up it be great than the plant and become a tree so that the bird of heaven come and make their resting place in it branch . another story he give to them the kingdom of heaven be like leaven which a woman take and put in three measure of meal till it be all leaven . all these thing jesus say to the people in the form of story and without a story he say nothing to them that it might come true which be say by the prophet open my mouth i will give out story i will give knowledge of thing keep secret from before all time . then he go away from the people and go into the house and his disciple come to him say make clear to u the story of the evil plant in the field . and he make answer and say he who put the good seed in the earth be the son of man and the field be the world and the good seed be the son of the kingdom and the evil seed be the son of the evil one and he who put them in the earth be satan and the get in of the grain be the end of the world and those who get it in be the angel . a then the evil plant be get together and burn with fire so will it be in the end of the world . the son of man will send out his angel and they will take out of his kingdom everything which be a cause of error and all those who do wrong and will put them into the fire there will be weep and cry of sorrow . then will the upright be shin a the sun in the kingdom of their father . he who have ear let him give ear . the kingdom of heaven be like a secret store of wealth in a field which a man come across and put back again and in his joy he go and give all he have to get that field . again the kingdom of heaven be like a trader search for beautiful jewel . and have come across one jewel of great price he go and give all he have in exchange for it . again the kingdom of heaven be like a net which be put into the sea and take in every sort of fish when it be full they take it up on the sand and seat there they put the good into vessel but the bad they put away . so will it be in the end of the world the angel will come and take out the bad from the good and will put them into the fire there will be weep and cry of sorrow . be all these thing now clear to you ? they say to him yes . and he say to them for this reason every scribe who have become a disciple of the kingdom of heaven be like the owner of a house who give out from his store thing new and old . and when jesus have come to the end of these story he go away from there . and come into his country he give them teach in their synagogue so that they be greatly surprised and say where do this man get this wisdom and these work of power ? be not this the woodworker 's son ? be not his mother name mary ? and his brother james and joseph and simon and juda ? and his sister be they not all with u ? from where then have he all these thing ? and they be bitter against him . but jesus say to them a prophet be nowhere without honour but in his country and among his family . and the work of power which he do there be small in number because they have no faith .at that time news of jesus come to herod the king and he say to his servant this be john the baptist he have come back from the dead and so these power be work in him . for herod have take john and put him in prison because of herodias his brother philip 's wife . because john have say to him it be not right for you to have her . and he would have put him to death but for his fear of the people because in their eye john be a prophet . but when herod 's birthday come the daughter of herodias be dance before them and herod be pleased with her . so he give her his word with an oath to let her have whatever she might make request for . and she at her mother 's suggestion say give me here on a plate the head of john the baptist . and the king be sad but because of his oath and because of his guest he give the order for it to be give to her and he send and have john 's head cut off in the prison . and his head be put on a plate and give to the girl and she take it to her mother . and his disciple come and take up his body and put it in the earth and they go and give jesus news of what have take place . now when it come to the ear of jesus he go away from there in a boat to a waste place by himself and the people hearing of it go after him on foot from the town . and he come out and saw a great number of people and he have pity on them and make well those of them who be ill. and when even have come the disciple come to him say this place be waste land and the time be now past send the people away so that they may go into the town and get themselves food . but jesus say to them there be no need for them to go away give them food yourselves . and they say to him we have here but five cake of bread and two fish . and he say give them to me . and he give order for the people to be seat on the grass and he take the five cake of bread and the two fish and look up to heaven he say word of blessing and make division of the food and give it to the disciple and the disciple give it to the people . and they all take of the food and have enough and they take up twelve basket full of broken bit which be not use . and those who have food be about five thousand men in addition to woman and child . and straight away he make the disciple get into the boat and go before him to the other side till he have send the people away . and after he have send the people away he go up into the mountain by himself for prayer and when evening be come he be there by himself . but the boat be now in the middle of the sea and be trouble by the wave for the wind be against them . and in the fourth watch of the night he come to them walk on the sea . and when they saw him walk on the sea they be trouble say it be a spirit and they give cry of fear . but straight away jesus say to them take heart it be i have no fear . and peter answering say to him lord if it be you give me the order to come to you on the water . and he say come . and peter get out of the boat and walk on the water go to jesus . but when he saw the wind he be in fear and start to go down he give a cry say help lord . and straight away jesus put out his hand and take a grip of him and say to him o man of little faith why be you in doubt ? and when they have get into the boat the wind go down . and those who be in the boat give him worship say truly you be the son of god . and when they have go across they come to land at gennesaret . and when the men of that place have news of him they send into all the country round about and take to him all who be ill with the request that they might only put their hand on the edge of his robe and all those who do so be make well .then there come to jesus from jerusalem pharisee and scribe say why do your disciple go against the teaching of the father ? for they take food with unwashed hand . and in answer he say to them why do you yourselves go against the word of god on account of the teaching which have be hand down to you ? for god say give honour to your father and mother and he who say evil of father or mother will be put to death . but you say if a man say to his father or his mother that by which you might have have profit from me be give to god there be no need for him to give honour to his father . and you have make the word of god without effect because of your teaching . you false one well do isaiah say of you these people give me honour with their lip but their heart be far from me . but their worship be to no purpose while they give a their teach the rule of men . and he get the people together and say to them give ear and let my word be clear to you not that which go into the mouth make a man unclean but that which come out of the mouth . then the disciple come and say to him do you see that the pharisee be trouble when these word come to their ear ? but he say in answer every plant which my father in heaven have not put in the earth will be take up by the root . let them be they be blind guide . and if a blind man be guide a blind man the two will go fall into a hole together . then peter say to him make the story clear to u . and he say be you like them still without wisdom ? do you not see that whatever go into the mouth go on into the stomach and be send out a waste ? but the thing which come out of the mouth come from the heart and they make a man unclean . for out of the heart come evil thought the taking of life break faith between the married unclean desire of the flesh taking of property false witness bitter word these be the thing which make a man unclean but to take food with unwashed hand do not make a man unclean . and jesus go away from there into the country of tyre and sidon . and a woman of canaan come out from those part cry and say have pity on me o lord son of david my daughter be greatly troubled with an unclean spirit . but he give her no answer . and his disciple come and say to him send her away for she be cry after u . but he make answer and say i be send only to the wander sheep of the house of israel . but she come and give him worship say help lord . and he make answer and say it be not right to take the child 's bread and give it to the dog . but she say yes lord but even the dog take the bit from under their master ' table . then jesus answer say to her o woman great be your faith let your desire be do . and her daughter be make well from that hour . and jesus go from there and come to the sea of galilee and he go up into the mountain and take his seat there . and there come to him great number of people have with them those who be break in body or blind or without voice or wound or ill in any way and a number of others they put them down at his foot and he make them well so that the people be full of wonder when they saw that those who have no voice be talk the feeble be make strong those whose body be break have the power of walking and the blind be able to see and they give glory to the god of israel . and jesus get his disciple together and say i have pity for the people because they have now be with me three day and have no food and i will not send them away without food or they will have no strength for the journey . and the disciple say to him how may we get enough bread in a waste place to give food to such a number of people ? and jesus say to them how much bread have you ? and they say seven cake and some small fish . then he give an order to the people to be seat on the earth and he take the seven cake of bread and the fish and have give praise he give the broken bread to the disciple and the disciple give it to the people . and they all take food and have enough and they take up of the broken bit seven basket full . and there be four thousand men who take food together with woman and child . and when he have send the people away he get into the boat and come into the country of magadan .and the pharisee and sadducee come and test him make a request to him to give them a sign from heaven . but in answer he say to them at nightfall you say the weather will be good for the sky be red . and in the morning the weather will be bad today for the sky be red and angry . you be able to see the face of heaven but not the sign of the time . an evil and false generation be search after a sign and no sign will be give to it but the sign of jonah . and he go away from them . and when the disciple come to the other side they have not take thought to get bread . and jesus say to them take care to have nothing to do with the leaven of the pharisee and sadducee . and they be reason among themselves say we take no bread . and jesus see it say o you of little faith why be you reason among yourselves because you have no bread ? do you still not see or keep in mind the five cake of bread of the five thousand and the number of basket you take up ? or the seven cake of bread of the four thousand and the number of basket you take up ? how be it that you do not see that i be not talk to you about bread but about keep away from the leaven of the pharisee and sadducee ? then they saw that it be not the leaven of bread which he have in mind but the teaching of the pharisee and sadducee . now when jesus have come into the part of caesarea philippi he say question his disciple who do men say that the son of man be ? and they say some say john the baptist some elijah and others jeremiah or one of the prophet . he say to them but who do you say that i be ? and simon peter make answer and say you be the christ the son of the living god . and jesus make answer and say to him a blessing on you simon bar jonah because this knowledge have not come to you from flesh and blood but from my father in heaven . and i say to you that you be peter and on this rock will my church be base and the door of hell will not overcome it . i will give to you the key of the kingdom of heaven and whatever be fix by you on earth will be fix in heaven and whatever you make free on earth will be make free in heaven . then he give order to the disciple to give no man word that he be the christ . from that time jesus go on to make clear to his disciple how he would have to go up to jerusalem and undergo much at the hand of those in authority and the chief priest and scribe and be put to death and the third day come again from the dead . and peter protesting say to him be it far from you lord it be impossible that this will come about . but he turn to peter say get out of my way satan you be a danger to me because your mind be not on the thing of god but on the thing of men . then jesus say to his disciple if any man would come after me let him give up all and take up his cross and come after me . because whoever have a desire to keep his life safe will have it take from him but whoever give up his life because of me will have it give back to him . for what profit have a man if he get all the world with the loss of his life ? or what will a man give in exchange for his life ? for the son of man will come in the glory of his father with his angel and then he will give to every man the reward of his work . truly i say to you there be some of those here who will not have a taste of death till they see the son of man come in his kingdom .and after six day jesus take with him peter and james and john his brother and make them go up with him into a high mountain by themselves . and he be change in form before them and his face be shin like the sun and his clothing become white a light . and moses and elijah come before their eye talk with him . and peter make answer and say to jesus lord it be good for u to be here if you will let me i will make here three tent one for you and one for moses and one for elijah . while he be still talk a bright cloud come over them and a voice out of the cloud say this be my dearly love son with whom i be well pleased give ear to him . and at these word the disciple go down on their face in great fear . and jesus come and put his hand on them and say get up and have no fear . and lift up their eye they saw no one but jesus only . and when they be come down from the mountain jesus give them order say let no man have word of what you have see till the son of man have come again from the dead . and his disciple question him say why then do the scribe say that elijah have to come first ? and in answer he say elijah truly have to come and put all thing right but i say to you that elijah have come and they have no knowledge of him but do to him whatever they be pleased to do the same will the son of man undergo at their hand . then the disciple saw that he be talk to them of john the baptist . and when they come to the people a man go down on his knee to him say lord have mercy on my son for he be off his head and be in great pain and frequently he go fall into the fire and frequently into the water . and i take him to your disciple and they be not able to make him well . and jesus answering say o false and foolish generation how long will i be with you ? how long will i put up with you ? let him come here to me . and jesus give order to the unclean spirit and it go out of him and the boy be make well from that hour . then the disciple come to jesus privately and say why be we not able to send it out ? and he say to them because of your little faith for truly i say to you if you have faith a a grain of mustard seed you will say to this mountain be move from this place to that and it will be move and nothing will be impossible to you . and while they be go about in galilee jesus say to them the son of man will be give up into the hand of men and they will put him to death and the third day he will come again from the dead . and they be very sad . and when they have come to capernaum those who take the temple tax come to peter and say do not your master make payment of the temple tax ? he say yes . and when he come into the house jesus say to him what be your opinion simon ? from whom do the king of the earth get payment or tax ? from their son or from other people ? and when he say from other people jesus say to him then be the son free . but so that we may not be a cause of trouble to them go to the sea and let down a hook and take the first fish which come up and in his mouth you will see a bit of money take that and give it to them for me and you .in that hour the disciple come to jesus say who be great in the kingdom of heaven ? and he take a little child and put him in the middle of them and say truly i say to you if you do not have a change of heart and become like little child you will not go into the kingdom of heaven . whoever then will make himself as low a this little child the same be the great in the kingdom of heaven . and whoever give honour to one such little child in my name give honour to me but whoever be a cause of trouble to one of these little one who have faith in me it would be good for him to have a great stone fix to his neck and to come to his end in the deep sea . a curse be on the earth because of trouble ! for it be necessary for trouble to come but unhappy be that man through whom the trouble come . and if your hand or your foot be a cause of trouble let it be cut off and put it away from you it be well for you to go into life with the loss of a hand or a foot than have two hand or two foot to go into the eternal fire . and if your eye be a cause of trouble to you take it out and put it away from you it be well for you to go into life with one eye than have two eye to go into the hell of fire . let it not seem to you that one of these little one be of no value for i say to you that in heaven their angel see at all time the face of my father in heaven . what would you say now ? if a man have a hundred sheep and one of them have go wander away will he not let the ninety nine be and go to the mountain in search of the wander one ? and if he come across it truly i say to you he have more joy over it than over the ninety nine which have not go out of the way . even so it be not the pleasure of your father in heaven for one of these little one to come to destruction . and if your brother do wrong to you go make clear to him his error between you and him in private if he give ear to you you have get your brother back again . but if he will not give ear to you take with you one or two more that by the lip of two or three witness every word may be make certain . and if he will not give ear to them let it come to the hearing of the church and if he will not give ear to the church let him be to you a a gentile and a tax farmer . truly i say to you whatever thing be fix by you on earth will be fix in heaven and whatever you make free on earth will be make free in heaven . again i say to you that if two of you be in agreement on earth about anything for which they will make a request it will be do for them by my father in heaven . for where two or three be come together in my name there be i among them . then peter come and say to him lord what number of time may my brother do wrong against me and i give him forgiveness ? till seven time ? jesus say to him i say not to you till seven time but till seventy time seven . for this reason the kingdom of heaven be like a king who go over his account with his servant . and at the start one come to him who be in his debt for ten thousand talent . and because he be not able to make payment his lord give order for him and his wife and his son and daughter and all he have to be give for money and payment to be make . so the servant go down on his face and give him worship say lord give me time to make payment and i will give you all . and the lord of that servant be move with pity let him go and make him free of the debt . but that servant go out and meet one of the other servant who be in debt to him for one hundred penny he take him by the throat say make payment of your debt . so that servant go down on his face request him and say give me time and i will make payment to you . and he would not but go and put him into prison till he have make payment of the debt . so when the other servant saw what be do they be very sad and come and give word to their lord of what have be do . then his lord send for him and say you evil servant i make you free of all that debt because of your request to me be it not right for you to have mercy on the other servant even a i have mercy on you ? and his lord be very angry and put him in the hand of those who would give him punishment till he make payment of all the debt . so will my father in heaven do to you if you do not everyone from your heart give forgiveness to his brother .and it come about that after say these word jesus go away from galilee and come into the part of judaea on the other side of jordan . and a great number go after him and he make them well there . and certain pharisee come to him test him and say be it right for a man to put away his wife for every cause ? and he say in answer have you not see in the writing that he who make them at the first make them male and female and say for this cause will a man go away from his father and mother and be join to his wife and the two will become one flesh ? so that they be no longer two but one flesh . then let not that which have be join by god be part by man . they say to him why then do moses give order that a husband might give her a statement in writing and be free from her ? he say to them moses because of your hard heart let you put away your wife but it have not be so from the first . and i say to you whoever put away his wife for any other cause than the loss of her virtue and take another be a false husband and he who take her a his wife when she be put away be no true husband to her . the disciple say to him if this be the position of a man in relation to his wife it be well not to be marry . but he say to them not all men be able to take in this say but only those to whom it be give . for there be men who from birth be without sex and there be some who be make so by men and there be others who have make themselves so for the kingdom of heaven . he who be able to take it let him take it . then some people take little child to him so that he might put his hand on them in blessing and the disciple say sharp word to them . but jesus say let the little one come to me and do not keep them away for of such be the kingdom of heaven . and he put his hand on them and go away . and one come to him and say master what good thing have i to do so that i may have eternal life ? and he say to him why be you question me about what be good ? one there be who be good but if you have a desire to go into life keep the rule of the law . he say to him which ? and jesus say do not put anyone to death do not be untrue in married life do not take what be not yours do not give false witness give honour to your father and your mother and have love for your neighbour a for yourself . the young man say to him all these thing have i do what more be there ? jesus say to him if you have a desire to be complete go get money for your property and give it to the poor and you will have wealth in heaven and come after me . but hear these word the young man go away sorrow for he have much property . and jesus say to his disciple truly i say to you it be hard for a man with much money to go into the kingdom of heaven . and again i say to you it be simpler for a camel to go through a needle 's eye than for a man with much money to go into the kingdom of god . and the disciple hear this be greatly surprised say who then may have salvation ? and jesus look at them say with men this be not possible but with god all thing be possible . then peter say to him see we have give up everything and have come after you what then will we have ? and jesus say to them truly i say to you that in the time when all thing be make new and the son of man be seat in his glory you who have come after me will be seat on twelve seat judge the twelve tribe of israel . and everyone who have give up house or brother or sister or father or mother or child or land for my name will be give a hundred time a much and have eternal life . but a great number who be first will be last and some who be last will be first .for the kingdom of heaven be like the master of a house who go out early in the morning to get worker into his vine garden . and when he have make an agreement with the workman for a penny a day he send them into his vine garden . and he go out about the third hour and saw others in the market place do nothing and he say to them go into the vine garden with the others and whatever be right i will give you . and they go to work . again he go out about the sixth and the ninth hour and do the same . and about the eleventh hour he go out and saw others do nothing and he say to them why be you here all the day do nothing ? they say to him because no man have give u work . he say to them go in with the rest into the vine garden . and when even come the lord of the vine garden say to his manager let the worker come and give them their payment from the last to the first . and when those men come who have go to work at the eleventh hour they be give every man a penny . then those who come first have the idea that they would get more and they like the rest be give a penny . and when they get it they make a protest against the master of the house say these last have do only one hour 's work and you have make them equal to u who have undergo the hard work of the day and the burning heat . but he in answer say to one of them friend i do you no wrong do you not make an agreement with me for a penny ? take what be yours and go away it be my pleasure to give to this last even a to you . have i not the right to do a seem good to me in my house ? or be your eye evil because i be good ? so the last will be first and the first last . and when jesus be go up to jerusalem he take the twelve disciples on one side and say to them see we go up to jerusalem and the son of man will be give into the hand of the chief priest and scribe and they will give order for him to be put to death and will give him up to the gentile to be make sport of and to be whip and to be put to death on the cross and the third day he will come back again from the dead . then the mother of the son of zebedee come to him with her son give him worship and make a request of him . and he say to her what be your desire ? she say to him let my two son be seat the one at your right hand and the other at your left in your of my cup but to be seat at my right hand and at my left be not for me to give but it be for those for whom my father have make it ready . and when it come to the ear of the ten they be angry with the become great among you let him be your servant and whoever have a desire to be first among you let him take the low place even a the son of man do not come to have servant but to be a servant and to give his life for the salvation of men . and when they be go out from jericho a great number go after him . and two blind men seat by the wayside when they have the news that jesus be go by give a desire for food . and see a fig tree by the wayside he come to it and saw nothing on it but leave only and he say to it let there be no fruit from you from this time forward for ever . and straight away the fig tree become dry and dead . and when the disciple saw it they be surprise say how do the fig tree become dry in so short a time ? and jesus in answer say to them truly i say to you if you have faith without doubt not only may you do what have be do to the fig tree but even if you say to this mountain be take up and put into the sea it will be do . and all thing whatever you make request for in prayer have faith you will get . and when he have come into the temple the chief priest and those in authority over the people come to him while he be teach and say by what authority do you do these thing ? and who give you this authority ? and jesus say to them in answer i will put one question to you and if you give me the answer i will say by what authority i do these thing . the baptism of john where do it come from ? from heaven or from men ? and they be reason among themselves say if we say from heaven he will say to u why then do you not have faith in him ? but if we say from men we be in fear of the people because all take john to be a prophet . and they make answer and say we have no idea . then he say to them and i will not say to you by what authority i do these thing . but how do it seem to you ? a man have two son and he come to the first and say son go and do work today in the vine garden . and he say in answer i will not but later change his decision he go . and he come to the second and say the same . and he make answer and say i go sir and go not . which of the two do his father 's pleasure ? they say the first . jesus say to them truly i say to you that tax farmer and loose woman be go into the kingdom of god before you . for john come to you in the way of righteousness and you have no faith in him but the tax farmer and the loose woman have faith in him and you when you saw it do not even have regret for your sin so a to have faith in him . give ear to another story . a master of a house make a vine garden and put a wall round it and make a place for crush out the wine and make a tower and let it out to field worker and go into another country . and when the time for the fruit come near he send his servant to the workman to get the fruit . and the workman make an attack on his servant give blow to one put another to death and stone another . again he send other servant more in number than the first and they do the same to them . but after that he send his son to them say they will have respect for my son . but when the workman saw the son they say among themselves this be he who will one day be the owner of the property come let u put him to death and take his heritage . and they take him and drive him out of the vine garden put him to death . when then the lord of the vine garden come what will he do to those workman ? they say to him he will put those cruel men to a cruel death and will let out the vine garden to other workman who will give him the fruit when it be ready . jesus say to them do you 's robe ? and he have nothing to say . then the king say to the servant put cord round his hand and foot and put him out into the dark there will be weep and cry of sorrow . for out of all to whom the now while the pharisee be together jesus put a question to them say what be your opinion of the christ ? whose son be he ? they say to him the son of david . he say to them how then do david in the but let the great among you be your servant . and whoever make himself high will be make low and whoever make himself low will be make high . but a curse be on you scribe and pharisee false one ! whoever take an oath by the offering which be on it he be responsible . you blind one which be great the offering or the altar which make the offering holy ? he then who take an oath by the altar take him who be seat on it . a curse be on you scribe and pharisee false one ! for you make men give a tenth of all sort of sweet smelling plant but you give no thought to the more important thing of the law righteousness and mercy and faith but it be right for you to do these and not to let the others be undone . you blind guide who take out a fly from your drink but make no trouble over a camel . a curse be on you scribe and pharisee false one ! for you make clean the outside of the cup and of the plate but inside they be full of violent behaviour and uncontrolled desire . you blind pharisee first make clean the inside of the cup and of the plate so that the outside may become equally clean . a curse be on you scribe and pharisee false one ! for you be like the rest place of the dead which be make white and seem beautiful on the outside but inside be full of dead men 's bone and of all unclean thing . even so you seem to men to be full of righteousness but inside you be all false cause error . and because wrongdoing will be increase the love of most people will become cold . but he who go through to the end will get salvation . and this good news of the kingdom will be give into . be ready then for at a time which you have no thought of the son of man will come . who be the true and wise servant whom his lord have put over those in his house to give them their food at the hour . for it be a when a man about to take a journey get his servant together and give them his property . and to one he give five talent to another two to another one to everyone a he be able and he go on his journey . straight away he who have be give the five talent go and do trade with them and make five more . in the same way he who have be give the two get two more . but he who be . his lord say to him well do good and true servant you have be true in a small thing i will give you control over great thing take your part in the joy of your lord . and he who have have the one in i have no clothing and you give it to me when i be ill or in prison you come to me . then will the upright make answer to him say lord when do we see you in need of food and give it to you ? or in
