death . but they say not while the feast be go on for fear of trouble among the people . now when jesus be in bethany in the house of simon the leper there come to him a woman have a bottle of perfume of great price and she put the perfume on his head when he be seat at table . but when the disciple saw it they be angry say to what purpose be this waste ? for we might have get much money for this and give it to the poor . but jesus see it say to them why be you trouble the woman ? she have do a kind act to me . for the poor you have ever with you but me you have not for ever . for in put this perfume on my body she do it to make me ready for my last resting place . truly i say to you wherever this good news go out in all the world what this woman have do will be talk of in memory of her . then one of the twelve who be name juda iscariot go to the chief priest and say what will you give me if i give him up to you ? and the price be fix at thirty bit of silver . and from that time he be watch for a chance to give him into their hand . now on the first day of unleavened bread the disciple come to jesus say where be we to make ready for you to take the passover meal ? and he say to them go into the town to such a man and say to him the master say my time be near i will keep the passover at your house with my disciple . and the disciple do a jesus have say to them and they make ready the passover . now when evening be come he be seat at table with the twelve disciple and while they be take food he say truly i say to you that one of you will be false to me . and they be very say and say to him one by one be it i lord ? and he make answer and say he who put his hand into the plate with me the same will be false to me . the son of man go even a the writing say of him but a curse be on that man through whom the son of man be give up it would have be well for that man if he have never come into the world . and juda who be false to him make answer and say be it i master ? he say to him yes . and when they be take food jesus take bread and after bless it he give the broken bread to the disciple and say take it this be my body . and he take a cup and have give praise he give it to them say take of it all of you for this be my blood of the testament which be give for men for the forgiveness of sin . but i say to you that from now i will not take of this fruit of the vine till that day when i take it new with you in my father 's kingdom . and after a song of praise to god they go out to the mountain of olive . then say jesus to them all of you will be turn away from me this night for it be say in the writing i will put to death the keeper of the sheep and the sheep of the flock will be put to flight . but after i be come back from the dead i will go before you into galilee . but peter make answer and say to him though all may be turn away from you i will never be turn away . jesus say to him truly i say to you that this night before the hour of the cock 's cry you will say three time that you have no knowledge of me . peter say to him even if i be put to death with you i will not be false to you . so say all the disciple . then come jesus with them to a place name gethsemane and say to his disciple be seat here while i go over there for prayer . and he take with him peter and the two son of zebedee and become sad and very troubled . then say he to them my soul be very sad even to death keep watch with me here . and he go forward a little and fall down on his face in prayer he say o my father if it be possible let this cup go from me but let not my pleasure but yours be do . and he come to the disciple and see that they be sleep and say to peter what be you not able to keep watch with me one hour ? keep watch with prayer so that you may not be put to the test the spirit truly be ready but the flesh be feeble . again a second time he go away and say in prayer o my father if this may not go from me without my take it let your pleasure be do . and he come again and saw them sleep for their eye be tire . and he go away from them again and a third time say the same prayer . then he come to the disciple and say to them go on sleep now and take your rest for the hour be come and the son of man be give into the hand of evil men . up let u be go see he who give me up be near . and while he be still talk judas one of the twelve come and with him a band arm with sword and stick from the chief priest and those in authority over the people . now the false one have give them a sign say the one to whom i give a kiss that be he take him . and straight away he come to jesus and say master ! and give him a kiss . and jesus say to him friend do that for which you have come . then they come and put hand on jesus and take him . and one of those who be with jesus put out his hand and take out his sword and give the servant of the high priest a blow cut off his ear . then say jesus to him put up your sword again into it place for all those who take the sword will come to death by the sword . do it not seem possible to you that if i make request to my father he will even now send me an army of angel ? but how then would the you take me not . but all this have take place so that the writing of the prophet might come true . then all his disciple go from him in flight . and those who have make jesus prisoner take him away to the house of caiaphas the high priest where the scribe and those in authority over the people have come together . but peter go after him at a distance to the house of the high priest and go in and though a number of false witness come . but later there come two who say this man say i be able to give the temple of god to destruction and to put it up again in three day . and the high priest get up and say to him have you no answer ? what be it which these say against you ? but jesus say not a word . and the high priest say to him i put you on oath by the living god that you will say to u if you be the christ the son of god . jesus say to him you say so but i say to you from now you will see the son of man seat at the right hand of power and come on the cloud of heaven . then the high priest violently part his robe say he have say evil against god what more need have we of witness ? for now his word against god have come to your ear what be your opinion ? they make answer and say it be right for him to be put to death . then they put shame on him and be cruel to him and some give him blow say be a prophet o christ and say who give you a blow ! now peter be seat in the open square outside the house and a servant girl come to him say you be with jesus the galilaean . but he say before them all that it be false say i have no knowledge of what you say . and when he have go who be near come and say to peter truly you be one of them because your talk be witness against you . then with curse and oath he say i have no knowledge of the man . and straight away there come the cry of a cock . and the word of jesus come back to peter when he say before the hour of the cock 's cry you will say three time that you have no knowledge of me . and he go out weep bitterly .now when an upright man . but they say what be that to u ? it be your business . and he put down the silver in the temple and go out and put himself to death by hang . and the chief priest take the silver and israel and they give them for the potter 's field a i have word from the lord . and jesus be before the ruler who put a question to him be you the king of the jew ? and jesus say to him you say so . but when the chief priest and those in authority make statement against him he give no answer . then say pilate to him do you give no attention to what their witness say against you ? and he give him no answer not even a word so that the ruler be greatly surprised . now at the feast it be the way for the ruler to let free to the people one prisoner at their selection . and they have then an important prisoner whose name be barabbas . so when they come together pilate say to them whom will you have ? barabbas or jesus who be name christ ? for he saw that for envy they have give him up . and while he be on the judge 's seat his wife send to him say have nothing to do with that upright man for i have have much trouble this day in a dream because of him . now the chief priest and those in authority get the people to make request for barabbas and for jesus to be put to death . but the ruler make answer and say to them which of the two be it your pleasure that i let go free ? and they say barabbas . pilate say to them what then be i to do with jesus who be name christ ? they all say let him be put to death on the cross . and he say why what evil have he do ? but they give loud cry say to the cross with him ! so when pilate saw that he be able to do nothing but that trouble be work up he take water and wash his hand before the people say the blood of this upright man be not on my hand you be responsible . and all the people make answer and say let his blood be on u and on our child . then he let barabbas go free but after have jesus whip he give him up to be put to death on the cross . then the ruler 's arm men take jesus into the open square and get all their band together . and they take off his clothing and put on him a red robe . and they make a crown of thorn and put it on his head and put a rod in his right hand and they go down on their knee before him and make sport of him say long life to the king of the jew . and they put shame on him and give him blow on the head with the rod . and when they have make sport of him they take the robe off him and put his clothing on him and take him away to put him on the cross . and while they be come out they saw a man of cyrene simon by name and they make him go with them so that he might take up his cross . and when they come to the place name golgotha that be to say dead man 's head they give him wine mixed with bitter drink and after taste it he take no more . and when they have put him on the cross they make division of his clothing among them by the decision of chance . and they be seat there watch him . and they put up over his head the statement of his crime in write this be jesus the king of the jew . then two thief be put on cross with him one on the right and one on the left . and those who go by say bitter word to him shake their head and say you who would give the temple to destruction and put it up again in three day get yourself free if you be the son of god come down from the cross . in the same way the chief priest make sport of him with the scribe and those in authority say a saviour of others he have no salvation for himself . if he be the king of israel let him now come down from the cross and we will have faith in him . he put his faith in god let god be his saviour now if he will have him for he say i be the son of god . and the thief who be on the cross say evil word to him . now from the sixth hour it be dark over all the land till the ninth hour . and about the ninth hour jesus give a loud cry say eli eli lama sabachthani ? that be my god my god why be you turn teach about a number of thing in the form of story and say to them in his teach give ear a man go out to put seed in the earth and while he be do it some be drop by the wayside and the bird come and take it for food . and some go on the stone where it have not much earth and it come up straight away because the earth be not deep and when the sun be high it be burn and because it have no root it become dry and dead . and some go among the thorn and the thorn come up and it have no room for growth and give no fruit . and some fall on good earth give fruit come up and increase and give thirty sixty and a hundred time a much . and he say to them whoever have ear let him give ear . and when he be by himself those who be round him with the twelve put question to him about the purpose of the story . and he say to them to you be give the secret of the kingdom of god but to those who be outside all thing be give in the form of story so that see they may see and it will not be clear to them and hear it they will not get the sense for fear that they may be turn again to me and have forgiveness . and he say to them if you be not clear about this story how will you be clear about the others ? the seed be the word . and these be they by the wayside where the word be plant and when they have give ear the evil one come straight away and take away the word which have be plant in them . and in the same way these be they who be plant on the stone who when the word have come to their ear straight away take it with joy and they have no root in themselves but go on for a time then when trouble come or pain because of the word they quickly become full of doubt . and others be those plant among the thorn these be they who have give ear to the word and the care of this life and the deceit of wealth and the desire for other thing come in put a stop to the growth of the word and it give no fruit . and these be they who be plant on the good earth such a give ear to the word and take it into their heart and give fruit thirty and sixty and a hundred time a much . and he say to them when the light come in do people put it under a vessel or under the bed and not on it table ? there be nothing cover which will not be see openly and nothing have be make secret which will not come to light . if any man have ears let him give ear . and he say to them take care what you give ear to in the same measure a you give you will get and more will be give to you . he who have to him will be give and he who have not from him will be take even that which he have . and he say such be the kingdom of god a if a man put seed in the earth and go to sleep and get up night and day and the seed come to growth though he have no idea how . the earth give fruit by herself first the leaf then the head then the full grain . but when the grain be ready he quickly send men to get it cut because the time for cut have come . and he say what picture may we give of the kingdom of god or with what story may we make it clear ? it be like a grain of mustard seed which when it be put in the earth be small than all the seed on the earth but when it be plant it come up and become tall than all the plant and put out great branch so that the bird of heaven be able to take rest in it shade . and with a number of such story he give them his teach a they be able to take it and without a story he say nothing to them but privately to his disciple he make all thing clear . and on that day when the evening have come he say to them let u go over to the other side . and go away from the people they take him with them a he be in the boat . and other boat be with him . and a great storm of wind come up and the wave come into the boat so that the boat be now become full . and he himself be in the back of the boat sleep on the cushion and they awake him say master be it nothing to you that we be in danger of destruction ? and he come out of his sleep and give strong order to the wind and say to the sea peace be at rest . and the wind go down and there be a great calm . and he say to them why be you full of fear ? have you still no faith ? and their fear be great and they say one to another who then be this that even the wind and the sea do his order ?and they come to the other side of the sea into the country of the gerasenes . and when he have get out of the boat straight away there come to him from the place of the dead a man with an unclean spirit . he be live in the place of the dead and no man be able to keep him down no not with a chain because he have frequently be prisoned in chain and iron band and the chain have be part and the band break by him and no man be strong enough to make him quiet . and all the time by day and by night in the place of the dead and in the mountain he be cry out and cut himself with stone . and when he saw jesus from far off he go quickly to him and give him worship and cry out with a loud voice he say what have i to do with you jesus son of the most high god ? in god 's name do not be cruel to me . for jesus have say to him come out of the man you unclean spirit . and jesus say what be your name ? and he make answer my name be legion because there be a great number of u . and he make strong prayer to him not to send them away out of the country . now on the mountain side there be a great herd of pig get their food . and they say to him send u into the pig so that we may go into them . and he let them do it . and the unclean spirit come out and go into the pig and the herd go rush down a sharp slope into the sea about two thousand of them and they come to their death in the sea . and their keeper go run and give an account of it in the town and in the country . and people come to see what have take place . and they come to jesus and saw the man in whom have be the evil spirit seat clothed and with full use of his sens and they be full of fear . and those who have see it give them an account of what have be do to him who have the evil spirit and of the fate of the pig . and they make a request to him to go out of their country . and when he be get into the boat the man in whom have be the evil spirit have a great desire to come with him . and he would not let him but say to him go to your house to your friend and give them news of the great thing the lord have do for you and how he have mercy on you . and he go on his way and make public in the country of decapolis what great thing jesus have do for him and all men be full of wonder . and when jesus have go over again in the boat to the other side a great number of people come to him and he be by the sea . and one of the ruler of the synagogue jairus by name come and see him go down at his foot and make strong prayer to him say my little daughter be near to death it be my prayer that you will come and put your hand on her so that she may be make well and have life . and he go with him and a great number of people go after him and come round him . and a woman who have have a flow of blood for twelve year and have undergone much at the hand of a number of medical men and have give all she have and be no good but even bad when she have news of the thing which jesus do go among the people come after him and put her hand on his robe . for she say if i may only put my hand on his robe i will be make well . and straight away the fountain of her blood be stop and she have a feeling in her body that her disease have go and she be well . and straight away jesus be conscious that power have go out of him and turn to the people he say who be touch my robe ? and his disciple say to him you see the people round you on every side and you say who be touch me ? and on his look round to see her who have do this thing the woman shake with fear conscious of what have be do to her come and fall on her face before him give him a true account of everything . and he say to her daughter your faith have make you well go in peace and be free from your disease . and while he be still talk they come from the ruler of the synagogue 's house say your daughter be dead why be you still trouble the master ? but jesus give no attention to their word say to the ruler of the synagogue have no fear only have faith . and he do not let anyone come with him but peter and james and john the brother of james . and they come to the house of the ruler of the synagogue and he saw people run this way and that and weeping and cry loudly . and when he have go in he say to them why be you make such a noise and weep ? the child be not dead but sleep . and they be laugh at him . but he have send them all out take the father of the child and her mother and those who be with him and go in where the child be . and take her by the hand he say to her talitha cumi which be my child i say to you get up . and the young girl get up straight away and be walk about she be twelve year old . and they be overcome with wonder . and he give them special order that they be not to say anything of this and he say that some food be to be give to her .and he go away from there and come into his country and his disciple go with him . and when the sabbath day have come he be teach in the synagogue and a number of people hear him be surprise say from where do this man get these thing ? and what be the wisdom give to this man and what be these work of power do by his hand ? be not this the woodworker the son of mary and brother of james and joses and juda and simon ? and be not his sister here with u ? and they be bitter against him . and jesus say to them a prophet be nowhere without honour but in his country and among his relation and in his family . and he be unable to do any work of power there but only to put his hand on one or two person who be ill and make them well . and he be greatly surprise because they have no faith . and he go about the country place teach . and he give order to the twelve and send them out two by two and he give them authority over the unclean spirit and he say that they be to take nothing for their journey but a stick only no bread no bag no money in their pocket they be to go with common shoe on their foot and not to take two coat . and he say to them wherever you go into a house make that your rest place till you go away . and whatever place will not take you in and will not give ear to you when you go away put off the dust from your foot a a witness against them . and they go out preach the need for a change of heart in men . and they send out a number of evil spirit and put oil on a great number who be ill and make them well . and king herod have news of him because his name be on the lip of all and he say john the baptist have come back from the dead and for this reason these power be work in him . but others say it be elijah . and others say it be a prophet even like one of the prophet . but herod when he have news of it say john whom i put to death have come back from the dead . for herod himself have send men out to take john and put him in prison because of herodias his brother philip 's wife whom he have take for himself . for john say to herod it be wrong for you to have your brother 's wife . and herodias be bitter against him desire to put him to death but she be not able for herod be in fear of john be conscious that he be an upright and holy man and keep him safe . and hear him he be much troubled and he give ear to him gladly . and the chance come when herod on his birthday give a feast to his lord and the high captain and the chief men of galilee and when the daughter of herodias herself come in and do a dance herod and those who be at table with him be pleased with her and the king say to the girl make a request for anything and i will give it you . and he take an oath say to her whatever be your desire i will give it to you even half of my kingdom . and she go out and say to her mother what be my request to be ? and she say the head of john the baptist . and she come in quickly to the king and say my desire be that you give me straight away on a plate the head of john the baptist . and the king be very sad but because of his oath and those who be with him at table he would not say 'no ' to her . and straight away the king send out one of his arm men and give him an order to come back with the head and he go and take off john 's head in prison and come back with the head on a plate and give it to the girl and the girl give it to her mother . and when his disciple have news of it they come and take up his body and put it in it last resting place . and the twelve come together to jesus and they give him an account of all the thing they have do and all they have be teach . and he say to them come away by yourselves to a quiet place and take a rest for a time . because there be a great number come and go and they have no time even for food . and they go away in the boat to a waste place by themselves . and the people saw them go and a number of them have knowledge who they be go run there together on foot from all the town and get there before them . and he get out and saw a great mass of people and he have pity on them because they be like sheep without a keeper and he give them teach about a number of thing . and at the end of the day his disciple come to him and say this place be waste land and it be late send them away so that they may go into the country and small town round about and get some food for themselves . but he say to them in answer give them food yourselves . and they say to him be we to go and get bread for two hundred penny and give it to them ? and he say to them how much bread have you ? go and see . and when they have see they say five cake of bread and two fish . and he make them all be seat in group on the green grass . and they be place in group by hundred and by fifty . and he take the five cake of bread and the two fish and look up to heaven he say word of blessing over them and when the cake be break he give them to the disciple to put before the people and he make division of the two fish among them all . and they all take of the food and have enough . and they take up twelve basket full of the broken bit and of the fish . and those who take of the bread be five thousand men . and straight away he make his disciple get into the boat and go before him to the other side to beth saida while he himself send the people away . and after he have send them away he go up into a mountain for prayer . and by even the boat be in the middle of the sea and he by himself on the land . and see that they have trouble in get their boat through the water because the wind be against them about the fourth watch of the night he come to them walk on the sea and he would have go past them but they when they saw him walk on the sea take him for a spirit and give a loud cry for they all saw him and be trouble . but straight away he say to them take heart it be i have no fear . and he go to them into the boat and the wind go down and they be full of wonder in themselves for it be not clear to them about the bread but their heart be hard . and when they have go across they come to gennesaret and get their boat to land . and when they have get out of the boat the people quickly have news of him and go run through all the country round about and take on their bed those who be ill to where it be say that he be . and wherever he go into small town or great town or into the country they take those who be ill into the market place request him that they might put their hand even on the edge of his robe and all those who do so be make well .and there come together to him the pharisee and certain of the scribe who have come from jerusalem and have see that some of his disciple take their bread with unclean that be unwashed hand . now the pharisee and all the jew do not take food without wash their hand with care keep the old rule which have be hand down to them and when they come from the market place they take no food till their hand be wash and a number of other order there be which have be hand down to them to keep washing of cup and pot and brass vessel . and the pharisee and the scribe put the question to him why do your disciple not keep the rule of the father but take their bread with unwashed hand ? and he say well do isaiah say of you you false one these people give me honour with their lip but their heart be far from me . but their worship be to no purpose while they give a their teach the rule of men . for turn away from the law of god you keep the rule of men . and he say to them truly you put on one side the law of god so that you may keep the rule which have be hand down to you . for moses say give honour to your father and mother and he who say evil of father or mother let him have the punishment of death but you say if a man say to his father or his mother that by which you might have have profit from me be corban that be to say give to god you no longer let him do anything for his father or his mother make the word of god of no effect by your rule which you have give and a number of other such thing you do . and turn to the people again he say to them give ear to me all of you and let my word be clear to you there be nothing outside the man which go into him be able to make him unclean but the thing which come out of the man be those which make the man unclean . and when he have go into the house away from all the people his disciple put question to him about the say . and he say to them have even you so little wisdom ? do you not see that whatever go into a man from outside be not able to make him unclean because it go not into the heart but into the stomach and go out with the waste ? he say this make all food clean . and he say that which come out of the man that make the man unclean . because from inside from the heart of men come evil thought and unclean pleasures the taking of good and of life break faith between husband and wife the desire of wealth wrongdoing deceit sin of the flesh an evil eye angry word pride foolish act all these evil thing come from inside and make the man unclean . and he go away from there to the country of tyre and sidon . and he go into a house desire that no man might have knowledge of it and he be not able to keep it secret . but a woman whose little daughter have an unclean spirit have have news of him come straight away and go down at his foot . now the woman be a greek a syro phoenician by birth and she make a request to him that he would send the evil spirit out of her daughter . and he say to her let the child first have their food for it be not right to take the child 's bread and give it to the dog . but she say to him in saw the child on the bed and the evil spirit go out . and again he go out from tyre and come through sidon to the sea of galilee through the country of decapolis . and they come to him with one who be make loose and his word become clear . and he give them order not to give news of it to anyone but the more he make this request so much the more they make it public . and they be overcome with wonder say he have do all thing well he even give back the power of hearing and the power of talk to those who have be without them .in those day again when there be a great mass of people and they have no food he make his disciple come to him and say to them i have pity for these people because they have be with me now three day and have no food if i send them away to their house with no food they will be overcome by weariness on the way and some of them have come from far . and his disciple say in answer how will it be possible to get enough bread for these men here in a waste place ? and ? peter say in answer you be the christ . and he put them under order not to say this of him to anyone . and teach them he say that the son of man would have to undergo much and be hat by those in his disciple say sharply to peter get out of my way satan for your mind be not on the thing of god but on the thing of men . and turn to the mass of people with his disciple he say to them if any man have the desire to come after me let him give up all other desire and take up his cross and come after me . whoever have a desire to keep his life will have it take from him and whoever give up his life because of me and the good news will keep it . what profit have a man if he get all the world with the loss of his life ? and what would a man give in exchange for his life ? whoever have a feeling of shame because of me and my word in this false and evil generation the son of man will have a feeling of shame because of him when he come in the glory of his father with the holy angel .and he say to them truly i say to you there be some here who will have no taste of death till they see the kingdom of god come with power . and after six day jesus take with him peter and james and john child and put him in the middle of them and take him in his arm he say to them whoever will give honour to one such little child in my name give honour to me and whoever give honour to me give honour not to me but to him who send me . john say to him master we saw one drive out evil spirit in your name and we say that he might not because he be not one of u . but jesus say say not so for there be no man who will do a great work in my name and be able at the same time to say evil of me . he who be not against u be for u . whoever give you a cup of water because you be christ 's truly i say to you he will in no way be without his reward . and whoever be a cause of trouble to one of these little one who have faith in me it would be good for him if a great stone be put round his neck and he be drop into the sea . and if your hand be a cause of trouble to you let it be cut off it be well for you to go into life with one hand than to have two hand and go into hell into the eternal fire . and if your foot be a cause of trouble to you let it be cut off it be well for you to go into life with one foot than to have two foot and go into hell . and if your eye be a cause of trouble to you take it out it be well for you to go into the kingdom of god with one eye than have two eye to go into hell where their worm be ever living and the fire be not put out . everyone will be salt with fire . salt be good but if the taste go from it how will you make it salt again ? have salt in yourselves and be at peace one with another .and he get up and go into the country of judaea on the other side of jordan and great number of people come together to him again and a be his way he give them teach . and pharisee come to him test him with the question be it right for a man to put away his wife ? and he say to them in answer what do moses say you be to do ? and they say to him moses let u give her a statement in writing and be free from her . but jesus say to them because of your hard heart he give you this law . but from the first male and female make he them . for this cause will a man go away from his father and mother and be join to his wife and the two will become one flesh so that they be no longer two but one flesh . let not that which have be join together by god be part by man . and in the house the disciple put question to him again about this thing . and he say to i be good ? no one be good but one and that be god . you have knowledge of what be say in the law do not put any one to death do not be untrue in married life do not take what be not yours do not give false witness do not get money by deceit give honour to your father and mother . and he say to him master all these law i have keep from the time when i be young . and jesus look on him and love him say there be one thing need go get money for your good and give it to the poor and you will have wealth in heaven and come with me . but his face become sad at the say and he go away sorrow for he be one who have much property . and jesus look round about say to his disciple how hard it be for those who have wealth to come into the kingdom of god ! and the disciple be full of wonder at his word . but jesus say to them again child how hard it be for those who put faith in wealth to come into the kingdom of god ! it be simpler for a camel to go through a needle 's eye than for a man of wealth to come into the kingdom of god . and they be greatly surprised say to him who then may have salvation ? jesus look on them say with men it be impossible but not with god for all thing be possible with god . peter say to him see we have give up everything and come after you . jesus say truly i say to you there be no man who have give up house or brother or sister or mother or father or child or land because of me and the good news who will not get a hundred time a much now in this time house and brother and sister and mother and child and land though with great trouble and in the world to come eternal life . but a great number who be first will be last and those who be last will be first . and they be on the way go up to jerusalem and jesus be go before them and they be full of wonder but not so among you but whoever have a desire to become great among you let him be your servant and whoever have a desire to be first among you let him be servant of all . for truly the son of man do not come to have servant but to be a servant and to give his life for the salvation of men . and they come to jericho and when he be go out of jericho with his disciple and a great number of people the on me . and some of them turn in protest give him an order to be quiet but he go on cry out all the more son of david have mercy on me . and jesus come to a stop and say let him come . and cry out to man say master make me able to see . and jesus say to him go on your way your faith have make you well . and straight away he be able to see and go after him in the way .and when they come near to . and they go away and saw a young as by the door outside in the open street and they be get him loose . and some of those who be there say to them what be you do take the as ? and they say to them come kingdom of our father david glory in the high . and he go into jerusalem into the temple and after look round about on all thing it be now even he go out to bethany with the twelve . and on the nothing but leave for it be not the time for the fruit . and he say to it let no man take fruit from you for ever . and his disciple take note of his word . and they come to jerusalem and he go into . and he give them teaching and say to them be it not in the writing my house be to be name a house of prayer for all the nation ? but you have make it a hole of thief . and it come to the ear of the chief priest and scribe and they take think how they might put him to death be in fear of him because all the people be full of wonder at his teaching . and every evening he go out of the town . and when they be go by in the morning they saw the fig tree dead from the root . and peter have a memory of it say to him master see the tree which be curse by you be dead . and jesus answering say to them have god 's faith . truly i say to you whoever say to this mountain be take up and be put into the sea and have no doubt in his heart but have faith that what he say will come about he will have his desire . for this reason i say to you whatever you make a request for in prayer have faith that it have be give to you and you will have it . and whenever you make a prayer let there be forgiveness in your heart if you have anything against anyone so that you may have forgiveness for your sin from your father who be in heaven . and they come again to jerusalem and while he be walk in the temple there come to him the chief priest and the scribe and those in authority and they say to him by what authority do you do these thing ? or who give you authority to do these thing ? and jesus say to them i will put to you one question give me an answer and i will say by what authority i do these thing . the baptism of john be it from heaven or from men ? give me an answer . and they give think to it among themselves say if we say from heaven he will say why then do you not have faith in him ? but if we say from men they be in fear of the people because all take john to be truly a prophet . and they say in answer to jesus we have no idea . and jesus say to them and i will not say to you by what authority i do these thing .and he give them teach in the form of story . a man have a vine garden plant and put a wall about it and make a place for crush out the wine and put up a tower and let it out to field worker and go into another country . and when the time come he send a servant to get from the workman some of the fruit of the garden . and they take him and give him blow and send him away with nothing . and again he send to them another servant and they give him wound on the head and be very cruel to him . and he send another and they put him to death and a number of others whip some and put some to death . he still have one a dearly love son he send him last to them say they will have respect for my son . but those workman say among themselves this be he who will one day be the owner of the property come let u put him to death and the heritage will be ours . and they take him and put him to death push his body out of the garden . what then will the master of the garden do ? he will come and put the workman to death and will give the garden into the hand of others . have you not see this which be in the writing the stone which the builder put on one side the same be make the chief stone of the building this be the lord 's do and it be a wonder in our eye ? and they make attempt to take him but they be in fear of the people because they saw that the story be against them and they go away from him . then they send to him certain of the pharisee and the herodians so that they might make use of his word to take him by a trick . and when they have come they say to him master we be certain that you be true and have no fear of anyone you have no respect for a man 's position but you be teach the true way of god be it right to give tax to caesar or not ? be we to give or not to give ? but he conscious of their false heart say to them why do you put me to the test ? give me a penny so that i may see it . and they give him one . and he say to them whose be this image and name on it ? and they say to him caesar 's . and jesus say to them give to caesar the thing which be caesar 's and to god the thing which be god 's . and they be full of wonder at him . and there come to him sadducee who say there be no come back from the dead and they put a question to him say master in the law moses say if a man 's brother come to his end and have a wife still live and no child it be right for his brother to take his wife and get a family for his brother . there be seven brother and the first take a wife and at his death there be no offspring and the second take her and at his death there be no offspring and the third the same and all the seven have no seed . last of all the woman herself come to her death . in the future life when they come back from the dead whose wife will she be ? for the seven have her for a wife . jesus say to them be not this the reason for your error that you have no knowledge of the holy writing or of the power of god ? when they come back from the dead they do not get marry but be like the angel in heaven . but a to the dead come back to life have you not see in the book of moses about the burning thorn tree how god say to him i be the god of abraham and the god of isaac and the god of jacob ? he be not the god of the dead but of the living you be greatly in error . and one of the scribe come and hear their argument together and see that he have give them a good answer put the question to him which law be the first of all ? jesus say in answer the first be give ear o israel the lord our god be one lord and you be to have love for the lord your god with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind and with all your strength . the second be this have love for your neighbour a for yourself . there be no other law great than these . and the scribe say to him truly master you have well say that he be one and there be no other but he and to have love for him with all the heart and with all the mind and with all the strength and to have the same love for his neighbour a for himself be much more than all form of offering . and when jesus saw that he give a wise answer he say to him you be not far from the kingdom of god . and every man after that be in fear of question him any more . and jesus when he be teach in the temple say how do the scribe say that the christ be the son of david ? david himself say in the holy spirit the lord say to my lord be seat at my right hand till i put those who be against you under your foot . david himself give him the name of lord and how then be he his son ? and the common people give ear to him gladly . and in his teaching he say be on your watch against the scribe whose pleasure it be to go about in long robe and be respect in the market place and to have the chief seat in the synagogue and the first place at feast who take away the property of widow and before the eye of men make long prayer these will be judge more hardly . and he take a seat by the place where the money be keep and saw how the people put money into the box and a number who have wealth put in much . and there come a poor widow and she put in two little bit of money which make a farthing . and he make his disciple come to him and say to them truly i say to you this poor widow have put in more than all those who be put money into the box because they all put in something out of what they have no need for but she out of her need put in all she have even all her living .and when he be go out of the temple one of his disciple say to him master see what stone and what building ! and jesus say to him do you see these great building ? there be not one stone here rest on another which will not be overturn . and while he be seat on the mountain of olive opposite the temple peter and james and john and andrew say to him privately say when these thing will be and what will be the sign when these thing be all about to be do . and jesus say to them take care that you be not trick by anyone . people will come in my name say i be he and a number will be turn from the true way . and when you have news of war and talk of war do not be trouble these thing have to be but it be still not the end . nation will go to war with nation and kingdom with kingdom there will be earth shock in different place there will be time when there be no food these thing be the first of the trouble . but take care for they will give you up to the sanhedrin and in synagogue you will be whip and you will be take before ruler and king because of me for a sign to them . and the good news have first to be give to all the nation . and when you be take and give up to be judge do not be trouble about what to say but whatever be give to you in that hour say because it be not you who say it but the holy spirit . and brother will give up brother to death and the father his child and child will go against their father and mother and put them to death . and you will be hat by all men because of my name but he who go through to the end will have salvation . but when you see the unclean thing which make destruction in the place where it have no right to be let this be clear to the reader then let those who be in judaea go quickly to the mountain and let him who be on the house top not go down or go in to take anything out of his house and let not him who be in the field go back to take his coat . and it will be hard for woman who be with child and for her who have a baby at the breast in those day . and say a prayer that it may not be in the winter . for in those day there will be sorrow such a there have not be from the time when god make the world till now and will not ever be again . and if the lord have not make the time short no flesh would have be keep from destruction but because of the saint he have make the time short . and then if any man say to you see here be christ or see there have no faith in it because there will be false christ and false prophet and they will give sign and wonder in the hope of turn even the saint from the true way . but take care see i have make all thing clear to you before the time . but in those day after that time of trouble the sun will be make dark and the moon will not give her light and the star will be fall from heaven and the power which be in the heaven will be move . and then they will see the son of man come in cloud with great power and glory . and then he will send out the angel and will get together his saint from the four wind from the farthest part of the earth to the farthest part of heaven . take an example from the fig tree when it branch become soft and put out their leaf you see that the summer be near even so when you see these thing take place you may be certain that he be near even at the door . truly i say to you this generation will not come to an end till all these thing be complete . heaven and earth will come to an end but my word will not come to an end . but of that day or that hour no one have knowledge not even the angel in heaven or the son but the father . take care keep watch with prayer for you be not certain when the time will be . it be a when a man who be in another country for a time have go away from his house and give authority to his servant and to everyone his work give the porter an order to keep watch . so you be to keep watch because you be not certain when the master of the house be come in the evening or in the middle of the night or at the cock 's cry or in the morning for fear that come suddenly he see you sleep . and what i say to you i say to all keep watch .it be now two day before the feast of the passover and the unleavened bread and the chief priest and the scribe make design how they might take him by deceit and put him to death but they say not while the feast be go on for fear there may be trouble among the people . and while he be in bethany in the house of simon the leper seat at table there come a woman with a bottle of perfumed oil of great price and when the bottle be break she put the perfume on his head . but some of them be angry among themselves say for what purpose have this oil be waste ? we might have get more than three hundred penny for it and give the money to the poor . and they say thing against her among themselves . but jesus say let her be why be you trouble her ? she have do a kind act to me . the poor you have ever with you and whenever you have the desire you may do them good but me you have not for ever . she have do what she be able she have put oil on my body to make it ready for it last resting place . and truly i say to you wherever the good news go out through all the earth what this woman have do will be talk of in memory of her . and judas iscariot who be one of the twelve go away to the chief priest so that he might give him up to them . and hear what he say they be glad and give him their word to make him a payment of money . and he take thought how he might best give him up to them . and on the first day out preach everywhere the lord work with them and give witness to the word by the sign which come after . so be it .a a number of attempt have be make to put together in order an account of those event which take place among u a they be hand down to u by those who saw them from the first and be preacher of the word it seem good to me have make observation with great care of the direction of event in their order to put the fact in write for you most noble theophilus so that you might have certain knowledge of those thing about which you be give teach . in the day of herod king of judaea there be a certain priest by name zacharias of the order of abijah and he have a wife of the family of aaron and her name be elisabeth . they be upright in the eye of god keep all the rule and order of god and do no wrong . and they be without child because elisabeth have never give birth and they be at that time very old . now it come about that in his turn he be act a priest before god and a be the way of the priest he have to go into the temple to see to the burning of perfume . and all the people be offer prayer outside at the time of the burning of perfume . and he saw an angel of the lord in his place on the right side of the altar . and zacharias be trouble when he saw him and fear come on him . but the angel say have no fear zacharias for your prayer have come to the ear of god and your wife elisabeth will have a son and his name will be john . and you will be glad and have great delight and number of people will have joy at his birth . for he will be great in the eye of the lord he will not take wine or strong drink and he will be full of the spirit of god from his birth . and through him great number of the child of israel will be turn to the lord their god . and he will go before his face in the spirit and power of elijah turn the heart of father to their child and wrongdoer to the way of righteousness to make ready a people whose heart have be turn to the lord . and zacharias say to the angel how may i be certain of this ? for i be an old man and my wife be far on in year . and the angel answer say i be gabriel whose place be before god i have be send to say these word to you and to give you this good news . now see you will be without voice or language till the day when these thing come about because you have not faith in my word which will have effect at the right time . and the people be wait for zacharias and be surprise because he be in the temple for such a long time . and when he come out he be not able to say anything and they saw that he have see a vision in the temple and he be make sign to them without word . and when the day of his work in the temple be end he go back to his house . after that time elisabeth be certain that she be to become a mother keep herself from men 's eye for five month say the lord have do this to me for his eye be on me to take away my shame in the eye of men . now in the sixth month the angel gabriel be send from god to a town in galilee name nazareth to a virgin who be to be marry to a man name joseph of the family of david and the name of the virgin be mary . and the angel come in to her and say peace be with you to whom special grace have be give the lord be with you . but she be greatly troubled at his word and say to herself what may be the purpose of these word ? and the angel say to her have no fear mary for you have god 's approval . and see you will give birth to a son and his name will be jesus . he will be great and will be name the son of the most high and the lord god do . and mary say i be the servant of the lord may it be to me a you say . and the angel go away . then mary get up and go quickly into the high land to a town of judah and go into the house of zacharias and take elisabeth in her arm . and when the voice of mary come to the ear of elisabeth the baby make a sudden move inside her then elisabeth be full of the holy spirit and she say with a loud voice may bless be on you among woman and a blessing on the child of your body . how be it that the mother of my lord come to me ? for truly when the sound of your voice come to my ear the baby in my body make a sudden move for joy . happy will she be who have faith that the thing which the lord have say to her will be do . and mary say my soul give glory to god my spirit be glad in god my saviour . for he have have pity on his servant though she be poor and lowly place and from this hour will all generation give witness to the blessing which have come to me . for he who be strong have do great thing for me and holy be his name . his mercy be for all generation in whom be the fear of him . with his arm he have do act of power he have put to flight those who have pride in their heart . he have put down king from their seat lift up on high the men of low degree . those who have no food he make full of good thing the men of wealth he send away with nothing in their hand his help he to her house . now it be time for elisabeth to give birth and she have a son . and it come to the ear of her neighbour and relation that the lord have be very good to her and they take part in her joy . and on the eighth day they come to see to the circumcision of the child and they would have give him the name of zacharias his father 's name but his mother make answer and say no his name be john . and they say not one of your relation have that name . and they make sign to his father to say what name be to be give to him . and he send for write material and put down his name be john and they be all surprise . and straight away his mouth be open and his tongue be free and he give praise to god . and fear come on all those who be live round about them and there be much talk about all these cattle have their food because there be no room for them in the house . and in the same country there be keeper of sheep in the field watch over their flock by night . and an angel of the lord come to day in the town of david a saviour have come to birth who be christ the lord . and this be the sign to you you will see a young child fold in linen in the place where the cattle have their food . and suddenly there be with the angel a great band of spirit from heaven give praise to god and say glory to god in the high and on the earth peace among men with whom he be well pleased . and when the be not good enough to undo he will give you baptism with the holy spirit and with fire in whose hand be the instrument with which he will make clean his grain he will put the good grain in his store but the waste will be burn in the fire which will never be put out . and so comfort them with these and other word he give the good news to the people but herod the king because john have make a he get up and go out of the synagogue and go into the house of simon . and simon 's wife 's mother be very ill with a burning heat and in answer to their prayer for her he go near her and with a sharp word he give order to the disease and it go away from her and straight away she get up and take care of their need . and at sundown all those who have anyone ill with any sort of disease take them to him and he put his hand on every one of them and make them well . and evil spirit come out of a number of them cry out and say you be the son of god . but he give them sharp order not to say a word while the people come push to be near him and to have knowledge of the word of god he be by a wide stretch of water name gennesaret and he saw two boat by the edge of the water but the fisherman have the boat . and when his talk be end he say to simon go out into deep water and let down your net for fish . and simon answering say master we be work all night and we take nothing but at your word i will let down the net . and when they have do this they get such a great number of fish that it seem a if their net would be break and they make sign to their friend in the other boat to come to their help . and they come and the two boat be so full that they be go down . but simon when he saw it go down at the knee of jesus and say go away from me o lord for i be a sinner . for he be full of wonder and so be all those who be with him at the number of fish which they have take and so be james and john the son of zebedee who be work with simon . and jesus say to simon have no fear from this time forward you will be a fisher of men . and when they have get their boat to the land they give up everything and go after him . and it come about that while he be in one of the town there be a leper there and when he saw jesus he go down on his face in prayer to him say lord if it be your pleasure you have power to make me clean . and he put out his hand to him and say it be my pleasure be clean . and straight away his disease go from him . and he give him order say nothing to any man but let the priest see you and give an offering so that you may be make clean a the law of moses say and for a witness to them . but news of him go out all the more in every direction and great number of people come together to give hearing to his word and to be make well from their disease . but he go away by himself to a waste place for prayer . and it come about that on one of these day he be teach and some pharisee and teacher of the law be seat there who have come from every town of galilee and judaea and from jerusalem and the power of the lord be with him to make those who be ill free from their disease . and some men have with them on a bed a man who be ill without power of move and they make attempt to get him in and put him before jesus . and because of the mass of people there be no way to get him in so they go up on the top of the house and let him down through the roof on his bed into the middle in front of jesus . and see their faith he say man you have forgiveness for your sin . and the scribe and pharisee be have an argument say who be this who have no respect for god ? who be able to give forgiveness for sin but god only ? but jesus who have knowledge of their thought say to them why be you reason in your heart ? which be the simpler to say you have forgiveness for your sin or to say get up and go ? but so that you may see that on earth the son of man have authority for the forgiveness of sin he say to the man who be ill i say to you get up and take up your bed and go into your house . and straight away he get up before them and take up his bed and go away to his house give praise to god . and wonder overcame them all and they give glory to god and they be full of fear say we have see strange thing today . and after these thing he go out and saw levi a tax farmer seat at the place where tax be take and say to him come after me . and give up his business he get up and go after him . and levi make a great feast for him in his house and a great number of tax farmer and others be seat at table with them . and the pharisee and their scribe make protest against his disciple say why do you take food and drink with tax farmer and sinner ? and jesus answering say to them those who be well have no need of a medical man but those who be ill. i have come not to get the upright but sinner so that they may be turn from their sin . and they say to him the disciple of john frequently go without food and make prayer and so do the disciple of the pharisee but your disciple take food and drink . and jesus say be you able to make the friend of the newly marry man go without food when he be with them ? but the day will come when he will be take away from them and then they will go without food . and he say to them in a story no man take a bit of cloth from a new coat and put it on to an old coat for so the new coat would be damage and the bit from the new would not go well with the old . and no man put new wine into old wine skin for fear that the skin will be burst by the new wine and the wine be let out and the skin come to destruction . but new wine have to be put into new wine skin . and no man have have old wine have any desire for new for he say the old be well .now it come about that on the sabbath he be go through the field of grain and his disciple take the head of the grain for food crush them in their hand . but some of the pharisee say why do you do what it be not right to do on the sabbath ? and jesus say and give it to those who be with him ? and he say the son of man be lord even of the sabbath . and it come about on another sabbath that he go into the synagogue and be teach there . and a man be there whose right hand be dead . and the scribe and pharisee be watch him to see if he would make him well on the sabbath so that they might be able to say something against him . but he have knowledge of their thought and he say to the man whose hand be dead get up and come into the middle . and he get up and come forward . and jesus say i put the question to you be it right to do good on the sabbath or to do evil ? to give life or to take it away ? and look round on all of them he say to him put out your hand . and he do so and his hand be make well . but they be full of wrath and be talk together about what they might do to jesus . and it come about in those day that he go out to the mountain for prayer and he be all night in prayer to god . and the day come and turn to his disciple he make a selection from among them of twelve to whom he give the name of apostle simon to whom he give the name of peter and andrew his brother and james and john and philip and bartholomew and matthew and thomas and jam the son of alphaeus and simon who be name the zealot and judas the son of james and juda iscariot he who be false to him . and he come down with them to a level place and a great band of his disciple and a very great number of people from all judaea and jerusalem and from the part of tyre and sidon by the sea come to give hearing to him and to be make well from their disease and those who be trouble with unclean spirit be make well . and all the people be desire to be touch by him for power come from him and make them all well . and turn his eye to his disciple he say happy be you who be poor for the kingdom of god be yours . happy be you who be in need of food now for you will be make full . happy be you who be weep now for you will be glad . happy be you when men have hate for you and put you away from among them and say angry word to you turn away in disgust at your name because of the son of man . be glad in that day and be lift up for joy for your reward in heaven will be great for their father do these same thing to the prophet . but unhappy be you who have wealth for you have be comfort now . unhappy be you who be full of food now for you will be in need . unhappy be you who be laugh now for you will be cry in sorrow . unhappy be you when all men give you their approval for so their father do to the false prophet . but i say to you who give ear to me have love for those who be against you do good to those who have hate for you give bless to those who give you curse say prayer for those who be cruel to you . if a man give you a blow on one side of your face then let the other side be turn to him from him who take away your coat do not keep back your robe . give to everyone who come with a request and if a man take away your property make no attempt to get it back again . do to others a you would have them do to you . if you have love for those who have love for you what credit be it to you ? for even sinner have love for those who have love for them . and if you do good to those who do good to you what credit be it to you ? for even sinner do the same . and if you let those have the use of your money from whom you be hop to get it back what credit be it to you ? even sinner do so to sinner hop to get back as much a they give . but be love to those who be against you and do them good and give them your money not give up hope and your reward will be great and you will be the son of the most high for he be kind to evil men and to those who have hard heart . be full of pity even a your father be full of pity . be not judge of others and you will not be judge do not give punishment to others and you will not get punishment yourselves make others free and you will be make free give and it will be give to you good measure crush down full and run over they will give to you . for in the same measure a you give it will be give to you again . and he give them teach in the form of a story say be it possible for one blind man to be guide to another ? will they not go fall together into a hole ? the disciple be not great than his master but everyone whose learning be complete will be like his master . and why do you take note of the grain of dust in your brother 's eye but take no note of the bit of wood which be in your eye ? how will you say to your brother brother let me take the grain of dust out of your eye when you yourself do not see the bit of wood in your eye ? o false one ! first take the wood out of your eye and then you will see clearly to take the dust out of your brother 's eye . for no good tree give bad fruit and no bad tree give good fruit . for every tree be judge by it fruit . men do not get fig from thorn or grape from blackberry plant . the good man out of the good store of his heart give good thing and the evil man out of his evil store give evil for out of the full store of the heart come the word of the mouth . why do you say to me lord lord and do not the thing which i say ? everyone who come to me and give ear to my word and do them i will make clear to you what he be like he be like a man build a house who go deep and put the base of it on a rock and when the water come up and the river be drive against that house it be not move because the building be good . but he who give hear without do be like a man build a house on the earth without a base for it and when the force of the river come against it straight away it come down and the destruction of that house be great .after he have come to the end of all his word in the hearing of the people he go into capernaum . and a certain captain have a servant who be very dear to him this servant be ill and near to death . and when news of jesus come to his ear he send to him ruler of the jew request that he would come and make his servant well . and they when they come to jesus make their request warmly say it be right for you to do this for him because he be a friend to our nation and himself have put up a synagogue for u . and jesus go with them . and when he be not far from the house the man send friend to him say lord do not give yourself trouble for i be not important enough for you to come into my house and i have the feeling that i be not even good enough to come to you but say the word only and my servant will be well . for i myself be a man under authority have men under me and i say to this one go and he go and to another come and he come and to my servant do this and he do it . and when these thing be say to jesus he be surprised and turn to the mass of people come after him say i have not see such great faith no not in israel . and when those who be send come back to the house they saw that the servant be well . and it come about after a little time that he go to a town name nain and his disciple go with him and a great number of people . now when he come near the door of the town a dead man be be take out the only son of his mother who be a widow and a great number of people from the town be with her . and when the lord saw her he have pity on her and say to her be not sad . and he come near and put his hand on the stretcher where the dead man be and those who be move it come to a stop . and he say young man i say to you get up . and the dead man get up and word come from his lip . and he give him to his mother . and fear come on all and they give praise to god say a great prophet be among u and god have give think to his people . and this story about him go through all judaea and the place round about . and the disciple of john give him an account of all these thing . then john send two of his disciple to the lord say be you he who be to come or be we wait for another ? and when the men come to him they say john the
