power in their leg be walk leper be make clean those who have no hearing now have their ear open dead men come to life again and the poor have the good news give to them . and a blessing will be on him who have no doubt about me . and when the men who be send by john have go away he say to the people about john what do you go out into the waste land to see ? a tall stem move in the wind ? but what do you go out to see ? a man in soft clothing ? see now those who have beautiful clothing and delicate food be in king ' house . but what do you go out to see ? a prophet ? yes i say to you and more than a prophet . this be he of whom it have be say see i send my servant before your face who will make ready your way before you . i say to you among all the son of woman not one be great than john but he who be least in the kingdom of god be great than he . and all the people and the tax farmer to whom john have give baptism when they have knowledge of these thing give glory to god . but the pharisee and the teacher of the law be against the purpose of god for themselves not have have his baptism . what comparison be i to make of the men of this generation ? what be they like ? they be like child who be seat in the market place cry out to one another and say we make music for you but you do not take part in the dance we give cry of sorrow but you be not sad . for john the baptist come take no food or drink and you say he have an evil spirit . the son of man come feasting and you say here be a lover of food and wine a friend of tax farmer and sinner . but wisdom be judge to be right by all her child . and one of the pharisee make a request that he would take a meal with him . and he go into the pharisee 's house and take his seat at the table . and there be a woman in the town who be a sinner and when she have news that he be a guest in the pharisee 's house she take a bottle of perfume and go in and take her place at the back of him near his foot weep so that his foot be wash with the drop from her eye and with her hair she make them dry and kiss his foot she put the perfume on them . now when the pharisee in whose house he be saw it he say to himself this man if he be a prophet would be conscious what sort of woman this be who have put her hand on him that she be a sinner . and jesus answering say simon i have something to say to you . and he say master say on . and he say two men be in debt to a certain man of business one have a debt of five hundred penny and the other of fifty . when they be unable to make payment he make the two of them free of their debt . which of them now will have the great love for him ? simon in answer say it seem he whose debt be great . and he say your decision be right . and turn to the woman he say to simon you see this woman ? i come into your house you do not give me water for my foot but she have be wash my foot with the drop from her eye and dry them with her hair . you do not give me a kiss but she from the time when i come in have go on kiss my foot . you put no oil on my head but she have put perfume on my foot . and so i say to you she will have forgiveness for her sin which be great in number because of her great love but he who have small need of forgiveness give little love . and he say to her you have forgiveness for your sin . and those who be seat at table with him say to themselves who be this who even give forgiveness of sin ? and he say to the woman by your faith you have salvation go in peace .and it come about after a short time that he go through town and country give the good news of the kingdom of god and with him be the twelve and certain woman who have be make free from evil spirit and disease mary name magdalene from whom seven evil spirit have go out and joanna the wife of chuza herod 's chief house servant and susanna and a number of others who give him of their wealth for his need . and when a great number of people come together and men from every town go out to him he give them teach in the form of a story a man go out to put in seed and while he be do it some be drop by the wayside and it be crush under foot and be take by the bird of heaven . and some go on the rock and when it come up it become dry and dead because it have no water . and some go among thorn and the thorn come up with it and it have no room for growth . and some fall on good earth come up and give fruit a hundred time a much . and with these word he say in a loud voice he who have ear let him give ear . and his disciple put question to him about the point of the story . and he say to you be give knowledge of the secret of the kingdom of god but to the others they be give in story so that see they may not see and though they give hear the sense will not be clear to them . now this be the point of the story the seed be the word of god . those by the side of the road be those who have give hearing then the evil one come and take away the word from their heart so that they may not have faith and get salvation . and those on the rock be those who with joy give hearing to the word but have no root they have faith for a time and when the test come they give up . and those which go among thorn be those who have give hearing and go on their way but they be overcome by care and wealth and the pleasure of life and they give no fruit . and those in the good earth be those who have give ear to the word keep it with a good and true heart and in quiet strength give fruit . no man when the light be light put a cover over it or put it under a bed but he put it on it table so that those who come in may see the light . for nothing be put out of view which will not be make clear and nothing be secret of which the knowledge will not come to light . so take care how you give hear for to him who have will be give and from him who have not will be take even what he seem to have . and his mother and his brother come to him and they be not able to get near him because of the great number of people . and someone say to him your mother and your brother be outside desire to see you . but he say to them in answer my mother and my brother be those who have knowledge of the word of god and do it . now it come about on one of those day that he get into a boat with his disciple and he say to them let u go over to the other side of the water and they put out the boat . but while they be sail he go to sleep and a storm of wind come down on the sea and the boat become full of water and they be in danger . then they come to him and awake him out of his sleep say master master destruction be near . and he when he be awake give order to the wind and the roll wave and the storm come to an end and all be calm . and he say to them where be your faith ? and fear and wonder overcome them and they say to one another who then be this who give order even to the wind and the water and they do what he say ? and they come to the country of the gerasenes which be opposite galilee . and when he have come to the land there come to him a certain man from the town who have evil spirit and for a long time he have have no clothing on and be not live in a house but in the place of the dead . and when he saw jesus he give a loud cry and go down on the earth before him and in a loud voice say what have i to do with you jesus son of the most high god ? do not be cruel to me . for he give an order to the evil spirit to come out of the man . for frequently it would take a grip of him and he be keep under control and prisoned with chain but part the chain in two he would be send by the driving of the evil spirit into waste place . and jesus say to him what be your name ? and he say legion for a number of spirit have go into him . and they make a request to him that he would not give them an order to go away into the deep . now there be a great herd of pig in that place get food on the mountain and the evil spirit make a request to him that he would let them go into the pig and he let them . and the evil spirit come out of the man and go into the pig and the herd go rush down a sharp slope into the water and come to destruction . and when the men who take care of them saw what have come about they go quickly and give news of it in the town and the country . and they go out to see what have take place and they come to jesus and saw the man out of whom the evil spirit have go seat clothed and with full use of his sens at the foot of jesus and fear come on them . and those who have see it give them an account of how the man who have the evil spirit be make well . and all the people of the country of the gerasenes make a request to him to go away from them for they be in great fear and he get into a boat and go back . but the man from whom the evil spirit have go out have a great desire to be with him but he send him away say go back to your house and let them have news of all the great thing which god have do for you . and he go away give word through all the town of the great thing which jesus have do for him . and when jesus go back the people be glad to see him for they be all wait for him . then there come a man name jairus who be a ruler in the synagogue and he go down at the foot of jesus desire him to come to his house for he have an only daughter about twelve year old and she be near to death . but while he be on his way the people be push to be near him . and a woman who have have a flow of blood for twelve year and have give all her money to medical men and not one of them be able to make her well come after him and put her hand on the edge of his robe and straight away the flowing of her blood be stop . and jesus say who be touch me ? and when they all say it be not i peter and those who be with him say master the people be push round you on every side . but jesus say someone be touch me for i have the feeling that power have go out from me . and when the woman saw that she be not able to keep it secret she come shake with fear and fall down before him she make clear before all the people the reason for her touch him and how she be make well straight away . and he say to her daughter your faith have make you well go in peace . while he be still talk someone come from the house of the ruler of the synagogue say your daughter be dead do not go on trouble the master . but jesus at these word say to him have no fear only have faith and she will be make well . and when he come to the house he do not let any man go in with him but only peter and john and james and the father of the girl and her mother . and all the people be weep and cry for her but he say do not be sad for she be not dead but sleep . and they be laugh at him be certain that she be dead . but he take her hand say to her my child get up . and her spirit come back to her and she get up straight away and he give order that food be to be give to her . and her father and mother be full of wonder but he give order to them to say nothing about it to anyone .and get the twelve together he give them power and authority over all evil spirit and over diseases to make them well . and he send them out to be preacher of the kingdom of god and to make well those who be ill. and he say to them take nothing for your journey no stick or bag or bread or money and do not take two coat . and if you go into a house let that house be your rest place till you go away . and if any people will not take you in when you go away from that town put off it dust from your foot for a witness against them . and they go away journey through all the town preach the good news and make people free from disease in all place . now herod the king have news of all these thing and he be in doubt because it be say by some people that john have come back from the dead and by some that elijah have come and by others that one of the old prophet have come back to life . and herod say i put john to death but who be this of whom such story be give to me ? and he have a desire to see him . and the twelve when they come back give him an account of what they have do . and he take them with him and go away from the people to a town name beth saida . but the people get news of it go after him and he be pleased to see them and give them teach about the kingdom of god and make those well who be in need of it . and the day go on and the twelve come to him and say send these people away so that they may go into the town and the country round about and get resting place and food for themselves for we be in a waste place . but he say give them food yourselves . and they say we have only five cake of bread and two fish if we do not go and get food for all these people . for there be about five thousand men . and he say to his disciple make them be seat in group about fifty to a group . and they do so and make them all be seat . and he take the five cake of bread and the two fish and look up to heaven he say word of blessing over them and when they have be break he give them to the disciple to give to the people . and they all take the food and have enough and they take up of the broken bit which be over twelve basket full . and it come about that when he be in prayer by himself and the disciple be with him he put a question to them say who do the people say i be ? and they answer say john the baptist but others say elijah and others that one of the old prophet have come back . and he say but who do you say that i be ? and peter answering say the christ of god . but he give them special order not to say this to any man say the son of man will undergo much and be put on one side by the ruler and the chief priest and the teacher of the law and be put to death and on the third day he will come back to life . and he say to them all if any man have a desire to come after me let him give up all and take up his cross every day and come after me . for whoever have a desire to keep his life will have it take from him but whoever give up his life because of me will keep it . for what profit will a man have if he get all the world but undergoes loss or destruction himself ? for if any man have a feeling of shame because of me or of my word the son of man will have shame because of him when he come in his glory and the glory of the father and of the holy angel . but truly i say to you some of those who be here now will have no taste of death till they see the kingdom of god . and about eight day after he have say these thing he take peter and john and james with him and go up into the mountain for prayer . and while he be in prayer his face be change and his clothing become white and shin . and two men moses and elijah be talk with him who be see in glory and be talk of his death which be about to take place in jerusalem . now peter and those who be with him be overcome with sleep but when they be fully awake they saw his glory and the two men who be with him . and when they be about to go away from him peter say to jesus master it be good for u to be here let u make three tent one for you and one for moses and one for elijah have no knowledge of what he be say . and while he say these thing the shade of a cloud come over them and they be full of fear when they go into the cloud . and there be a voice from the cloud say this be my son the man of my selection give ear to him . and after the voice be go they saw that jesus be by himself . and they keep quiet and say nothing at that time to anyone of the thing which they have see . and on the day after when they come down from the mountain a great band of people come to him . and a man from among them cry out say master i make a request to you give a thought to my son for he be my only child and see a spirit take him and suddenly he give a cry twist in pain and streaming at the lip and when it go away from him at last he be mark a from blow . and i make a request to your disciple to send it out of him but they be not able to do it . and jesus say o generation without faith and false in heart how long will i have to be with you and put up with you ? let your son come here . and while he be come he be push violently down and twist by the evil spirit . but jesus give sharp order to the unclean spirit and make the boy well and give him back to his father . and they be full of wonder at the great power of god . but while they be all wonder at all the thing which he do he say to his disciple let these word go deep into your ear for the son of man will be give up into the hand of men . but this say be not clear to them and it sense be keep secret from them so that they be not able to see it and they have fear of question him about it . now there be a discussion among them about which of them whoever give honour to me give honour to him who send me for whoever be least among you all that man be great . and john answering say master we saw a man drive out evil spirit in your name and we do not let him do it because he be not one of u . but jesus say to him let him do it for he who be not against you be for you . and it come about that when the day be near for him to be take up his face be turn to go to jerusalem and he send men before and they come to a small town of samaria to make ready for him . but they would not have him there because he be clearly go to jerusalem . and when his disciple james and john saw this they say lord may we send fire from heaven and put an end to them ? but turn round he say sharp word to them . and they go to another small town . and when they be on the way a certain man say to him i will come after you wherever you go . and jesus say to him fox have hole and the bird of the air have rest place but the son of man have nowhere to put his head . and he say to another come after me . but he say lord let me first go and give the last honour to my father . but he say to him let the dead take care of their dead it be for you to go and give news of the kingdom of god . and another man say i will come with you lord but first let me say a last good day to those who be at my house . but jesus say no man have put his hand to the plough and look back be good enough for the kingdom of god .now after these thing the lord make selection of seventy others and send them before him two together into every town and place where he himself be about to come . and he say to them there be much grain ready to be cut but not enough worker so make prayer to the lord of the grain field that he will send worker to get in the grain . go on your way see i send you out like lamb among wolf . take no bag for money or for food and no shoe say no word to any man on the way . and whenever you go into a house first say peace be to this house . and if a son of peace be there your peace will be with him but if not it will come back to you again . and keep in that same house take what food and drink they give you for the worker have a right to his reward . do not go from house to house . and into whatever town you go if they take you in take whatever food be give to you and make well those in it who be ill and say to them the kingdom of god be near to you . but if you go into a town where they will not have you go out into the street of it and say even the dust of your town which be on our foot we put off a a witness against you but be certain of name be record in heaven . in that same hour he be full of joy in the holy spirit and say i give praise to you o father lord of heaven and earth because you have keep these thing secret from the wise number of prophet and king have have a desire to see the thing which you see and have not see them and to have knowledge of the thing which have come to your ear and they have it not . and a certain teacher of the law get up and put him to the test say master what have i to do so that i may have eternal life ? and he say to him what do the law say in your reading of it ? and he answer say have love for the lord your god with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength and with all your mind and for your neighbour a for yourself . and he say you have give the right answer do this and you will have life . but he desire to put himself in the right say to jesus and who be my neighbour ? and jesus answer him say a certain man be go down from jerusalem to jericho and he get into the hand of thief who take his clothing and give him cruel blow and when they go away he be half dead . and by chance a certain priest be go down that way and when he saw him he go by on the other side . and in the same way a levite when he come to the place and saw him go by on the other side . but a certain man of samaria journeying that way come where he be and when he saw him he be move with pity for him and come to him and put clean linen round his wound with oil and wine and he put him on his beast and take him to a house and take care of him . and the day after he take two penny and give them to the owner of the house and say take care of him and if this money be not enough when i come again i will give you whatever more be need . which of these three men in your opinion be neighbour to the man who come into the hand of thief ? and he say the one who have mercy on him . and jesus say go and do the same . now while they be on their way he come to a certain town and a woman name martha take him into her house . and she have a sister by name mary who take her seat at the lord 's foot and give attention to his word . but martha have her hand full of the work of the house and she come to him and say lord be it nothing to you that my sister have let me do all the work ? say to her that she be to give me some help . but the lord answering say to her martha martha you be full of care and trouble about such a number of thing little be need or even one thing only for mary have take that good part which will not be take away from her .and it come about that not be put to the test . and he say to them which of you have a friend would go to him in the middle of the night and say to him friend let me have three cake of bread because a friend of mine have possible for me to get up and give to you ? i say to you though he will not get up and give to him because he be his friend still if he keep on make his request he will get up and give him as much a will be give and he who be search will get his desire and to him who give the sign the door will be open . and which of you be a father will give a stone to his son who make request for bread ? or for a fish will give him a snake ? or for an egg will give him a scorpion ? if then you who be evil be able to give good thing to your child how much more will your father in heaven give the holy spirit to those who make request to him ? and he be send an evil spirit out of a man who be without the power of talk . and it come about that when the spirit have go the man have the power of talk and the people be full of wonder . but some of them say he send out evil spirit by beelzebul the ruler of evil spirit . and others test him be look for a sign from heaven from him . but he have knowledge of their thought say to them every kingdom in which there be division be make waste and a house in which there be division come to destruction . if then satan be at war with himself how will he keep his kingdom ? because you say that i send evil spirit out of men by the help of beelzebul . and if i by beelzebul send out evil spirit by whose help do your son send them out ? so let them be your judge . but if i by the finger of god send out evil spirit then the kingdom of god have overtake you . when the strong man arm keep watch over his house then his good be safe but when one who be strong make an attack on him and overcome him he take away his instrument of war in which he have put his faith and make division of his good . he who be not with me be against me and he who will not give me help in get people together be drive them away . the unclean spirit when he have go out of a man go through dry place look for rest and when he do not get it he say i will go back to my house from which i come . and when he come he see that it have be make fair and clean . then he go and get seven other spirit more evil than himself and they go in and take their place there and the last condition of that man be bad than the first . and it come about that when he say these thing a certain woman among the people say in a loud voice happy be the body which give you birth and the breast from which you take milk . but he say more happy be they who give hearing to the word of god and keep it . and when a great number of people come together to him he say this generation be an evil generation it be look for a sign and no sign will be give to it but the sign of jonah . for even a jonah become a sign to the ninevites so will the son of man be to this generation . the queen of the south will come up on the day of judging and give her decision against the men of this generation for she come from the end of the earth to give ear to the wisdom of solomon and now something great than solomon be here . the men of nineveh will come up in the day of judging and give their decision against this generation for they be turn away from their sin at the preaching of jonah but now something great than jonah be here . no man when the light have be light put it in a secret place or under a vessel but on it table so that those who come in may see the light . the light of the body be the eye when your eye be true all your body be full of light but when it be evil your body be dark . so take care that the light which be in you be not dark . if then all your body be light with no part of it dark it will be completely full of light a when a flame with it bright shin give you light . now while he be talk a pharisee make a request that he would come to a meal with him and he go in and take his seat at the meal . and when the pharisee saw it he be surprised because he come to the meal without first wash himself . and the lord say to him you pharisee make the outside of the cup and the plate clean but inside you be thief and full of evil . o you foolish one ! do not he who make the outside in the same way make the inside ? but if you give to the poor such thing a you be able then all thing be clean to you . but a curse be on you pharisees ! for you make men give a tenth of every sort of plant and give no thought to right and the love of god but it be right for you to do these thing and not let the others be undone . a curse be on you pharisees ! for your desire be for the most important seat in the synagogue and for word of respect say to you in the market place . a curse be on you ! for you be like the rest place of dead men which be not see and men go walk over them without knowledge of it . and one of the teacher of the law answer say to him master in say this you give a bad name to u a to them . and he say a curse be on you teacher of the law ! for while other men be crush under the weight of the rule you make for them you yourselves do not put so much a one finger to them . a curse be on you ! for you make rest place for the body of the prophet but your father put them to death . so you be witness and give approval to the work of your father for they put them to death and you make their last resting place . for this reason the wisdom of god have say i will send them prophet and teacher and to some of them they will give death and cruel pain so that punishment may come on this generation for the blood of all the prophet which be give from the early day from the blood of abel to the blood of zachariah who be put to death between the altar and the temple . yes i say to you it will come on this generation . a curse be on you teacher of the law ! for you have take away the key of knowledge you do not go in yourselves and you get in the way of those who be go in . and when he have come out of that place the scribe and the pharisee come round him angrily question him about more thing and watch him for a chance to get something from his word which might be use against him .at that time when thousand of the people have come together in such number that they be crush one another he say first to his disciple have nothing to do with the leaven of the pharisee which be deceit . but nothing be cover up which will not come to light or secret which will not be make clear . so whatever you have say in the dark will come to men 's hearing in the light and what you have say secretly inside the house will be make public from the house top . and i say to you my friend have no fear of those who may put the body to death and be able to do no more than that . but i will make clear to you of whom you be to be in fear of him who after death have power to send you to hell yes truly i say have fear of him . be not five sparrow give in exchange for two farthing ? and god have every one of them in mind . but even the hair of your head be number . have no fear you be of more value than a flock of sparrow . and i say to you that to everyone who give witness to me before men the son of man will give witness before the angel of god . but if anyone say before men that he have no knowledge of me i will say that i have no knowledge of him before the angel of god . and if anyone say a word against the son of man he will have forgiveness but for him who say evil word against the holy spirit there will be no forgiveness . and when they take you before the synagogue and the authority and the ruler take no thought about what answer you will give or what you will say for the holy spirit will make clear to you in that very hour what to say . and one of the people say to him master give an order to my brother to make division of the heritage with me . but he say man who make me a judge or a maker of decision for you ? and he say to them take care to keep yourselves free from the desire for property for a man 's life be not make up of the number of thing which he have . and he say to them in a story the land of a certain man of great wealth be very fertile and he say to himself what be to be do ? for i have no place in which to put all my fruit . and he say this i will do i will take down my store house and make great one and there i will put all my grain and my good . and i will say to my soul soul you have a great amount of good in store enough for a number of year be at rest take food and wine and be happy . but god say to him you foolish one tonight i will take your soul from you and who then will be the owner of all the thing which you have get together ? so that be what come to the man who get wealth for himself and have not wealth in the eye of god . and he say to his disciple for this reason i say to you take no thought for your life about what food you will take or for your body how it may be clothe . be not life more than food and the body than it clothing ? give thought to the raven they do not put seed into the earth or get together grain they have no store house or building and god give them their food of how much great value be you than the bird ! and which of you by take thought be able to make himself any taller ? if then you be not able to do even that which be least why be you troubled about the rest ? give thought to the flower they do no work they make no thread and still i say to you even solomon in all his glory be not clothe like one of these . but if god give such clothing to the grass in the field which today be live and tomorrow will be burn in the oven how much more will he give clothing to you o men of little faith ? and do not give overmuch think to your food and drink and let not your mind be full of doubt . for the nation of the world go in search of all these thing but your father have knowledge that you have need of them . but let your chief care be for his kingdom and these other thing will be give to you in addition . have no fear little flock for it be your father 's good pleasure to give you the kingdom . give what property you have in exchange for money and give the money to the poor make for yourselves money bag which will not get old wealth store up in heaven which will be yours for ever where thief will not come nor worm put it to destruction . for where your wealth be there will your heart be . be ready dress a for a journey with your light burning . and be like men who be look for their lord when he come back from the bride feast so that when he come to the door it will be open to him quickly . happy be those servant who be watch when the lord come truly i say to you he will make himself their servant and place them at the table he will come out and give them food . and if he come in the second division of the night or in the third and they be watch for him happy be those servant . but be certain of this that if the master of the house have have knowledge of the time when the thief be come he would have be watch and would not have let his house be break into . so be ready for the son of man be come at a time when you be not look for him . and peter say to him lord be these word say to u only or to all men ? and the lord say who then be the wise and responsible servant whom his lord will put in control of his family to give them their food at the right time ? happy be that servant who when his lord come be do so . truly i say to you he will put him in control of all his good . but if that servant say to himself my lord be a long time come and go about give blow to the men servant and the woman servant feast and take overmuch wine the lord of that servant will come at a time when he be not look for him and at an hour when he be not ready for him and he will have him cut in two and will give him his part in the fate of those who have no faith and the servant who have knowledge of his lord 's desire and be not ready for him and do not do a he be order will be give a great number of blow but he who without knowledge do thing for which punishment be give will get only a small number of blow . the man to whom much be give will have to give much if much be give into his care of him more will be request . i come to send a fire on the earth and it may even now have be light . but there be a baptism which i have to undergo and how be i keep back till it be complete ! be it your opinion that i have come to give peace on earth ? i say to you no but division for from this time a family of five in one house will be on opposite side three against two and two against three . they will be at war the father against his son and the son against his father mother against daughter and daughter against mother mother in law against daughter in law and daughter in law against mother in law . then he say to the people when you see a cloud come up in the west straight away you say there will be rain and so it be . and when you see a south wind blowing you say there will be heat and so it be . o false one ! the face of the earth and the heaven be clear to you how be it that the sign of these time be not a clear to you ? and why be you in your heart unable to be judge of what be right ? for if anyone have a cause at law against you and you be go with him before the ruler make an attempt on the way to come to an agreement with him for if you do not he may take you before the judge and the judge will give you up to the police and they will put you in prison . i say to you you will not come out of it till you have make payment to the very last farthing .now some people who be there at that time give him an account of how the blood of some galilaean have be mix by pilate with their offering . and he in answer say to them be you of the opinion that these galilaean be bad than all other galilaean because these thing be do to them ? i say to you it be not so but if your heart be not change you will all come to the same end . or those eighteen men who be crush by the fall of the tower of siloam be they bad than all the other men live in jerusalem ? i say to you it be not so but if your heart be not change you will all come to an end in the same way . and he make up this story for them a certain man have a fig tree in his garden and he come to get fruit from it and there be no fruit . and he say to the gardener see for three year i have be look for fruit from this tree and i have not have any let it be cut down why be it take up space ? and he say lord let it be for this year and i will have the earth turn up round it and put animal waste on it to make it fertile and if after that it have fruit it be well if not let it be cut down . and he be teach in one of the synagogue on the sabbath . and there be a woman who have have a disease for eighteen year she be bent and be not able to make herself straight . and when jesus saw her he say to her woman you be make free from your disease . and he put his hand on her and she be make straight and give praise to god . and the ruler of the synagogue be angry because jesus have make her well on the sabbath and he say to the people there be six day in which men may do work so come on those day to be make well and not on the sabbath . but the lord give him an answer and say o you false men ! do you not every one of you on the sabbath let loose his ox and his as and take it to the water ? and be it not right for this daughter of abraham who have be in the power of satan for eighteen year to be make free on the sabbath ? and when he say these thing those who be against him be sham and all the people be full of joy because of the great thing which be do by him . then he say what be the kingdom of god like ? what comparison may i make of it ? it be like a grain of mustard seed which a man take and put in his garden and it become a tree and the bird of heaven make their resting place in it branch . and again he say what be the kingdom of god like ? it be like leaven which a woman put into three measure of meal and it be all leaven . and he go on his way through town and country place teach and journey to jerusalem . and someone say to him lord will only a small number have salvation ? and he say to them do your best to go in by the narrow door for i say to you a number will make the attempt to go in but will not be able to do so . when the master of the house have get up and the door have be shut and you still outside give blow on the door say lord let u in he will make answer and say i have no knowledge of where you come from . then you will say we have take food and drink with you and you be teach in our street . but he will say truly i have no knowledge of you or where you come from go away from me you worker of evil . there will be weep and cry of sorrow when you see abraham isaac and jacob and all the prophet in the kingdom of god but you yourselves be shut outside . and they will come from the east and from the west from the north and from the south and take their place in the kingdom of god . and the last will be first and the first will be last . at that time certain pharisee come to him and say go away from this place because herod 's purpose be to put you to death . and he say go and say to that fox i send out evil spirit and do work of mercy today and tomorrow and on the third day my work will be complete . but i have to go on my way today and tomorrow and the third day for it be not right for a prophet to come to his death outside jerusalem . o jerusalem jerusalem put to death the prophet and stone those who be send to her ! again and again would i have take your child to myself a a bird take her young one under her wing but you would not ! now see your house be waste and i say to you you will not see me again till you say a blessing on him who come in the name of the lord .and it come about that when he go into the house of one of the chief pharisee on the sabbath to have a meal they be watch him . and a certain man be there who have a disease . and jesus answering say to the scribe and pharisee be it right to make people well on the sabbath or not ? but they say nothing . and he make him well and send him away . and he say to them which of you whose ox or as have get into a water hole will not straight away get him out on the sabbath ? and they have no answer to that question . and he give teach in the form of a story to the guest who come to the feast when he saw how they take the best seat say to them when you get a request to come to a feast do not take the best seat for a more important man than you may be come and then the giver of the feast will come to you and say give your place to this man and you with shame will have to take the low seat . but when you come go and take the low seat so that when the giver of the feast come he may say to you friend come up high and then you will have honour in the eye of all the others who be there . for every man who give himself a high place will be put down but he who take a low place will be lift up . and he say to the master of the house when you give a feast do not send for your friend and your brother and your family or your neighbour who have wealth for they may give a feast for you and so you will get a reward . but when you give a feast send for the poor and the blind and those who be break in body and you will have a blessing because they will not be able to give you any payment and you will get your reward when the upright come back from the dead . and hear these word one of those who be at table with him say to him happy be the man who will be a guest in the kingdom of god . and he say to them a certain man give a great feast and send word of it to a number of people . and when the time have come he send his servant to say to them come for all thing be now ready . and they all give reason why they be not able to come . the first say to him i have get a new field and it be necessary for me to go and see it i be full of regret that i be unable to come . and another say i have get some cattle and i be go to make a test of them i be full of regret that i be unable to come . and another say i have be marry and so i be not able to come . and the servant come back and give his master an account of these thing . then the master of the house be angry and say to the servant go out quickly into the street of the town and get the poor the blind and those who be break in body . and the servant say lord your order have be do and still there be room . and the lord say to the servant go out into the road and the field and make them come in so that my house may be full . for i say to you that not one of those who be request to come will have a taste of my feast . now a great number of people go with him . and turn round he say to them if any man come to me and have not hate for his father and mother and wife and child and brother and sister and even for his life he may not be my disciple . whoever do not take up his cross and come after me may not be my disciple . for which of you desire to put up a tower do not first give much thought to the price if he will have enough to make it complete ? for fear that if he make a start and be not able to go on with it to the end all who see it will be laugh at him and say this man make a start at building and be not able to make it complete . or what king go to war with another king will not first take thought if he will be strong enough with ten thousand men to keep off him who come against him with twenty thousand ? or while the other be still a great distance away he send representative request condition of peace . and so whoever be not ready to give up all he have may not be my disciple . for salt be good but if the taste go from it of what use be it ? it be no good for the land or for the place of waste no one have a use for it . he who have ear let him give ear .now all the tax farmer and sinner come near to give ear to him . and the pharisee and scribe be angry say this man give approval to sinner and take food with them . and he make a story for them say what man of you have a hundred sheep if one of them get loose and go away will not let the ninety nine be in the waste land by themselves and go after the wander one till he see where it be ? and when he have get it again he take it in his arm with joy . and when he get back to his house he send for his neighbour and friend say to them be glad with me for i have get back my sheep which have go away . i say to you that even so there will be more joy in heaven when one sinner be turn away from his wrongdoing than for ninety nine good men who have no need of a change of heart . or what woman have ten bit of silver if one bit have go from her hand will not get a light and go through her house search with care till she see it ? and when she have it again she get her friend and neighbour together say be glad with me for i have get back the bit of silver which have go from me . even so i say to you there be joy among the angel of god when one sinner be turn away from his wrongdoing . and he say a certain man have two son and the young of them say to his father father give me that part of your property which will be mine . and he make division of his good between them . and not long after the young son get together everything which be his and take a journey into a far away country and there all his money go in foolish living . and when everything be go there be no food to be have in that country and he be in need . and he go and put himself into the hand of one of the people of that country and he send him into his field to give the pig their food . and so great be his need that he would have be glad to take the pig ' food and no one give him anything . but when he come to his sens he say what number of my father 's servant have bread enough and more while i be near to death here through need of food ! i will get up and go to my father and will say to him father i have do wrong against heaven and in your eye i be no longer good enough to be name your son make me like one of your servant . and he get up and go to his father . but while he be still far away his father saw him and be move with pity for him and go quickly and take him in his first robe quickly and put it on him and put a ring on his hand and shoe on his foot and get the fat young ox and put it to death and let u have a feast and be glad . for this my son who be dead be and have come back .and another time he say to the disciple there be a certain man of great wealth who have a servant and it be say to him that this servant be waste his good . and he send for him and take away my position ? i have not enough strength for work in the field and i would be sham if i make request for money from people in the street . i have come to a decision what to do so that when i be put out of my position they will take me into their house . and send for every one who be in debt to his lord he say to the first what be the amount of your debt to my lord ? and he say a hundred measure of oil . and he say take your account straight away and put down fifty . then he say to another what be the amount of your debt ? and he say a hundred measure of grain . and he say to him take your account and put down eighty . and his lord be pleased with the false servant because he have be wise for the son of this world be wiser in relation to their generation than the son of light . and i say to you make friend for yourselves through the wealth of this life so that when it come to an end you may be take into the eternal resting place . he who be true in a little be true in much he who be false in small thing be false in great . if then you have not be true in your use of the wealth of this life who will give into your care the true wealth ? and if you have not be true in your care of the property of other people who will give you that which be yours ? no man may be a servant to two master for he will have hate for the one and love for the other or he will keep to the one and have no respect for the other . you may not be servant of god and of wealth . and the pharisee who have a great love of money hear these thing be make sport of him . and he say you take care to preaching of the kingdom of god and everyone make his way into it by force . but heaven and earth will come to an end before the small letter of the law may be drop out . everyone who put away his wife and take another be a false husband and he who be marry to a woman whose husband have put her away be no true husband to her . now there be a certain man of great wealth who be dress in fair for any of these little one . give attention to yourselves if your brother do wrong say a sharp word to him and if he have sorrow for his sin let him have forgiveness . and if he do you wrong seven time in a day and seven time come to you and say i have regret for what i have do let him have forgiveness . and the twelve say to the lord make our faith great . and the lord say if your faith be only as great a a grain of mustard seed you might say to this tree be root up and plant in the sea and it would be do . but which of you have a servant who be plough or keep sheep will say to him when we be order to do . and it come about that when they be on the way to jerusalem he go through samaria and galilee . and when he go into a certain small town he come across ten men who be leper and be feast and trading they be plant and building but on the day when lot go out of sodom fire come down from heaven and destruction come on them all . so will it be in the day of the revelation of the others two men go up to the temple for prayer one a pharisee and the other a tax farmer . the pharisee take up his position say to himself these word god i give you praise because i be not like other by what authority you do these thing and who give you this authority . and in answer he say to them i will put a question to you and do you give me an answer the baptism of john be it from heaven or of men ? and they say among themselves if we say from heaven he will say why do you not have faith in him ? but if we say of men we will be stone by the people for they be certain that john be a prophet . and they make answer that they have no idea where it come from . and jesus say and i will not make clear to you by what authority i do these thing . and he give the people this story a man make a vine garden and give the use of it to some field worker and go into another country for a long time . and at the right time he send a servant to the worker to get part of the fruit from the vine but the workman give him blow and send him away with nothing . and he send another servant and they give blow to him in the same way and put shame on him and send him away with nothing . and he send a third and they give him wound and put him out . and the lord of the garden say what be i to do ? i will send my dearly love son they may give respect to him . but when the workman saw him they say to one another this be he who will one day be the owner of the property let u put him to death and the heritage will be ours . and drive him out of the garden they put him to death . now what will the lord do to these workman ? he will come and put them to destruction and give the garden to others . and when he say this they say may it not be so . but he look on them say be it not in the writing the stone which the builder put on one side the same have become the chief stone of the building ? everyone fall on that stone will be break but the man on whom the stone come down will be crush to dust . and the chief priest and the scribe make attempt to get their hand on him in that very hour and they be in fear of the people for they saw that he have make up this story against them . and they keep watch on him and send out secret representative who be act the part of good men in order that they might get something from his word on account of which they might give him up to the government and into the power of the ruler . and they put a question to him say master we be certain that your teaching and your word be right and that you have no respect for a man 's position but you be teach the true way of god be it right for u to make payment of tax to caesar or not ? but he saw through their trick and say to them let me see a penny . whose image and name be on it ? and they say caesar 's . and he say then give to caesar the thing which be caesar 's and to god the thing which be god 's . and they be not able to get anything from these word before the people but they be full of wonder at his answer and say nothing . and some of the sadducee come to him who say that there be no come back from the dead and they say to him master moses say that if a man 's brother come to his end have a wife but no child his brother be to take the wife and get a family for his brother . now there be seven brother and the first have a wife and come to his end have no child and the second and the third take her and in the same way all the seven without have any child come to their end . and last of all the woman come to her end . when they come back from the dead whose wife will she be ? for all the seven have her . and jesus say to them the son of this world be marry and have wife but those to whom be give the reward of the world to come and to come back from the dead have no wife and be not married and death have no more power over them for they be equal to the angel and be son of god be of those who will come back from the dead . but even moses make it clear that the dead come back to life say in the story of the burn thorn tree the lord the god of abraham the god of isaac and the god of jacob . now he be not the god of the dead but of the living for all men be live to him . and some of the scribe in answer to this say master you have say well . and they have fear of put any more question to him . and he say to them why do they say that the christ be the son of david ? for david himself say in the book of psalm the lord say to my lord take your seat at my right hand till i put under your foot all those who be against you . david then give him the name of lord so how be it possible for him to be his son ? and in the hearing of all the people he say to his disciple keep away from the scribe whose pleasure it be to go about in long robe and to have word of respect say to them in the market place and to take the chief seat in the synagogue and the first place at feast who take the property of widow and before the eye of men make long prayer they will get a great punishment .and look up he saw the men of wealth put their offering in the money box . and he saw a certain poor widow put in a farthing . and he say truly i say to you this poor widow have give more than all of them for they give out of their wealth have more than enough for themselves but she even out of her need have put in all her living . and some be talk about the temple how it be make fair with beautiful stone and with offering but he say a for these thing which you see the day will come when not one stone will be rest on another but all will be break down . and they say to him master when will these thing be ? and what sign will there be when these event be to take place ? and he say take care that you be not trick for a number of people will come in my name say i be he and the time be near do not go after them . and when news of war and troubled time come to your ear have no fear for these thing have to be but the end will not be now . then he say to them nation will be move against nation and kingdom against kingdom there will be great earth shock and outburst of disease in a number of place and men will be without food and there will be wonder and great sign from heaven . but before all this they will take you and be very cruel to you give you up to the synagogue and to prison take you before king and ruler because of my name . and it will be turn to a witness for you . so take care not to be trouble before the time come about what answer you will give for i will give you word and wisdom so that not one of those who be against you will be able to get the good of you or to put you in the wrong . but you will be give up even by your father and mother your brother and relation and friend and some of you will be put to death . and you will be hat by all men because of me . but not a hair of your head will come to destruction . by go through all these thing you will keep your life . but when you see army all round about jerusalem then be certain that her destruction be near . then let those who be in judaea go in flight to the mountain and those who be in the middle of the town go out and let not those who be in the country come in . for these be the day of punishment in which all the thing in the writing will be put into effect . it will be hard for woman who be with child and for her with a baby at the breast in those day . for great trouble will come on the land and wrath on this people . and they will be put to death with the sword and will be take a prisoner into all the nation and jerusalem will be crush under the foot of the gentile till the time of the gentile be complete . and there will be sign in the sun and moon and star and on the earth fear among the nation and doubt because of the loud noise of the sea and the wave men 's strength will go from them in fear and in wait for the thing which be come on the earth for the power of the heaven will be move . and then they will see the son of man come in a cloud with power and great glory . but when these thing come about let your head be lift up because your salvation be near . and he make a story for them see the fig tree and all the tree when they put out their young leave you take note of it and it be clear to you that summer be come . in the same way when you see these thing take place you may be certain that the kingdom of god be near . truly i say to you this generation will not come to an end till all thing be complete . heaven and earth will come to an end but my word will not come to an end . but give attention to yourselves for fear that your heart become over full of the pleasure of food and wine and the care of this life and that day may come on you suddenly and take you a in a net for so it will come on all those who be live on the face of all the earth . but keep watch at all time with prayer that you may be strong enough to come through all these thing and take your place before the son of man . and every day he be teach in the temple and every night he go out to the mountain which be name the mountain of olive to take his rest . and all the people come early in the morning to give ear to his word in the temple .now the feast of unleavened bread be near which be call the passover . and the chief priest and the scribe be look for a chance to put him to death but they go in fear of the people . and satan come into judas iscariot who be one of the twelve . and he go away and have a discussion with the chief priest and the ruler about how he might give him up to them . and they be glad and undertook to give him money . and he make an agreement with them to give him up to them if he get a chance when the people be not present . and the day of unleavened bread come when the passover lamb be put to death . and jesus send peter and john say go and make the passover ready for u so that we may take it . and they say to him where be we to get it ready ? and he say to them when you go into the town you will see a man come to you with a vessel of water go after him into the house into which he go . and say to the master of the house the master say where be the guest room where i may take the passover with my disciple ? and he will take you up to a great room with a table and seat there make ready . and they go and it be a he have say and they make the passover ready . and when the time have come he take his seat and the apostle with him . and he say i have have a great desire to keep this passover with you before i come to my death for i say to you i will not take it till it be make complete in the kingdom of god . and he take a cup and have give praise he say make division of this among yourselves for i say to you i will not take of the fruit of the vine till the kingdom of god have come . and he take bread and have give praise he give it to them when it have be break say this be my body which be give for you do this in memory of me . and in the same way after the meal he take the cup say this cup be the new testament make with my blood which be give for you . but the hand of him who be false to me be with me at the table . for it will be do to the son of man after the purpose of god but unhappy be that man by whom he be give up . and they be wonder among themselves which of them it be who would do this thing . and there be an argument among them about which of them be the great . and he say the king of the gentile be lord over them and those who have authority be give name of honour . but let it not be so with you but he who be great let him become like the young and he who be chief like a servant . for which be great the guest who be seat at a meal or the servant who be wait on him ? be it not the guest ? but i be among you a a servant . but you be those who have keep with me through my trouble and i will give you a kingdom a my father have give one to me so that you may take food and drink at my table in my kingdom and be seat like king judge the twelve tribe of israel . simon simon satan have make a request to have you so that he may put you to the test a grain be test but i have make prayer for you that your faith may not go from you and when you be turn again make your brother strong . and he say to him lord i be ready to go with you to prison and to death . and he say i say to you peter before the cock 's second cry today you will say three time that you have no knowledge of me . and he say to them when i send you out without money or bag or shoe be you in need of anything ? and they say nothing . and he say to them but now he who have a money bag or a bag for food let him take it and he who have not let him give his coat for money and get a sword . for i say to you that these word will be put into effect in me and he be number among the evil doer for what have be say in the writing about me have an end . and they say lord here be two sword . and he say it be enough . and he come out and go a his way be to the mountain of olive and the disciple this question to him what sign of authority have you to give u see that you do these thing ? and jesus say to them send destruction on this temple and i will put it up again in three day . the jew say the building of this temple take forty six year and you will put it up in three day ! but his word be about that holy building which be his body . so when he have come back again from the dead the memory of these word come back to the disciple and they have faith in the holy writing and in the word which jesus have say . now while he be in jerusalem at the feast of the passover a great number of people come to have faith in his name after see the sign which he do . but jesus do not have faith in them because he have knowledge of them all . he have no need for any witness about man for he himself have knowledge of what be in man .now there be among the pharisee a man name nicodemus who be one of the ruler of the jew . he come to jesus by night and say to him rabbi we be certain that you have come from god a a teacher because no man would be able to do these sign which you do if god be not with him . jesus say to him truly i say to you without a new birth no man be able to see the kingdom of god . nicodemus say to him how be it possible for a man to be give birth when he be old ? be he able to go into his mother 's body a second time and come to birth again ? jesus say in answer truly i say to you if a man 's birth be not from water and from the spirit it be not possible for him to go into the kingdom of god . that which have birth from the flesh be flesh and that which have birth from the spirit be spirit . do not be surprise that i say to you it be necessary for you to have a second birth . the wind go where it pleasure take it and the sound of it come to your ear but you be unable to say where it come from and where it go so it be with everyone whose birth be from the spirit . and nicodemus say to him how be it possible for these thing to be ? and jesus answering say be you the teacher of israel and have no knowledge of these thing ? truly i say to you we say that of which we have knowledge we give witness of what we have see and you do not take our witness to be true . if you have no belief when my word be about the thing of earth how will you have belief if my word be about the thing of heaven ? and no one have ever go up to heaven but he who come down from heaven the son of man . a the snake be lift up by moses in the waste land even so it be necessary for the son of man to be lift up so that whoever have faith may have in him eternal life . for god have such love for the world that he give his only son so that whoever have faith in him may not come to destruction but have eternal life . god do not send his son into the world to be judge of the world he send him so that the world might have salvation through him . the man who have faith in him do not come up to be judge but he who have no faith in him have be judge even now because he have no faith in the name of the only son of god . and this be the test by which men be judge the light have come into the world and men have more love for the dark than for the light because their act be evil . the light be hat by everyone whose act be evil and he do not come to the light for fear that his act will be see . but he whose life be true come to the light so that it may be clearly see that his act have be do by the help of god . after these thing jesus and his disciple go into the land of judaea and there he be with them for some time give baptism . now john be then give baptism at aenon near salim because there be much water there and people come and be give baptism . for at this time john have not be put into prison . then a question come up between everyone be go to him . and this be john 's answer a man be unable to have anything if it be not give to him from heaven . you yourselves give witness that i say i be not the christ . what i say be i be send before the christ . he who have the bride be the husband but the husband 's friend whose place be by his side and whose ear be open to him be full of joy because of the husband 's voice such be my joy and it be complete . he have to become great while i become less . he who come from heaven be great than all others he who come from earth be of the earth and of the earth be his word he who come from heaven be over all . he give witness of what he have see and of what have come to his ear and no man take his witness a true . he who so take his witness have make clear his faith that god be true . for he whom god have send say god 's word and god do not give him the spirit by measure . the father have love for the son and have put all thing into his hand . he who have faith in the son samaria . so he come to a town of samaria which be name sychar near to the bit of land which jacob give to his son joseph now jacob 's fountain be there . jesus be tire after his journey be rest by the fountain . it be about the sixth hour . a woman of samaria come to get water and jesus say to her give me some water . for his disciple have go to the town to get food . the woman of samaria say to him why do you a jew make a request for water to me a woman of samaria ? she say this because jew have nothing to do with the people of samaria . in answer jesus say if you have knowledge of what god give freely and who it be who say to you give me water you would make your prayer to him and he would give you living water . the woman say to him sir you have no vessel and the fountain be deep from where will you get the living water ? be you great than our father jacob who give u the fountain and take the water of it himself with his child and his cattle ? jesus say to her everyone who take this water will be in need of it again but whoever take the water i give him will never be in need of drink again for the water i give him will become in him a fountain of eternal life . the woman say to him sir give me this water so that i may not be in need again of drink and will not have to come all this way for it . jesus say to her go get your husband and come back here with him . in answer the woman say i have no husband . jesus say to her you have say rightly i have no husband you have have five husband and the man you have now be not your husband that be truly say . the woman say to him sir i see that you be a prophet . our father give worship on this mountain but you jews say that the right place for worship be in jerusalem . jesus say to her woman take my word for this the time be come when you will not give worship to the father on this mountain or in jerusalem . you give worship but without knowledge of what you be worship we give worship to what we have knowledge of for salvation come from the jew . but the time be come and be even now here when the true worshipper will give worship to the father in the true way of the spirit for these be the worshipper desire by the father . god be spirit then let his worshipper give him worship in the true way of the spirit . the woman say to him i be certain that the messiah who be name christ be come when he come he will make all thing clear to u . jesus say to her i who be talk to you be he . at that point the disciple come back and they be surprise to see him talk to a woman but not one of them say to him what be your purpose ? or why be you talk to her ? then the woman put down her water pot and go into the town and say to the people come and see a man who have be talk to me of everything i grain which you have no hand in plant other men do that work and you take the reward . now a number of the people of that town have faith in him because of the woman 's witness he have be talk to me and there be a certain man of high position whose son be ill at capernaum . when it come to his ear that jesus have come from judaea into galilee he go to him and make a request that he would come
