who have faith in him if you keep my word then you be truly my disciple and you will have knowledge of what be true and that will make you free . they say to him in answer we be abraham 's seed and have never be any man 's servant why do you say you will become free ? and this be the answer jesus give them truly i say to you everyone who do evil be the servant of sin . now the servant do not go on living in the house for ever but the son do . if then the son make you free you will be truly free . i be conscious that you be abraham 's seed but you have a desire to put me to death because my word have no place in you . i say the thing which i have see in my father 's house and you do the thing which come to you from your father 's house . in answer they say to him our father be abraham . jesus say to them if you be abraham 's child you would do what abraham do . but now you have a desire to put me to death a man who have say to you what be true a i have it from god abraham do not do that . you be do the work of your father . they say to him we be true son of abraham we have one father who be god . jesus say to them if god be your father you would have love for me because it be from god i come and be here . i do not come of myself but he send me . why be my word not clear to you ? it be because your ear be shut to my teaching . you be the child of your father the evil one and it be your pleasure to do his desire . from the first he be a taker of life and he do not go in the true way because there be no true thing in him . when he say what be false it be natural to him for he be false and the father of what be false . but because i say what be true you have no belief in me . which of you be able truly to say that i be a sinner ? if i say what be true why have you no belief in me ? he who be a child of god give ear to the word of god your ear be not open to them because you be not from god . the jew say to him in answer be we not right in say that you be of samaria and have an evil spirit ? and this be the answer of jesus i have not an evil spirit but i give honour to my father and you do not give honour to me . i however be not in search of glory for myself there be one who be search for it and he be judge . truly i say to you if a man keep my word he will never see death . the jew say to him now we be certain that you have an evil spirit . abraham be dead and the prophet be dead and you say if a man keep my word he will never see death . be you great than our father abraham who be dead ? and the prophet be dead who do you say that you be ? jesus say in answer if i take glory for myself my glory be nothing it be my father who give me glory of whom you say that he be your god . you have no knowledge of him but i have knowledge of him and if i say i have no knowledge of him i would be talk falsely like you but i have full knowledge of him and i keep his word . your father abraham be full of joy at the hope of see my day he saw it and be glad . then the jew say to him you be not fifty year old have you see abraham ? jesus say to them truly i say to you before abraham come into be i be . so they take up stone to send at him but jesus get secretly out of their way and go out of the temple .and when he go on his way he saw a man blind from birth . and his disciple put a question to him say master be it because of this man 's sin or the sin of his father and mother that he have be blind from birth ? jesus say in answer it be not because of his sin or because of his father 's or mother 's it be so that the work of god might be see openly in him . while it be day we have to do the work of him who send me the night come when no work may be do . as long a i be in the world i be the light of the world . have say these word he put earth mixed with water from his mouth on the man 's eye and say to him go and make yourself clean in the bath of siloam the sense of the name be send . so he go away and after wash come back able to see . then the neighbour and others who have see him before in the street with his hand out for money say be not this the man who get money from people ? some say it be he others say no but he be like him . he say i be he . so they say to him how then be your eye make open ? his answer be the man who be name jesus put earth mixed with water on my eye and say to me go and make yourself clean in siloam so i go away and after wash be now able to see . and they say to him where be he ? his answer be i have no knowledge . they take him before the pharisee this man who have be blind . now the day on which the earth be mixed by jesus and the man 's eye be make open be the sabbath . so the pharisee put more question to him about how his eye have be make open . and he say to them he put earth on my eye and i have a wash and be able to see . then some of the pharisee say that man have not come from god for he do not keep the sabbath . others say how be it possible for a sinner to do such sign ? so there be a division among them . again they say to the blind man what have you to say about him for open your eye ? and he say he be a prophet . now the jew have no belief in the statement that he have be blind and be now able to see till they send for the father and mother of the man whose eye have be make open and put the question to them say be this your son of whom you say that he be blind at birth ? how be it then that he be now able to see ? in answer his father and mother say we be certain that this be our son and that he be blind at birth but how it be he be now able to see or who make his eye open we be not able to say put the question to him he be old enough to give an answer for himself . they say this because of their fear of the jew for the jew have come to an agreement that if any man say that jesus be the christ he would be put out of the synagogue . that be the reason why they say he be old enough put the question to him . so they send a second time for the man who have be blind and they say to him give glory to god it be clear to u that this man be a sinner . he say in answer i have no knowledge if he be a sinner or not but one thing i be certain about i be blind and now i see . then they say to him what do he do to you ? how do he give you the use of your eye ? his answer be i have say it before but your ear be shut why would you have me say it again ? be it your desire to become his disciple ? and they be angry with him and say you be his disciple but we be disciple of moses . we be certain that god give his word to moses but a for this man we have no knowledge where he come from . the man say in answer why here be a strange thing ! you have no knowledge where he come from though he give me the use of my eye . we have knowledge that god do not give ear to sinner but if any man be a worshipper of god and do his pleasure to him god 's ear be open . in all the year nobody have ever before see the eye of a man blind from birth make open . if this man do not come from god he would be unable to do anything . their answer be you come to birth through sin do you make yourself our teacher ? and they put him out of the synagogue . it come to the ear of jesus that they have put him out and meet him he say have you faith in the son of man ? he say in answer and who be he lord ? say so that i may have faith in him . jesus say to him you have see him it be he who be talk to you . and he say lord i have faith . and he give him worship . and jesus say i come into this world to be a judge so that those who do not see may see and those who see may become blind . these word come to the ear of the pharisee who be with him and they say to him be we then blind ? jesus say to them if you be blind you would have no sin but now that you say we see your sin be there still .truly i say to you he who do not go through the door into the place where the sheep be keep but get in by some other way be a thief and an outlaw . he who go in by the door be the keeper of the sheep . the porter let him in and the sheep give ear to his voice he say over the name of the sheep and take them out . when he have get them all out he go before them and the sheep go after him for they have knowledge of his voice . they will not go after another who be not their keeper but will go from him in flight because his voice be strange to them . in this jesus be teach them in the form of a story but what he say be not clear to them . so jesus say again truly i say to you i be the door of the sheep . all who come before me be thief and outlaw but the sheep do not give ear to them . i be the door if any man go in through me he will have salvation and will go in and go out and will get food . the thief come only to take the sheep and to put them to death he come for their destruction i have come so that they may have life and have it in great measure . i be the good keeper of sheep the good keeper give his life for the sheep . he who be a servant and not the keeper or the owner of the sheep see the wolf come and go in flight away from the sheep and the wolf come down on them and send them in all direction because he be a servant he have no interest in the sheep . i be the good keeper i have knowledge of my sheep and they have knowledge of me even a the father have knowledge of me and i of the father and i be give my life for the sheep . and i have other sheep which be not of this field i will be their guide in the same way and they will give ear to my voice so there will be one flock and one keeper . for this reason be i love by the father because i give up my life so that i may take it again . no one take it away from me i give it up of myself . i have power to give it up and i have power to take it again . these order i have from my father . there be a division again among the jew because of these word . and a number of them say he have an evil spirit and be out of his mind why do you give ear to him ? others say these be not the word of one who have an evil spirit . be it possible for an evil spirit to make blind people see ? then come the feast of the opening of the temple in jerusalem it be winter and jesus be walk in the temple in solomon 's covered way . then the jew come round him say how long be you go to keep u in doubt ? if you be the christ say so clearly . jesus say in answer i have say it and you have no belief the work which i do in my father 's name these give witness about me . but you have no belief because you be not of my sheep . my sheep give ear to my voice and i have knowledge of them and they come after me and i give them eternal life they will never come to destruction and no one will ever take them out of my hand . that which my father have give to me have more value than all and no one be able to take anything out of the father 's hand . i and my father be one . then the jew take up stone again to send at him . jesus say to them in answer i have let you see a number of good work from the father for which of those work be you stone me ? this be their answer we be not stone you for a good work but for evil word because be a man you make yourself god . in answer jesus say be there not a say in your law i say you be god ? if he say they be god to whom the word of god come and the writing may not be break do you say of him whom the father make holy and send into the world your word be evil because i say i be god 's son ? if i be not do the work of my father do not have belief in me but if i be do them then have belief in the work even if you have no belief in me so that you may see clearly and be certain that the father be in me and i be in the father . then again they make an attempt to take him but he get away from them . and he go again to the other side of the jordan to the place where john first give baptism and he be there for a time . and a great number of people come to him say john do no sign but everything john say of this man be true . and a number come to have faith in him there .now a certain man name lazarus be ill he be of bethany the town of mary and her sister martha . the mary whose brother lazarus be ill be the mary who put perfume oil on the lord and make his foot dry with her hair . so the sister send to him say lord your dear friend be ill. when this come to his ear jesus say the end of this disease be not death but the glory of god so that the son of god may have glory because of it . now jesus have love in his heart for martha and her sister and lazarus . so when the news come to him that lazarus be ill he do not go from the place where he be for two day . then after that time he say to his disciple let u go into judaea again . the disciple say to him master the jew be attempt only the other day to have you stone and be you go back there again ? then jesus say in answer be there not twelve hour in the day ? a man may go about in the day without fall because he see the light of this world . but if a man go about in the night he may have a fall because the light be not in him . these thing say he and after that he say to them lazarus our friend be at rest but i go so that i may make him come out of his sleep . then his disciple say to him lord if he be rest he will get well . jesus however be talk of his death but they have the idea that he be talk about take rest in sleep . then jesus say to them clearly lazarus be dead . and because of you i be glad i be not there so that you may have faith but let u go to him . then thomas who be name didymus say to the other disciple let u go so that we may be with him in death . now when jesus come he make the discovery that lazarus have be put into the earth four day before . now bethany be near to jerusalem about two mile away and a number of jew have come to martha and mary to give them comfort about their brother . when martha have the news that jesus be on the way she go out to him but mary do not go from the house . then martha say to jesus lord if you have be here my brother would not be dead . but i be certain that even now whatever request you make to god god will give it to you . jesus say to her your brother will come to life again . martha say to him i be certain that he will come to life again when all come back from the dead at the last day . jesus say to her i be myself that day and that life he who have faith in me will have life even if he be dead and no one who be live and have faith in me will ever see death . be this your faith ? she say to him yes lord my faith be that you be the christ the son of god who be to come into the world . and have say this she go away and say secretly to her sister mary the master be here and have send for you . and mary hearing this get up quickly and go to him . now jesus have not at this time come into the town but be still in the place where martha have see him . then the jew who be with her in the house comfort her when they saw mary get up quickly and go out go after her in the belief that she be go to the place of the dead and would be weep there . when mary come to where jesus be and saw him she go down at his foot say lord if you have be here my brother would not be dead . and when jesus saw her weeping and saw the jew weep who come with her his spirit be move and he be trouble and say where have you put him ? they say come and see lord . and jesus himself be weep . so the jew say see how dear he be to him ! but some of them say this man who make open the eye of the blind man be he not able to keep his friend from death ? so jesus deeply trouble in heart come to the place of the dead . it be a hole in the rock and a stone be over the opening . jesus say take away the stone . martha the sister of him who be dead say lord by this time the body will be smell for he have be dead four day . jesus say to her do i not say to you that if you have faith you would see the glory of god ? so they take away the stone . and jesus look up to heaven say father i give praise to you for hear me . i be certain that your ear be at all time open to me but i say it because of these who be here so that they may see that you send me . then he say in a loud voice lazarus come out ! and he who be dead come out with linen band fold tightly about his hand and foot and a cloth about his face . jesus say to them make him free and let him go . then a number of the jew who have come to mary and have see the thing which jesus do have belief in him . but some of them go to the pharisee with the news of what jesus have do . then the high priest and the pharisee have a meeting and say what be we do ? this man be do a number of sign . if we let him go on in this way everybody will have belief in him and the roman will come and take away our place and our nation . but one of them caiaphas who be high priest that year say to them you have no knowledge of anything you do not see that it be in your interest for one man to be put to death for the people so that all the nation may not come to destruction . he do not say this of himself but be the high priest that year he say a a prophet that jesus would be put to death for the nation and not for that nation only but for the purpose of unite in one body the child of god all over the world . and from that day they take think together how to put him to death . so jesus no longer go about publicly among the jew but go from there into the country near to the waste land to a town name ephraim where he be for some time with the disciple . now the passover of the jew be near and number of people go up from the country to jerusalem to make themselves clean before the passover . they be look for jesus and say to one another while they be in the temple what be your opinion ? will he not come to the feast ? now the chief priest and the pharisee have give order that if anyone have knowledge where he be he be to give them word so that they might take him .then six day before the passover jesus come to bethany where lazarus be whom jesus have make to come back from the dead . so they make him a meal there and he be wait on by martha and lazarus be among those who be seat with him at table . then mary take a pound of perfumed oil of great value put it on the foot of jesus and make them dry with her hair and the house become full of the smell of the perfume . but one of his disciple judas iscariot who be to give him up say why be not this perfume trade for three hundred penny and the money give to the poor ? he say this not because he have any love for the poor but because he be a thief and have the money bag take for himself what be put into it . then jesus say let her be . let her keep what she have for the day of my death . the poor you have ever with you but me you have not for ever . then a great number of the jew have news that he be there and they come not only because of jesus but so that they might see lazarus who have be dead and to whom he have give life . now there be talk among the chief priest of put lazarus to death for because of him a great number of the jew go away and have belief in jesus . the day after a great number of people who be there for the feast when they have the news that jesus be come to jerusalem take branch of palm tree and go out to him cry a blessing on him who come in the name of the lord the king of israel ! and jesus saw a young as and take his seat on it a the writing say have no fear daughter of zion see your king be come seat on a young as . these thing be not clear to his disciple at first but when jesus have be lift up into his glory then it come to their mind that these thing in the writing be about him and that they have be do to him . now the people who be with him when his voice come to lazarus in the place of the dead and give him life again have be talk about it . and that be the reason the people go out to him because it have come to their ear that he have do this sign . then the pharisee say one to another you see you be unable to do anything the world have go after him . now there be some greek among the people who have come up to give worship at the feast they come to philip who be of beth saida in galilee and make a request say sir we have a desire to see jesus . philip go and give word of it to andrew and andrew go with philip to jesus . and jesus say to them in answer the hour of the glory of the son of man have come . truly i say to you if a seed of grain do not go into the earth and come to an end it be still a seed and no more but through it death it give much fruit . he who be in love with life will have it take from him and he who have no care for his life in this world will keep it for ever and ever . if any man be my servant let him come after me and where i be there will my servant be . if any man become my servant my father will give him honour . now be my soul trouble and what be i to say ? father keep me from this hour . no for this purpose have i come to this hour . father give glory to your name . then there come a voice out of heaven say i have give it glory and i will give it glory again . hear the sound a number of people who be there say that it be thunder others say an angel be talk to him . jesus say in answer this voice come not for me but for you . now be this world to be judge now will the ruler of this world be send out . and i if i be lift up from the earth will make all men come to me . this he say point to the sort of death he would have . then the people in answer say to him the law say that the christ will have life without end how say you then that it be necessary for the son of man to be lift up ? who be this son of man ? jesus say to them for a little time longer the light will be among you while you have the light go on walking in it so that the dark may not overtake you one walk in the dark have no knowledge of where he be go . in so far a you have the light put your faith in the light so that you may become son of light . with these word jesus go away and for a time be not see again by them . but though he have do such a number of sign before them they still have no belief in him so that the word of the prophet isaiah might come true when he say lord who have any belief in our preaching ? and the arm of the lord to whom have it be unveil ? for this reason they be unable to have belief because isaiah say again he have make their eye blind and their heart hard for fear that they might see with their eye and get knowledge with their heart and be change and i might make them well . isaiah say these word because he saw his glory . his word be about him . however a number even of the ruler have belief in him but because of the pharisee they do not say so openly for fear that they might be shut out from the synagogue for the praise of men be dearer to them than the approval of god . then jesus say with a loud voice he who have faith in me have faith not in me but in him who send me . and he who see me see him who send me . i have come a a light into the world so that no one who have faith in me will go on living in the dark . and if any man give ear to my word and do not keep them i be not his judge i do not come to be judge of the world but to give salvation to the world . he who put me on one side and do not take my word to heart be not without a judge the word which i have say will be his judge on the last day . for i have not say it on my authority but the father who send me give me order what to say and how to say it . and i have knowledge that his order be eternal life so that the thing which i say i say them even a the father say them to me .now before the feast of the passover it be clear to jesus that the time have come for him to go away from this world to the father . have once have love for those in the world who be his his love for them go on to the end . so while a meal be go on the evil one have now put it into the heart of judas iscariot simon 's son to be false to him jesus be conscious that the father have put everything into his hand and that he come from god and be go to god get up from table put off his robe and take a cloth and put it round him . then he put water into a basin and be wash the foot of the disciple and dry them with the cloth which be round him . so he come to simon peter . peter say lord be my foot to be wash by you ? and jesus answering say to him what i do be not clear to you now but it will be clear to you in time to come . peter say i will never let my foot be wash by you never . jesus say in answer if i do not make you clean you have no part with me . simon peter say to him lord not my foot only but my hand and my head . jesus say to him he who be bath have need only to have his foot wash and then he be clean all over and you my disciple be clean but not all of you . he have knowledge who be false to him that be why he say you be not all clean . then after wash their foot and put on his robe again he take his seat and say to them do you see what i have do to you ? you give me the name of master and lord and you be right that be what i be . if then i the lord and the master have make your foot clean it be right for you to make one another 's foot clean . i have give you an example so that you may do what i have do to you . truly i say to you a servant be not great than his lord and he who be send be not great than the one who send him . if these thing be clear to you happy be you if you do them . i be not talk of you all i have knowledge of my true disciple but thing be a they be so that the writing may come true the foot of him who take bread with me be lift up against me . from this time forward i give you knowledge of thing before they come about so that when they come about you may have belief that i be he . truly i say to you he who take to his heart anyone whom i send take me to his heart and he who so take me take him who send me . when jesus have say this he be trouble in spirit and give witness say truly i say to you that one of you will be false to me . then the eye of the disciple be turn on one another in doubt a to whom he have in mind . there be at table one of his disciple the one dear to jesus rest his head on jesus ' breast . make a sign to him simon peter say who be it he be talk about ? he then rest his head on jesus ' breast say to him lord who be it ? this be the answer jesus give it be the one to whom i will give this bit of bread after i have put it in the vessel . then he take the bit of bread put it into the vessel and give it to judas the son of simon iscariot . and when juda take the bread satan go into him . then jesus say to him do quickly what you have to do . now it be not clear to anyone at table why he say this to him . some be of the opinion that because juda keep the money bag jesus say to him get the thing we have need of for the feast or that he be to give something to the poor . so judas have take the bit of bread straight away go out and it be night . then when he have go out jesus say now be glory give to the son of man and god be give glory in him . if god be give glory in him god will give him glory in himself and will give him glory even now . my dear child i be only to be with you a little long . then you will be look for me and a i say to the jew so now i say to you where i be go you may not come . i give you a new law have love one for another even a i have have love for you so be you to have love one for another . by this it will be clear to all men that you be my disciple if you have love one for another . simon peter say to him lord where be you go ? jesus say in answer where i be go you may not come with me now but you will come later . peter say to him why may i not come with you even now ? i will give up my life for you . jesus say in answer will you give up your life for me ? truly i say to you before the cry of the cock you will have say three time that you be not my disciple .let not your heart be trouble have faith in god and have faith in me . in my father 's house be room enough if it be not so would i have say that i be go to make ready a place for you ? and if i go and make ready a place for you i will come back again and will take you to be with me so that you may be where i be . and you all have knowledge of where i be go and of the way to it . thomas say lord we have no knowledge of where you be go how may we have knowledge of the way ? jesus say to him i be the true and living way no one come to the father but by me . if you have knowledge of me you would have knowledge of my father you have knowledge of him now and have see him . philip say to him lord let u see the father and we have need of nothing more . jesus say to him philip have i be with you all this time and still you have no knowledge of me ? he who have see me have see the father . why do you say let u see the father ? have you not faith that i be in the father and the father be in me ? the word which i say to you i say not from myself but the father who be in me all the time do his work . have faith that i be in the father and that the father be in me at least have faith in me because of what i do . truly i say to you he who put his faith in me will do the very work which i do and he will do great thing than these because i be go to my father . and whatever request you make in my name that i will do so that the father may have glory in the son . if you make any request to me in my name i will do it . if you have love for me you will keep my law . and i will make prayer to the father and he will give you another helper to be with you for ever even the spirit of true knowledge . that spirit the world be not able to take to it heart because it see him not and have no knowledge of him but you have knowledge of him because he be ever with you and will be in you . i will not let you be without a friend i be come to you . a little time longer and the world will see me no more but you will see me and you will be live because i be live . at that time it will be clear to you that i be in my father and you be in me and i in you . he who have my law and keep them he it be who have love for me and he who have love for me will be love by my father and i will have love for him and will let myself be see clearly by him . juda not iscariot say to him how be it that you will let yourself be see clearly by u and not by the world ? jesus say to him in answer if anyone have love for me he will keep my word and he will be dear to my father and we will come to him and make our live place with him . he who have no love for me do not keep my word and the word which you be hear be not my word but the father 's who send me . i have say all this to you while i be still with you . but the helper the holy spirit whom the father will send in my name will be your teacher in all thing and will put you in mind of everything i have say to you . may peace be with you my peace i give to you i give it not a the world give . let not your heart be trouble let it be without fear . keep in mind how i say to you i go away and come to you again . if you have love for me you would be glad because i be go to the father for the father be great than i. and now i have give you word of it before it come so that when it come you may have faith . after this i will not say much to you because the ruler of this world come and he have no power over me but he come so that the world may see that i have love for the father and that i be do a i be order by the father . get up and let u go .i be the true vine and my father be the gardener . he take away every branch in me which have no fruit and every branch which have fruit he make clean so that it may have more fruit . you be clean even now through the teaching which i have give you . be in me at all time a i be in you . a the branch be not able to give fruit of itself if it be not still on the vine so you be not able to do so if you be not in me . i be the vine you be the branch he who be in me at all time a i be in him give much fruit because without me you be able to do nothing . if a man do not keep himself in me he become dead and be cut off like a dry branch such branch be take up and put in the fire and burn . if you be in me at all time and my word be in you then anything for which you make a request will be do for you . here be my father 's glory in that you give much fruit and so be my true disciple . even a the father have give me his love so i have give my love to you be ever in my love . if you keep my law you will be ever in my love even a i have keep my father 's law and be ever in his love . i have say these thing to you so that i may have joy in you and so that your joy may be complete . this be the law i give you have love one for another even a i have love for you . great love have no man than this that a man give up his life for his friend . you be my friend if you do what i give you order to do . no longer do i give you the name of servant because a servant be without knowledge of what his master be do i give you the name of friend because i have give you knowledge of all the thing which my father have say to me . you do not take me for yourselves but i take you for myself and i give you the work of go about and produce fruit which will be for ever so that whatever request you make to the father in my name he may give it to you . so this be my law for you have love one for another . if you be hat by the world keep in mind that i be hat by the world before you . if you be of the world you would be love by the world but because you be not of the world but i have take you out of the world you be hat by the world . keep in mind the word i say to you a servant be not great than his lord . if they be cruel to me they will be cruel to you if they keep my word they will keep yours . they will do all this to you because of my name because they have no knowledge of him who send me . if i have not come and be their teacher they would have have no sin but now they have no reason to give for their sin . he who have hate for me have hate for my father . if i have not do among them the work which no other man ever do they would have have no sin but now they have see and they have have hate in their heart for me and my father . this come about so that the writing in their law may be make true their hate for me be without cause . when the helper come whom i will send to you from the father even the spirit of true knowledge who come from the father he will give witness about me and you in addition will give witness because you have be with me from the first .i have say these thing to you so that you may not be in doubt . they will put you out of the synagogue yes the time be come when whoever put you to death will have the belief that he be do god 's pleasure . they will do these thing to you because they have not have knowledge of the father or of me . i have say these thing to you so that when the time come what i have say may come to your mind . i do not say them to you at the first because then i be still with you . but now i be go to him who send me and not one of you say to me where be you go ? but your heart be full of sorrow because i have say these thing . but what i be say be true my go be for your good for if i do not go away the helper will not come to you but if i go i will send him to you . and he when he come will make the world conscious of sin and of righteousness and of be judge of sin because they have not faith in me of righteousness because i go to the father and you will see me no more of be judge because the ruler of this world have be judge . i have still much to say to you but you be not strong enough for it now . however when he the spirit of true knowledge have come he will be your guide into all true knowledge for his word will not come from himself but whatever have come to his hearing that he will say and he will make clear to you the thing to come . he will give me glory because he will take of what be mine and make it clear to you . everything which the father have be mine that be why i say he will take of what be mine and will make it clear to you . after a little time you will see me no longer and then again after a little time you will see me . so some of the disciple say one to another what be this he be say after a little time you will see me no longer and then again after a little time you will see me ? and i be go to the father ? so they say again and again what be this he be say a little time ? his word be not clear to u . jesus saw that they have a desire to put the question to him so he say to them be this what you be question one with another why i say after a little time you will see me no longer and then again after a little time you will see me ? truly i say to you you will be weep and sorrow but the world will be glad you will be sad but your sorrow will be turn into joy . when a woman be about to give birth she have sorrow because her hour be come but when she have give birth to the child the pain be put out of her mind by the joy that a man have come into the world . so you have sorrow now but i will see you again and your heart will be glad and no one will take away your joy . and on that day you will put no question to me . truly i say to you whatever request you make to the father he will give it to you in my name . up to now you have make no request in my name do so and it will be answer so that your heart may be full of joy . all this i have say to you in veiled language but the time be come when i will no longer say thing in veiled language but will give you knowledge of the father clearly . in that day you will make request in my name and i do not say that i will make prayer to the father for you for the father himself give his love to you because you have give your love to me and have have faith that i come from god . i come out from the father and have come into the world again i go away from the world and go to the father . his disciple say now you be talk clearly and not in veiled language . now we be certain that you have knowledge of all thing and have no need for anyone to put question to you through this we have faith that you come from god . jesus make answer have you faith now ? see a time be come yes it be now here when you will go away in all direction every man to his house and i will be by myself but i be not by myself because the father be with me . i have say all these thing to you so that in me you may have peace . in the world you have trouble but take heart ! i have overcome the world .jesus say these thing then lift his eye to heaven he say father the time have now come give glory to your son so that the son may give glory to you even a you give him authority over all flesh to give eternal life to all those whom you have give to him . and this father let me have glory with you even that glory which i have with you before the world be . i have give knowledge of your name to the men whom you give me out of the world yours they be and you give heart and have certain knowledge that i come from you and they have faith that you send me . my prayer be for them my prayer be not for the world but for those whom you have give to me because they be . and for them i make myself holy so that they may be make truly holy . my prayer be not for them only but for all who will have faith in me through their word may they all be one ! even a you father be in me and i be in you so let them be in u so that all men may come to have faith that you send me . and the glory which you have give to me i have give to them so that they may be one even a we be have for me may be in them and i in them .when jesus have say these word he go out with his disciple over the stream kedron to a garden into which he go with his disciple . and juda who be false to him have knowledge of the place because jesus go there frequently with his disciple . so judas get a band of arm men and police from the chief priest and pharisee go there with light and with arm . then jesus have knowledge of everything which be come on him go forward and say to them who be you look for ? their answer be jesus the nazarene . jesus say i be he . and juda who be false to him be there at their side . and when he say to them i be he they go back fall to the earth . so again he put the question to them who be you look for ? and they say jesus the nazarene . jesus make answer i have say that i be he if you be look for me let these men go away . he say this so that his word might come true i have keep safe all those whom you give to me . then simon peter who have a sword take it out and give the high priest 's servant a blow cut off his right ear . the servant 's name be malchus . then jesus say to peter put back your sword be i not to take the cup which my father have give to me ? then the band and the chief captain and the police take jesus and put cord round him . they take him first to annas because anna be the father in law of caiaphas who be the high priest that year . it be caiaphas who have say to the jew that it be in their interest for one man to be put to death for the people . and simon peter go after jesus with another disciple . now that disciple be a friend of the high priest and he go in with jesus into the house of the high priest but peter be keep outside at the door . then this other disciple who be a friend of the high priest come out and have a word with the girl who keep the door and take peter in . then the girl who be the door keeper say to peter be you not one of this man 's disciple ? in answer he say i be not . now the servant and the police have make a fire of coal because it be cold they be warm themselves in front of it and peter be there with them warm himself . then the high priest put question to jesus about his disciple and his teaching . jesus make answer i say thing openly to the world at all time i have give my teaching in the synagogue and in the temple to which all the jew come and i have say nothing secretly . why be you question me ? put question to my hearer about what i have say to them they have knowledge of what i say . when he say this one of the police by his side give him a blow with his open hand say do you give such an answer to the high priest ? jesus say in answer if i have say anything evil give witness to the evil but if i say what be true why do you give me blow ? then annas send him chain to caiaphas the high priest . but simon peter be still there warm himself by the fire . they say to him be you not one of his disciple ? he say no i be not . one of the servant of the high priest a relation of him whose ear have be cut off by peter say do i not see you with him in the garden ? then again peter say no . and straight away a cock give it cry . so they take jesus from the house of caiaphas to the praetorium . it be early . they themselves do not go into the praetorium so that they might not become unclean but might take the passover . so pilate come out to them and put the question what have you to say against this man ? they say to him in answer if the man be not a wrongdoer we would not have give him up to you . then pilate say to them take him yourselves and let him be judge by your law . but the jew say to him we have no right to put any man to death . that the word of jesus might come true point to the sort of death he would have . then pilate go back into the praetorium and sent for jesus and say to him be you the king of the jew ? jesus make answer do you say this of yourself or do others say it about me ? pilate say be i a jew ? your nation and the chief priest have give you into my hand what have you do ? jesus say in answer my kingdom be not of this world if my kingdom be of this world my disciple would have make a good fight to keep me out of the hand of the jew but my kingdom be not here . then pilate say to him be you then a king ? jesus make answer you say that i be a king . for this purpose be i give birth and for this purpose i come into the world that i might give witness to what be true . every lover of what be true give ear to my voice . pilate say to him true ? what be true ? have say this he go out again to the jew and say to them i see no wrong in him . but every year you make a request to me to let a prisoner go free at the passover . be it your desire that i let the king of the jew go free ? then again they give a loud cry not this man but barabbas . now barabbas be an outlaw .then pilate take jesus and have him whip with cord . and the men of the army make a crown of thorn and put it on him come out to you to make it clear to you that i see no wrong in him . then jesus come out with the crown of thorn and the purple robe . and pilate say to them here be the man ! so when the chief priest and the police saw him they give a loud cry to the cross ! to the cross ! pilate say to them take him yourselves and put him on the cross i see no crime in him . and the jew make answer we have a law and by that law it be right for him to be put to death because he say he be the son of god . when this say come to pilate 's ear his fear become great and he go again into the praetorium and say to jesus where do you come from ? but jesus give him no answer . then pilate say to him you say nothing to me ? be it not clear to you that i have power to let you go free and power to put you to to let him go free but the jew say in a loud voice if you let this man go you be not caesar 's friend everyone who make himself a king go against caesar . so when these word come to pilate 's ear he we have no king but caesar . so then he give him up to them to be put to death on the cross . and they take jesus away and he go out with his cross on him to the place which be name dead man 's head the nazarene the king of the jew . the writing be see by a number of the jew for the place where jesus be put to death on the cross be near the town and the writing be in hebrew and latin and greek . distribution of my clothing among them and my coat they put to the decision of chance . this be what the men of the army do . now by the side of the cross of jesus be his mother and his mother 's however do not say that he would not undergo death but if it be my desire for him to be here till i come back what be that to you ? this be the disciple who give witness about these thing and who put them in write and we have knowledge that his witness be true . and jesus do such a number of other thing that if every one be record it be my opinion that even the world itself be not great enough for the book there would be .paul a servant of jesus christ an apostle by the selection of god give authority a a preacher of the good news of which god have give word before by his prophet in the holy writing about his son who in the flesh come from the family of david but be mark out a son of god in power by the holy spirit through the come to life again of the dead jesus christ our lord through whom grace have be give to u send u out to make disciple to the faith among all nation for his name among whom you in the same way have be mark out to be disciple of jesus christ to all those who be in rome love by god mark out a saint grace to you and peace from god our father and the lord jesus christ . first of all i give praise to my god through jesus christ for you all because news of your faith have go into all the world . for god be my witness whose servant i be in spirit in the good news of his son that you be at all time in my memory and in my prayer and that i be ever make prayer that god will give me a good journey to you . for i have a strong desire to see you and to give you some grace of the spirit so that you may be make strong that be to say that all of u may be comfort together by the faith which be in you and in me . you may be certain my brother that it have frequently be in my mind to come to you but till now i be keep from it so that i might have some fruit from you in the same way a i have have it from the other nation . i have a debt to greeks and to the nation outside to the wise and to those who have no learning . for which reason i have the desire as far a i be able to give the knowledge of the good news to you who be in rome . for i have no feeling of shame about the good news because it be the power of god give salvation to everyone who have faith to the jew first and then to the greek . for in it there be the revelation of the righteousness of god from faith to faith a it be say in the holy writing the man who do righteousness will be live by his faith . for there be a revelation of the wrath of god from heaven against all the wrongdoing and evil thought of men who keep down what be true by wrongdoing because the knowledge of god may be see in them god have make it clear to them . for from the first making of the world those thing of god which the eye be unable to see that be his eternal power and existence be fully make clear he have give the knowledge of them through the thing which he have make so that men have no reason for wrongdoing because have the knowledge of god they do not give glory to god a god and do not give praise but their mind be full of foolish thing and their heart be without sense be make dark . seem to be wise they be in fact foolish and by them the glory of the eternal god be change and make into the image of man who be not eternal and of bird and beast and thing which go on the earth . for this reason god give them up to the evil desire of their heart work shame in their body with one another because by them the true word of god be change into that which be false and they give worship and honour to the thing which be make and not to him who make it to whom be bless for ever . so be it . for this reason god give them up to evil passion and their woman be change the natural use into one which be unnatural and in the same way the men give up the natural use of the woman and be burn in their desire for one another men do shame with men and get in their body the right reward of their evil do . and because they have not the mind to keep god in their knowledge god give them up to an evil mind to do those thing which be not right be full of all wrongdoing evil desire for the good of others hate envy put to death fight deceit cruel way evil talk and false statement about others hat by god full of pride without respect full of loud talk give to evil invention not honour father or mother without knowledge not true to their undertaking unkind have no mercy who though they have knowledge of the law of god that the fate of those who do these thing be death not only go on do these thing themselves but give approval to those who do them .so you have no reason whoever you be for judge for in judge another you be judge yourself for you do the same thing . and we be conscious that god be a true judge against those who do such thing . but you who be judge another for do what you do yourself be you hop that god 's decision will not take effect against you ? or be it nothing to you that god have pity on you wait and put up with you for so long not see that in his pity god 's desire be to give you a change of heart ? but by your hard and unchanged heart you be store up wrath for yourself in the day of the revelation of god 's judging in righteousness who will give to every man his right reward to those who go on with good work in the hope of glory and honour and salvation from death he will give eternal life but to those who from a love of competition be not guide by what be true will come the heat of his wrath trouble and sorrow on all whose work be evil to the jew first and then to the greek but glory and honour and peace to all whose work be good to the jew
