give punishment for wrong do to you dear brother but give way to the wrath of god for it be say in the holy writing punishment be mine i will give reward say the lord . but if one who have hate for you be in need of food or of drink give it to him for in so do you will put coal of fire on his head . do not let evil overcome you but overcome evil by good .let everyone put himself under the authority of the high power because there be no power which be not of god and all power be order by god . for which reason everyone who put himself against the authority put himself against the order of god and those who be against it will get punishment for themselves . for ruler be not a cause of fear to the good work but to the evil . if you would have no fear of the authority do good and you will have praise for he be the servant of god to you for good . but if you do evil have fear for the sword be not in his hand for nothing he be god 's servant making god 's punishment come on the evil doer . so put yourselves under the authority not for fear of wrath but because you have the knowledge of what be right . for the same reason make payment of tax because the authority be god 's servant to take care of such thing at all time . give to all what be their right tax to him whose they be payment to him whose right it be fear to whom fear honour to whom honour be to be give . be in debt for nothing but to have love for one another for he who have love for his neighbour have keep all the law . and this do not be untrue in married life do not put to death do not take what be another 's do not have desire for what be another 's and if there be any other order it be cover by this word have love for your neighbour a for yourself . love do no wrong to his neighbour so love make the law complete . see then that the time have come for you to be awake from sleep for now be your salvation nearer than when you first have faith . the night be far go and the day be near so let u put off the work of the dark arm ourselves with light with right behaviour a in the day not in pleasure making and drinking not in bad company and unclean behaviour not in fight and envy . but put on the lord jesus christ and do not give thought to the flesh to do it desire .do not put on one side him who be feeble in faith and do not put him in doubt by your reasoning . one man have faith to take all thing a food another who be feeble in faith take only green food . let not him who take food have a low opinion of him who do not and let not him who do not take food be a judge of him who do for he have god 's approval . who be you to make yourself a judge of another man 's servant ? it be to his master that he be responsible for good or bad . yes his place will be safe because the lord be able to keep him from fall . this man put one day before another to that man they be the same . let every man be certain in his mind . he who keep the day keep it to the lord and he who take food take it a to the lord for he give praise to god and he who do not take food to the lord he take it not and give praise to god . for every man 's life and every man 's death have a relation to others as well a to himself . as long a we have life we be live to the lord or if we give up our life it be to the lord so if we be live or if our life come to an end we be the lord 's . and for this purpose christ go into death and come back again that he might be the lord of the dead and of the living . but you why do you make yourself your brother 's judge ? or again why have you no respect for your brother ? because we will all have to take our place before god a our judge . for it be say in the holy writing by my life say the lord to me every knee will be bent and every tongue will give worship to god . so every one of u will have to give an account of himself to god . then let u not be judge of one another any long but keep this in mind that no man be to make it hard for his brother or give him cause for doubt . i be conscious of this and be certain in the lord jesus that nothing be unclean in itself but for the man in whose opinion it be unclean for him it be unclean . and if because of food your brother be troubled then you be no longer go on in the way of love . do not let your food be destruction to him for whom christ go into death . let it not be possible for men to say evil about your good for the kingdom of god be not food and drink but righteousness and peace and joy in the holy spirit . and he who in these thing be christ 's servant be please to god and have the approval of men . so then let u go after the thing which make peace and the thing by which we may be a help to one another . do not let the work of god come to nothing on account of food . all thing be certainly clean but it be evil for that man who by take food make it hard for another . it be well not to take meat or wine or to do anything which might be a cause of trouble to your brother . the faith which you have have it to yourself before god . happy be the man who be not judge by that to which he give approval . but he who be in doubt be judge if he take food because he do it not in faith and whatever be not of faith be sin .we who be strong have to be a support to the feeble and not give pleasure to ourselves . let every one of u give pleasure to his neighbour for his good to make him strong . for christ do not give pleasure to himself but a it be say the bitter word of those who be angry with you come on me . now those thing which be put down in write before our time be for our learning so that through quiet waiting and through the comfort of the holy writing we might have hope . now may the god who give comfort and strength in wait make you of the same mind with one another in harmony with christ jesus so that with one mouth you may give glory to the god and father of our lord jesus christ . so then take one another to your heart a christ take u to the glory of god . now i say that christ have be make a servant of the circumcision to give effect to the undertaking give by god to the father and so that the gentile might give glory to god for his mercy a it be say for this reason i will give praise to you among the gentile and i will make a song to your name . and again he say take part you gentiles in the joy of his people . and again give praise to the lord all you gentile and let all the nation give praise to him . and again isaiah say there will be the root of jesse and he who come to be the ruler over the gentile in him will the gentile put their hope . now may the god of hope make you full of joy and peace through faith so that all hope may be yours in the power of the holy spirit . and i myself be certain of you brother that you be full of what be good complete in all knowledge able to give direction to one another . but i have in some measure less fear in write to you to put these thing before you again because of the grace which be give to me by god to be a servant of christ jesus to the gentile do the work of a priest in the good news of god so that the offering of the gentile might be please to god be make holy by the holy spirit . so i have pride in christ jesus in the thing which be god 's . and i will keep myself from talk of anything but those thing which christ have do by me to put the gentile under his rule in word and in act by sign and wonder in the power of the holy spirit so that from jerusalem and round about as far a illyricum i have give all the good news of christ make it my purpose not to take the good news where christ be name so that my work might not be rest on that of others but a it be say in the holy writing they will see to whom the news of him have not be give and those to whose ear it have not come will have knowledge . for which reason i be frequently keep from come to you but now have no longer any place in these part and have have for a number of year a great desire to come to you whenever i go to spain for it be my hope to see you on my way and to be send on there by you if first i may in some measure have be comfort by your company but now i go to jerusalem take help for the saint . for it have be the good pleasure of those of macedonia and achaia to send a certain amount of money for the poor among the saint at jerusalem . yes it have be their good pleasure and they be in their debt . for if the gentile have have a part in the thing of the spirit which be theirs it be right for them in the same way to give them help in the thing of the flesh . so when i have do this and have give them this fruit of love i will go on by you into spain . and i be certain that when i come i will be full of the blessing of christ . now i make request to you brother by our lord jesus christ and by the love of the spirit that you will be work together with me in your prayer to god for me so that i may be keep safe from those in judaea who have not put themselves under the rule of god and that the help which i be take for jerusalem may be please to the saint so that i may come to you in joy by the good pleasure of god and have rest with you . now may the god of peace be with you all . so be it .it be my desire to say a good word for phoebe who be a servant of the church in cenchreae that you will take her in kindly after the way of the saint a one who be the lord 's and give her help in anything in which she may have need of you because she have be a help to a great number and to myself . give my love to prisca and aquila worker with me in christ jesus who for my life put their neck in danger to whom not only i but all the church of the gentile be in debt and say a kind word to the church which be in their house . give my love to my dear epaenetus who be the first fruit of asia to christ . give my love to mary who give much care to you . give my love to andronicus and junia my relation who be in prison with me who be note among the apostle and who be in christ before me . give my love to ampliatus who be dear to me in the lord give my love to urbanus a worker in christ with u and to my dear stachys . give my love to apelles who have the approval of christ . say a kind word to those who be of the house of aristobulus . give my love to herodion my relation . say a kind word to those of the house of narcissus who be in the lord . give my love to tryphaena and tryphosa worker in the lord . give my love to my dear persis who do much work in the lord . give my love to rufus one of the lord 's selection and to his mother and mine . give my love to asyncritus phlegon hermes patrobas hermas and the brother who be with them . give my love to philologus and julia nereus and his sister and olympas and all the saint who be with them . give one another a holy kiss . all the church of christ send their love to you . now it be my desire brother that you will take note of those who be cause division and trouble among you quite against the teaching which be give to you and keep away from them . for such people be not servant of the lord christ but of their stomach and by their smooth and well say word the heart of those who have no knowledge of evil be trick . for all have knowledge of how you do what you be order . for this reason i have joy in you but it be my desire that you may be wise in what be good and without knowledge of evil . and the god of peace will be crush satan under your foot before long . the grace of our lord jesus christ be with you . timothy who be work with me send his love to you so do lucius and jason and sosipater my relation . i tertius who have do the writing of this letter send love in the lord . gaius with whom i be live whose house be open to all the church send his love so do erastus the manager of the account of the town and quartus the brother . now to him who be able to make you strong in agreement with the good news which i give you and the preaching of jesus christ in the light of the revelation of that secret which have be keep through time eternal but be now make clear and by the writing of the prophet by the order of the eternal god the knowledge of it have be give to all the nation so that they may come under the rule of the faith to the only wise god through jesus christ be the glory for ever . so be it .paul an apostle of jesus christ by the purpose of god and sosthenes the brother to the church of god which be in corinth to those who have be make holy in christ jesus saint by the selection of god with all those who in every place give honour to the name of our lord jesus christ their lord and ours grace to you and peace from god our father and the lord jesus christ . i give praise to my god for you at all time because of the grace of god which have be give to you in christ jesus so that in him you have wealth in all thing in word and in knowledge of every sort even a the witness of the christ have be make certain among you so that have every grace you be live in the hope of the revelation of our lord jesus christ who will give you strength to the end to be free from all sin in the day of our lord jesus christ . god be true through whom you have be give a part with his son jesus christ our lord . now i make request to you my brother in the name of our lord jesus christ that you will all say the same thing and that there may be no division among you so that you may be in complete agreement in the same mind and in the same opinion . because it have come to my knowledge through those of the house of chloe that there be division among you my brother . that be that some of you say i be of paul some say i be of apollo some say i be of cephas and some say i be christ 's . be there a division in christ ? be paul nail to the cross for you ? or be you give baptism in the name of paul ? i give praise to god that not one of you have baptism from me but crispus and gaius so that no one may be able to say that you have baptism in my name . and i give baptism to the house of stephanas but i be not certain that any others have baptism from me . for christ send me not to give baptism but to be a preacher of the good news not with wise word for fear that the cross of christ might be make of no value . for the word of the cross seem foolish to those who be on the way to destruction but to u who be on the way to salvation it be the power of god . a it say in the holy writing i will put an end to the wisdom of the wise and will put on one side the design of those who have knowledge . where be the wise ? where be he who have knowledge of the law ? where be the man of this world who have a love of discussion ? have not god make foolish the wisdom of this world ? for because by the purpose of god the world with all it wisdom have not the knowledge of god it be god 's pleasure by so foolish a thing a preach to give salvation to those who have faith in him . see that the jew make request for sign and the greek be look for knowledge but we give the good news of christ on the cross a hard thing to the jew and a foolish thing to the gentile but to those of god 's selection jew and greek christ be the power and the wisdom of god . because what seem foolish in god be wise than men and what seem feeble in god be strong than men . for you see god 's design for you my brother that he have not take a great number of the wise after the flesh not the strong not the noble but god make selection of the foolish thing of this world so that he might put the wise to shame and the feeble thing that he might put to shame the strong and the low thing of the world and the thing without honour do god make selection of yes even the thing which be not so that he might make a nothing the thing which be so that no flesh might have glory before god . but god have give you a place in christ jesus through whom god have give u wisdom and righteousness and salvation and make u holy so that a it be say in the holy writing whoever have a desire for glory let his glory be in the lord .and when i come to you my brother i do not come with wise word of knowledge put before you the secret of god . for i have make the decision to have knowledge of nothing among you but only of jesus christ on the cross . and i be with you without strength in fear and in doubt . and in my preaching there be no honeyed word of wisdom but i be dependent on the power of the spirit to make it clear to you so that your faith might be base not on man 's wisdom but on the power of god . but still we have wisdom for those who be complete in knowledge though not the wisdom of this world and not of the ruler of this world who be come to nothing but we give the news of the secret wisdom of god which he have keep in store before the world come into existence for our glory of which not one of the ruler of this world have knowledge for if they have they would not have put the lord of glory on the cross but a it say in the holy writing thing which the eye saw not and which have not come to the ear or into the heart of man such thing a god have make ready for those who have love for him . but god have give u the revelation of these thing through his spirit for the spirit make search into all thing even the deep thing of god . for who have knowledge of the thing of a man but the spirit of the man which be in him ? in the same way no one have knowledge of the thing of god but the spirit of god . but we have not the spirit of the world but the spirit which come from god so that we may have knowledge of the thing which be freely give to u by god . and these be the thing which we say not in the language of man 's wisdom but in word give to u by the spirit judge the thing of the spirit by the help of the spirit . for the natural man be not able to take in the thing of the spirit of god for they seem foolish to him and he be not able to have knowledge of them because such knowledge come only through the spirit . but he who have the spirit though judge all thing be himself judge by no one . for who have knowledge of the mind of the lord so a to be his teacher ? but we have the mind of christ .and the teaching i give you my brother be such a i be able to give not to those who have the spirit but to those who be still in the flesh even to child in christ . i give you milk and not meat because you be then unable to take it and even now you be not able because you be still in the flesh for when there be envy and division among you be you not still walk after the way of the flesh even a natural men ? for when one say i be of paul and another say i be of apollo be you not talk like natural men ? what then be apollos ? and what be paul ? they be but servant who give you the good news a god give it to them . i do the planting apollo do the watering but god give the increase . so then the planter be nothing and the waterer be nothing but god who give the increase . now the planter and the waterer be work for the same end but they will have their separate reward in the measure of their work . for we be worker with god you be god 's plant god 's building . in the measure of the grace give to me i a a wise master builder have put the base in position and another go on building on it . but let every man take care what he put on it . for there be no other base for the building but that which have be put down which be jesus christ . but on the base a man may put gold silver stone of great price wood dry grass cut stem every man 's work will be make clear in that day because it will be test by fire and the fire itself will make clear the quality of every man 's work . if any man 's work come through the test he will have a reward . if the fire put an end to any man 's work it will be his loss but he will get salvation himself though a by fire . do you not see that you be god 's holy house and that the spirit of god have his place in you ? if anyone make the house of god unclean god will put an end to him for the house of god be holy and you be his house . let no man have a false idea . if any man seem to himself to be wise among you let him become foolish so that he may be wise . for the wisdom of this world be foolish before god . a it be say in the holy writing he who take the wise in their secret design and again the lord have knowledge of the reasoning of the wise that they be nothing . so let no one take pride in men . for all thing be yours paul or apollo or cephas or the world or life or death or thing present or thing to come all be yours and you be christ 's and christ be god 's .let u be judge a servant of christ and a those who be responsible for the secret thing of god . and it be right for such servant to be safe person . but it be a small thing to me that i be judge by you or by man 's judging i be not even a judge of myself . for i be not conscious of any wrong in myself but this do not make me clear for it be the lord who be my judge . for this reason let there be no judging before the time till the lord come who will make clear the secret thing of the dark and the design of the heart and then will every man have his praise from god . my brother it be because of you that i have take apollo and myself a example of these thing so that in u you might see that it be not wise to go far than what be in the holy writing so that no one of you may be lift up against his brother . for who make you good than your brother ? or what have you that have not be give to you ? but if it have be give to you what cause have you for pride a if it have not be give to you ? for even now you be full even now you have wealth you have be make king without u truly i would be glad if you be king so that we might be king with you . for it seem to me that god have put u the apostle last of all a men whose fate be death for we be put on view to the world and to angel and to men . we be make to seem foolish for christ but you be wise in christ we be feeble but you be strong you have glory but we have shame . even to this hour we be without food drink and clothing we be give blow and have no certain rest place and with our hand we do the hard work when they give u curse we give blessing when we undergo punishment we take it quietly when evil thing be say about u we give gentle answer we be make a the unclean thing of the world a that for which no one have any use even till now . i be not say these thing to put you to shame but so that a my dear child you may see what be right . for even if you have ten thousand teacher in christ you have not more than one father for in christ jesus i have give birth to you through the good news . so my desire be that you take me a your example . for this cause i have send timothy to you who be my dear and true child in the lord he will make clear to you my way in christ even a i be teach everywhere in every church . now some be full of pride a if i be not come to you . but i will come to you in a short time if it be please to the lord and i will take note not of the word of those who be full of pride but of the power . for the kingdom of god be not in word but in power . what be your desire ? be my come to be with punishment or be it to be in love and a gentle spirit ?it be say in fact that there be among you a sin of the flesh such a be not see even among the gentile that one of you have his father 's wife . and in place of feel sorrow you be pleased with yourselves so that he who have do this thing have not be send away from among you . for i myself be present in spirit though not in body have come to a decision about him who have do this thing in the name of our lord jesus when you have come together with my spirit with the power of our lord jesus that this man be to be hand over to satan for the destruction of the flesh so that his spirit may have forgiveness in the day of the lord jesus . this pride of yours be not good . do you not see that a little leaven make a change in all the mass ? take away then the old leaven so that you may be a new mass even a you be without leaven . for christ have be put to death a our passover . let u then keep the feast not with old leaven and not with the leaven of evil thought and act but with the unleavened bread of true thought and right feeling . in my letter i say to you that you be not to keep company with those who go after the desire of the flesh but i have not in mind the sinner who be outside the church or those who have a desire for and take the property of others or those who give worship to image for it be not possible to keep away from such people without go out of the world completely but the sense of my letter be that if a brother have the name of be one who go after the desire of the flesh or have the desire for other people 's property or be in the way of use violent language or be the worse for drink or take by force what be not his you might not keep company with such a one or take food with him . for it be no business of mine to be judge those who be outside but it be yours to be judge those who be among you a for those who be outside god be their judge . so put away the evil man from among you .how be it that if any one of you have a cause at law against another he take it before a gentile judge and not before the saint ? be it not certain that the saint will be the judge of the world ? if then the world will be judge by you be you unable to give a decision about the small thing ? be it not certain that we be to be the judge of angel ? how much more then of the thing of this life ? if then there be question to be judge in connection with the thing of this life why do you put them in the hand of those who have no position in the church ? i say this to put you to shame . be there not among you one wise man who may be able to give a decision between his brother ? but a brother who have a cause at law against another take it before gentile judge . more than this it be not to your credit to have cause at law with one another at all . why not put up with wrong ? why not undergo loss ? so far from do this you yourselves do wrong and take your brother ' property . have you not knowledge that evil doer will have no part in the kingdom of god ? have no false idea about this no one who go after the desire of the flesh or give worship to image or be untrue when marry or be less than a man or make a wrong use of men or be a thief or the bad for drink or make use of strong language or take by force what be not his will have any part in the kingdom of god . and such be some of you but you have be wash you have be make holy you have be give righteousness in the name of the lord jesus christ and in the spirit of our god . i be free to do all thing but not all thing be wise . i be free to do all thing but i will not let myself come under the power of any . food be for the stomach and the stomach for food and god will put an end to them together . but the body be not for the desire of the flesh but for the lord and the lord for the body and god who make the lord jesus come back from the dead will do the same for u by his power . do you not see that your body be part of the body of christ ? how then may i take what be a part of the body of christ and make it a part of the body of a loose woman ? such a thing may not be . or do you not see that he who be join to a loose woman be one body with her ? for god have say the two of them will become one flesh . but he who be unite to the lord be one spirit . keep away from the desire of the flesh . every sin which a man do be outside of the body but he who go after the desire of the flesh do evil to his body . or be you not conscious that your body be a house for the holy spirit which be in you and which have be give to you by god ? and you be not the owner of yourselves for a payment have be make for you let god be honour in your body .now a to the thing in your letter to me it be good for a man to have nothing to do with a woman . but because of the desire of the flesh let every man have his wife and every woman her husband . let the husband give to the wife what be right and let the wife do the same to the husband . the wife have not power over her body but the husband and in the same way the husband have not power over his body but the wife . do not keep back from one another what be right but only for a short time and by agreement so that you may give yourselves to prayer and come together again so that satan may not get the good of you through your loss of self control . but this i say a my opinion and not a an order of the lord . it be my desire that all men might be even a i be . but every man have the power of his special way of life give him by god one in this way and one in that . but i say to the unmarried and to the widow it be good for them to be even a i be . but if they have not self control let them get marry for married life be well than the burning of desire . but to the marry i give order though not i but the lord that the wife may not go away from her husband or if she go away from him let her keep unmarried or be unite to her husband again and that the husband may not go away from his wife . but to the rest i say and not the lord if a brother have a wife who be not a christian and it be her desire to go on living with him let him not go away from her . and if a woman have a husband who be not a christian and it be his desire to go on living with her let her not go away from her husband . for the husband who have not faith be make holy through his christian wife and the wife who be not a christian be make holy through the brother if not your child would be unholy but now be they holy . but if the one who be not a christian have a desire to go away let it be so the brother or the sister in such a position be not force to do one thing or the other but it be god 's pleasure that we may be at peace with one another . for how may you be certain o wife that you will not be the cause of salvation to your husband ? or you o husband that you may not do the same for your wife ? only a the lord have give to a man and a be the purpose of god for him so let him go on living . and these be my order for all the church . if any man who be a christian have have circumcision let him keep so and if any man who be a christian have not have circumcision let him make no change . circumcision be nothing and it opposite be nothing but only do the order of god be of value . let every man keep the position in which he have be place by god . if you be a servant when you become a christian let it not be a grief to you but if you have a chance to become free make use of it . for he who be a servant when he become a christian be the lord 's free man and he who be free when he become a christian be the lord 's servant . it be the lord who have make payment for you be not servant of men . my brother let every man keep in that condition which be the purpose of god for him . now about virgin i have no order from the lord but i give my opinion a one to whom the lord have give mercy to be true to him . in my opinion then because of the present trouble it be good for a man to keep a he be . if you be marry to a wife make no attempt to get free from her if you be free from a wife do not take a wife . if you get marry it be not a sin and if an unmarried woman get married it be not a sin . but those who do so will have trouble in the flesh . but i will not be hard on you . but i say this my brother the time be short and from now it will be wise for those who have wife to be a if they have them not and for those who be in sorrow to give no sign of it and for those who be glad to give no sign of joy and for those who be get property to be a if they have nothing and for those who make use of the world not to be use it fully for this world 's way of life will quickly come to an end . but it be my desire for you to be free from care . the unmarried man give his mind to the thing of the lord how he may give pleasure to the lord but the married man give his attention to the thing of this world how he may give pleasure to his wife . and the wife be not the same a the virgin . the virgin give her mind to the thing of the lord so that she may be holy in body and in spirit but the married woman take think for the thing of the world how she may give pleasure to her husband . now i say this for your profit not to make thing hard for you but because of what be right and so that you may be able to give all your attention to the thing of the lord . but if in any man 's opinion he be not do what be right for his virgin if she be past her best year and there be need for it let him do what seem right to him it be no sin let them be marry . but the man who be strong in mind and purpose who be not force but have control over his desire do well if he come to the decision to keep her a virgin . so then he who get marry to his virgin do well and he who keep her unmarried do well . it be right for a wife to be with her husband as long a he be live but when her husband be dead she be free to be marry to another but only to a christian . but it will be good for her to keep a she be in my opinion and it seem to me that i have the spirit of god .now about thing offer to image we all seem to ourselves to when i be present but now much more when i be not with you give yourselves to work out your salvation with fear in your heart for it be god who be the cause of your desire and of your act for his good pleasure . do all thing without protest and argument so that you may be holy and gentle child of god without sin in a twisted and foolish generation among whom you be see a light in the world offer the word of life so that i may have glory in you in the day of christ because my running be not for nothing and my work be not without effect . and even if i be offer like a drink offering give myself for the cause and work of your faith i be glad and have joy with you all and in the same way do you be glad and have a part in my joy . but i be hop in the lord jesus to send timothy to you before long so that i may be comfort when i have news of you . for i have no man of like mind who will truly have care for you . for they all go after what be theirs not after the thing of christ . but his quality be clear to you how a a child be to it father so he be a help to me in the work of the good news . him then i be hop to send as quickly a possible when i be able to see how thing will go for me but i have faith in the lord that i myself will come before long . but it seem to me necessary to send to you epaphroditus my brother who have take part with me in the work and in the fight and your servant send by you for help in my need because his heart be with you all and he be greatly troubled because you have news that he be ill for in fact he be ill almost to death but god have mercy on him and not only on him but on me so that i might not have grief on grief . i have send him then the more gladly so that when you see him again you may be happy and i may have the less sorrow . so take him to your heart in the lord with all joy and give honour to such a he be because for the work of christ he be near to death put his life in danger to make your care for me complete .for the rest my brother be glad in the lord . write the same thing to you be no trouble to me and for you it be safe . be on the watch against dog against the worker of evil against those of the circumcision for we be the circumcision who give worship to god and have glory in jesus christ and have no faith in the flesh even though i myself might have faith in the flesh if any other man have reason to have faith in the flesh i have more be give circumcision on the eighth day of the nation of israel of the tribe of benjamin a hebrew of hebrew in relation to the law a pharisee in bitter hate i be cruel to the church i keep all the righteousness of the law to the last detail . but those thing which be profit to me i give up for christ . yes truly and i be ready to give up all thing for the knowledge of christ jesus my lord which be more than all for whom i have undergo the loss of all thing and to me they be less than nothing so that i may have christ a my reward and be see in him not have my righteousness which be of the law but that which be through faith in christ the righteousness which be of god by faith that i may have knowledge of him and of the power of his come back from the dead and a part with him in his pain become like him in his death if in any way i may have the reward of life from the dead . not a if i have even now get the reward or be make complete but i go on in the hope that i may come to the knowledge of that for which i be make the servant of christ jesus . brother it be clear to me that i have not come to that knowledge but one thing i do let go those thing which be past and stretch out to the thing which be before i go forward to the mark even the reward of the high purpose of god in christ jesus . then let u all who have come to full growth be of this mind and if in anything you be of a different mind even this will god make clear to you only as far a we have get let u be guide by the same rule . brother take me a your example and take note of those who be walk after the example we have give . for there be those of whom i have give you word before and do so now with sorrow who be hater of the cross of christ whose end be destruction whose god be the stomach and whose glory be in their shame whose mind be fix on the thing of the earth . for our country be in heaven from where the saviour for whom we be wait will come even the lord jesus christ by whom this poor body of ours will be change into the image of the body of his glory in the measure of the working by which he be able to put all thing under himself .so my brother well love give effect to it . but i will not say anything about my need for i be able wherever i be to be dependent on myself . it be the same to me if i be look down on or honour everywhere and in all thing i
